original: RV_10.001.01.1{29} agre bṛhannuṣasāmūrdhvo asthān nirjaganvān tamasojyotiṣāgāt
analyzed: agre bṛhan uṣasām ūrdhvaḥ asthāt nirjaganvān tamasaḥ jyotiṣā āgāt

original: RV_10.001.01.2{29} agnirbhānunā ruśatā svaṅga ā jātoviśvā sadmānyaprāḥ
analyzed: agniḥ bhānunā ruśatā su aṅgaḥ ā jātaḥ viśvā sadmāni aprāḥ

original: RV_10.001.02.1{29} sa jāto garbho asi rodasyoragne cārurvibhṛta oṣadhīṣu
analyzed: sa jātaḥ garbhaḥ asi rodasyoḥ agne cāruḥ vibhṛtaḥ oṣadhīṣu

original: RV_10.001.02.2{29} citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsyaktūn pra mātṛbhyo adhikanikradat gāḥ
analyzed: citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsi aktūn pra mātṛbhyaḥ adhikanikradat gāḥ

original: RV_10.001.03.1{29} viṣṇuritthā paramamasya vidvāñ jāto bṛhannabhi pātitṛtīyam
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ itthā paramam asya vidvān jātaḥ bṛhan abhi pāti tṛtīyam

original: RV_10.001.03.2{29} āsā yadasya payo akrata svaṃ sacetaso abhyarcantyatra
analyzed: āsā yat asya payaḥ akrata svam sacetasaḥ abhyarcanti atra

original: RV_10.001.04.1{29} ata u tvā pitubhṛto janitrīrannāvṛdhaṃ prati carantyannaiḥ
analyzed: atas u tvā pitu bhṛtaḥ janitrīḥ annāvṛdham prati caranti annaiḥ

original: RV_10.001.04.2{29} tā īṃ pratyeṣi punaranyarūpā asi tvaṃ vikṣumānuṣīṣu hotā
analyzed: tāḥ īm pratyeṣi punar anya rūpā asi tvam vikṣu mānuṣīṣu hotā

original: RV_10.001.05.1{29} hotāraṃ citrarathamadhvarasya yajñasya-yajñasya ketuṃruśantam
analyzed: hotāram citra ratham adhvarasya yajñasya yajñasya ketuṃruśantam

original: RV_10.001.05.2{29} pratyardhiṃ devasya-devasya mahnā śriyā tvagnimatithiṃ janānām
analyzed: pratyardhim devasya devasya mahnā śriyā tu agnim atithim janānām

original: RV_10.001.06.1{29} sa tu vastrāṇyadha peśanāni vasāno agnirnābhāpṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: sa tu vastrāṇi adha peśanāni vasānaḥ agniḥ nābhāpṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_10.001.06.2{29} aruṣo jātaḥ pada iḷāyāḥ purohito rājanyakṣīha devān
analyzed: aruṣaḥ jātaḥ pade iḷāyāḥ purohitaḥ rājan yakṣi iha devān

original: RV_10.001.07.1{29} ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agna ubhe sadā putro na mātarātatantha
analyzed: ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agne ubhe sadā putraḥ na mātarā ātatantha

original: RV_10.001.07.2{29} pra yāhyachośato yaviṣṭhāthā vaha sahasyehadevān
analyzed: pra yāhi achośataḥ yaviṣṭha athā vaha sahasya ihadevān

original: RV_10.002.01.1{30} piprīhi devānuśato yaviṣṭha vidvān ṛtūnr{ṛ}tupateyajeha
analyzed: piprīhi deva anuśataḥ yaviṣṭha vidvān ṛtūn ṛtu pate yaja iha

original: RV_10.002.01.2{30} ye daivyā ṛtvijastebhiragne tvaṃ hotṝṇāmasyāyajiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: ye daivyāḥ ṛtvijaḥ tebhiḥ agne tvam hotṝṇām asi a yajiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_10.002.02.1{30} veṣi hotramuta potraṃ janānāṃ mandhātāsi draviṇodāṛtāvā
analyzed: veṣi hotram uta potram janānām mandhātā asi draviṇaḥ dāḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_10.002.02.2{30} svāhā vayaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi devo devānyajatvagnirarhan
analyzed: svāhā vayam kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi devaḥ devān yajatu agniḥ arhan

original: RV_10.002.03.1{30} ā devānāmapi panthāmaganma yacchaknavāma tadanupravoḷum
analyzed: ā devānām api panthām aganma yat śaknavāma tat anupravoḷum

original: RV_10.002.03.2{30} agnirvidvān sa yajāt sedu hotā so adhvarāṃsa ṛtūn kalpayāti
analyzed: agniḥ vidvān sa yajāt sa idu hotā saḥ adhvarāṃsaḥ ṛtūn kalpayāti

original: RV_10.002.04.1{30} yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratāni viduṣaṃ devāaviduṣṭarāsaḥ
analyzed: yat vaḥ vayam pramināma vratāni viduṣam devāḥ aviduṣṭarāsaḥ

original: RV_10.002.04.2{30} agniṣ ṭad viśvamā pṛṇāti vidvānyebhirdevān ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti
analyzed: agniḥ tat viśvam ā pṛṇāti vidvān yebhiḥ devān ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti

original: RV_10.002.05.1{30} yat pākatrā manasā dīnadakṣā na yajñasya manvatemartyāsaḥ
analyzed: yat pākatrā manasā dīna dakṣāḥ na yajñasya manvate imartyāsaḥ

original: RV_10.002.05.2{30} agniṣ ṭad dhotā kratuvid vijānanyajiṣṭho devān ṛtuśo yajāti
analyzed: agniḥ tat hotā kratu vid vijānan yajiṣṭhaḥ devān ṛtuśas yajāti

original: RV_10.002.06.1{30} viśveṣāṃ hyadhvarāṇāmanīkaṃ citraṃ ketuṃ janitātvā jajāna
analyzed: viśveṣām hi adhvarāṇām anīkam citram ketum janitā atvā jajāna

original: RV_10.002.06.2{30} sa ā yajasva nṛvatīranu kṣā spārhāiṣaḥ kṣumatīrviśvajanyāḥ
analyzed: saḥ ā yajasva nṛvatīḥ anu kṣā spārhāḥ iṣaḥ kṣumatīḥ viśvajanyāḥ

original: RV_10.002.07.1{30} yaṃ tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yaṃ tvāpastvaṣṭā yaṃ tvāsujanimā jajāna
analyzed: yam tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yam tvā apaḥ tvaṣṭā yam tvā asujanimā jajāna

original: RV_10.002.07.2{30} panthāmanu pravidvānpitṛyāṇaṃ dyumadagne samidhāno vi bhāhi
analyzed: panthām anu pravidvān pitṛyāṇam dyumat agne samidhānaḥ vi bhāhi

original: RV_10.003.01.1{31} ino rājannaratiḥ samiddho raudro dakṣāya suṣumānadarśi
analyzed: inaḥ rājan aratiḥ samiddhaḥ raudraḥ dakṣāya suṣumān adarśi

original: RV_10.003.01.2{31} cikid vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatāsiknīmeti ruśatīmapājan
analyzed: cikit vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatā asiknīm eti ruśatīm apājan

original: RV_10.003.02.1{31} kṛṣṇāṃ yadenīmabhi varpasā bhūjjanayan yoṣāmbṛhataḥ piturjām
analyzed: kṛṣṇām yadenīm abhi varpasā bhūt janayan yoṣām bṛhataḥ pituḥ jām

original: RV_10.003.02.2{31} ūrdhvaṃ bhānuṃ sūryasya stabhāyandivo vasubhiraratirvi bhāti
analyzed: ūrdhvam bhānum sūryasya stabhāyan divaḥ vasubhiḥ aratiḥ vi bhāti

original: RV_10.003.03.1{31} bhadro bhadrayā sacamāna āgāt svasāraṃ jāro abhyetipaścāt
analyzed: bhadraḥ bhadrayā sacamānaḥ āgāt svasāram jāraḥ abhyeti paścāt

original: RV_10.003.03.2{31} supraketairdyubhiragnirvitiṣṭhan ruśadbhirvarṇairabhi rāmamasthāt
analyzed: su praketaiḥ dyubhiḥ agniḥ vitiṣṭhan ruśadbhiḥ varṇaiḥ abhi rāmam asthāt

original: RV_10.003.04.1{31} asya yāmāso bṛhato na vagnūnindhānā agneḥ sakhyuḥśivasya
analyzed: asya yāmāsaḥ bṛhataḥ na vagnūn indhānāḥ agneḥ sakhyuḥśivasya

original: RV_10.003.04.2{31} iḍyasya vṛṣṇo bṛhataḥ svāso bhāmāso yāmannaktavaścikitre
analyzed: iḍyasya vṛṣṇaḥ bṛhataḥ svāsaḥ bhāmāsaḥ yāman naktavaḥ cikitre

original: RV_10.003.05.1{31} svanā na yasya bhāmāsaḥ pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥsudivaḥ
analyzed: svanāḥ na yasya bhāmāsaḥ pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥsudivaḥ

original: RV_10.003.05.2{31} jyeṣṭhebhiryastejiṣṭhaiḥ krīḷumadbhirvarṣiṣṭhebhirbhānubhirnakṣati dyām
analyzed: jyeṣṭhebhiḥ yaḥ tejiṣṭhaiḥ krīḍumadbhiḥ varṣiṣṭhebhiḥ bhānubhiḥ nakṣati dyām

original: RV_10.003.06.1{31} asya śuṣmāso dadṛśānapaverjehamānasya svanayan niyudbhiḥ
analyzed: asya śuṣmāsaḥ dadṛśāna paveḥ jehamānasya svanayan niyudbhiḥ

original: RV_10.003.06.2{31} pratnebhiryo ruśadbhirdevatamo vi rebhadbhiraratirbhāti vibhvā
analyzed: pratnebhiḥ yaḥ ruśadbhiḥ devatamaḥ vi rebhadbhiḥ aratiḥ bhāti vibhvā

original: RV_10.003.07.1{31} sa ā vakṣi mahi na ā ca satsi divaspṛthivyoraratiryuvatyoḥ
analyzed: saḥ ā vakṣi mahi naḥ ā ca satsi divaspṛthivyoḥ aratiḥ yuvatyoḥ

original: RV_10.003.07.2{31} agniḥ sutukaḥ sutukebhiraśvai rabhasvadbhīrabhasvāneha gamyāḥ
analyzed: agniḥ su tukaḥ su tukebhiḥ aśvaiḥ rabhasvat bhī rabhasvān iha gamyāḥ

original: RV_10.004.01.1{32} pra te yakṣi pra ta iyarmi manma bhuvo yathā vandyo nohaveṣu
analyzed: pra te yakṣi pra te iyarmi manma bhuvaḥ yathā vandyaḥ nohaveṣu

original: RV_10.004.01.2{32} dhanvanniva prapā asi tvamagna iyakṣave pūravepratna rājan
analyzed: dhanvan iva prapāḥ asi tvam agne iyakṣave pūrave pratna rājan

original: RV_10.004.02.1{32} yaṃ tvā janāso abhi saṃcaranti gāva uṣṇamiva vrajaṃyaviṣṭha
analyzed: yam tvā janāsaḥ abhi saṃcaranti gāvaḥ uṣṇam iva vrajaṃyaviṣṭha

original: RV_10.004.02.2{32} dūto devānāmasi martyānāmantarmahāṃścarasi rocanena
analyzed: dūtaḥ devānām asi martyānām antar mahān carasi rocanena

original: RV_10.004.03.1{32} śiśuṃ na tvā jenyaṃ vardhayantī mātā bibhartisacanasyamānā
analyzed: śiśum na tvā jenyam vardhayantī mātā bibhartisacanasyamānā

original: RV_10.004.03.2{32} dhanoradhi pravatā yāsi haryañ jigīṣasepaśurivāvasṛṣṭaḥ
analyzed: dhanoḥ adhi pravatā yāsi haryam jigīṣase paśuḥ iva avasṛṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10.004.04.1{32} mūrā amūra na vayaṃ cikitvo mahitvamagne tvamaṅga vitse
analyzed: mūrāḥ amūra na vayam cikitvaḥ mahitvam agne tvam aṅga vitse

original: RV_10.004.04.2{32} śaye vavriścarati jihvayādan rerihyate yuvatiṃviśpatiḥ san
analyzed: śaye vavriḥ carati jihvayā adan rerihyate yuvatiṃviśpatiḥ san

original: RV_10.004.05.1{32} kūcijjāyate sanayāsu navyo vane tasthau palito dhūmaketuḥ
analyzed: kūcid jāyate sanayāsu navyaḥ vane tasthau palitaḥ dhūmaketuḥ

original: RV_10.004.05.2{32} asnātāpo vṛṣabho na pra veti sacetaso yaṃ parṇayantamartāḥ
analyzed: a snāta apaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na pra veti sacetasaḥ yam parṇayantam artāḥ

original: RV_10.004.06.1{32} tanūtyajeva taskarā vanargu raśanābhirdaśabhirabhyadhītām
analyzed: tanūtyajā iva taskarāḥ vanargu raśanābhiḥ daśabhiḥ abhyadhītām

original: RV_10.004.06.2{32} iyaṃ te agne navyasī manīṣā yukṣvā rathaṃna śucayadbhiraṅgaiḥ
analyzed: iyam te agne navyasī manīṣā yukṣvā rathaṃna śucayadbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ

original: RV_10.004.07.1{32} brahma ca te jātavedo namaśceyaṃ ca gīḥ sadamidvardhanī bhūt
analyzed: brahma ca te jātavedaḥ namaḥ ca iyam ca gīḥ sadam id vardhanī bhūt

original: RV_10.004.07.2{32} rakṣā ṇo agne tanayāni tokā rakṣota nastanvo aprayuchan
analyzed: rakṣa naḥ agne tanayāni tokā rakṣa uta naḥ tanvaḥ aprayuchan

original: RV_10.005.01.1{33} ekaḥ samudro dharuṇo rayīṇāmasmad dhṛdo bhūrijanmā vicaṣṭe
analyzed: ekaḥ samudraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām asmat dhṛdaḥ bhūri janmā vicaṣṭe

original: RV_10.005.01.2{33} siṣaktyūdharniṇyorupastha utsasya madhyenihitaṃ padaṃ veḥ
analyzed: siṣakti ūdhar niṇyoḥ upasthe utsasya madhye nihitam padam veḥ

original: RV_10.005.02.1{33} samānaṃ nīḷaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasānāḥ saṃ jagmire mahiṣāarvatībhiḥ
analyzed: samānam nīḍam vṛṣaṇaḥ vasānāḥ sam jagmire mahiṣa aarvatībhiḥ

original: RV_10.005.02.2{33} ṛtasya padaṃ kavayo ni pānti guhā nāmānidadhire parāṇi
analyzed: ṛtasya padam kavayaḥ ni pānti guhā nāmā nidadhire parāṇi

original: RV_10.005.03.1{33} ṛtāyinī māyinī saṃ dadhāte mitvā śiśuṃ jajñaturvardhayantī
analyzed: ṛtāyinī māyinī sam dadhāte mitvā śiśum jajñatuḥ vardhayantī

original: RV_10.005.03.2{33} viśvasya nābhiṃ carato dhruvasya kaveścittantuṃ manasā viyantaḥ
analyzed: viśvasya nābhim carataḥ dhruvasya kaveḥ cit tantum manasā viyantaḥ

original: RV_10.005.04.1{33} ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ sujātamiṣo vājāya pradivaḥsacante
analyzed: ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ su jāta miṣaḥ vājāya pradivaḥsacante

original: RV_10.005.04.2{33} adhīvāsaṃ rodasī vāvasāne ghṛtairannairvāvṛdhāte madhūnām
analyzed: adhīvāsam rodasī vāvasāne ghṛtaiḥ annaiḥ vāvṛdhāte madhūnām

original: RV_10.005.05.1{33} sapta svasṝraruṣīrvāvaśāno vidvān madhva ujjabhārādṛśe kam
analyzed: sapta svasṝḥ aruṣīḥ vāvaśānaḥ vidvān madhvaḥ ujjabhāra ādṛśe kam

original: RV_10.005.05.2{33} antaryeme antarikṣe purājā ichan vavrimavidatpūṣaṇasya
analyzed: antar yeme antarikṣe purājāḥ ichan vavrim avidat pūṣaṇasya

original: RV_10.005.06.1{33} sapta maryādāḥ kavayastatakṣustāsāmekāmidabhyaṃhuro gāt
analyzed: sapta maryādāḥ kavayaḥ tatakṣuḥ tāsām ekām id abhyaṃhuraḥ gāt

original: RV_10.005.06.2{33} āyorha skambha upamasya nīḷe pathāṃvisarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau
analyzed: āyoḥ ha skambhaḥ upamasya nīḍe pathām visarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau

original: RV_10.005.07.1{33} asacca sacca parame vyoman dakṣasya janmannaditerupasthe
analyzed: asat ca sat ca parame vyoman dakṣasya janman aditeḥ upasthe

original: RV_10.005.07.2{33} agnirha naḥ pra thamajā ṛtasya pūrva āyuni vṛṣabhaścadhenuḥ
analyzed: agniḥ ha naḥ pra thama jāḥ ṛtasya pūrve āyuni vṛṣabhaḥ cadhenuḥ

original: RV_10.006.01.1{01} ayaṃ sa yasya śarmannavobhiragneredhate jaritābhiṣṭau
analyzed: ayam sa yasya śarman navobhiḥ agneḥ edhate jaritā abhiṣṭau

original: RV_10.006.01.2{01} jyeṣṭhebhiryo bhānubhir{ṛ}ṣūṇāṃ paryeti parivītovibhāvā
analyzed: jyeṣṭhebhiḥ yaḥ bhānubhiḥ ṛṣūṇām paryeti parivītaḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_10.006.02.1{01} yo bhanubhirvibhāvā vibhātyagnirdevebhir{ṛ}tāvājasraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ bhanubhiḥ vibhāvā vibhāti agniḥ devebhiḥ ṛtau ājasraḥ

original: RV_10.006.02.2{01} ā yo vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyo 'parihvṛto atyo na saptiḥ
analyzed: ā yaḥ vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyaḥ parihvṛtaḥ atyaḥ na saptiḥ

original: RV_10.006.03.1{01} īśe yo viśvasyā devavīterīśe viśvāyuruṣasovyuṣṭau
analyzed: īśe yaḥ viśvasyāḥ deva vīteḥ īśe viśvāyuḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_10.006.03.2{01} ā yasmin manā havīṃṣyagnāvariṣṭarathaskabhnāti śūṣaiḥ
analyzed: ā yasmin manāḥ havīṃṣi agnau ariṣṭa rathaḥ skabhnāti śūṣaiḥ

original: RV_10.006.04.1{01} śūṣebhirvṛdho juṣāṇo arkairdevānachā raghupatvājigāti
analyzed: śūṣebhiḥ vṛdhaḥ juṣāṇaḥ arkaiḥ devān achā raghu patvā ājigāti

original: RV_10.006.04.2{01} mandro hotā sa juhvā yajiṣṭhaḥ sammiślo agnirā jigharti devān
analyzed: mandraḥ hotā sa juhvā yajiṣṭhaḥ sammiślaḥ agniḥ ā jigharti devān

original: RV_10.006.05.1{01} tamusrāmindraṃ na rejamānamagniṃ gīrbhirnamobhirākṛṇudhvam
analyzed: tam usrām indram na rejamānam agnim gīrbhiḥ namobhiḥ ākṛṇudhvam

original: RV_10.006.05.2{01} ā yaṃ viprāso matibhirgṛṇanti jātavedasaṃjuhvaṃ sahānām
analyzed: ā yam viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ gṛṇanti jātavedasam juhvam sahānām

original: RV_10.006.06.1{01} saṃ yasmin viśvā vasūni jagmurvāje nāśvāḥsaptīvanta evaiḥ
analyzed: sam yasmin viśvā vasūni jagmuḥ vāje na aśvāḥ saptīvantaḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_10.006.06.2{01} asme ūtīrindravātatamā arvācīnāagna ā kṛṇuṣva
analyzed: asme ūtīḥ indra vātatamāḥ arvācīnāḥ agne ā kṛṇuṣva

original: RV_10.006.07.1{01} adhā hyagne mahnā niṣadyā sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūtha
analyzed: adhā hi agne mahnā niṣadyā sadyas jajñānaḥ havyaḥ babhūtha

original: RV_10.006.07.2{01} taṃ te devāso anu ketamāyannadhāvardhanta prathamāsaūmāḥ
analyzed: tam te devāsaḥ anu ketam āyan adha avardhanta prathamāḥ aūmāḥ

original: RV_10.007.01.1{02} svasti no divo agne pṛthivyā viśvāyurdhehi yajathāya deva
analyzed: svasti naḥ divaḥ agne pṛthivyāḥ viśvāyuḥ dhehi yajathāya deva

original: RV_10.007.01.2{02} sacemahi tava dasma praketairuruṣyā ṇa urubhirdevaśaṃsaiḥ
analyzed: sacemahi tava dasma praketaiḥ uruṣya naḥ urubhiḥ deva śaṃsaiḥ

original: RV_10.007.02.1{02} imā agne matayastubhyaṃ jātā gobhiraśvairabhi gṛṇantiradhaḥ
analyzed: imāḥ agne matayaḥ tubhyam jātāḥ gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ abhi gṛṇantiḥ adhas

original: RV_10.007.02.2{02} yadā te marto anu bhogamānaḍ vaso dadhānomatibhiḥ sujāta
analyzed: yadā te martaḥ anu bhogam ānaṭ vaso dadhānaḥ matibhiḥ su jāta

original: RV_10.007.03.1{02} agniṃ manye pitaramagnimāpimagniṃ bhrātaraṃ sadamitsakhāyam
analyzed: agnim manye pitaram agnim āpim agnim bhrātaram sadam id sakhāyam

original: RV_10.007.03.2{02} agneranīkaṃ bṛhataḥ saparyaṃ divi śukraṃyajataṃ sūryasya
analyzed: agneḥ anīkam bṛhataḥ saparyam divi śukraṃyajatam sūryasya

original: RV_10.007.04.1{02} sidhrā agne dhiyo asme sanutrīryaṃ trāyase dama ānityahotā
analyzed: sidhrāḥ agne dhiyaḥ asme sanutrīryam trāyase dame ānitya hotā

original: RV_10.007.04.2{02} ṛtavā sa rohidaśvaḥ purukṣurdyubhirasmāahabhirvāmamastu
analyzed: ṛtavā sa rohit aśvaḥ purukṣuḥ dyubhiḥ asmāahabhiḥ vāmam astu

original: RV_10.007.05.1{02} dyubhirhitaṃ mitramiva prayogaṃ pratnam ṛtvijamadhvarasyajāram
analyzed: dyubhiḥ hitam mitram iva prayogam pratnam ṛtvijam adhvarasya ajāram

original: RV_10.007.05.2{02} bāhubhyāmagnimāyavo 'jananta vikṣu hotāraṃ nyasādayanta
analyzed: bāhubhyām agnim āyavaḥ jananta vikṣu hotāram nyasādayanta

original: RV_10.007.06.1{02} svayaṃ yajasva divi deva devān kiṃ te pākaḥ kṛṇavadapracetāḥ
analyzed: svayam yajasva divi deva devān kim te pākaḥ kṛṇavat apracetāḥ

original: RV_10.007.06.2{02} yathāyaja ṛtubhirdeva devānevā yajasvatanvaṃ sujāta
analyzed: yathā ayajaḥ ṛtubhiḥ deva devān evā yajasva tanvam su jāta

original: RV_10.007.07.1{02} bhavā no agne 'vitota gopā bhavā vayaskṛduta novayodhāḥ
analyzed: bhava naḥ agne vitā uta gopāḥ bhava vayaskṛt uta no vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_10.007.07.2{02} rāsvā ca naḥ sumaho havyadātiṃ trāsvota nastanvo aprayuchan
analyzed: rāsvā ca naḥ su mahas havya dātim trāsvā uta naḥ tanvaḥ aprayuchan

original: RV_10.008.01.1{03} pra ketunā bṛhatā yātyagnirā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti
analyzed: pra ketunā bṛhatā yāti agniḥ ā rodasī vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti

original: RV_10.008.01.2{03} divaścidantānupamānudānaḷ apāmupasthe mahiṣovavardha
analyzed: divaḥ cit antān upamān udānaḥ apām upasthe mahiṣaḥ uvavardha

original: RV_10.008.02.1{03} mumoda garbho vṛṣabhaḥ kakudmānasremā vatsaḥ śimīvānarāvīt
analyzed: mumoda garbhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ kakudmān asremā vatsaḥ śimīvān arāvīt

original: RV_10.008.02.2{03} sa devatātyudyatāni kṛṇvan sveṣu kṣayeṣuprathamo jigāti
analyzed: sa devatā ati udyatāni kṛṇvan sveṣu kṣayeṣu prathamaḥ jigāti

original: RV_10.008.03.1{03} ā yo mūrdhānaṃ pitrorarabdha nyadhvare dadhire sūroarṇaḥ
analyzed: ā yaḥ mūrdhānam pitroḥ arabdha ni adhvare dadhire sūroarṇaḥ

original: RV_10.008.03.2{03} asya patmannaruṣīraśvabhudhnā ṛtasya yonautanvo juṣanta
analyzed: asya patman aruṣīḥ aśva bhudhnāḥ ṛtasya yonau tanvaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_10.008.04.1{03} uṣa-uṣo hi vaso agrameṣi tvaṃ yamayorabhavo vibhāvā
analyzed: uṣā oṣaḥ hi vaso agram eṣi tvam yamayoḥ abhavaḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_10.008.04.2{03} ṛtāya sapta dadhiṣe padāni janayan mitraṃ tanve svāyai
analyzed: ṛtāya sapta dadhiṣe padāni janayan mitram tanve svāyai

original: RV_10.008.05.1{03} bhuvaścakṣurmaha ṛtasya gopā bhuvo varuṇo yad ṛtāyaveṣi
analyzed: bhuvaḥ cakṣuḥ mahaḥ ṛtasya gopāḥ bhuvaḥ varuṇaḥ yat ṛtāya veṣi

original: RV_10.008.05.2{03} bhuvo apāṃ napājjātavedo bhuvo dūto yasyahavyaṃ jujoṣaḥ
analyzed: bhuvaḥ apām napāt jātavedaḥ bhuvaḥ dūtaḥ yasya havyam jujoṣaḥ

original: RV_10.008.06.1{04} bhuvo yajñasya rajasaśca netā yatrā niyudbhiḥ sacaseśivābhiḥ
analyzed: bhuvaḥ yajñasya rajasaḥ ca netā yatrā niyudbhiḥ sacase śivābhiḥ

original: RV_10.008.06.2{04} divi mūrdhānaṃ dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ jihvāmagnecakṛṣe havyavāham
analyzed: divi mūrdhānam dadhiṣe svarṣām jihvām agne cakṛṣe havyavāham

original: RV_10.008.07.1{04} asya tritaḥ kratunā vavre antarichan dhītiṃ piturevaiḥparasya
analyzed: asya tritaḥ kratunā vavre antar ichan dhītim pituḥ eva aiḥparasya

original: RV_10.008.07.2{04} sacasyamānaḥ pitrorupasthe jāmi bruvāṇaāyudhāni veti
analyzed: sacasyamānaḥ pitroḥ upasthe jāmi bruvāṇaḥ āyudhāni vā iti

original: RV_10.008.08.1{04} sa pitryāṇyāyudhani vidvanindreṣita āptyo abhyayudhyat
analyzed: sa pitryāṇi āyudhani vidvan indra iṣitaḥ āptyaḥ abhyayudhyat

original: RV_10.008.08.2{04} triśīrṣāṇaṃ saptaraśmiṃ jaghanvān tvāṣṭrasya cinniḥ sasṛje trito gāḥ
analyzed: tri śīrṣāṇam sapta raśmim jaghanvān tvāṣṭrasya cit niḥ sasṛje tritaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_10.008.09.1{04} bhūrīdindra udinakṣantamojo 'vābhinat satpatirmanyamānam
analyzed: bhūri id indraḥ udinakṣantam ojaḥ vā abhinat satpatiḥ manyamānam

original: RV_10.008.09.2{04} tvāṣṭrasya cid viśvarūpasya gonāmācakraṇastrīṇi śīrṣā parā vark
analyzed: tvāṣṭrasya cit viśva rūpasya gonāma ācakraṇaḥ trīṇi śīrṣā parā vark

original: RV_10.009.01.1{05} āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvastā na ūrje dadhātana
analyzed: āpaḥ hi stha mayobhuvaḥ tāḥ naḥ ūrje dadhātana

original: RV_10.009.01.2{05} maheraṇāya cakṣase
analyzed: maheraṇāya cakṣase

original: RV_10.009.02.1{05} yo vaḥ śivatamo rasastasya bhajayateha naḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śivatamaḥ rasaḥ tasya bhajayata iha naḥ

original: RV_10.009.02.2{05} uśatīrivamātaraḥ
analyzed: uśatīḥ iva mātaraḥ

original: RV_10.009.03.1{05} tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha
analyzed: tasmai aram gamāma vaḥ yasya kṣayāya jinvatha

original: RV_10.009.03.2{05} āpojanayathā ca naḥ
analyzed: āpojanayathā ca naḥ

original: RV_10.009.04.1{05} śaṃ no devīrabhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye
analyzed: śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye āpaḥ bhavantu pītaye

original: RV_10.009.04.2{05} śaṃ yorabhi sravantu naḥ
analyzed: śam yos abhi sravantu naḥ

original: RV_10.009.05.1{05} īśānā vāryāṇāṃ kṣayantīścarṣaṇīnām
analyzed: īśānāḥ vāryāṇām kṣayantīḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_10.009.05.2{05} apoyācāmi bheṣajam
analyzed: apoyācāmi bheṣajam

original: RV_10.009.06.1{05} apsu me somo abravīdantarviśvāni bheṣajā
analyzed: apsu me somaḥ abravīt antar viśvāni bheṣajā

original: RV_10.009.06.2{05} agniṃ caviśvaśambhuvam
analyzed: agnim ca viśva śambhuvam

original: RV_10.009.07.1{05} āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajāṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama
analyzed: āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajām varūtham tanve mama

original: RV_10.009.07.2{05} jyok casūryaṃ dṛśe
analyzed: jyok ca sūryam dṛśe

original: RV_10.009.08.1{05} idamāpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritaṃ mayi
analyzed: idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kim ca duritam mayi

original: RV_10.009.08.2{05} yad vāhamabhidudroha yad va śepa utānṛtam
analyzed: yat vā aham abhidudroha yat vaḥ śepe uta anṛtam

original: RV_10.009.09.1{05} āpo adyānvacāriṣaṃ rasena samagasmahi
analyzed: āpaḥ adya anvacāriṣam rasena samagasmahi

original: RV_10.009.09.2{05} payasvānagnaā gahi taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcasā
analyzed: payasva anagnau gahi tam mā sam sṛja varcasā

original: RV_10.010.01.1{06} o cit sakhāyaṃ sakhyā vavṛtyāṃ tiraḥ purū cidarṇavaṃjaganvan
analyzed: ā u cit sakhāyam sakhyā vavṛtyām tiras purū cit arṇavaṃjaganvan

original: RV_10.010.01.2{06} piturnapātamā dadhīta vedhā adhi kṣamiprataraṃ didhyānaḥ
analyzed: piturnapātamā dadhīta vedhāḥ adhi kṣamiprataram didhyānaḥ

original: RV_10.010.02.1{06} na te sakhā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭyetat salakṣmā yad viṣurūpābhavāti
analyzed: na te sakhā sakhyam vaṣṭi etat salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti

original: RV_10.010.02.2{06} mahas putraso asurasya vīrā divo dhartāraurviyā pari khyan
analyzed: mahaḥ putrasaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ divaḥ dhartārā aurviyā pari khyan

original: RV_10.010.03.1{06} uśanti ghā te amṛtāsa etadekasya cit tyajasaṃ martyasya
analyzed: uśanti gha te amṛtāsaḥ etat ekasya cit tyajasam martyasya

original: RV_10.010.03.2{06} ni te mano manasi dhāyyasme janyuḥ patistanvamāviviśyāḥ
analyzed: ni te manaḥ manasi dhāyi asme janyuḥ patiḥ tanvam āviviśyāḥ

original: RV_10.010.04.1{06} na yat purā cakṛmā kad dha nūnam ṛtā vadanto anṛtaṃrapema
analyzed: na yat purā cakṛma kad ha nūnam ṛtā vadantaḥ anṛtaṃrapema

original: RV_10.010.04.2{06} gandharvo apsvapyā ca yoṣā sā no nābhiḥparamaṃ jāmi tan nau
analyzed: gandharvaḥ apsvapyā ca yoṣā sā naḥ nābhiḥ paramam jāmi tat nau

original: RV_10.010.05.1{06} garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kardevāstvaṣṭā savitāviśvarūpaḥ
analyzed: garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kaḥ devāḥ tvaṣṭā savitā a viśva rūpaḥ

original: RV_10.010.05.2{06} nākirasya pra minanti vratāni veda nāvasyapṛthivi uta dyauḥ
analyzed: nākirasya pra minanti vratāni veda nāvasyapṛthivi uta dyauḥ

original: RV_10.010.06.1{07} ko asya veda prathamasyāhnaḥ ka īṃ dadarśa ka iha pravocat
analyzed: kaḥ asya veda prathamasya ahnaḥ kaḥ īm dadarśa kaḥ iha pravocat

original: RV_10.010.06.2{07} bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kadu brava āhanovīcyā nṝn
analyzed: bṛhat mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kadu bravaḥ āhanā uvīcyā nṝn

original: RV_10.010.07.1{07} yamasya mā yamyaṃ kāma āgan samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya
analyzed: yamasya mā yamyam kāmaḥ āgan samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya

original: RV_10.010.07.2{07} jāyeva patye tanvaṃ riricyāṃ vi cid vṛheva rathyeva cakrā
analyzed: jāyā iva patye tanvam riricyām vi cit vṛheva rathyā iva cakrā

original: RV_10.010.08.1{07} na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣantyete devānāṃ spaśa iha yecaranti
analyzed: na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣanti ete devānām spaśaḥ iha ye caranti

original: RV_10.010.08.2{07} anyena madāhano yāhi tuyaṃ tena vi vṛha rathyevacakrā
analyzed: anyena mad āhanaḥ yāhi tuyam tena vi vṛha rathyā iva cakrā

original: RV_10.010.09.1{07} rātrībhirasmā ahabhirdaśasyet sūryasya cakṣurmuhurunmimīyāt
analyzed: rātrībhiḥ asmai ahabhiḥ daśasyet sūryasya cakṣuḥ muhur unmimīyāt

original: RV_10.010.09.2{07} divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū yamīryamasyabibhṛyādajāmi
analyzed: divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū yamīḥ yamasi abibhṛyāt ajāmi

original: RV_10.010.10.1{07} ā ghā tā gachānuttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavannajāmi
analyzed: ā gha tā gacha anuttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavan ajāmi

original: RV_10.010.10.2{07} upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhumanyamichasva subhagepatiṃ mat
analyzed: upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhumanyam ichasva subhagepatim mat

original: RV_10.010.11.1{08} kiṃ bhratāsad yadanāthaṃ bhavāti kimu svasā yan nir{ṛ}tirnigachat
analyzed: kim bhratā asat yat anātham bhavāti kimu svasā yat nirṛtiḥ nigacchat

original: RV_10.010.11.2{08} kāmamūtā bahvetad rapāmi tanvā me tanvaṃ sampipṛgdhi
analyzed: kāma mūtā bahu etat rapāmi tanvāḥ me tanvam sampipṛgdhi

original: RV_10.010.12.1{08} na vā u te tanvā tanvaṃ saṃ papṛcyāṃ pāpamāhuryaḥsvasāraṃ nigachāt
analyzed: na vai u te tanvā tanvam sam papṛcyām pāpam āhuḥ yaḥ svasāram nigacchāt

original: RV_10.010.12.2{08} anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na tebhrāta subhage vaṣṭyetat
analyzed: anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te bhrāta subhage vaṣṭi etat

original: RV_10.010.13.1{08} bato batasi yama naiva te mano hṛdayaṃ cāvidāma
analyzed: bataḥ batasi yama na eva te manaḥ hṛdayam ca avidāma

original: RV_10.010.13.2{08} anyā kilatvāṃ kakṣyeva yuktaṃ pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam
analyzed: anyā kila tvām kakṣyā iva yuktam pari svajāte libujā iva vṛkṣam

original: RV_10.010.14.1{08} anyamū ṣu tvaṃ yamyanya u tvāṃ pari ṣvajāte libujevavṛkṣam
analyzed: anyamū su tvam yami anye u tvām pari svajāte

original: RV_10.010.14.2{08} tasya vā tvaṃ mana ichā sa vā tavādhā kṛṇuṣvasaṃvidaṃ subhadrām
analyzed: tasya vā tvam manaḥ icha sa vā tava adhā kṛṇuṣva a saṃvidam su bhadrām

original: RV_10.011.01.1{09} vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvo aditeradābhyaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvaḥ aditeḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_10.011.01.2{09} viśvaṃ sa veda varuṇo yathā dhiyā sayajñiyo yajatu yajñiyān ṛtūn
analyzed: viśvam sa veda varuṇaḥ yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyaḥ yajatu yajñiyān ṛtūn

original: RV_10.011.02.1{09} rapad gandharvīrapyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātume manaḥ
analyzed: rapat gandharvī rapyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātume manaḥ

original: RV_10.011.02.2{09} iṣṭasya madhye aditirni dhātu no bhrātā nojyeṣṭhaḥ prathamo vi vocati
analyzed: iṣṭasya madhye aditiḥ ni dhātu naḥ bhrātā nojyeṣṭhaḥ prathamaḥ vi vocati

original: RV_10.011.03.1{09} so cin nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvatyuṣā uvāsa manavesvarvatī
analyzed: sā u cit nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvatī uṣāḥ uvāsa manave isvarvatī

original: RV_10.011.03.2{09} yadīmuśantamuśatāmanu kratumagniṃhotāraṃ vidathāya jījanan
analyzed: yadi īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agniṃhotāram vidathāya jījanan

original: RV_10.011.04.1{09} adha tyaṃ drapsaṃ vibhvaṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ virābharadiṣitaḥ śyeno adhvare
analyzed: adha tyam drapsam vibhvam vicakṣaṇam virābharat iṣitaḥ śyenaḥ adhvare

original: RV_10.011.04.2{09} yadī viśo vṛṇate dasmamāryāagniṃ hotāramadha dhīrajāyata
analyzed: yadi viśaḥ vṛṇate dasmam āryāḥ agnim hotāram adha dhīḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10.011.05.1{09} sadāsi raṇvo yavaseva puṣyate hotrābhiragne manuṣaḥsvadhvaraḥ
analyzed: sadā asi raṇvaḥ yavasā iva puṣyate hotrābhiḥ agne manuṣaḥsu adhvaraḥ

original: RV_10.011.05.2{09} viprasya vā yacchaśamāna ukthyaṃ vājaṃsasavānupayāsi bhūribhiḥ
analyzed: viprasya vā yat śaśamānaḥ ukthyam vājaṃsasavān upayāsi bhūribhiḥ

original: RV_10.011.06.1{10} udīraya pitarā jāra ā bhagamiyakṣati haryato hṛttaiṣyati
analyzed: udīraya pitarā jāraḥ ā bhagam iyakṣati haryataḥ

original: RV_10.011.06.2{10} vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhastaviṣyate asurovepate matī
analyzed: vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhaḥ taviṣyate asuraḥ vepate matī

original: RV_10.011.07.1{10} yaste agne sumatiṃ marto akṣat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa praśṛṇve
analyzed: yaḥ te agne sumatim martaḥ akṣat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa praśṛṇve

original: RV_10.011.07.2{10} iṣaṃ dadhāno vahamāno aśvairā sa dyumānamavān bhūṣati dyūn
analyzed: iṣam dadhānaḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ ā sa dyumān amavān bhūṣati dyūn

original: RV_10.011.08.1{10} yadagna eṣā samitirbhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra
analyzed: yat agne eṣā samitiḥ bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra

original: RV_10.011.08.2{10} ratnā ca yad vibhajāsi svadhāvo bhāgaṃ no atra vasumantaṃvītāt
analyzed: ratnā ca yat vibhajāsi svadhāvas bhāgam naḥ atra vasumantaṃvītāt

original: RV_10.011.09.1{10} śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā rathamamṛtasyadravitnum
analyzed: śrudhi naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣva ratham amṛtasya dravitnum

original: RV_10.011.09.2{10} ā no vaha rodasī devaputre mākirdevānāmapabhūriha syāḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ vaha rodasī deva putre mākir devānām apabhūḥ iha syāḥ

original: RV_10.012.01.1{11} dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtenābhiśrāve bhavataḥsatyavācā
analyzed: dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtena abhiśrāve bhavataḥ satya vācā

original: RV_10.012.01.2{11} devo yan martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdaddhotā pratyaṃ svamasuṃ yan
analyzed: devaḥ yat martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdat hotā pratyam sva masum yan

original: RV_10.012.02.1{11} devo devān paribhūr{ṛ}tena vahā no havyaṃ prathamaścikitvān
analyzed: devaḥ devān paribhūḥ ṛtena vaha naḥ havyam prathamaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_10.012.02.2{11} dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīko mandro hotā nityovācā yajīyān
analyzed: dhūma ketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīkaḥ mandraḥ hotā nitya uvācā yajīyān

original: RV_10.012.03.1{11} svāvṛg devasyāmṛtaṃ yadī gorato jātāso dhārayantaurvī
analyzed: svāvṛj devasya amṛtam yadi goḥ rataḥ jātāsaḥ dhārayanta aurvī

original: RV_10.012.03.2{11} viśve devā anu tat te yajurgurduhe yadenīdivyaṃ ghṛtaṃ vāḥ
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anu tat te yajuḥ guḥ duhe ghṛtam vār

original: RV_10.012.04.1{11} arcāmi vāṃ vardhāyāpo ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutaṃrodasī me
analyzed: arcāmi vām vardhāya apaḥ ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutam rodasī me

original: RV_10.012.04.2{11} ahā yad dyāvo 'sunītimayan madhvā no atrapitarā śiśītām
analyzed: ahā yat dyāvaḥ sunītimayan madhvā naḥ atra pitarā śiśītām

original: RV_10.012.05.1{11} kiṃ svin no rājā jagṛhe kadasyāti vrataṃ cakṛmā ko viveda
analyzed: kim svid naḥ rājā jagṛhe kadasya ati vratam cakṛma kaḥ viveda

original: RV_10.012.05.2{11} mitraścid dhi ṣmā juhurāṇo devāñchloko nayātāmapi vājo asti
analyzed: mitraḥ cit hi sma juhurāṇaḥ devān ślokaḥ nayātām api vājaḥ asti

original: RV_10.012.06.1{12} durmantvatrāmṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yad viṣurūpābhavāti
analyzed: nāma salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti

original: RV_10.012.06.2{12} yamasya yo manavate sumantvagne tam ṛṣva pāhyaprayuchan
analyzed: yamasya yaḥ manavate sumantu agne tam ṛṣva pāhi aprayuchan

original: RV_10.012.07.1{12} yasmin devā vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante

original: RV_10.012.07.2{12} sūrye jyotiradadhurmāsyaktūn pari dyotaniṃ caratoajasrā
analyzed: sūrye jyotiḥ adadhuḥ māsi aktūn pari dyotanim carataḥ ajasrā

original: RV_10.012.08.1{12} yasmin devā manmani saṃcarantyapīcye na vayamasya vidma
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ manmani saṃcaranti apīcye na vayam asya vidma

original: RV_10.012.08.2{12} mitro no atrāditiranāgān savitā devo varuṇāya vocat
analyzed: mitraḥ naḥ atra aditiḥ anāgān savitā devaḥ varuṇāya vocat

original: RV_10.012.09.1{12} śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ...
analyzed: śrudhi naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣva

original: RV_10.013.01.1{13} yuje vāṃ brahma pūrvyaṃ namobhirvi śloka etu pathyevasūreḥ
analyzed: yuje vām brahma pūrvyam namobhiḥ vi ślokaḥ etu pathyeva sūreḥ

original: RV_10.013.01.2{13} śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrā ā ye dhāmānidivyāni tasthuḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrāḥ ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuḥ

original: RV_10.013.02.1{13} yame iva yatamāne yadaitaṃ pra vāṃ bharan mānuṣādevayantaḥ
analyzed: yame iva yatamāne yadā etam pra vām bharan mānuṣāḥ devayantaḥ

original: RV_10.013.02.2{13} ā sīdataṃ svamu lokaṃ vidāne svāsasthebhavatamindave naḥ
analyzed: ā sīdatam svamu lokam vidāne svāsasthebhavatam indave naḥ

original: RV_10.013.03.1{13} pañca padāni rupo anvarohaṃ catuṣpadīmanvemi vratena
analyzed: pañca padāni rupaḥ anvaroham catuṣpadīm anvemi vratena

original: RV_10.013.03.2{13} akṣareṇa prati mima etām ṛtasya nābhāvadhi saṃ punāmi
analyzed: akṣareṇa prati mime etām ṛtasya nābhau adhi sam punāmi

original: RV_10.013.04.1{13} devebhyaḥ kamavṛṇīta mṛtyuṃ prajāyai kamamṛtaṃnāvṛṇīta
analyzed: devebhyaḥ kam avṛṇīta mṛtyum prajāyai kam amṛtam na avṛṇīta

original: RV_10.013.04.2{13} bṛhaspatiṃ yajñamakṛṇvata ṛṣiṃ priyāṃyamastanvaṃ prārirecīt
analyzed: bṛhaspatim yajñam akṛṇvata ṛṣim priyām yamaḥ tanvam prārirecīt

original: RV_10.013.05.1{13} sapta kṣaranti śiśave marutvate pitre putrāso apyavīvatannṛtam
analyzed: sapta kṣaranti śiśave marutvate pitre putrāsaḥ api avīvatan nṛtam

original: RV_10.013.05.2{13} ubhe idasyobhayasya rājata ubhe yatete ubhayasyapuṣyataḥ
analyzed: ubhe id asya ubhayasya rājataḥ ubhe yatete

original: RV_10.014.01.1{14} pareyivāṃsaṃ pravato mahīranu bahubhyaḥ panthāmanupaspaśanam
analyzed: pareyivāṃsam pravataḥ mahīḥ anu bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśanam

original: RV_10.014.01.2{14} vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃrājānaṃ haviṣā duvasya
analyzed: vaivasvatam saṃgamanam janānām yamam rājānam haviṣā duvasya

original: RV_10.014.02.1{14} yamo no gātuṃ prathamo viveda naiṣa gavyūtirapabhartavā u
analyzed: yamaḥ naḥ gātum prathamaḥ viveda na eṣa gavyūtiḥ apabhartavai u

original: RV_10.014.02.2{14} yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyurenā jajñānāḥpathyā anu svāḥ
analyzed: yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ enā jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ

original: RV_10.014.03.1{14} mātalī kavyairyamo aṅgirobhirbṛhaspatir{ṛ}kvabhirvāvṛdhānaḥ
analyzed: mātalī kavyaiḥ yamaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_10.014.03.2{14} yāṃśca devā vāvṛdhurye ca devāṃsvāhānye svadhayānye madanti
analyzed: yān ca devāḥ vāvṛdhuḥ ye ca devān svāhā anye svadhayā anye madanti

original: RV_10.014.04.1{14} imaṃ yama prastaramā hi sīdāṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥsaṃvidānaḥ
analyzed: imam yama prastaramā hi sīda aṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ

original: RV_10.014.04.2{14} ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastā vahantvenā rājanhaviṣā mādayasva
analyzed: ā tvā mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ vahantu enā rājan haviṣā mādayasva

original: RV_10.014.05.1{14} aṅgirobhirā gahi yajñiyebhiryama vairūpairiha mādayasva
analyzed: aṅgirobhiḥ ā gahi yajñiyebhiḥ yama vairūpaiḥ iha mādayasva

original: RV_10.014.05.2{14} vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te 'smin yajñe barhiṣyāniṣadya
analyzed: vivasvantam huve yaḥ pitā te smin yajñe barhiṣi a niṣadya

original: RV_10.014.06.1{15} aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ
analyzed: aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ atharvāṇaḥ bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ

original: RV_10.014.06.2{15} teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānāmapi bhadre saumanasesyāma
analyzed: teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanasesyāma

original: RV_10.014.07.1{15} prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvyebhiryatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥpareyuḥ
analyzed: prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvyebhiḥ yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ

original: RV_10.014.07.2{15} ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamaṃ paśyāsivaruṇaṃ ca devam
analyzed: ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamam paśya asi varuṇam ca devam

original: RV_10.014.08.1{15} saṃ gachasva pitṛbhiḥ saṃ yameneṣṭāpūrtena paramevyoman
analyzed: sam gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ sam yamena iṣṭāpūrtena parame vyoman

original: RV_10.014.08.2{15} hitvāyāvadyaṃ punarastamehi saṃ gachasva tanvāsuvarcāḥ
analyzed: hitvā ayāvadyam punar astam ehi sam gacchasva tanvā asu varcāḥ

original: RV_10.014.09.1{15} apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāto 'smā etaṃ pitaro lokamakran
analyzed: apeta vīta vi ca sarpata atas sma etam pitaraḥ lokam akran

original: RV_10.014.09.2{15} ahobhiradbhiraktubhirvyaktaṃ yamo dadātyavasānamasmai
analyzed: ahobhiḥ adbhiḥ aktubhiḥ vyaktam yamaḥ dadāti avasānam asmai

original: RV_10.014.10.1{15} ati drava sārameyau śvānau caturakṣau śabalau sādhunāpathā
analyzed: ati drava sārameyau śvānau catur akṣau śabalau sādhunāpathā

original: RV_10.014.10.2{15} athā pitṝn suvidatrānupehi yamena ye sadhamādammadanti
analyzed: athā pitṝn suvidatra an upehi yamena ye sadhamādam madanti

original: RV_10.014.11.1{16} yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau caturakṣau pathirakṣīnṛcakṣasau
analyzed: yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau catur akṣau pathirakṣī nṛ cakṣasau

original: RV_10.014.11.2{16} tābhyāmenaṃ pari dehi rājan svasti cāsmāanamīvaṃ ca dhehi
analyzed: tābhyām enam pari dehi rājan svasti ca asmai anamīvam ca dhehi

original: RV_10.014.12.1{16} urūṇasāvasutṛpā udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janānanu
analyzed: urūṇasau asutṛpā udumbalau yamasya dūtau carataḥ janān anu

original: RV_10.014.12.2{16} tāvasmabhyaṃ dṛśaye sūryāya punardātāmasumadyeha bhadram
analyzed: tau asmabhyam dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adya iha bhadram

original: RV_10.014.13.1{16} yamāya somaṃ sunuta yamaya juhutā haviḥ
analyzed: yamāya somam sunuta yamaya juhuta haviḥ

original: RV_10.014.13.2{16} yamaṃ ha yajñogachatyagnidūto araṃkṛtaḥ
analyzed: yamam ha yajñaḥ gacchati agni dūtaḥ araṃkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10.014.14.1{16} yamāya ghṛtavad dhavirjuhota pra ca tiṣṭhata
analyzed: yamāya ghṛtavat haviḥ juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata

original: RV_10.014.14.2{16} sa nodeveṣvā yamad dīrghamāyuḥ pra jīvase
analyzed: sa naḥ deva iṣvā yamat dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase

original: RV_10.014.15.1{16} yamāya madhumattamaṃ rājñe havyaṃ juhotana
analyzed: yamāya madhumattamam rājñe havyam juhotana

original: RV_10.014.15.2{16} idaṃ namaṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ
analyzed: idam namaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrva jebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ

original: RV_10.014.16.1{16} trikadrukebhiḥ patati ṣaḷ urvīrekamid bṛhat
analyzed: trikadrukebhiḥ patati ṣaṣ urvīḥ ekam id bṛhat

original: RV_10.014.16.2{16} triṣṭubgāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yama āhitā
analyzed: triṣṭubh gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yame āhitā

original: RV_10.015.01.1{17} udīratāmavara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥsomyāsaḥ
analyzed: udīratām avare ud parāsaḥ ud madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ

original: RV_10.015.01.2{17} asuṃ ya īyuravṛkā ṛtajñāste no 'vantupitaro haveṣu
analyzed: asum ye īyuḥ avṛkāḥ ṛta jñāḥ te naḥ vantu pitaraḥ haveṣu

original: RV_10.015.02.1{17} idaṃ pitṛbhyo namo astvadya ye pūrvāso ya uparāsa īyuḥ
analyzed: idam pitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ astu adya ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ īyuḥ

original: RV_10.015.02.2{17} ye pārthive rajasyā niṣattā ye vā nūnaṃ suvṛjanāsuvikṣu
analyzed: ye pārthive rajasyāḥ niṣattāḥ ye vā nūnam su vṛjanā su vikṣu

original: RV_10.015.03.1{17} āhaṃ pitṝn suvidatrānavitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ caviṣṇoḥ
analyzed: ā aham pitṝn suvidatrān avitsi napātam ca vikramaṇam ca viṣṇoḥ

original: RV_10.015.03.2{17} barhiṣado ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvastaihāgamiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvaḥ te ha āgamiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_10.015.04.1{17} barhiṣadaḥ pitara ūtyarvāgimā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ ūtī arvāk imā vaḥ havyā cakṛma juṣadhvam

original: RV_10.015.04.2{17} ta ā gatāvasā śantamenāthā naḥ śaṃ yorarapodadhāta
analyzed: te ā gata avasā śantamena athā naḥ śam yorarapaḥ dadhāta

original: RV_10.015.05.1{17} upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāso barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu
analyzed: upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu

original: RV_10.015.05.2{17} ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantvadhi bruvantu te 'vantvasmān
analyzed: te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu adhi bruvantu te vantu asmān

original: RV_10.015.06.1{18} ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadyemaṃ yajñamabhi gṛṇītaviśve
analyzed: ācya jānu dakṣiṇatas niṣadya imam yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve

original: RV_10.015.06.2{18} mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cin no yad va āgaḥpuruṣatā karāma
analyzed: mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cit naḥ yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma

original: RV_10.015.07.1{18} āsīnāso aruṇīnāmupasthe rayiṃ dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya
analyzed: āsīnāsaḥ aruṇīnām upasthe rayim dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_10.015.07.2{18} putrebhyaḥ pitarastasya vasvaḥ pra yachata ta ihorjandadhāta
analyzed: putrebhyaḥ pitaraḥ tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata te iha ūrjan dadhāta

original: RV_10.015.08.1{18} ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāso 'nūhire somapīthaṃvasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ nūhire soma pītham vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_10.015.08.2{18} tebhiryamaḥ saṃrarāṇo havīṃṣyuśannuśadbhiḥ pratikāmamattu
analyzed: tebhiḥ yamaḥ saṃrarāṇaḥ havīṃṣi uśan uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu

original: RV_10.015.09.1{18} ye tātṛṣurdevatrā jehamānā hotrāvida stomataṣṭāsoarkaiḥ
analyzed: ye tātṛṣuḥ devatrā jehamānāḥ hotrā vidaḥ stoma taṣṭāsaḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_10.015.09.2{18} āgne yāhi suvidatrebhirarvāṃ satyaiḥ kavyaiḥpitṛbhirgharmasadbhiḥ
analyzed: ā agne yāhi suvidatrebhiḥ arvām satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ

original: RV_10.015.10.1{18} ye satyāso havirado haviṣpā idreṇa devaiḥ sarathandadhānāḥ
analyzed: ye satyāsaḥ haviḥ adaḥ haviṣpāḥ idreṇa devaiḥ sa rathandadhānāḥ

original: RV_10.015.10.2{18} āgne yāhi sahasraṃ devavandaiḥ paraiḥpūrvaiḥ pitṛbhirgharmasadbhiḥ
analyzed: ā agne yāhi sahasram deva vandaiḥ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ

original: RV_10.015.11.1{19} agniṣvāttāḥ pitara eha gachata sadaḥ-sadaḥ sadatasupraṇītayaḥ
analyzed: agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ ā iha gacchata sadaḥ sadaḥ sadatasu praṇītayaḥ

original: RV_10.015.11.2{19} attā havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣyathārayiṃ sarvavīraṃ dadhātana
analyzed: atta havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣyatha arayim sarva vīram dadhātana

original: RV_10.015.12.1{19} tvamagna īḷito jātavedo 'vāḍ ḍhavyāni surabhīṇikṛtvī
analyzed: tvam agne īḍitaḥ jātavedaḥ vār havyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvī

original: RV_10.015.12.2{19} prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣannaddhi tvandeva prayatā havīṃṣi
analyzed: prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣan addhi tvan deva prayatā havīṃṣi

original: RV_10.015.13.1{19} ye ceha pitaro ye ca neha yāṃśca vidma yānu ca napravidma
analyzed: ye ca iha pitaraḥ ye ca na iha yān ca vidma yā anu ca na pravidma

original: RV_10.015.13.2{19} tvaṃ vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhiryajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ juṣasva
analyzed: tvam vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhiḥ yajñam su kṛtam juṣasva

original: RV_10.015.14.1{19} ye agnidagdhā ye anagnidagdhā madhye divaḥ svadhayāmādayante
analyzed: ye agni dagdhāḥ ye an agni dagdhāḥ madhye divaḥ svadhayā āmādayante

original: RV_10.015.14.2{19} tebhiḥ svarāḷ asunītimetāṃ yathāvaśantanvaṃ kalpayasva
analyzed: tebhiḥ svarāj asunītim etām yathāvaśantanvam kalpayasva

original: RV_10.016.01.1{20} mainamagne vi daho mābhi śoco māsya tvacaṃ cikṣipo māśarīram
analyzed: mā enam agne vi dahaḥ mā abhi śocaḥ mā asya tvacam cikṣipaḥ mā aśarīram

original: RV_10.016.01.2{20} yadā śṛtaṃ kṛṇavo jātavedo 'themenaṃ prahiṇutāt pitṛbhyaḥ
analyzed: yadā śṛtam kṛṇavaḥ jātavedaḥ thā imā enam prahiṇutāt pitṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_10.016.02.1{20} śṛtaṃ yadā karasi jātavedo 'theme:
analyzed: śṛtam yadā karasi jātavedaḥ thā ime

original: naṃ pari dattātpitṛbhyaḥ
analyzed: nam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_10.016.02.2{20} yadā gachātyasunītimetāmathā devānāṃvaśanīrbhavāti
analyzed: yadā gachāti asunītim etām athā devānām vaśanīḥ bhavāti

original: RV_10.016.03.1{20} sūryaṃ cakṣurgachatu vātamātmā dyāṃ ca gachapṛthivīṃ ca dharmaṇā
analyzed: sūryam cakṣuḥ gacchatu vātam ātmā dyām ca gaccha pṛthivīm ca dharmaṇā

original: RV_10.016.03.2{20} apo vā gacha yadi tatra te hitamoṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ
analyzed: apaḥ vā gacha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ

original: RV_10.016.04.1{20} ajo bhāgastapasā taṃ tapasva taṃ te śocistapatu taṃ tearciḥ
analyzed: ajaḥ bhāgaḥ tapasā tam tapasva tam te śociḥ tapatu tam te arciḥ

original: RV_10.016.04.2{20} yāste śivāstanvo jātavedastābhirvahainaṃsukṛtāmu lokam
analyzed: yāḥ te śivāḥ tanvaḥ jātavedaḥ tābhiḥ vaha enam su kṛtā āmu lokam

original: RV_10.016.05.1{20} ava sṛja punaragne pitṛbhyo yasta āhutaścaratisvadhābhiḥ
analyzed: ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyaḥ yaḥ te āhutaḥ carati svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_10.016.05.2{20} ayurvasāna upa vetu śeṣaḥ saṃ gachatāntanvā jātavedaḥ
analyzed: ayuḥ vasānaḥ upa vetu śeṣaḥ sam gacchata antanvā jātavedaḥ

original: RV_10.016.06.1{21} yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna ātutoda pipīlaḥ sarpa uta vāśvāpadaḥ
analyzed: yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakunaḥ ātutoda pipīlaḥ sarpaḥ uta vā aśvāpadaḥ

original: RV_10.016.06.2{21} agniṣ ṭad viśvādagadaṃ kṛṇotu somaśca yobrāhmaṇānāviveśa
analyzed: agniḥ tat viśva adagadam kṛṇotu somaḥ ca yaḥ brāhmaṇān āviveśa

original: RV_10.016.07.1{21} agnervarma pari gobhirvyayasva saṃ prorṇuṣva pīvasāmedasā ca
analyzed: agneḥ varma pari gobhiḥ vyayasva sam pra ūrṇuṣva pīvasā medasā ca

original: RV_10.016.07.2{21} net tvā dhṛṣṇurharasā jarhṛṣāṇo dadhṛgvidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte
analyzed: na id tvā dhṛṣṇuḥ harasā jarhṛṣāṇaḥ dadhṛṣ vidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte

original: RV_10.016.08.1{21} imamagne camasaṃ mā vi jihvaraḥ priyo devānāmutasomyānām
analyzed: imam agne camasam mā vi jihvaraḥ priyaḥ devānām uta somyānām

original: RV_10.016.08.2{21} eṣa yaścamaso devapānastasmin devā amṛtāmādayante
analyzed: eṣa yaḥ camasaḥ deva pānaḥ tasmin devāḥ amṛtā mādayante

original: RV_10.016.09.1{21} kravyādamagniṃ pra hiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājño gachaturipravāhaḥ
analyzed: kravyādam agnim pra hiṇomi dūram yama rājñaḥ gaccha turipra vāhaḥ

original: RV_10.016.09.2{21} ihaivāyamitaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃvahatu prajānan
analyzed: iha eva ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan

original: RV_10.016.10.1{21} yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa vo gṛhamimaṃ paśyannitaraṃjātavedasam
analyzed: yaḥ agniḥ kravyād praviveśa vaḥ gṛham imam paśyan itaraṃjātavedasam

original: RV_10.016.10.2{21} taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya devaṃ sa gharmaminvāt parame sadhasthe
analyzed: tam harāmi pitṛ yajñāya devam sa gharmam invāt parame sadhasthe

original: RV_10.016.11.1{22} yo agniḥ kravyavāhanaḥ pitṝn yakṣad ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ agniḥ kravya vāhanaḥ pitṝn yakṣat ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_10.016.11.2{22} preduhavyāni vocati devebhyaśca pitṛbhya ā
analyzed: preduhavyāni vocati devebhyaḥ ca pitṛbhyaḥ ā

original: RV_10.016.12.1{22} uśantastvā ni dhīmahyuśantaḥ samidhīmahi
analyzed: uśantaḥ tvā ni dhīmahi uśantaḥ samidhīmahi

original: RV_10.016.12.2{22} uśannuśata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave
analyzed: uśan uśataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave

original: RV_10.016.13.1{22} yaṃ tvamagne samadahastamu nirvāpayā punaḥ
analyzed: yam tvam agne samadahaḥ tamu nirvāpaya punar

original: RV_10.016.13.2{22} kiyāmbvatra rohatu pākadūrvā vyalkaśā
analyzed: kiyā ambu atra rohatu pākadūrvā vyalkaśā

original: RV_10.016.14.1{22} śītike śītikāvati hlādike hlādikāvati
analyzed: śītike śītikāvati hlādike hlādikāvati

original: RV_10.016.14.2{22} maṇḍūkyā susaṃ gama imaṃ svagniṃ harṣaya
analyzed: maṇḍūkyā su sam gamaḥ imam su agnim harṣaya

original: RV_10.017.01.1{23} tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatuṃ kṛṇotītīdaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃsameti
analyzed: tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum kṛṇoti iti idam viśvam bhuvanaṃsameti

original: RV_10.017.01.2{23} yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā maho jāyā vivasvatonanāśa
analyzed: yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā mahaḥ jāyā vivasvatā unanāśa

original: RV_10.017.02.1{23} apāgūhannamṛtāṃ martyebhyaḥ kṛtvī savarṇāmadadurvivasvate
analyzed: apāgūhan amṛtām martyebhyaḥ kṛtvī savarṇām adaduḥ vivasvate

original: RV_10.017.02.2{23} utāśvināvabharad yat tadasīdajahādu dvāmithunā saraṇyūḥ
analyzed: uta aśvinau abharat yat tat asīt ajahāt u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ

original: RV_10.017.03.1{23} pūṣā tvetaścyāvayatu pra vidvānanaṣṭapaśurbhuvanasya gopāḥ
analyzed: pūṣā tvā itas cyāvayatu pra vidvān a naṣṭa paśuḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ

original: RV_10.017.03.2{23} sa tvaitebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyo 'gnirdevebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ
analyzed: sa tvā etebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyaḥ gniḥ devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ

original: RV_10.017.04.1{23} āyurviśvāyuḥ pari pāsati tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathepurastāt
analyzed: āyuḥ viśvāyuḥ pari pāsati tvā pūṣā tvā pātu

original: RV_10.017.04.2{23} yatrasate sukṛto yatra te yayustatra tvādevaḥ savitā dadhātu
analyzed: yatra āsate su kṛtaḥ yatra te yayuḥ tatra tvā adevaḥ savitā dadhātu

original: RV_10.017.05.1{23} pūṣemā āśā anu veda sarvāḥ so asmānabhayatamenaneṣat
analyzed: pūṣā imāḥ āśāḥ anu veda sarvāḥ saḥ asmān abhayatamena neṣat

original: RV_10.017.05.2{23} svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayuchan pura etuprajānan
analyzed: svasti dāḥ āghṛṇiḥ sarva vīraḥ prayuchan puras etu prajānan

original: RV_10.017.06.1{24} prapathe pathamajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathepṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: prapathe patham ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_10.017.06.2{24} ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā cacarati prajānan
analyzed: ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā cacarati prajānan

original: RV_10.017.07.1{24} sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīmadhvare tāyamāne
analyzed: sarasvatīm devayantaḥ havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne

original: RV_10.017.07.2{24} sarasvatīṃ sukṛto ahvayanta sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt
analyzed: sarasvatīm su kṛtaḥ ahvayanta sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryam dāt

original: RV_10.017.08.1{24} sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayatha svadhābhirdevi pitṛbhirmadantī
analyzed: sarasvati yā sa ratham yayatha svadhābhiḥ devi pitṛbhiḥ madantī

original: RV_10.017.08.2{24} āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayasvānamīvā iṣa ādhehyasme
analyzed: āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayasva anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ ādhehi asme

original: RV_10.017.09.1{24} sarasvatīṃ yāṃ pitaro havante dakṣiṇā yajñamabhinakṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: sarasvatīm yām pitaraḥ havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_10.017.09.2{24} sahasrārghamiḷo atra bhāgaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhehi
analyzed: sahasra argham iḷaḥ atra bhāgam rāyaspoṣam yajamāneṣu dhehi

original: RV_10.017.10.1{24} apo asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapvaḥ punantu
analyzed: apaḥ asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena naḥ ghṛta pvaḥ punantu

original: RV_10.017.10.2{24} viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devirudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi
analyzed: viśvam hi ripram pravahanti śuciḥ āpūtaḥ emi

original: RV_10.017.11.1{25} drapsaścaskanda prathamānanu dyūnimaṃ ca yonimanu yaśca purvaḥ
analyzed: drapsaḥ caskanda prathamān anu dyūn imam ca yonim anu yaḥ ca purvaḥ

original: RV_10.017.11.2{25} samānaṃ yonimanu saṃcarantaṃ drapsaṃ juhomyanu sapta hotrāḥ
analyzed: samānam yonim anu saṃcarantam drapsam juhomi anu sapta hotrāḥ

original: RV_10.017.12.1{25} yaste drapsa skandati yaste aṃśurbāhucyuto dhiṣaṇāyāupasthāt
analyzed: yaḥ te drapsaḥ skandati yaḥ te aṃśuḥ bāhu cyutaḥ dhiṣaṇāyāḥ upasthāt

original: RV_10.017.12.2{25} adhvaryorvā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt taṃ te juhomimanasā vaṣaṭkṛtam
analyzed: adhvaryoḥ vā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt tam te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam

original: RV_10.017.13.1{25} yaste drapsa skanno yaste aṃśuravaśca yaḥ paraḥsrucā
analyzed: yaḥ te drapsaḥ skannaḥ yaḥ te aṃśuḥ avaḥ ca yaḥ paraḥsrucā

original: RV_10.017.13.2{25} ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu rādhase
analyzed: ayam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ sam tam siñcatu rādhase

original: RV_10.017.14.1{25} payasvatīroṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ payasvat māmakam vacaḥ

original: RV_10.017.14.2{25} apāmpayasvadit payastena mā saha śundhata
analyzed: apām payasvat id payaḥ tena mā saha śundhata

original: RV_10.018.01.1{26} paraṃ mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yaste sva itaro devayānāt
analyzed: param mṛtyo anu parehi panthām yaḥ te svaḥ itaraḥ deva yānāt

original: RV_10.018.01.2{26} cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajāṃ rīriṣomota vīrān
analyzed: cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajām rīriṣoma uta vīrān

original: RV_10.018.02.1{26} mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanto yadaita drāghīya āyuḥ pratarandadhānāḥ
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ padam yopayantaḥ yadā aita drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataran dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10.018.02.2{26} āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥpūtā bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_10.018.03.1{26} ime jīvā vi mṛtairāvavṛtrannabhūd bhadrā devahūtirnoadya
analyzed: ime jīvāḥ vi mṛtaiḥ āvavṛtran abhūt bhadrā deva hūtiḥ na u adya

original: RV_10.018.03.2{26} prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīya āyuḥprataraṃ dadhānāḥ
analyzed: prāñcaḥ agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10.018.04.1{26} imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gādaparoarthametam
analyzed: imam jīvebhyaḥ paridhim dadhāmi mā eṣām nu gāt aparoartham etam

original: RV_10.018.04.2{26} śataṃ jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīrantarmṛtyuṃ dadhatāṃ parvatena
analyzed: śatam jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīḥ antar mṛtyum dadhatām parvatena

original: RV_10.018.05.1{26} yathāhānyanupūrvaṃ bhavanti yatha ṛtava ṛtubhiryantisādhu
analyzed: yathā ahāni anupūrvam bhavanti yathā ṛtavaḥ ṛtubhiḥ yanti sādhu

original: RV_10.018.05.2{26} yathā na pūrvamaparo jahātyevā dhātarāyūṃṣi kalpayaiṣām
analyzed: yathā na pūrvam aparaḥ jahāti eva dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpaya eṣām

original: RV_10.018.06.1{27} ā rohatāyurjarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yatiṣṭha
analyzed: ā rohata āyuḥ jarasam vṛṇānāḥ anupūrvam yatamānāḥ yatiṣṭha

original: RV_10.018.06.2{27} iha tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣā dīrghamāyuḥkarati jīvase vaḥ
analyzed: iha tvaṣṭā su janimā sajoṣāḥ dīrgham āyuḥ karati jīvase vaḥ

original: RV_10.018.07.1{27} imā nārīravidhavāḥ supatnīrāñjanena sarpiṣā saṃviśantu
analyzed: imāḥ nārīḥ avidhavāḥ su patnīḥ āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃviśantu

original: RV_10.018.07.2{27} anaśravo 'namīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayoyonimagre
analyzed: anaśravaḥ namīvāḥ su ratnāḥ ā rohantu janayaḥ yonim agre

original: RV_10.018.08.1{27} udīrṣva nāryabhi jīvalokaṃ gatāsumetamupa śeṣa ehi
analyzed: udīrṣva nāri abhi jīva lokam gatāsum etam upa śeṣe ehi

original: RV_10.018.08.2{27} hastagrābhasya didhiṣostavedaṃ patyurjanitvamabhi sambabhūtha
analyzed: hasta grābhasya didhiṣoḥ tava idam patyuḥ janitvam abhi sambabhūtha

original: RV_10.018.09.1{27} dhanurhastādādadāno mṛtasyāsme kṣatrāya varcasebalāya
analyzed: dhanuḥ hastāt ādadānaḥ mṛtasya asme kṣatrāya varcasebalāya

original: RV_10.018.09.2{27} atraiva tvamiha vayaṃ suvīrā viśvā spṛdhoabhimātīrjayema
analyzed: atra eva tvam iha vayam su vīrāḥ viśvāḥ spṛdhaḥ abhimātīḥ jayema

original: RV_10.018.10.1{27} upa sarpa mātaraṃ bhūmimetāmuruvyacasaṃ pṛthivīṃsuśevām
analyzed: upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uru vyacasam pṛthivīm su śevām

original: RV_10.018.10.2{27} ūrṇamradā yuvatirdakṣiṇāvata eṣā tvā pātunir{ṛ}terupasthāt
analyzed: ūrṇamradā yuvatiḥ dakṣiṇāvataḥ eṣā tvā pātu nirṛteḥ upasthāt

original: RV_10.018.11.1{28} ucchvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ sūpāyanāsmai bhavasūpavañcanā
analyzed: ucchvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ su upāyanā asmai bhavasu upavañcanā

original: RV_10.018.11.2{28} mātā putraṃ yathā sicābhyenaṃ bhūmaūrṇuhi
analyzed: mātā putram yathā sicā abhi enam bhūma ūrṇuhi

original: RV_10.018.12.1{28} ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasraṃ mita upa hiśrayantām
analyzed: ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasram mite upa hiśrayantām

original: RV_10.018.12.2{28} te gṛhāso ghṛtaścuto bhavantu viśvāhāsmaiśaraṇāḥ santvatra
analyzed: te gṛhāsaḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ bhavantu viśvāhā asmai śaraṇāḥ santu atra

original: RV_10.018.13.1{28} ut te stabhnāmi pṛthivīṃ tvat parīmaṃ logaṃ nidadhan moahaṃ riṣam
analyzed: ud te stabhnāmi pṛthivīm tvat pari imam logam nidadhan mā u aham riṣam

original: RV_10.018.13.2{28} etāṃ sthūṇāṃ pitaro dhārayantu te 'trāyamaḥ sādanā te minotu
analyzed: etām sthūṇām pitaraḥ dhārayantu te trāyamaḥ sādanā te minotu

original: RV_10.018.14.1{28} pratīcīne māmahanīṣvāḥ parṇamivā dadhuḥ
analyzed: pratīcīne mām ahanīṣvāḥ parṇam iva ā dadhuḥ

original: RV_10.018.14.2{28} pratīcīṃ jagrabhā vācamaśvaṃ raśanayā yathā
analyzed: pratīcīm jagrabhāḥ vācam aśvam raśanayā yathā

original: RV_10.019.01.1{01} ni vartadhvaṃ mānu gātāsmān siṣakta revatīḥ
analyzed: ni vartadhvam mā anu gāta asmān siṣakta revatīḥ

original: RV_10.019.01.2{01} agnīṣomāpunarvasū asme dhārayataṃ rayim
analyzed: agnīṣomā punarvasū asme dhārayatam rayim

original: RV_10.019.02.1{01} punarenā ni vartaya punarenā nyā kuru
analyzed: punar enā ni vartaya punar enā nyā kuru

original: RV_10.019.02.2{01} indra eṇā niyachatvagnirenā upājatu
analyzed: indraḥ eṇāḥ niyacchatu agniḥ enāḥ upājatu

original: RV_10.019.03.1{01} punaretā ni vartantāmasmin puṣyantu gopatau
analyzed: punar etāḥ ni vartantām asmin puṣyantu gopatau

original: RV_10.019.03.2{01} ihaivāgneni dhārayeha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ
analyzed: iha eva agneni dhāraya iha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ

original: RV_10.019.04.1{01} yan niyānaṃ nyayanaṃ saṃjñānaṃ yat parāyaṇam
analyzed: yat niyānam nyayanam saṃjñānam yat parāyaṇam

original: RV_10.019.04.2{01} āvartanaṃ nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve
analyzed: āvartanam nivartanam yaḥ gopāḥ api tam huve

original: RV_10.019.05.1{01} ya udānaḍ vyayanaṃ ya udānaṭ parāyaṇam
analyzed: yaḥ udānaṭ vyayanam yaḥ udānaṭ parāyaṇam

original: RV_10.019.05.2{01} āvartanaṃnivartanamapi gopā ni vartatām
analyzed: āvartanam nivartanam api gopāḥ ni vartatām

original: RV_10.019.06.1{01} ā nivarta ni vartaya punarna indra gā dehi
analyzed: ā nivarta ni vartaya punar naḥ indra gāḥ dehi

original: RV_10.019.06.2{01} jīvābhirbhunajāmahai
analyzed: jīvābhiḥ bhunajāmahai

original: RV_10.019.07.1{01} pari vo viśvato dadha ūrjā ghṛtena payasā
analyzed: pari vaḥ viśvatas dadhe ūrjā ghṛtena payasā

original: RV_10.019.07.2{01} ye devāḥ keca yajñiyāste rayyā saṃ sṛjantu naḥ
analyzed: ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyāḥ te rayyā sam sṛjantu naḥ

original: RV_10.019.08.1{01} ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya
analyzed: ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya

original: RV_10.019.08.2{01} bhūmyāścatasraḥpradiśastābhya enā ni vartaya
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ tābhyaḥ enāḥ ni vartaya

original: RV_10.020.01.1{02} bhadraṃ no api vātaya manaḥ
analyzed: bhadram naḥ api vātaya manaḥ

original: RV_10.020.02.1{02} agnimīḷe bhujāṃ yaviṣṭhaṃ śāsā mitraṃ durdharītum
analyzed: agnim īḍe bhujām yaviṣṭham śāsā mitram durdharītum

original: RV_10.020.02.2{02} yasya dharman svarenīḥ saparyanti māturūdhaḥ
analyzed: yasya dharman svarenīḥ saparyanti mātuḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_10.020.03.1{02} yamāsā kṛpanīḷaṃ bhāsāketuṃ vardhayanti
analyzed: yamāsā kṛpanīḍam bhāsā ketum vardhayanti

original: RV_10.020.03.2{02} bhrājateśreṇidan
analyzed: bhrājateḥ śreṇidan

original: RV_10.020.04.1{02} aryo viśāṃ gātureti pra yadānaḍ divo antān
analyzed: aryaḥ viśām gātuḥ eti pra yat ānaṭ divaḥ antān

original: RV_10.020.04.2{02} kavirabhraṃ didyānaḥ
analyzed: kaviḥ abhram didyānaḥ

original: RV_10.020.05.1{02} juṣad dhavyā mānuṣasyordhvastasthāv ṛbhvā yajñe
analyzed: juṣat havyā mānuṣasya ūrdhvastasthau ṛbhvāḥ yajñe

original: RV_10.020.05.2{02} minvan sadma pura eti
analyzed: minvan sadma puras eti

original: RV_10.020.06.1{02} sa hi kṣemo haviryajñaḥ śruṣṭīdasya gātureti
analyzed: sa hi kṣemaḥ haviḥ yajñaḥ śruṣṭīt asya gātuḥ eti

original: RV_10.020.06.2{02} agniṃ devā vāśīmantam
analyzed: agnim devāḥ vāśīmantam

original: RV_10.020.07.1{03} yajñāsāhaṃ duva iṣe 'gniṃ pūrvasya śevasya
analyzed: yajñāsāham duvaḥ iṣe gnim pūrvasya śevasya

original: RV_10.020.07.2{03} adreḥsūnumāyumāhuḥ
analyzed: adreḥ sūnum āyum āhuḥ

original: RV_10.020.08.1{03} naro ye ke cāsmadā viśvet te vāma ā syuḥ
analyzed: naraḥ ye ke ca asmadā viśvā id te vāme ā syuḥ

original: RV_10.020.08.2{03} agniṃhaviṣā vardhantaḥ
analyzed: agniṃhaviṣā vardhantaḥ

original: RV_10.020.09.1{03} kṛṣṇaḥ śveto 'ruṣo yāmo asya bradhna ṛjra uta śoṇoyaśasvān
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ śvetaḥ ruṣaḥ yāmaḥ asya bradhnaḥ ṛjraḥ uta śoṇaḥ yaśasvān

original: RV_10.020.09.2{03} hiraṇyarūpaṃ janitā jajāna
analyzed: hiraṇya rūpam janitā jajāna

original: RV_10.020.10.1{03} evā te agne vimado manīṣāmūrjo napādamṛtebhiḥsajoṣāḥ
analyzed: eva te agne vimadaḥ manīṣām ūrjaḥ napāt amṛtebhiḥsajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10.020.10.2{03} gira ā vakṣat sumatīriyāna iṣamūrjaṃsukṣitiṃ viśvamābhāḥ
analyzed: giraḥ ā vakṣat sumatīḥ iyānaḥ iṣam ūrjam su kṣitim viśvam ābhāḥ

original: RV_10.021.01.1{04} āgniṃ na svavṛktibhirhotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: ā agnim na svavṛktibhiḥ hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.021.01.2{04} yajñāyastīrṇabarhiṣe vi vo made śīraṃ pāvakaśociṣaṃvivakṣase
analyzed: yajñāyaḥ tīrṇa barhiṣe vi vaḥ made śīram pāvaka śociṣam vivakṣase

original: RV_10.021.02.1{04} tvāmu te svābhuvaḥ śumbhantyaśvarādhasaḥ
analyzed: tvāmu te su ābhuvaḥ śumbhanti aśva rādhasaḥ

original: RV_10.021.02.2{04} veti tvāmupasecanī vi vo mada ṛjītiragna āhutirvivakṣase
analyzed: vā iti tvām upasecanī vi vaḥ made ṛjītiḥ agne āhutiḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10.021.03.1{04} tve dharmāṇa āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīriva
analyzed: tve dharmāṇaḥ āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīḥ iva

original: RV_10.021.03.2{04} kṛṣṇārūpāṇyarjunā vi vo made viśvā adhi śriyo dhiṣevivakṣase
analyzed: kṛṣṇā rūpāṇi arjunā vi vaḥ made viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ

original: RV_10.021.04.1{04} yamagne manyase rayiṃ sahasāvannamartya
analyzed: yam agne manyase rayim sahasāvan amartya

original: RV_10.021.04.2{04} tamā novājasātaye vi vo made yajñeṣu citramā bharā vivakṣase
analyzed: tamā no vājasātaye vi vaḥ made yajñeṣu citramā bhara vivakṣase

original: RV_10.021.05.1{04} agnirjāto atharvaṇā vidad viśvāni kāvyā
analyzed: agniḥ jātaḥ atharvaṇā vidat viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_10.021.05.2{04} bhuvad dūtovivasvato vi vo made priyo yamasya kāmyo vivakṣase
analyzed: bhuvat dūtaḥ vivasvataḥ vi vaḥ made priyaḥ yamasya kāmyaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10.021.06.1{05} tvāṃ yajñeṣvīḷate 'gne prayatyadhvare
analyzed: tvām yajñeṣu īḍate gne prayati adhvare

original: RV_10.021.06.2{05} tvaṃ vasūnikāmyā vi vo made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase
analyzed: tvam vasūni kāmyāḥ vi vaḥ made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase

original: RV_10.021.07.1{05} tvāṃ yajñeṣv ṛtvijaṃ cārumagne ni ṣedire
analyzed: tvām yajñeṣu ṛtvijam cārumagne ni sedire

original: RV_10.021.07.2{05} ghṛtapratīkaṃ manuṣo vi vo made śukraṃ cetiṣṭhamakṣabhirvivakṣase
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkam manuṣaḥ vi vaḥ made śukram cetiṣṭham akṣabhiḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10.021.08.1{05} agne śukreṇa śociṣoru prathayase bṛhat
analyzed: agne śukreṇa śociṣā uru prathayase bṛhat

original: RV_10.021.08.2{05} abhikrandanvṛṣāyase vi vo made garbhaṃ dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase
analyzed: abhikrandan vṛṣāyase vi vaḥ made garbham dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase

original: RV_10.022.01.1{06} kuha śruta indraḥ kasminnadya jane mitro na śruyate
analyzed: kuha śrutaḥ indraḥ kasmin adya jane mitraḥ na śruyate

original: RV_10.022.01.2{06} ṛṣīṇāṃ vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā va carkṛṣe gira
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā carkṛṣe gira

original: RV_10.022.02.1{06} iha śruta indro asme adya stave vajry ṛcīṣamaḥ
analyzed: iha śrutaḥ indraḥ asme adya stave vajrī ṛcīṣamaḥ

original: RV_10.022.02.2{06} mitro nayo janeṣvā yaśaścakre asāmyā
analyzed: mitraḥ nayaḥ janeṣvā yaśaḥ cakre asāmyā

original: RV_10.022.03.1{06} maho yas patiḥ śavaso asāmyā maho nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ
analyzed: mahaḥ yaḥ patiḥ śavasaḥ asāmyā mahaḥ nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ

original: RV_10.022.03.2{06} bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putramiva priyam
analyzed: bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putram iva priyam

original: RV_10.022.04.1{06} yujāno aśva vātasya dhunī devo devasya vajrivaḥ
analyzed: yujānaḥ aśva vātasya dhunī devaḥ devasya vajrivas

original: RV_10.022.04.2{06} syantapathā virukmatā sṛjāna stoṣyadhvanaḥ
analyzed: syanta pathā virukmatā sṛjāna stoṣyadhvanaḥ

original: RV_10.022.05.1{06} tvaṃ tyā cid vātasyāśvāgā ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai
analyzed: tvam tyā cit vātasya aśvāgāḥ ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai

original: RV_10.022.05.2{06} yayordevo na martyo yantā nakirvidāyyaḥ
analyzed: yayoḥ devaḥ na martyaḥ yantā nakirvidāyyaḥ

original: RV_10.022.06.1{07} adha gmantośanā pṛchate vāṃ kadarthā na ā gṛham
analyzed: adha gmantā uśanā pṛcchate vām kadarthāḥ naḥ ā gṛham

original: RV_10.022.06.2{07} ājagmathuḥ parākād divaśca gmaśca martyam
analyzed: ājagmathuḥ parākāt divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca martyam

original: RV_10.022.07.1{07} ā na indra pṛkṣase 'smākaṃ brahmodyatam
analyzed: ā naḥ indra pṛkṣase smākam brahma udyatam

original: RV_10.022.07.2{07} tat tvāyācāmahe 'vaḥ śuṣṇaṃ yad dhannamānuṣam
analyzed: tat tvā āyācāmahe vaḥ śuṣṇam yat hanna mānuṣam

original: RV_10.022.08.1{07} akarmā dasyurabhi no amanturanyavrato amānuṣaḥ
analyzed: akarmā dasyuḥ abhi naḥ amantuḥ anya vrataḥ amānuṣaḥ

original: RV_10.022.08.2{07} tvantasyāmitrahan vadhardāsasya dambhaya
analyzed: tvantasya amitra han vadhardāsasya dambhaya

original: RV_10.022.09.1{07} tvaṃ na indra śūra śūrairuta tvotāso barhaṇā
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra śūra śūraiḥ uta tvotāsaḥ barhaṇā

original: RV_10.022.09.2{07} purutrāte vi pūrtayo navanta kṣoṇayo yathā
analyzed: purutrāte vi pūrtayaḥ navanta kṣoṇayaḥ yathā

original: RV_10.022.10.1{07} tvaṃ tān vṛtrahatye codayo nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ
analyzed: tvam tān vṛtra hatye codayaḥ nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivas

original: RV_10.022.10.2{07} guhā yadī kavīnāṃ viśāṃ nakṣatraśavasām
analyzed: guhā yadī kavīnām viśām nakṣatra śavasām

original: RV_10.022.11.1{08} makṣū tā ta indra dānāpnasa ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ
analyzed: makṣū tā te indra dānā apnasaḥ ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivas

original: RV_10.022.11.2{08} yad dha śuṣṇasya dambhayo jātaṃ viśvaṃ sayāvabhiḥ
analyzed: yat ha śuṣṇasya dambhayaḥ jātam viśvam sa yāvabhiḥ

original: RV_10.022.12.1{08} mākudhryagindra śūra vasvīrasme bhūvannabhiṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: mākudhryak indra śūra vasvīḥ asme bhūvan abhiṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_10.022.12.2{08} vayaṃ-vayaṃ ta āsāṃ sumne syāma vajrivaḥ
analyzed: vayam vayam te āsām sumne syāma vajrivas

original: RV_10.022.13.1{08} asme tā ta indra santu satyāhiṃsantīrupaspṛśaḥ
analyzed: asme tā te indra santu satyā a hiṃsantīḥ upaspṛśaḥ

original: RV_10.022.13.2{08} vidyāmayāsāṃ bhujo dhenūnāṃ na vajrivaḥ
analyzed: vidyāma yāsām bhujaḥ dhenūnām na vajrivas

original: RV_10.022.14.1{08} ahastā yadapadī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhirvedyānām
analyzed: a hastā yad apadī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhiḥ vedyānām

original: RV_10.022.14.2{08} śuṣṇaṃ pari pradakṣiṇid viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ
analyzed: śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇit viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ

original: RV_10.022.15.1{08} pibā-pibedindra śūra somaṃ mā riṣaṇyo vasavāna vasuḥsan
analyzed: piba a pibet indra śūra somam mā riṣaṇyaḥ vasavāna vasuḥsan

original: RV_10.022.15.2{08} uta trāyasva gṛṇato maghono mahaśca rāyo revataskṛdhī naḥ
analyzed: uta trāyasva gṛṇataḥ maghonaḥ mahaḥ ca rāyaḥ revataskṛdhi naḥ

original: RV_10.023.01.1{09} yajāmaha indraṃ vajradakṣiṇaṃ harīṇāṃ rathyaṃvivratānām
analyzed: yajāmahe indram vajra dakṣiṇam harīṇām rathyam vivratānām

original: RV_10.023.01.2{09} pra śmaśru dodhuvadūrdhvathā bhūd visenābhirdayamāno vi rādhasā
analyzed: pra śmaśru dodhuvat ūrdhvathā bhūt visenābhiḥ dayamānaḥ vi rādhasā

original: RV_10.023.02.1{09} harī nvasya yā vane vide vasvindro maghairmaghavāvṛtrahā bhuvat
analyzed: harī nu asya yā vane vide vasu indraḥ maghaiḥ maghavā a vṛtra hā bhuvat

original: RV_10.023.02.2{09} ṛbhurvāja ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavo 'vakṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ vājaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavaḥ vakṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit

original: RV_10.023.03.1{09} yadā vajraṃ hiraṇyamidathā rathaṃ harī yamasyavahato vi sūribhiḥ
analyzed: yadā vajram hiraṇyam idathā ratham harī yamasi avahataḥ vi sūribhiḥ

original: RV_10.023.03.2{09} ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśruta indrovājasya dīrghaśravasas patiḥ
analyzed: ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sana śrutaḥ indrovājasya dīrghaśravasaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10.023.04.1{09} so cin nu vṛṣṭiryūthyā svā sacānindraḥ śmaśrūṇiharitābhi pruṣṇute
analyzed: sā u cit nu vṛṣṭiḥ yūthyā svā sacā an indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritā abhi pruṣṇute

original: RV_10.023.04.2{09} ava veti sukṣayaṃ sute madhūdiddhūnoti vāto yathā vanam
analyzed: ava veti su kṣayam sute madhu udit hūnoti vātaḥ yathā vanam

original: RV_10.023.05.1{09} yo vācā vivāco mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrāśivā jaghāna
analyzed: yaḥ vācā vivācaḥ mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrā aśivāḥ jaghāna

original: RV_10.023.05.2{09} tat-tadidasya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasi piteva yastaviṣīṃvāvṛdhe śavaḥ
analyzed: tat tat id asya pauṃsyam gṛṇīmasi pitā iva yaḥ taviṣī iva āvṛdhe śavaḥ

original: RV_10.023.06.1{09} stomaṃ ta indra vimadā ajījanannapūrvyaṃ purutamaṃsudānave
analyzed: stomam te indra vimadāḥ ajījanan apūrvyam purutamam sudānave

original: RV_10.023.06.2{09} vidmā hyasya bhojanaminasya yadā paśuṃ nagopāḥ karāmahe
analyzed: vidma hi asya bhojanaminasya yadā paśum naga upāḥ karāmahe

original: RV_10.023.07.1{09} mākirna enā sakhyā vi yauśustava cendra vimadasya caṛśeḥ
analyzed: mākir naḥ enā sakhyā vi yauśuḥ tava ca indra vimadasya caṛśeḥ

original: RV_10.023.07.2{09} vidmā hi te pramatiṃ deva jāmivadasme te santusakhyā śivāni
analyzed: vidma hi te pramatim deva jāmi vat asme te santu sakhyā śivāni

original: RV_10.024.01.1{10} indra somamimaṃ piba madhumantaṃ camū sutam
analyzed: indra somam imam piba madhumantam camū sutam

original: RV_10.024.01.2{10} asme rayiṃni dhāraya vi vo made sahasriṇaṃ purūvaso vivakṣase
analyzed: asme rayiṃni dhāraya vi vaḥ made sahasriṇam purūvaso vivakṣase

original: RV_10.024.02.1{10} tvāṃ yajñebhirukthairupa havyebhirīmahe
analyzed: tvām yajñebhiḥ ukthaiḥ upa havyebhiḥ īmahe

original: RV_10.024.02.2{10} śacīpateśacīnāṃ vi vo made śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryaṃ vivakṣase
analyzed: śacīpate śacīnām vi vaḥ made śreṣṭham naḥ dhehi vāryam vivakṣase

original: RV_10.024.03.1{10} yas patirvāryāṇāmasi radhrasya coditā
analyzed: yaḥ patiḥ vāryāṇām asi radhrasya coditā

original: RV_10.024.03.2{10} indrastotṝṇāmavitā vi vo made dviṣo naḥ pāhyaṃhasovivakṣase
analyzed: indra stotṝṇām avitā vi vaḥ made dviṣaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10.024.04.1{10} yuvaṃ śakrā māyāvinā samīcī nīramanthatam
analyzed: yuvam śakrā māyāvinā samīcī nīramanthatam

original: RV_10.024.04.2{10} vimadenayadiḷita nasatya niramanthatam
analyzed: nasatya niramanthatam

original: RV_10.024.05.1{10} viśve devā akṛpanta samicyorniṣpatantyoḥ
analyzed: viśve devāḥ akṛpanta samicyoḥ niṣpatantyoḥ

original: RV_10.024.05.2{10} nasatyavabruvandevaḥ punarā vahataditi
analyzed: nasati avabruvan devaḥ punar ā vahatat iti

original: RV_10.024.06.1{10} madhuman me parāyaṇaṃ madhumat punarayanam
analyzed: madhumat me parāyaṇam madhumat punarayanam

original: RV_10.024.06.2{10} ta no devadevataya yuvaṃ madhumatas kṛtam
analyzed: ta naḥ deva devataya yuvam madhumataḥ kṛtam

original: RV_10.025.01.1{11} bhadraṃ no api vātaya mano dakṣamuta kratum
analyzed: bhadram naḥ api vātaya manaḥ dakṣam uta kratum

original: RV_10.025.01.2{11} adhā tesakhye andhaso vi vo made raṇan gavo na yavase vivakṣase
analyzed: adhā tesakhye andhasaḥ vi vaḥ made raṇan gavaḥ na yavase vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.02.1{11} hṛdispṛśasta asate viśveṣu soma dha masu
analyzed: hṛdispṛśaḥ te asate viśveṣu soma dha masu

original: RV_10.025.02.2{11} adhā kāmā imemama vi vo made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavo vivakṣase
analyzed: adha kāmāḥ imāḥ imama vi vaḥ made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.03.1{11} uta vratani soma te prahaṃ mināmi pākyā
analyzed: uta vratani soma te praham mināmi pākyā

original: RV_10.025.03.2{11} adhā pitevasūnave vi vo made mṛḷa no abhi cid vadhād vivakṣase
analyzed: adhā piteva sūnave vi vaḥ made mṛḍa naḥ abhi cit vadhāt vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.04.1{11} samu pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāso 'vatāniva
analyzed: samu pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāsaḥ vatān iva

original: RV_10.025.04.2{11} kratuṃ naḥsoma jivase vi vo made dharayā camasāniva vivakṣase
analyzed: kratum naḥsoma jivase vi vaḥ made dharayā camasān iva vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.05.1{11} tava tye soma śaktibhirnikāmāso vy ṛṇvire
analyzed: tava tye soma śaktibhiḥ nikāmāsaḥ vi ṛṇvire

original: RV_10.025.05.2{11} gṛtsasyadhirastavaso vi vo made vrajaṃ gomantamaśvinaṃ vivakṣase
analyzed: gṛtsasya dhiraḥ tavasaḥ vi vaḥ made vrajam gomantam aśvinam vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.06.1{12} paśuṃ naḥ soma rakṣasi purutra viṣṭhitaṃ jagat
analyzed: paśum naḥ soma rakṣasi purutra viṣṭhitam jagat

original: RV_10.025.06.2{12} samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vo made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvanavivakṣase
analyzed: samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vaḥ made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvana vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.07.1{12} tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato gopa adabhyo bhava
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma viśvatas gopa adabhyaḥ bhava

original: RV_10.025.07.2{12} sedha rājannapasridho vi vo made ma no duḥ śaṃsa īśatā vivakṣase
analyzed: sedha rājan apasridhaḥ vi vaḥ made mā naḥ duḥ śaṃsaḥ īśatā vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.08.1{12} tvaṃ naḥ soma sukraturva yodheyāya jāgṛhi
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma su kratuḥ vaḥ yodheyāya jāgṛhi

original: RV_10.025.08.2{12} kṣetravittaromanuṣo vi vo made druho naḥ pāhyaṃhaso vivakṣase
analyzed: kṣetra vittaraḥ manuṣaḥ vi vaḥ made druhaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.09.1{12} tvaṃ no vṛtra hantamendrasyendo śivaḥ sakhā
analyzed: tvam naḥ vṛtra hantama indrasya indo śivaḥ sakhā

original: RV_10.025.09.2{12} yat siṃhavante samithe vi vo made yudhyamanastokasātauvivakṣase
analyzed: yat siṃhavante samithe vi vaḥ made

original: RV_10.025.10.1{12} ayaṃ gha sa turo mada indrasya vardhata priyaḥ
analyzed: ayam gha sa turaḥ madaḥ indrasya vardhata priyaḥ

original: RV_10.025.10.2{12} ayaṃkakṣīvato maho vi vo made matiṃ viprasya vardhayadvivakṣase
analyzed: ayaṃkakṣīvataḥ mahaḥ vi vaḥ made matim viprasya vardhayat vivakṣase

original: RV_10.025.11.1{12} ayaṃ vipraya daśuṣe vajaniyarti gomataḥ
analyzed: ayam daśuṣe vaja niyarti gomataḥ

original: RV_10.025.11.2{12} ayaṃsaptabhya ā varaṃ vi vo made prandhaṃ śroṇaṃ catariṣad vivakṣase
analyzed: ā varam vi vaḥ made prandham śroṇam catariṣat vivakṣase

original: RV_10.026.01.1{13} pra hyachā manīṣā spārha yanti niyutaḥ
analyzed: pra hi achā manīṣā spārha yanti niyutaḥ

original: RV_10.026.01.2{13} pra dasrāniyudrathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ
analyzed: pra dasra a niyut rathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ

original: RV_10.026.02.1{13} yasya tyan mahitvaṃ vatāpyamayaṃ janaḥ
analyzed: yasya tyad mahi tvam vata api amayam janaḥ

original: RV_10.026.02.2{13} vipra ā vaṃsaddhītibhiściketa suṣṭutīnām
analyzed: vipraḥ ā vaṃsat dhītibhiḥ ciketa suṣṭutīnām

original: RV_10.026.03.1{13} sa veda suṣṭutīnāmindurna pūṣa vṛṣā
analyzed: sa veda suṣṭutīnām induḥ na pūṣa vṛṣā

original: RV_10.026.03.2{13} abhi psuraḥpruṣāyati vrajaṃ na ā pruṣāyati
analyzed: abhi psuraḥpruṣāyati vrajam naḥ ā pruṣāyati

original: RV_10.026.04.1{13} maṃsīmahi tvā vayamasmākaṃ deva pūṣan
analyzed: maṃsīmahi tvā vayam asmākam deva pūṣan

original: RV_10.026.04.2{13} matmāṃ casādhanaṃ viprāṇāṃ cādhavam
analyzed: viprāṇām ca ādhavam

original: RV_10.026.05.1{13} pratyardhiryajñanāmaśvahayo rathānām
analyzed: pratyardhiḥ yajñanām aśva hayaḥ rathānām

original: RV_10.026.05.2{13} ṛṣiḥ sa yomanurhito viprasya yāvayatsakhaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ sa yaḥ manuḥ hitaḥ viprasya yāvayat sakhaḥ

original: RV_10.026.06.1{14} adhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāśca śucasya ca
analyzed: adhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāḥ ca śucasya ca

original: RV_10.026.06.2{14} vāsovayo 'vīnāmā vāsāṃsi marmṛjat
analyzed: vāsaḥ vayaḥ vīnāmā vāsāṃsi marmṛjat

original: RV_10.026.07.1{14} ino vājānāṃ patirinaḥ puṣṭīnaṃ sakha
analyzed: inaḥ vājānām patiḥ inaḥ puṣṭīnam sakha

original: RV_10.026.07.2{14} pra śmaśruharyato dūdhod vi vṛtha yo adābhyaḥ
analyzed: pra śmaśru haryataḥ dūdhot vi vṛtha yaḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_10.026.08.1{14} ā te rathasya pūṣannajā dhuraṃ vavṛtyuḥ
analyzed: ā te rathasya pūṣan ajāḥ dhuram vavṛtyuḥ

original: RV_10.026.08.2{14} viśvasyārthinaḥ sakhā sanojā anapacyutaḥ
analyzed: viśvasya arthinaḥ sakhā sanaḥ jāḥ an apacyutaḥ

original: RV_10.026.09.1{14} asmakamurjā rathaṃ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ
analyzed: asmakam ūrjā ratham pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ

original: RV_10.026.09.2{14} bhuvadvajanāṃ vṛdha imaṃ naḥ śṛṇavad dhavam
analyzed: bhuvat vajanām vṛdhaḥ imam naḥ śṛṇavat dhavam

original: RV_10.027.01.1{15} asat su me jaritaḥ sābhivego yat sunvate yajamanaya śikṣam
analyzed: asat su me jaritar sa abhivegaḥ yat sunvate yajamanaya śikṣam

original: RV_10.027.01.2{15} anāśīrdāmahamasmi prahantā satyadhvṛtaṃ vṛjināyantamābhum
analyzed: anāśīrdām aham asmi prahantā satya dhvṛtam vṛjināyantam ābhum

original: RV_10.027.02.1{15} yadīdahaṃ yudhaye saṃnayānyadevayūn tanvāśūśujānān
analyzed: yadīdaham yudhaye saṃnayāni a devayūn tanvā aśūśujānān

original: RV_10.027.02.2{15} amā te tumraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ pacāni tīvraṃsutaṃ pañcadaśaṃ ni ṣiñcam
analyzed: amā te tumram vṛṣabham pacāni tīvraṃsutam pañcadaśam ni siñcam

original: RV_10.027.03.1{15} nāhaṃ taṃ veda ya iti bravītyadevayūn samaraṇejaghanvān
analyzed: na aham tam veda yaḥ iti bravīti adevayūn samaraṇejaghanvān

original: RV_10.027.03.2{15} yadāvākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvadādid dha mevṛṣabhā pra bruvanti
analyzed: yadā avākhyat samaraṇam ha mevṛṣabhā pra bruvanti

original: RV_10.027.04.1{15} yadajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣvāsaṃ viśve sato maghavāno maāsan
analyzed: yat ajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣu āsam viśve sataḥ maghavānaḥ mā āsan

original: RV_10.027.04.2{15} jināmi vet kṣema ā santamābhuṃ pra taṃkṣiṇāṃ parvate pādagṛhya
analyzed: jināmi vet kṣeme ā santam ābhum pra taṃkṣiṇām parvate pādagṛhya

original: RV_10.027.05.1{15} na vā u māṃ vṛjane vārayante na parvatāso yadahammanasye
analyzed: na vai u mām vṛjane vārayante na parvatāsaḥ yat ahammanasye

original: RV_10.027.05.2{15} mama svanāt kṛdhukarṇo bhayāta evedanu dyūnkiraṇaḥ samejāt
analyzed: mama svanāt kṛdhu karṇaḥ bhayāt eva idanu dyūn kiraṇaḥ samejāt

original: RV_10.027.06.1{16} darśan nvatra śṛtapānanindrān bāhukṣadaḥ śaravepatyamānān
analyzed: darśan nu atra śṛta pānan indrān bāhukṣadaḥ śara vepatyamānān

original: RV_10.027.06.2{16} ghṛṣuṃ vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyamadhyū nveṣu pavayo vavṛtyuḥ
analyzed: ghṛṣum vā ye niniduḥ nu eṣu pavayaḥ vavṛtyuḥ

original: RV_10.027.07.1{16} abhūrvaukṣīrvyu āyurānaḍ darṣan nu pūrvo aparonu darṣat
analyzed: āyuḥ ānaṭ darṣat nu pūrvaḥ aparaḥ nu darṣat

original: RV_10.027.07.2{16} dve pavaste pari taṃ na bhūto yo asya pārerajaso viveṣa
analyzed: dve pavaste pari tam na bhūtaḥ yaḥ asya pārerajasaḥ viveṣa

original: RV_10.027.08.1{16} gāvo yavaṃ prayutā aryo akṣan tā apaśyaṃ sahagopāścarantīḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ yavam prayutāḥ aryaḥ akṣan tāḥ apaśyam saha gopāḥ carantīḥ

original: RV_10.027.08.2{16} havā idaryo abhitaḥ samāyan kiyadāsusvapatiśchandayāte
analyzed: havāḥ idaryaḥ abhitas samāyan kiyat asu sva patiḥ chandayāte

original: RV_10.027.09.1{16} saṃ yad vayaṃ yavasādo janānāmahaṃ yavāda urvajreantaḥ
analyzed: sam yat vayam yavasādaḥ janānām aham yava adaḥ uru ajreantaḥ

original: RV_10.027.09.2{16} atrā yukto 'vasātāramichādatho ayuktaṃ yunajadvavanvān
analyzed: atrā yuktaḥ vasātāram ichāt atho a yuktam yunajat vavanvān

original: RV_10.027.10.1{16} atredu me maṃsase satyamuktaṃ dvipācca yaccatuṣpātsaṃsṛjāni
analyzed: atrā idu me maṃsase satyam uktam dvipād ca yat catuṣpād saṃsṛjāni

original: RV_10.027.10.2{16} strībhiryo atra vṛṣaṇaṃ pṛtanyādayuddhoasya vi bhajāni vedaḥ
analyzed: strībhiḥ yaḥ atra vṛṣaṇam pṛtanyāt ayuddhaḥ asya vi bhajāni vedaḥ

original: RV_10.027.11.1{17} yasyānakṣā duhitā jātvāsa kastāṃ vidvānabhimanyāte andhām
analyzed: yasya anakṣā duhitā jātu āsa kaḥ tām vidvān abhimanyāte andhām

original: RV_10.027.11.2{17} kataro meniṃ prati taṃ mucāte ya īṃvahāte ya īṃ vā vareyāt
analyzed: kataraḥ menim prati tam mucāte yaḥ īṃvahāte yaḥ īm vā vareyāt

original: RV_10.027.12.1{17} kiyatī yoṣā maryato vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasāvāryeṇa
analyzed: kiyatī yoṣā maryataḥ vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasā avāryeṇa

original: RV_10.027.12.2{17} bhadrā vadhūrbhavati yat supeśāḥ svayaṃ sāmitraṃ vanute jane cit
analyzed: bhadrā vadhūḥ bhavati yat supeśāḥ svayam sāmitram vanute jane cit

original: RV_10.027.13.1{17} patto jagāra pratyañcamatti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhauvarūtham
analyzed: pattas jagāra pratyañcam atti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhau varūtham

original: RV_10.027.13.2{17} āsīna ūrdhvāmupasi kṣiṇāti nyaṃṃ uttānāmanveti bhūmim
analyzed: āsīnaḥ ūrdhvām upasi kṣiṇāti nyaṃ uttānām anveti bhūmim

original: RV_10.027.14.1{17} bṛhannachāyo apalāśo arvā tasthau mātā viṣito attigarbhaḥ
analyzed: bṛhan achāyaḥ a palāśaḥ arvā tasthau mātā viṣitaḥ atti garbhaḥ

original: RV_10.027.14.2{17} anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā nidadhe dhenurūdhaḥ
analyzed: anyasyāḥ vatsam rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā nidadhe dhenu rūdhaḥ

original: RV_10.027.15.1{17} sapta vīrāso adharādudāyannaṣṭottarāttāt samajagmiran te
analyzed: sapta vīrāsaḥ adharāt udāyan aṣṭa uttarāttāt samajagmiran te

original: RV_10.027.15.2{17} nava paścātāt sthivimanta āyan daśa prāksānu vi tirantyaśnaḥ
analyzed: nava paścātāt sthivimantaḥ āyan daśa prāk sānu vi tiranti aśnaḥ

original: RV_10.027.16.1{18} daśānāmekaṃ kapilaṃ samānaṃ taṃ hinvanti kratavepāryāya
analyzed: daśānām ekam kapilam samānam tam hinvanti kratu vepāryāya

original: RV_10.027.16.2{18} garbhaṃ mātā sudhitaṃ vakṣaṇāsvavenantantuṣayantī bibharti
analyzed: garbham mātā sudhitam vakṣaṇāsu avenantantuṣayantī bibharti

original: RV_10.027.17.1{18} pīvānaṃ meṣamapacanta vīrā nyuptā akṣā anu dīvaāsan
analyzed: pīvānam meṣam apacanta vīrāḥ nyuptāḥ akṣāḥ anu dīvaḥ āsan

original: RV_10.027.17.2{18} dvā dhanuṃ bṛhatīmapsvantaḥ pavitravantā carataḥpunantā
analyzed: dvā dhanum bṛhatīm apsu antar pavitravantā carataḥpunantā

original: RV_10.027.18.1{18} vi krośanāso viṣvañca āyan pacāti nemo nahi pakṣadardhaḥ
analyzed: vi krośanāsaḥ viṣvañcaḥ āyan pacāti nemaḥ nahi pakṣa dardhaḥ

original: RV_10.027.18.2{18} ayaṃ me devaḥ savitā tadāha drvanna id vanavatsarpirannaḥ
analyzed: ayam me devaḥ savitā tat āha dru annaḥ id vanavat sarpiḥ annaḥ
