original: RV_10.027.19.1{18} apaśyaṃ grāmaṃ vahamānamārādacakrayā svadhayāvartamānam
analyzed: apaśyam grāmam vahamānam ārāt acakrayā svadhayā āvartamānam

original: RV_10.027.19.2{18} siṣaktyaryaḥ pra yugā janānāṃ sadyaḥśiśnā pramināno navīyān
analyzed: siṣakti aryaḥ pra yugā janānām sadyas śiśnā praminānaḥ navīyān

original: RV_10.027.20.1{18} etau me gāvau pramarasya yuktau mo ṣu pra sedhīrmuhurinmamandhi
analyzed: etau me gāvau pramarasya yuktau mā u su pra sedhīḥ muhur id mamandhi

original: RV_10.027.20.2{18} āpaścidasya vi naśantyarthaṃ sūraśca markauparo babhūvān
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asya vi naśanti artham sūraḥ ca markauparaḥ babhūvān

original: RV_10.027.21.1{19} ayaṃ yo vajraḥ purudhā vivṛtto 'vaḥ sūryasya bṛhataḥpurīṣāt
analyzed: ayam yaḥ vajraḥ purudhā vivṛttaḥ vaḥ sūryasya bṛhataḥ purīṣāt

original: RV_10.027.21.2{19} śrava idenā paro anyadasti tadavyathījarimāṇastaranti
analyzed: śravaḥ id enā paras anyat asti tat avyathī jarimāṇaḥ taranti

original: RV_10.027.22.1{19} vṛkṣe-vṛkṣe niyatā mīmayad gaustato vayaḥ pra patānpuruṣādaḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣe vṛkṣe niyatā mīmayat gauḥ tatas vayaḥ pra patān puruṣādaḥ

original: RV_10.027.22.2{19} athedaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhayāta idrāyasunvad ṛṣaye ca śikṣat
analyzed: athā idam viśvam bhuvanam bhayāt idrāya sunvat ṛṣaye ca śikṣat

original: RV_10.027.23.1{19} devānāṃ māne prathamā atiṣṭhan kṛntatradeṣamupara udāyan
analyzed: devānām māne prathamāḥ atiṣṭhan kṛntatrat iṣam upare udāyan

original: RV_10.027.23.2{19} trayastapanti pṛthivimanūpa dva bṛbūkaṃ vahataḥpurīṣam
analyzed: trayaḥ tapanti pṛthivim anūpa dva bṛbūkam vahataḥpurīṣam

original: RV_10.027.24.1{19} sā te jīvāturuta tasya viddhi ma smaitādṛgapa gūhaḥsamarye
analyzed: sā te jīvātuḥ uta tasya viddhi mā smā etādṛś apa gūhaḥ samarye

original: RV_10.027.24.2{19} aviḥ svaḥ kṛṇute gūhate busaṃ sa pādurasyanirṇijo na mucyate
analyzed: aviḥ svar kṛṇute gūhate busam sa pādurasya nirṇijaḥ na mucyate

original: RV_10.028.01.1{20} viśvo hyanyo arirājagāma mamedaha śvaśuro na jagāma
analyzed: viśvaḥ hi anyaḥ arirājagāma mama id aha śvaśuraḥ na jagāma

original: RV_10.028.01.2{20} jakṣīyād dhanā uta somaṃ papīyāt svāśitaḥ punarastaṃ jagāyāt
analyzed: jakṣīyāt dhanā uta somam papīyāt su āśitaḥ punar astam jagāyāt

original: RV_10.028.02.1{20} sa roruvad vṛṣabhastigmaśṛngo varṣman tasthāu varimannāpṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: sa roruvat vṛṣabhaḥ tigma śṛngaḥ varṣman tasthau variman ā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_10.028.02.2{20} viśveṣvenaṃ vṛjaneṣu pāmi yo me kukṣisutasomaḥ pṛṇāti
analyzed: viśveṣu enam vṛjaneṣu pāmi yaḥ me kukṣi suta somaḥ pṛṇāti

original: RV_10.028.03.1{20} adriṇā te mandina indra tūyān sunvanti somān pibasi tvameśām
analyzed: adriṇā te mandinaḥ indra tūyān sunvanti somān pibasi tvam īśām

original: RV_10.028.03.2{20} pacanti te vṛṣabhānatsi teṣāṃ pṛkṣeṇa yanmaghavan hūyamānaḥ
analyzed: pacanti te vṛṣabha anatsi teṣām pṛkṣeṇa yat maghavan hūyamānaḥ

original: RV_10.028.04.1{20} idaṃ su me jaritarā cikiddhi pratīpaṃ śāpaṃ nadyovahanti
analyzed: idam su me jaritarā cikiddhi pratīpam śāpam nadyaḥ vahanti

original: RV_10.028.04.2{20} lopāśaḥ siṃhaṃ pratyañcamatsāḥ kroṣṭāvarāhaṃ niratakta kakṣāt
analyzed: lopāśaḥ siṃham pratyañca matsāḥ kroṣṭāvarāham niratakta kakṣāt

original: RV_10.028.05.1{20} katha ta etadahamā ciketaṃ gṛtsasya pākastavasomanīṣām
analyzed: katha te etat aham ā ciketam gṛtsasya pākastavasoma nīṣām

original: RV_10.028.05.2{20} tvaṃ no vidvān ṛtuthā vi voco yamardhaṃ temaghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ vidvān ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ yam ardham te maghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ

original: RV_10.028.06.1{20} evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ vardhayanti divaścin me bṛhatauttarā dhuḥ
analyzed: eva hi mām tavasam vardhayanti divaścit me bṛhatā auttarāḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_10.028.06.2{20} purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākamaśatruṃhi ma janitā jajāna
analyzed: purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākamaśatruṃhi ma janitā jajāna

original: RV_10.028.07.1{21} evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ jajñurugraṃ karman-karman vṛṣaṇamindra devāḥ
analyzed: eva hi mām tavasam jajñuḥ ugram karman karman vṛṣaṇam indra devāḥ

original: RV_10.028.07.2{21} vadhīṃ vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasano 'pa vrajammahinā dāśuṣe vam
analyzed: vadhīm vṛtram vajreṇa mandasano pa vrajam mahinā dāśuṣe vam

original: RV_10.028.08.1{21} devāsa āyan paraśūnrabibhran vanā vṛścanto abhi viḍbhirāyan
analyzed: devāsaḥ āyan paraśūn rabibhran vanā vṛścantaḥ abhi viḍbhiḥ āyan

original: RV_10.028.08.2{21} ni sudrvaṃ dadhato vakṣaṇāsu yatrā kṛpīṭamanutad dahanti
analyzed: ni su drvam dadhataḥ vakṣaṇāsu yatrā kṛpīṭam anutat dahanti

original: RV_10.028.09.1{21} śaśaḥ kṣuraṃ pratyañcaṃ jagārādriṃ logena vyabhedamārāt
analyzed: śaśaḥ kṣuram pratyañcam jagāra adrim logena vyabhedam ārāt

original: RV_10.028.09.2{21} bṛhantaṃ cid ṛhate randhayāni vayad vatso vṛṣabhaṃśūśuvānaḥ
analyzed: bṛhantam cit ṛhate randhayāni vayat vatsaḥ vṛṣabham śūśuvānaḥ

original: RV_10.028.10.1{21} suparṇa itthā nakhamā siṣāyāvaruddhaḥ paripadaṃ nasiṃhaḥ
analyzed: suparṇaḥ itthā nakham ā siṣāya avaruddhaḥ paripadam na siṃhaḥ

original: RV_10.028.10.2{21} niruddhaścin mahiṣastarṣyāvān godhā tasmāayathaṃ karṣadetat
analyzed: niruddhaḥ cit mahiṣaḥ tarṣyāvān godhā tasmāayatham karṣat etat

original: RV_10.028.11.1{21} tebhyo godhā ayathaṃ karṣadetad ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipiyantyannaiḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ godhāḥ karṣat etat ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipiyanti annaiḥ

original: RV_10.028.11.2{21} sima ukṣṇo 'vasṛṣṭānadanti svayaṃ balānitanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ
analyzed: sime ukṣṇaḥ vasṛṣṭāḥ anadanti svayam balāni tanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ

original: RV_10.028.12.1{21} ete śamībhiḥ suśamī abhūvan ye hinvire tanvaḥ somaukthaiḥ
analyzed: ete śamībhiḥ suśamī abhūvan ye hinvire tanvaḥ soma aukthaiḥ

original: RV_10.028.12.2{21} nṛvad vadannupa no māhi vājān divi śravodadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ
analyzed: nṛvat vadan upa naḥ māhi vājān divi śravaḥ udadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ

original: RV_10.029.01.1{22} vane na vā yo nyadhāyi cākañchucirvāṃ stomo bhuraṇāvajīgaḥ
analyzed: vane na vā yaḥ nyadhāyi cākan śuciḥ vām stomaḥ bhuraṇau ajīgaḥ

original: RV_10.029.01.2{22} yasyedindraḥ purudineṣu hotā nṛṇāṃ naryonṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān
analyzed: yasya id indraḥ puru dineṣu hotā nṛṇām naryaḥ unṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān

original: RV_10.029.02.1{22} pra te asyā uṣasaḥ prāparasyā nṛtau syāma nṛtamasyanṛṇām
analyzed: pra te asyāḥ uṣasaḥ pra aparasyāḥ nṛtau syāma

original: RV_10.029.02.2{22} anu triśokaḥ śatamāvahan nṝn kutsena ratho yoasat sasavān
analyzed: anu triśokaḥ śatam āvahat nṝn kutsena rathaḥ yoasat sasavān

original: RV_10.029.03.1{22} kaste mada indra rantyo bhūd duro giro abhyugro vi dhāva
analyzed: kaḥ te madaḥ indra rantyaḥ bhūt duraḥ giraḥ abhi ugraḥ vi dhāva

original: RV_10.029.03.2{22} kad vāho arvāgupa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyamupamaṃrādho annaiḥ
analyzed: kad vāho arvāk upa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyam upamaṃrādhaḥ annaiḥ

original: RV_10.029.04.1{22} kadu dyumnamindra tvāvato nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kan naāgan
analyzed: kadu dyumnam indra tvāvataḥ nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kad na āgan

original: RV_10.029.04.2{22} mitro na satya urugāya bhṛtyā anne samasya yadasanmanīṣāḥ
analyzed: mitraḥ na satyaḥ uru gāya bhṛtyāḥ anne samasya yat asat manīṣāḥ

original: RV_10.029.05.1{22} preraya sūro arthaṃ na pāraṃ ye asya kāmaṃ janidhā ivagman
analyzed: preraya sūraḥ artham na pāram ye asya kāmam janidhāḥ ivagman

original: RV_10.029.05.2{22} giraśca ye te tuvijāta pūrvīrnara indrapratiśikṣantyannaiḥ
analyzed: giraḥ ca ye te tuvi jāta pūrvīḥ naraḥ indra pratiśikṣanti annaiḥ

original: RV_10.029.06.1{23} mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī dyaurmajmanā pṛthivīkāvyena
analyzed: mātre nu te su mite indra pūrvī dyauḥ majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena

original: RV_10.029.06.2{23} varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādman bhavantupītaye madhūni
analyzed: varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādman bhavantu pītaye madhūni

original: RV_10.029.07.1{23} ā madhvo asmā asicannamatramindrāya pūrṇaṃ sa hisatyarādhāḥ
analyzed: ā madhvaḥ asmai asicat namatram indrāya pūrṇam sa hi satya rādhāḥ

original: RV_10.029.07.2{23} sa vāvṛdhe varimannā pṛthivyā abhi kratvānaryaḥ pauṃsyaiśca
analyzed: sa vāvṛdhe varimannā pṛthivyāḥ abhi kratvā anaryaḥ pauṃsyaiḥ ca

original: RV_10.029.08.1{23} vyānaḷ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā āsmai yatante sakhyāyapūrvīḥ
analyzed: vyānaṭ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ sva ojāḥ ā asmai yatante sakhyāyapūrvīḥ

original: RV_10.029.08.2{23} ā smā rathaṃ na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yaṃ bhadrayāsumatyā codayāse
analyzed: ā smā ratham na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yam bhadrayā asumatyā codayāse

original: RV_10.030.01.1{24} pra devatrā brāhmaṇe gāturetvapo achā manaso naprayukti
analyzed: pra devatrā brāhmaṇe achā manasaḥ naprayukti

original: RV_10.030.01.2{24} mahīṃ mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsiṃ pṛthujrayaserīradhā suvṛktim
analyzed: mahīm mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim pṛthujrayasā irīradhā suvṛktim

original: RV_10.030.02.1{24} adhvaryavo haviṣmanto hi bhūtāchāpa itośatīruśantaḥ
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ haviṣmantaḥ hi bhūta achā apaḥ ita uśatīḥ uśantaḥ

original: RV_10.030.02.2{24} ava yāścaṣṭe aruṇaḥ suparṇastamāsyadhvamūrmimadyā suhastāḥ
analyzed: ava yāḥ caṣṭe aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ tam āsyadhvam ūrmim adyā su hastāḥ

original: RV_10.030.03.1{24} adhvaryavo 'pa itā samudramapāṃ napātaṃ haviṣā yajadhvam
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ paḥ ita samudram apām napātam haviṣā yajadhvam

original: RV_10.030.03.2{24} sa vo dadadūrmimadyā supūtaṃ tasmai somaṃ madhumantaṃsunota
analyzed: sa vaḥ dadat ūrmi madyā su pūtam tasmai somam madhumantam sunota

original: RV_10.030.04.1{24} yo anidhmo dīdayadapsvantaryaṃ viprāsa īḷateadhvareṣu
analyzed: yaḥ anidhmaḥ dīdayat apsu antaryam viprāsaḥ īḍate adhvareṣu

original: RV_10.030.04.2{24} apāṃ napān madhumatīrapo dā yābhirindrovāvṛdhe vīryāya
analyzed: apām napāt madhumatīḥ apaḥ dāḥ yābhiḥ indraḥ uvāvṛdhe vīryāya

original: RV_10.030.05.1{24} yābhiḥ somo modate harṣate ca kalyāṇībhiryuvatibhirnamaryaḥ
analyzed: yābhiḥ somaḥ modate harṣate ca kalyāṇībhiḥ yuvatibhiḥ namaryaḥ

original: RV_10.030.05.2{24} tā adhvaryo apo achā parehi yadāsiñcāoṣadhībhiḥ punītāt
analyzed: tāḥ adhvaryo apaḥ achā parehi yat āsiñca a oṣadhībhiḥ punītāt

original: RV_10.030.06.1{25} eved yūne yuvatayo namanta yadīmuśannuśatīretyacha
analyzed: eva id yūne yuvatayaḥ namanta yadi īm uśan uśatīḥ etya cha

original: RV_10.030.06.2{25} saṃ jānate manasā saṃ cikitre 'dhvaryavo dhiṣaṇāpaścadevīḥ
analyzed: sam jānate manasā sam cikitre dhvaryavaḥ dhiṣaṇā paśca devīḥ

original: RV_10.030.07.1{25} yo vo vṛtābhyo akṛṇodu lokaṃ yo vo mahyā abhiśasteramuñcat
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ vṛtābhyaḥ akṛṇotu lokam yaḥ vaḥ mahyāḥ abhiśasteḥ amuñcat

original: RV_10.030.07.2{25} tasmā indrāya madhumantamūrmiṃ devamādanampra hiṇotanāpaḥ
analyzed: tasmai indrāya madhumantam ūrmim deva mādanam pra hiṇotana apaḥ

original: RV_10.030.08.1{25} prāsmai hinota madhumantamūrmiṃ garbho yo vaḥ sindhavomadhva utsaḥ
analyzed: pra asmai hinota madhumantam ūrmim garbhaḥ yaḥ vaḥ sindhavaḥ madhvaḥ utsaḥ

original: RV_10.030.08.2{25} ghṛtapṛṣṭhamīḍyamadhvareṣvāpo revatīḥśṛṇutā havaṃ me
analyzed: ghṛta pṛṣṭham īḍyam adhvareṣu āpaḥ revatīḥ śṛṇuta havam me

original: RV_10.030.09.1{25} taṃ sindhavo matsaramindrapānamūrmiṃ pra heta ya ubheiyarti
analyzed: tam sindhavaḥ matsaram indra pānam ūrmim pra heta yaḥ ubhā iiyarti

original: RV_10.030.09.2{25} madacyutamauśānaṃ nabhojāṃ pari tritantuṃvicarantamutsam
analyzed: mada cyutam auśānam nabhaḥ jām pari tri tantum vicarantam utsam

original: RV_10.030.10.1{25} āvarvṛtatīradha nu dvidhārā goṣuyudho na niyavaṃcarantīḥ
analyzed: āvarvṛtatīḥ adha nu dvi dhārāḥ goṣuyudhaḥ na niyavaṃcarantīḥ

original: RV_10.030.10.2{25} ṛṣe janitrīrbhuvanasya patnīrapo vandasvasavṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ
analyzed: ṛṣe janitrīḥ bhuvanasya patnīḥ apaḥ vandasva asavṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ

original: RV_10.030.11.1{26} hinotā no adhvaraṃ devayajyā hinota brahma sanayedhanānām
analyzed: hinota naḥ adhvaram deva yajyā hinota brahma sanayedhanānām

original: RV_10.030.11.2{26} ṛtasya yoge vi śyadhvamūdhaḥ śruṣṭīvarīrbhūtanāsmabhyamāpaḥ
analyzed: ṛtasya yoge vi śyadhvam ūdhaḥ śruṣṭīvarīḥ bhūtana asmabhyam āpaḥ

original: RV_10.030.12.1{26} āpo revatīḥ kṣayathā hi vasvaḥ kratuṃ ca bhadrambibhṛthāmṛtaṃ ca
analyzed: āpaḥ revatīḥ kṣayatha hi vasvaḥ kratum ca bhadram bibhṛtha amṛtam ca

original: RV_10.030.12.2{26} rāyaśca stha svapatyasya patnīḥsarasvatī tad gṛṇate vayo dhāt
analyzed: rāyaḥ ca stha su apatyasya patnīḥ sarasvatī tat gṛṇate vayaḥ dhāt

original: RV_10.030.13.1{26} prati yadāpo adṛśramāyatīrghṛtaṃ payāṃsi bibhratīrmadhūni
analyzed: prati yadā apaḥ adṛśram āyatīḥ ghṛtam payāṃsi bibhratīḥ madhūni

original: RV_10.030.13.2{26} adhvaryubhirmanasā saṃvidānā indrāya somaṃsuṣutaṃ bharantīḥ
analyzed: adhvaryubhiḥ manasā saṃvidānāḥ indrāya somaṃsuṣutam bharantīḥ

original: RV_10.030.14.1{26} emā agman revatīrjīvadhanyā adhvaryavaḥ sādayatāsakhāyaḥ
analyzed: ā imāḥ agman revatīḥ jīva dhanyāḥ adhvaryavaḥ sādayatā sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10.030.14.2{26} ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāso 'pāṃ naptrāsaṃvidānāsa enāḥ
analyzed: ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāsaḥ pām naptrā a saṃvidānāsaḥ enāḥ

original: RV_10.030.15.1{26} āgmannāpa uśatīrbarhiredaṃ nyadhvare asadandevayantīḥ
analyzed: āgman āpaḥ uśatīḥ barhiḥ ā idam ni adhvare asadan devayantīḥ

original: RV_10.030.15.2{26} adhvaryavaḥ sunutendrāya somamabhūdu vaḥsuśakā devayajyā
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ sunuta indrāya somam abhūt vaḥ su śakā deva yajyā

original: RV_10.031.01.1{27} ā no devānāmupa vetu śaṃso viśvebhisturairavaseyajatraḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ devānām upa vetu śaṃsaḥ viśvebhiḥ turaiḥ avaseya jatraḥ

original: RV_10.031.01.2{27} tebhirvayaṃ suṣakhāyo bhavema taranto viśvāduritā syāma
analyzed: tebhiḥ vayam su sakhāyaḥ bhavema tarantaḥ viśva a duritāḥ syāma

original: RV_10.031.02.1{27} pari cin marto draviṇaṃ mamanyād ṛtasya pathā namasāvivāset
analyzed: pari cit martaḥ draviṇam mamanyāt ṛtasya pathā namasā āvivāset

original: RV_10.031.02.2{27} ata svena kratunā saṃ vadeta śreyāṃsandakṣaṃ manasā jagṛbhyāt
analyzed: atas svena kratunā sam vadeta śreyāṃsan dakṣam manasā jagṛbhyāt

original: RV_10.031.03.1{27} adhāyi dhītirasasṛgramaṃśāstīrthe:
analyzed: adhāyi dhīti rasa sṛgram aṃśāḥ tīrthe

original: na dasmamupayantyumāḥ
analyzed: na dasmam upayanti umāḥ

original: RV_10.031.03.2{27} abhyānaśma suvitasya śūṣaṃ navedasoamṛtānāmabhūma
analyzed: abhyānaśma suvitasya śūṣam navedasaḥ amṛtānām abhūma

original: RV_10.031.04.1{27} nityaścākanyāt svapatirdāmūnā yasmā u devaḥ savitajajāna
analyzed: nityaḥ cākanyāt sva patiḥ dāmūnāḥ yasmai u devaḥ savitā jajāna

original: RV_10.031.04.2{27} bhago vā gobhiraryamemanajyāt so asmai caruśchadayaduta syāt
analyzed: bhagaḥ vā gobhiḥ aryamā imanajyāt saḥ asmai caruḥ chadayat uta syāt

original: RV_10.031.05.1{27} iyaṃ sā bhūyā uṣasāmiva kṣa yad dha kṣumantaḥśavasā samāyan
analyzed: iyam sā bhūyāḥ uṣasām iva kṣa yat ha kṣumantaḥ śavasā samāyan

original: RV_10.031.05.2{27} asya stutiṃ jariturbhikṣamāṇā ānaḥ śagmāsa upa yantu vājāḥ
analyzed: asya stutim jarituḥ bhikṣamāṇāḥ ānaḥ śagmāsaḥ upa yantu vājāḥ

original: RV_10.031.06.1{28} asyedeṣā sumatiḥ paprathānābhavat pūrvyā bhumanāgauḥ
analyzed: asya id eṣā sumatiḥ paprathānā abhavat pūrvyā bhumanāgauḥ

original: RV_10.031.06.2{28} asya sanīḷā asurasya yonau samāna ā bharaṇebibhramāṇāḥ
analyzed: asya sanīḍāḥ asurasya yonau samāne ā bharaṇe bibhramāṇāḥ

original: RV_10.031.07.1{28} kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivīniṣṭatakṣuḥ
analyzed: kim svid vanam kaḥ u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsa yatas dyāvāpṛthivīn iṣṭatakṣuḥ

original: RV_10.031.07.2{28} santasthāne ajare itaūtī ahāni pūrvīruṣaso jaranta
analyzed: santasthāne ajare itaūtī ahāni pūrvīruṣasaḥ jaranta

original: RV_10.031.08.1{28} naitāvadenā paro anyadastyukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivībibharti
analyzed: na etāvat enā paras anyat asti ukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti

original: RV_10.031.08.2{28} tvadaṃ pavitraṃ kṛṇuta svadhāvān yadīṃsūryaṃ na harito vahanti
analyzed: tvadam pavitram kṛṇuta svadhāvān yadi īṃ sūryam na haritaḥ vahanti

original: RV_10.031.09.1{28} stego na kṣāmatyeti pṛthvīṃ mihaṃ na vāto vi havāti bhūma
analyzed: stegaḥ na kṣām atyeti pṛthvīm miham na vātaḥ vi havāti bhūma

original: RV_10.031.09.2{28} mitro yatra varuṇo ajyamāno 'gnirvane na vyasṛṣṭa śokam
analyzed: mitraḥ yatra varuṇaḥ ajyamānaḥ gniḥ vane na vyasṛṣṭa śokam

original: RV_10.031.10.1{28} starīryat sūta sadyo ajyamānā vyathiravyathiḥ kṛṇutasvagopā
analyzed: starīḥ yat sūta sadyas ajyamānā vyathiḥ avyathiḥ kṛṇuta sva gopā

original: RV_10.031.10.2{28} putro yat purvaḥ pitrorjaniṣṭa śamyāṃ gaurjagāra yad dha pṛchān
analyzed: putraḥ yat purvas pitroḥ janiṣṭa śamyām gauḥ jagāra yat ha pṛchān

original: RV_10.031.11.1{28} uta kaṇvaṃ nṛṣadaḥ putramāhuruta śyāvo dhanamādattavāji
analyzed: uta kaṇvam nṛṣadaḥ putram āhuḥ uta śyāvaḥ dhanam ādatta vāji

original: RV_10.031.11.2{28} pra kṛṣṇāya ruśadapinvatodhar{ṛ}tamatra nakirasmā apīpet
analyzed: pra kṛṣṇāya ruśat apinvatodha ṛtam atra nakir asmai apīpet

original: RV_10.032.01.1{29} pra su gmantā dhiyasānasya sakṣaṇi varebhirvarānabhiṣu prasīdataḥ
analyzed: pra su gmantā dhiyasānasya sakṣaṇi varebhiḥ varān abhiṣu prasīdataḥ

original: RV_10.032.01.2{29} asmākamindra ubhayaṃ jujoṣati yatsomyasyāndhaso bubodhati
analyzed: asmākam indraḥ ubhayam jujoṣati yat somyasya andhasaḥ bubodhati

original: RV_10.032.02.1{29} vīndra yāsi divyāni rocanā vi pārthivāni rajasāpuruṣṭuta
analyzed: vi indra yāsi divyāni rocanā vi pārthivāni rajasāpuruṣṭuta

original: RV_10.032.02.2{29} ye tvā vahanti muhuradhvarānupa te suvanvantu vagyanānarādhasaḥ
analyzed: ye tvā vahanti muhur adhvarān upa te suvanvantu vagyanān arādhasaḥ

original: RV_10.032.03.1{29} tadin me chantsat vapuṣo vapuṣṭaraṃ putro yajjānampitroradhīyati
analyzed: tat id me chantsat vapuṣaḥ vapuṣṭaram putraḥ yat jānam pitroḥ adhīyati

original: RV_10.032.03.2{29} jāyā patiṃ vahati vagnunā sumat puṃsaid bhadro vahatuḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ
analyzed: jāyā patim vahati vagnunā sumat puṃsā ed bhadraḥ vahatuḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10.032.04.1{29} tadit sadhasthamabhi cāru dīdhaya gāvo yacchāsanvahatuṃ na dhenavaḥ
analyzed: tat id sadhastham abhi cāru dīdhaya gāvaḥ yat śāsan vahatum na dhenavaḥ

original: RV_10.032.04.2{29} mātā yan manturyūthasyapūrvyābhi vāṇasya saptadhāturijjanaḥ
analyzed: mātā yat mantuḥ yūthasya pūrvyā abhi vāṇasya sapta dhātuḥ id janaḥ

original: RV_10.032.05.1{29} pra vo 'chā ririce devayuṣ padameko rudrebhiryātiturvaṇiḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ śā ririce devayuḥ padam ekaḥ rudrebhiḥ yāti turvaṇiḥ

original: RV_10.032.05.2{29} jarā vā yeṣvamṛteṣu dāvane pari vaūmebhyaḥ siñcatā madhu
analyzed: jarā vā yeṣu amṛteṣu dāvane pari vaūmebhyaḥ siñcata madhu

original: RV_10.032.06.1{30} nidhīyamānamapagūḷamapsu pra me devānāṃ vratapāuvāca
analyzed: nidhīyamānam apagūḍam apsu pra me devānām vrata pāḥ uvāca

original: RV_10.032.06.2{30} indro vidvānanu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāhamagneanuśiṣṭa āgām
analyzed: indraḥ vidvān anu hi tvā cacakṣa tena aham agne anuśiṣṭaḥ āgām

original: RV_10.032.07.1{30} akṣetravit kṣetravidaṃ hyaprāṭ sa praitikṣetravidānuśiṣṭaḥ
analyzed: a kṣetra vid kṣetra vidam hi aprāṭ sa praiti kṣetra vidā anuśiṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10.032.07.2{30} etad vai bhadramanuśāsanosyotasrutiṃ vindatyañjasīnām
analyzed: etat vai bhadram anuśāsanā usya utasrutim vindati añjasīnām

original: RV_10.032.08.1{30} adyedu prāṇīdamamannimāhāpīvṛto adhayan māturūdhaḥ
analyzed: adya idu apīvṛtaḥ adhayat mātuḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_10.032.08.2{30} emenamāpa jarimā yuvānamaheḷan vasuḥ sumanābabhūva
analyzed: āpa jarimā yuvānam aheḍan vasuḥ sumanāḥ babhūva

original: RV_10.032.09.1{30} etāni bhadrā kalaśa kriyāma kuruśravaṇa dadato maghāni
analyzed: etāni bhadrā kalaśa kriyāma kuruśravaṇa dadataḥ maghāni

original: RV_10.032.09.2{30} dāna id vo maghavānaḥ so astvayaṃ ca somo hṛdi yambibharmi
analyzed: dāne id vaḥ maghavānaḥ saḥ astu ayam ca somaḥ hṛdi yam bibharmi

original: RV_10.033.01.1{01} pra mā yuyujre prayujo janānāṃ vahāmi sma puṣaṇamantareṇa
analyzed: pra mā yuyujre prayujaḥ janānām vahāmi sma puṣaṇam antareṇa

original: RV_10.033.01.2{01} viśve devāso adha māmarakṣan duḥśāsurāgāditi ghoṣa āsīt
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ adha mām arakṣan duḥśāsuḥ āgāt iti ghoṣaḥ āsīt

original: RV_10.033.02.1{01} saṃ mā tapantyabhitaḥ sapatnīriva parśavaḥ
analyzed: sam mā tapanti abhitas sapatnīḥ iva parśavaḥ

original: RV_10.033.02.2{01} ni bādhateamatirnagnatā jasurverna vevīyate matiḥ
analyzed: ni bādhate amatiḥ nagna tā jasuḥ veḥ na vevīyate matiḥ

original: RV_10.033.03.1{01} mūṣo na śiśnā vyadanti mādhya stotāraṃ te śatakrato
analyzed: mūṣaḥ na śiśnā vyadanti mā adhya stotāram te śatakrato

original: RV_10.033.03.2{01} sakṛt su no maghavannindra mṛḷayādhā piteva no bhava
analyzed: sakṛt su naḥ maghavan indra mṛḍaya adha pitā iva naḥ bhava

original: RV_10.033.04.1{01} kuruśravaṇamāvṛṇi rājānaṃ trāsadasyavam
analyzed: kuruśravaṇam āvṛṇi rājānam trāsadasyavam

original: RV_10.033.04.2{01} maṃhiṣṭhaṃvāghatām ṛṣiḥ
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ

original: RV_10.033.05.1{01} yasya mā harito rathe tisro vahanti sādhuyā
analyzed: yasya mā haritaḥ rathe tisraḥ vahanti sādhuyā

original: RV_10.033.05.2{01} stavaisahasradakṣiṇe
analyzed: stavai sahasra dakṣiṇe

original: RV_10.033.06.1{02} yasya prasvādaso gira upamaśravasaḥ pituḥ
analyzed: yasya prasvādasaḥ giraḥ upamaśravasaḥ pituḥ

original: RV_10.033.06.2{02} kṣetraṃ naraṇvamūcuṣe
analyzed: kṣetram naraṇvam ūcuṣe

original: RV_10.033.07.1{02} adhi putropamaśravo napān mitrātitherihi
analyzed: adhi putra upamaśravaḥ napāt mitra atithā īrihi

original: RV_10.033.07.2{02} pituṣ ṭe asmivanditā
analyzed: pituḥ te asmivanditā

original: RV_10.033.08.1{02} yadīśīyāmṛtānāmuta vā martyānām
analyzed: yadi īśīya amṛtānām uta vā martyānām

original: RV_10.033.08.2{02} jīvedinmaghavā mama
analyzed: jīvedidh maghavā mama

original: RV_10.033.09.1{02} na devānāmati vrataṃ śatātmā cana jīvati
analyzed: na devānām ati vratam śata ātmā cana jīvati

original: RV_10.033.09.2{02} tathāyujā vi vāvṛte
analyzed: tathā yujā vi vāvṛte

original: RV_10.034.01.1{03} prāvepā mā bṛhato mādayanti pravātejā iriṇe varvṛtānāḥ
analyzed: prāvepāḥ mā bṛhataḥ mādayanti pravātejāḥ iriṇe varvṛtānāḥ

original: RV_10.034.01.2{03} somasyeva maujavatasya bhakṣo vibhīdako jāgṛvirmahyamachān
analyzed: somasya iva maujavatasya bhakṣaḥ vibhīdakaḥ jāgṛviḥ mahyam achān

original: RV_10.034.02.1{03} na mā mimetha na jihīḷa eṣā śivā sakhibhya uta mahyamāsīt
analyzed: na mā mimetha na jihīḍe eṣā śivā sakhibhyaḥ uta mahyam āsīt

original: RV_10.034.02.2{03} akṣasyāhamekaparasya hetoranuvratāmapa jāyāmarodham
analyzed: akṣasya aham eka parasya hetoḥ anuvratām apa jāyām arodham

original: RV_10.034.03.1{03} dveṣṭi śvaśrūrapa jāyā ruṇaddhi na nāthito vindatemarḍitāram
analyzed: dveṣṭi jāyā ruṇaddhi na nāthitaḥ

original: RV_10.034.03.2{03} aśvasyeva jarato vasnyasya nāhaṃ vindāmikitavasya bhogam
analyzed: aśvasya iva jarataḥ vasnyasya na aham vindāmikitavasya bhogam

original: RV_10.034.04.1{03} anye jāyāṃ pari mṛśantyasya yasyāgṛdhad vedane vājyakṣaḥ
analyzed: anye jāyām pari mṛśanti asya yasya agṛdhat vedane vājī akṣaḥ

original: RV_10.034.04.2{03} pitā matā bhrātara enamāhurna jānīmo nayatābaddhametam
analyzed: pitā matāḥ bhrātaraḥ enam āhuḥ na jānīmaḥ nayata ābaddham etam

original: RV_10.034.05.1{03} yadādīdhye na daviṣāṇyebhiḥ parāyadbhyo 'va hīyesakhibhyaḥ
analyzed: yat ādīdhye na daviṣāṇi ebhiḥ parāyadbhyaḥ

original: RV_10.034.05.2{03} nyuptāśca babhravo vācamakratanemīdeṣāṃ niṣkṛtaṃ jāriṇīva
analyzed: nyuptāḥ ca babhravaḥ vācamakrata nemī deṣām niṣkṛtam jāriṇī iva

original: RV_10.034.06.1{04} sabhāmeti kitavaḥ pṛchamāno jeṣyāmīti tanvāśūśujānaḥ
analyzed: sabhām ā iti kitavaḥ pṛcchamānaḥ jeṣyāmi iti tanvā aśūśujānaḥ

original: RV_10.034.06.2{04} akṣāso asya vi tiranti kāmaṃ pratidīvnedadhata ā kṛtāni
analyzed: akṣāsaḥ asya vi tiranti kāmam pratidīvnā idadhataḥ ā kṛtāni

original: RV_10.034.07.1{04} akṣāsa idan:
analyzed: akṣāsaḥ idan

original: kuśino nitodino nikṛtvānastapanāstāpayiṣṇavaḥ
analyzed: kuśinaḥ nitodinaḥ nikṛtvānaḥ tapanāḥ tāpayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_10.034.07.2{04} kumāradeṣṇā jayataḥ punarhaṇo madhvāsampṛktāḥ kitavasya barhaṇā
analyzed: kumāradeṣṇāḥ jayataḥ punarhaṇaḥ madhvā asampṛktāḥ kitavasya barhaṇā

original: RV_10.034.08.1{04} tripañcāśaḥ krīḷati vrāta eṣāṃ deva iva savitāsatyadharmā
analyzed: tripañcāśaḥ krīḍati vrātaḥ eṣām devaḥ iva savitā a satya dharmā

original: RV_10.034.08.2{04} ugrasya cin manyave nā namante rājā cidebhyonama it kṛṇoti
analyzed: ugrasya cit manyave nā namante rājā cit ebhyaḥ namaḥ id kṛṇoti

original: RV_10.034.09.1{04} nīcā vartanta upari sphurantyahastāso hastavantaṃ sahante
analyzed: nīcā vartante upari sphuranti ahastāsaḥ hastavantam sahante

original: RV_10.034.09.2{04} divyā aṅgārā iriṇe nyuptāḥ śītāḥ santo hṛdayaṃnirdahanti
analyzed: divyāḥ aṅgārāḥ iriṇe nyuptāḥ śītāḥ santaḥ hṛdayam nirdahanti

original: RV_10.034.10.1{04} jāyā tapyate kitavasya hīnā mātā putrasya carataḥ kvasvit
analyzed: jāyā tapyate kitavasya hīnā mātā putrasya carataḥ kvasvid

original: RV_10.034.10.2{04} ṛṇāvā bibhyad dhanamichamāno 'nyeṣāmastamupanaktameti
analyzed: ṛṇāvā bibhyat dhanam icchamānaḥ ni eṣām astam upanaktam eti

original: RV_10.034.11.1{05} striyaṃ dṛṣṭvāya kitavaṃ tatāpānyeṣāṃ jāyāṃsukṛtaṃ ca yonim
analyzed: striyam dṛṣṭvāya kitavam tatāpa anyeṣām jāyāṃsu kṛtam ca yonim

original: RV_10.034.11.2{05} pūrvāhṇe aśvān yuyuje hi babhrūn soagnerante vṛṣalaḥ papāda
analyzed: pūrvāhṇe aśvān yuyuje hi babhrūn saḥ agneḥ ante vṛṣalaḥ papāda

original: RV_10.034.12.1{05} yo vaḥ senānīrmahato gaṇasya rājā vrātasya prathamobabhūva
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ senānīḥ mahataḥ gaṇasya rājā vrātasya prathamaḥ babhūva

original: RV_10.034.12.2{05} tasmai kṛṇomi na dhanā ruṇadhmi daśāhamprācīstad ṛtaṃ vadāmi
analyzed: tasmai kṛṇomi na dhanā ruṇadhmi daśa aham prācīḥ tat ṛtam vadāmi

original: RV_10.034.13.1{05} akṣairmā dīvyaḥ kṛṣimit kṛṣasva vitte ramasva bahumanyamānaḥ
analyzed: akṣaiḥ mā dīvyaḥ kṛṣi mit kṛṣasva vitte ramasva bahu manyamānaḥ

original: RV_10.034.13.2{05} tatra gāvaḥ kitava tatra jāyā tan me vicaṣṭe savitāyamaryaḥ
analyzed: tatra gāvaḥ kitava tatra jāyā tat me vicaṣṭe savitā ayam aryaḥ

original: RV_10.034.14.1{05} mitraṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ khalu mṛlatā no mā no ghoreṇa caratābhidhṛṣṇu
analyzed: mitram kṛṇudhvam khalu mṛlata naḥ mā naḥ ghoreṇa carata abhidhṛṣṇu

original: RV_10.034.14.2{05} ni vo nu manyurviśatāmarātiranyo babhrūṇāmprasitau nvastu
analyzed: ni vaḥ nu manyuḥ viśatām arātiḥ anyaḥ babhrūṇām prasitau nu astu

original: RV_10.035.01.1{06} abudhramu tya indravanto agnayo jyotirbharanta uṣasovyuṣṭiṣu
analyzed: abudhramu tye indravantaḥ agnayaḥ jyotiḥ bharantaḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_10.035.01.2{06} mahī dyāvāpṛthivī cetatāmapo 'dyādevānāmava ā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: mahī dyāvāpṛthivī cetatām apaḥ dyā devānām avaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.035.02.1{06} divaspṛthivyorava ā vṛṇīmahe mātṝn sindhūn parvatāñcharyaṇāvataḥ
analyzed: divaspṛthivyā uravaḥ ā vṛṇīmahe mātṝn sindhūn parvatān śaryaṇāvataḥ

original: RV_10.035.02.2{06} anāgāstvaṃ sūryamuṣāsamīmahe bhadraṃsomaḥ suvāno adyā kṛṇotu naḥ
analyzed: anāgāstvam sūryam uṣāsam īmahe bhadram somaḥ suvānaḥ adyā kṛṇotu naḥ

original: RV_10.035.03.1{06} dyāvā no adya pṛthivī anāgaso mahī trāyetāṃ suvitāyamātarā
analyzed: dyāvā naḥ adya pṛthivī anāgasaḥ mahī trāyetām suvitāyamātarā

original: RV_10.035.03.2{06} uṣā uchantyapa bādhatāmaghaṃ svastyagniṃsamidhānamīmahe
analyzed: uṣāḥ uchantī apa bādhatām agham svasti agniṃsamidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10.035.04.1{06} iyaṃ na usrā prathamā sudevyaṃ revat sanibhyo revatī vyuchatu
analyzed: iyam naḥ usrā prathamā su devyam revat sanibhyaḥ revatī vyuchatu

original: RV_10.035.04.2{06} āre manyuṃ durvidatrasya dhīmahi svastyagniṃsamidhānamīmahe
analyzed: āre manyum durvidatrasya dhīmahi svasti agniṃsamidhānamīmahe

original: RV_10.035.05.1{06} pra yāḥ sisrate sūryasya raśmibhirjyotirbharantīruṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu
analyzed: pra yāḥ sisrate sūryasya raśmibhiḥ jyotiḥ bharantīḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_10.035.05.2{06} bhadrā no adya śravase vyuchata svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
analyzed: bhadrāḥ naḥ adya śravase vyuchata svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10.035.06.1{07} anamīvā uṣasa ā carantu na udagnayo jihatāṃ jyotiṣābṛhat
analyzed: anamīvāḥ uṣasaḥ ā carantu naḥ udagnayaḥ jihatām jyotiṣā abṛhat

original: RV_10.035.06.2{07} āyukṣātāmaśvinā tūtujiṃ rathaṃ svastyagniṃsamidhānamīmahe
analyzed: āyukṣātām aśvinā tūtujim ratham svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10.035.07.1{07} śreṣṭhaṃ no adya savitarvareṇyaṃ bhāgamā suva sa hiratnadhā asi
analyzed: śreṣṭham naḥ adya savitar vareṇyam bhāgam ā suva sa hiratna dhāḥ asi

original: RV_10.035.07.2{07} rāyo janitrīṃ dhiṣaṇāmupa bruve svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
analyzed: rāyaḥ janitrīm dhiṣaṇām upa bruve svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10.035.08.1{07} pipartu mā tad ṛtasya pravācanaṃ devānāṃ yan manuṣyāamanmahi
analyzed: pipartu mā tat ṛtasya pravācanam devānām yat manuṣyā amanmahi

original: RV_10.035.08.2{07} viśvā idusrā spaḷ udeti sūryaḥ svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
analyzed: viśvāḥ idusrāḥ spaṣ udeti sūryaḥ svasti agnim samidhānamīmahe

original: RV_10.035.09.1{07} adveṣo adya barhiṣa starīmaṇi grāvṇāṃ yoge manmanaḥsādha īmahe
analyzed: a dveṣaḥ adya barhiṣaḥ starīmaṇi grāvṇām yoge manmanaḥ sādhaḥ īmahe

original: RV_10.035.09.2{07} ādityānāṃ śarmaṇi sthā bhuraṇyasi svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
analyzed: ādityānām śarmaṇi stha bhuraṇyasi svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10.035.10.1{07} ā no barhiḥ sadhamāde bṛhad divi devānīḷe sādayāsapta hotṝn
analyzed: ā naḥ barhiḥ sadhamāde bṛhat divi devānīḍe sādaya asapta hotṝn

original: RV_10.035.10.2{07} indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagaṃ svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
analyzed: indram mitram varuṇam sātaye bhagam svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10.035.11.1{08} ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye vṛdhe no yajñamavatāsajoṣasaḥ
analyzed: te ādityāḥ ā gata sarvatātaye vṛdhe naḥ yajñamavatāsajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_10.035.11.2{08} bṛhaspatiṃ pūṣaṇamaśvinā bhagaṃ svastyagniṃ samidhānamīmahe
analyzed: bṛhaspatim pūṣaṇam aśvinā bhagam svasti agnim samidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10.035.12.1{08} tan no devā yachata supravācanaṃ chardirādityāḥ subharaṃnṛpāyyam
analyzed: tat naḥ devāḥ yacchata su pravācanam chardiḥ ādityāḥ subharam nṛpāyyam

original: RV_10.035.12.2{08} paśve tokāya tanayāya jīvase svastyagniṃsamidhānamīmahe
analyzed: paśve tokāya tanayāya jīvase svasti agniṃsamidhānam īmahe

original: RV_10.035.13.1{08} viśve adya maruto viśva ūtī viśve bhavantvagnayaḥsamiddhāḥ
analyzed: viśve adya marutaḥ viśve ūtī viśve bhavantu agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ

original: RV_10.035.13.2{08} viśve no devā avasā gamantu viśvamastudraviṇaṃ vājo asme
analyzed: viśve naḥ devāḥ avasā gamantu viśva mastu draviṇam vājaḥ asme

original: RV_10.035.14.1{08} yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ trāyadhve yaṃ pipṛthātyaṃhaḥ
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ vatha vājasātau yam trāyadhve yam pipṛtha ati aṃhaḥ

original: RV_10.035.14.2{08} yo vo gopīthe na bhayasya veda te syāmadevavītaye turāsaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ gopīthe na bhayasya veda te syāma deva vītaye turāsaḥ

original: RV_10.036.01.1{09} uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā dyāvākṣāmā varuṇomitro aryamā
analyzed: uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā dyāvākṣāmā varuṇaḥ umitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10.036.01.2{09} indraṃ huve marutaḥ parvatānapa ādityāndyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ
analyzed: indram huve marutaḥ parvatān apaḥ ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svar

original: RV_10.036.02.1{09} dyauśca naḥ pṛthivī ca pracetasa ṛtāvarī rakṣatāmaṃhasoriṣaḥ
analyzed: dyauḥ ca naḥ pṛthivī ca pracetasaḥ ṛtāvarī rakṣatām aṃhasā ūriṣaḥ

original: RV_10.036.02.2{09} mā durvidatrā nir{ṛ}tirna īśata tad devānāmavoadyā vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: mā durvidatrā nirṛtiḥ naḥ īśata tat devānām avoadyā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.036.03.1{09} viśvasmān no aditiḥ pātvaṃhaso mātā mitrasya varuṇasyarevataḥ
analyzed: viśvasmāt naḥ aditiḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ mātā mitrasya varuṇasya revataḥ

original: RV_10.036.03.2{09} svarvajjyotiravṛkaṃ naśīmahi tad devānāṃ ...
analyzed: svarvat jyotiḥ avṛkam naśīmahi tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.04.1{09} grāvā vadannapa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu duṣvapnyaṃ nir{ṛ}tiṃviśvamatriṇam
analyzed: grāvā vadan apa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu duṣvapnyam nirṛtim viśva matriṇam

original: RV_10.036.04.2{09} ādityaṃ śarma marutāmaśīmahi taddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: ādityam śarma marutām aśīmahi tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.05.1{09} endro barhiḥ sīdatu pinvatāmiḷā bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhir{ṛ}kvo arcatu
analyzed: ā indraḥ barhiḥ sīdatu pinvatām iḷā bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhiḥ ṛkvaḥ arcatu

original: RV_10.036.05.2{09} supraketaṃ jīvase manma dhīmahi taddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: su praketam jīvase manma dhīmahi tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.06.1{10} divispṛśaṃ yajñamasmākamaśvinā jīrādhvaraṃ kṛṇutaṃsumnamiṣṭaye
analyzed: divispṛśam yajñam asmākam aśvinā jīra adhvaram kṛṇutam sumnam iṣṭaye

original: RV_10.036.06.2{10} prācīnaraśmimāhutaṃ ghṛtena taddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: prācīna raśmim āhutam ghṛtena tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.07.1{10} upa hvaye suhavaṃ mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ pāvakam ṛṣvaṃ sakhyāyaśambhuvam
analyzed: upa hvaye su havam mārutam gaṇam pāvakam ṛṣvam sakhyāya śambhuvam

original: RV_10.036.07.2{10} rāyas poṣaṃ sauśravasāya dhīmahi taddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣam sauśravasāya dhīmahi tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.08.1{10} apāṃ peruṃ jīvadhanyaṃ bharāmahe devāvyaṃ suhavamadhvaraśriyam
analyzed: apām perum jīva dhanyam bharāmahe devāvyam su havam adhvara śriyam

original: RV_10.036.08.2{10} suraśmiṃ somamindriyaṃ yamīmahi taddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: su raśmim somam indriyam yamīmahi tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.09.1{10} sanema tat susanitā sanitvabhirvayaṃ jīvā jīvaputrāanāgasaḥ
analyzed: sanema tat su sanitā sanitvabhiḥ vayam jīvāḥ jīva putrāḥ anāgasaḥ

original: RV_10.036.09.2{10} brahmadviṣo viṣvageno bharerata taddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: brahma dviṣaḥ viṣvak enaḥ bharerata tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.10.1{10} ye sthā manoryajñiyāste śṛṇotana yad vo devā īmahetad dadātana
analyzed: ye stha manoḥ yajñiyāḥ te śṛṇotana yat vaḥ devāḥ īmahe itat dadātana

original: RV_10.036.10.2{10} jaitraṃ kratuṃ rayimad vīravad yaśastaddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: jaitram kratum rayimat vīravat yaśaḥ tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.11.1{11} mahadadya mahatāmā vṛṇīmahe 'vo devānāṃ bṛhatāmanarvaṇām
analyzed: mahat adya mahatām ā vṛṇīmahe vaḥ devānām bṛhatām anarvaṇām

original: RV_10.036.11.2{11} yathā vasu vīrajātaṃ naśāmahai taddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: yathā vasu vīra jātam naśāmahai tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.12.1{11} maho agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇyanāgā mitre varuṇesvastaye
analyzed: mahaḥ agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇyanāgāḥ mitre varuṇesvastaye

original: RV_10.036.12.2{11} śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani taddevānāṃ ...
analyzed: śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani tat devānām

original: RV_10.036.13.1{11} ye savituḥ satyasavasya viśve mitrasya vrate varuṇasyadevāḥ
analyzed: ye savituḥ satya savasya viśve mitrasya vrate varuṇasya devāḥ

original: RV_10.036.13.2{11} te saubhagaṃ vīravad gomadapno dadhātanadraviṇaṃ citramasme
analyzed: te saubhagam vīravat gomat apnaḥ dadhātana draviṇam citram asme

original: RV_10.036.14.1{11} savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt savitottarāttātsavitādharāttāt
analyzed: savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt savitā uttarāttāt savitā adharāttāt

original: RV_10.036.14.2{11} savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātiṃ savitā norāsatāṃ dīrghamayuḥ
analyzed: savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātim savitā naḥ āsatām dīrgham ayuḥ

original: RV_10.037.01.1{12} namo mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase maho devāya tad ṛtaṃsaparyata
analyzed: namaḥ mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase mahaḥ devāya tat ṛtaṃsaparyata

original: RV_10.037.01.2{12} dūredṛśe devajātāya ketave divas putrāyasūryāya śaṃsata
analyzed: dūredṛśe deva jātāya ketave divaḥ putrāya sūryāya śaṃsata

original: RV_10.037.02.1{12} sā mā satyoktiḥ pari pātu viśvato dyāvā ca yatratatanannahāni ca
analyzed: sā mā satya uktiḥ pari pātu viśvatas dyāvā ca ca

original: RV_10.037.02.2{12} viśvamanyan ni viśate yadejativiśvāhāpo viśvāhodeti sūryaḥ
analyzed: viśvam anyat ni viśate yat ejati viśvāhā apaḥ viśvāhā udeti sūryaḥ

original: RV_10.037.03.1{12} na te adevaḥ pradivo ni vāsate yadetaśebhiḥ patarairatharyasi
analyzed: na te adevaḥ pradivaḥ ni vāsate yat etaśebhiḥ pataraiḥ atharyasi

original: RV_10.037.03.2{12} prācīnamanyadanu vartate raja udanyenajyotiṣā yāsi sūrya
analyzed: prācīnam anyat anu vartate rajaḥ udanyena jyotiṣā yāsi sūrya

original: RV_10.037.04.1{12} yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamo jagacca viśvamudiyarṣibhānunā
analyzed: yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamaḥ jagat ca viśvam udiya ṛṣi bhānunā

original: RV_10.037.04.2{12} tenāsmad viśvāmanirāmanāhutimapāmīvāmapa duṣvapnyaṃ suva
analyzed: tena asmat viśvāmanirāman āhutim apa amīvām apa duṣvapnyam suva

original: RV_10.037.05.1{12} viśvasya hi preṣito rakṣasi vratamaheḷayannuccarasisvadhā anu
analyzed: viśvasya hi preṣitaḥ rakṣasi vratam aheḍayan ucca rasi svadhāḥ anu

original: RV_10.037.05.2{12} yadadya tvā sūryopabravāmahai taṃ no devāanu maṃsīrata kratum
analyzed: yat adya tvā sūrya upabravāmahai tam naḥ devāḥ anu maṃsīrata kratum

original: RV_10.037.06.1{12} taṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī tan na āpa indraḥ śṛṇvantu marutohavaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: tam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī tat naḥ āpaḥ indraḥ śṛṇvantu marutaḥ havam vacaḥ

original: RV_10.037.06.2{12} mā śūne bhūma sūryasya sandṛśibhadraṃ jīvanto jaraṇāmaśīmahi
analyzed: mā śūne bhūma sūryasya sandṛśi bhadram jīvantaḥ jaraṇām aśīmahi

original: RV_10.037.07.1{13} viśvāhā tvā sumanasaḥ sucakṣasaḥ prajāvanto anamīvāanāgasaḥ
analyzed: viśvāhā tvā sumanasaḥ su cakṣasaḥ prajāvantaḥ anamīva aanāgasaḥ

original: RV_10.037.07.2{13} udyantaṃ tvā mitramaho dive-dive jyog jīvāḥprati paśyema sūrya
analyzed: udyantam tvā mitra mahas dive dive jyok jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya

original: RV_10.037.08.1{13} mahi jyotirbibhrataṃ tvā vicakṣaṇa bhāsvantaṃ cakṣuṣe cakṣuṣe mayaḥ
analyzed: mahi jyotiḥ bibhratam tvā vicakṣaṇa bhāsvantam cakṣuṣe cakṣuṣe mayaḥ

original: RV_10.037.08.2{13} ārohantaṃ bṛhataḥ pājasas pari vayaṃjīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya
analyzed: ārohantam bṛhataḥ pājasaḥ pari vayaṃjīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya

original: RV_10.037.09.1{13} yasya te viśvā bhuvanāni ketunā pra cerate ni ca viśanteaktubhiḥ
analyzed: yasya te viśvā bhuvanāni ketunā pra cerate ni ca viśante aktubhiḥ

original: RV_10.037.09.2{13} anāgāstvena harikeśa sūryāhnāhnā novasyasā-vasyasodihi
analyzed: anāgāstvena hari keśa sūrya ahnā ahnā novasyasā avasyasā udihi

original: RV_10.037.10.1{13} śaṃ no bhava cakṣasā śaṃ no ahnā śaṃ bhānunā śaṃhimā śaṃ ghṛṇena
analyzed: śam naḥ bhava cakṣasā śam naḥ ahnā śam bhānunā śaṃhimā śam ghṛṇena

original: RV_10.037.10.2{13} yathā śamadhvañchamasad duroṇetat sūrya draviṇaṃ dhehi citram
analyzed: yathā śamadhvan śamasad duroṇā itat sūrya draviṇam dhehi citram

original: RV_10.037.11.1{13} asmākaṃ devā ubhayāya janmane śarma yachata dvipadecatuṣpade
analyzed: asmākam devāḥ ubhayāya janmane śarma yacchata dvipade catuṣpade

original: RV_10.037.11.2{13} adat pibadūrjayamānamāśitaṃ tadasmeśaṃ yorarapo dadhātana
analyzed: adat pibat ūrjayamānam āśitam tat asmā īśam yā urarapaḥ dadhātana

original: RV_10.037.12.1{13} yad vo devāścakṛma jihvayā guru manaso vā prayutīdevaheḷanam
analyzed: yat vaḥ devāḥ cakṛma jihvayā guru manasaḥ vā

original: RV_10.037.12.2{13} arāvā yo no abhi duchunāyate tasmin tadenovasavo ni dhetana
analyzed: arāvā yaḥ naḥ abhi duchunāyate tasmin tad enaḥ vasavaḥ ni dhetana

original: RV_10.038.01.1{14} asmin na indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati śimīvati krandasi prāvasātaye
analyzed: asmin naḥ indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati śimīvati krandasi prāvasātaye

original: RV_10.038.01.2{14} yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu viṣvakpatanti didyavo nṛṣāhye
analyzed: yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu viṣvak patanti didyavaḥ nṛṣāhye

original: RV_10.038.02.1{14} sa naḥ kṣumantaṃ sadane vyūrṇuhi goarṇasaṃ rayimindraśravāyyam
analyzed: sa naḥ kṣumantam sadane vyūrṇuhi go arṇasam rayim indra śravāyyam

original: RV_10.038.02.2{14} syāma te jayataḥ śakra medino yathā vayamuśmasi tad vaso kṛdhi
analyzed: syāma te jayataḥ śakra medinaḥ yathā vayam uśmasi tat vaso kṛdhi

original: RV_10.038.03.1{14} yo no dāsa āryo vā puruṣṭutādeva indra yudhaye ciketati
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dāsaḥ āryaḥ vā puruṣṭutādevaḥ indra yudhaye ciketati

original: RV_10.038.03.2{14} asmābhiṣ ṭe suṣahāḥ santu śatravastvayā vayaṃ tānvanuyāma saṃgame
analyzed: asmābhiḥ te suṣahāḥ santu śatravaḥ tvayā vayam tān vanuyāma saṃgame

original: RV_10.038.04.1{14} yo dabhrebhirhavyo yaśca bhūribhiryo abhīke varivovinnṛṣāhye
analyzed: yaḥ dabhrebhiḥ havyaḥ yaḥ ca bhūribhiḥ yaḥ abhīke varivaḥ vid nṛṣāhye

original: RV_10.038.04.2{14} taṃ vikhāde sasnimadya śrutaṃ naramarvāñcamindramavase karāmahe
analyzed: tam vikhāde sasnim adya śrutam naram arvāñcam indram avase karāmahe

original: RV_10.038.05.1{14} svavṛjaṃ hi tvāmahamindra śuśravānānudaṃ vṛṣabharadhracodanam
analyzed: svavṛjam hi tvām aham indra śuśrava anānudam vṛṣabha radhra codanam

original: RV_10.038.05.2{14} pra muñcasva pari kutsādihā gahi kimutvāvān muṣkayorbaddha āsate
analyzed: pra muñcasva pari kutsa adihā gahi muṣkayoḥ baddhaḥ āsate

original: RV_10.039.01.1{15} yo vāṃ parijmā suvṛdaśvinā ratho doṣāmuṣāso havyohaviṣmatā
analyzed: yaḥ vām parijmā suvṛt aśvinā rathaḥ doṣāmuṣāsaḥ havyaḥ haviṣmatā

original: RV_10.039.01.2{15} śaśvattamāsastamu vāmidaṃ vayaṃ piturnanāma suhavaṃ havāmahe
analyzed: śaśvattamāsaḥ tamu vām idam vayam pituḥ nanāma su havam havāmahe

original: RV_10.039.02.1{15} codayataṃ sūnṛtāḥ pinvataṃ dhiya ut purandhīrīrayatantaduśmasi
analyzed: codayatam sūnṛtāḥ pinvatam dhiyaḥ ud purandhīḥ īrayatan tat uśmasi

original: RV_10.039.02.2{15} yaśasaṃ bhāgaṃ kṛṇutaṃ no aśvinā somaṃ nacāruṃ maghavatsu nas kṛtam
analyzed: yaśasam bhāgam kṛṇutam naḥ aśvinā somam nacārum maghavatsu naḥ kṛtam

original: RV_10.039.03.1{15} amājuraścid bhavatho yuvaṃ bhago 'nāśościdavitārāpamasya cit
analyzed: amājuraḥ cit bhavathaḥ yuvam bhagaḥ nāśoḥ cit avitārā apamasya cit

original: RV_10.039.03.2{15} andhasya cin nāsatyā kṛśasya cid yuvāmidāhurbhiṣajā rutasya cit
analyzed: andhasya cit nāsatyā kṛśasya cit yuvām id āhuḥ bhiṣajā rutasya cit

original: RV_10.039.04.1{15} yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ sanayaṃ yathā rathaṃ punaryuvānaṃcarathāya takṣathuḥ
analyzed: yuvam cyavānam sanayam yathā ratham punaryuvānam carathāya takṣathuḥ

original: RV_10.039.04.2{15} niṣ ṭaugryamūhathuradbhyas pariviśvet tā vāṃ savaneṣu pravācyā
analyzed: niḥ taugryam ūhathuḥ adbhyaḥ pariviśvā id tā vām savaneṣu pravācyā

original: RV_10.039.05.1{15} purāṇā vāṃ vīryā pra bravā jane 'tho hāsathurbhiṣajāmayobhuvā
analyzed: purāṇā vām vīryā pra bravā jane tho hāsathuḥ bhiṣajā mayobhuvā

original: RV_10.039.05.2{15} tā vāṃ nu navyāvavase karāmahe 'yaṃnāsatyā śradariryathā dadhat
analyzed: tā vām nu navyau avase karāmahe yaṃnāsatyā śradariḥ yathā dadhat

original: RV_10.039.06.1{16} iyaṃ vāmahve śṛṇutaṃ me aśvinā putrāyeva pitarā mahyaṃśikṣatam
analyzed: iyam vāmahve śṛṇutam me aśvinā putrāya iva pitarā mahyam śikṣatam

original: RV_10.039.06.2{16} anāpirajñā asajātyāmatiḥ purā tasyāabhiśasterava spṛtam
analyzed: an āpiḥ ajñāḥ a sajātyā a matiḥ purā spṛtam

original: RV_10.039.07.1{16} yuvaṃ rathena vimadāya śundhyuvaṃ nyūhathuḥ purumitrasyayoṣaṇām
analyzed: yuvam rathena vimadāya śundhyuvam nyūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣaṇām

original: RV_10.039.07.2{16} yuvaṃ havaṃ vadhrimatyā agachataṃ yuvaṃsuṣutiṃ cakrathuḥ purandhaye
analyzed: yuvam havam vadhrimatyāḥ agachatam yuvaṃsuṣutim cakrathuḥ purandhaye

original: RV_10.039.08.1{16} yuvaṃ viprasya jaraṇāmupeyuṣaḥ punaḥ kalerakṛṇutaṃyuvad vayaḥ
analyzed: yuvam viprasya jaraṇām upeyuṣaḥ punar kaleḥ akṛṇutam yuvat vayaḥ

original: RV_10.039.08.2{16} yuvaṃ vandanam ṛśyadādudūpathuryuvaṃsadyo viśpalāmetave kṛthaḥ
analyzed: yuvam vandanam ṛśyadā dudūpathuḥ yuvaṃsadyaḥ viśpalām etave kṛthaḥ

original: RV_10.039.09.1{16} yuvaṃ ha rebhaṃ vṛṣaṇā guhā hitamudairayatammamṛvāṃsamaśvinā
analyzed: yuvam ha rebham vṛṣaṇā guhā hitam udairayatam mamṛvāṃsam aśvinā

original: RV_10.039.09.2{16} yuvam ṛbīsamuta taptamatrayaomanvantaṃ cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye
analyzed: yuvam ṛbīsam uta taptamatrayaḥ omanvantam cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye

original: RV_10.039.10.1{16} yuvaṃ śvetaṃ pedave 'śvināśvaṃ navabhirvājairnavatīca vājinam
analyzed: yuvam śvetam pedave śvinā aśvam navabhiḥ vājaiḥ navatīca vājinam

original: RV_10.039.10.2{16} carkṛtyaṃ dadathurdrāvayatsakhaṃ bhagaṃ nanṛbhyo havyaṃ mayobhubam
analyzed: carkṛtyam dadathuḥ drāvayat sakham bhagam nanṛbhyaḥ havyam mayobhubam

original: RV_10.039.11.1{17} na taṃ rājānāvadite kutaścana nāṃho aśnoti duritaṃnakirbhayam
analyzed: na tam rājā anāvadite kutaścana na aṃhaḥ aśnoti duritaṃnakir bhayam

original: RV_10.039.11.2{17} yamaśvinā suhavā rudravartanī purorathaṃkṛṇuthaḥ patnyā saha
analyzed: yam aśvinā su havā rudravartanī puroratham kṛṇuthaḥ patnyā saha

original: RV_10.039.12.1{17} ā tena yātaṃ manaso javīyasā rathaṃ yaṃ vām ṛbhavaścakruraśvinā
analyzed: ā tena yātam manasaḥ javīyasā ratham yam vām ṛbhavaḥ cakruḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10.039.12.2{17} yasya yoge duhitā jāyate diva ubhe ahanīsudine vivasvataḥ
analyzed: yasya yoge duhitā jāyate divaḥ ubhe ahanī sudine vivasvataḥ

original: RV_10.039.13.1{17} tā vartiryātaṃ jayuṣā vi parvatamapinvataṃ śayavedhenumaśvinā
analyzed: tā vartiḥ yātam jayuṣā vi parvatam apinvatam śayavedhenum aśvinā

original: RV_10.039.13.2{17} vṛkasya cid vartikāmantarāsyād yuvaṃśacībhirgrasitāmamuñcatam
analyzed: vṛkasya cit vartikām antara āsyāt yuvam śacībhiḥ grasitām amuñcatam

original: RV_10.039.14.1{17} etaṃ vāṃ stomamaśvināvakarmātakṣāma bhṛgavo na ratham
analyzed: etam vām stomam aśvinau akarma atakṣāma bhṛgavaḥ na ratham

original: RV_10.039.14.2{17} nyamṛkṣāma yoṣaṇāṃ na marye nityaṃ na sūnuntanayaṃ dadhānāḥ
analyzed: nyamṛkṣāma yoṣaṇām na marye nityam na sūnuntanayam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10.040.01.1{18} rathaṃ yāntaṃ kuha ko ha vāṃ narā prati dyumantaṃsuvitāya bhūṣati
analyzed: ratham yāntam kuha kaḥ ha vām narā prati dyumantam suvitāya bhūṣati

original: RV_10.040.01.2{18} prātaryāvāṇaṃ vibhvaṃ viśe-viśevastor vastorvahamānaṃ dhiyā śami
analyzed: prātaryāvāṇam vibhvam viśe viśe vastoḥ vastoḥ vahamānam dhiyā śami

original: RV_10.040.02.1{18} kuha svid doṣā kuha vastoraśvinā kuhābhipitvaṃ karataḥkuhoṣatuḥ
analyzed: kuha svid doṣā kuha vastoḥ aśvinā kuha abhipitvam karataḥ kuha uṣatuḥ

original: RV_10.040.02.2{18} ko vāṃ śayutrā vidhaveva devaraṃ maryaṃ nayoṣā kṛṇute sadhastha ā
analyzed: kaḥ vām śayutrā vidhavā iva devaram maryam na yoṣā kṛṇute sadhasthe ā

original: RV_10.040.03.1{18} prātarjarethe jaraṇeva kāpayā vastor-vastoryajatā gachathogṛham
analyzed: prātar jarethe jaraṇā iva kāpayā vastoḥ vastoḥ yajatā gachathaḥ gṛham

original: RV_10.040.03.2{18} kasya dhvasrā bhavathaḥ kasya vā narā rājaputrevasavanāva gachathaḥ
analyzed: kasya dhvasrā bhavathaḥ kasya vā narā rāja putrā ivasavanā ava gachathaḥ

original: RV_10.040.04.1{18} yuvāṃ mṛgeva vāraṇā mṛgaṇyavo doṣā vastorhaviṣā nihvayāmahe
analyzed: yuvām mṛgā iva vāraṇā mṛgaṇyavaḥ doṣā vastoḥ haviṣā nihvayāmahe

original: RV_10.040.04.2{18} yuvaṃ hotrām ṛtuthā juhvate nareṣaṃ janāyavahathaḥ śubhas patī
analyzed: yuvam hotrām ṛtuthā juhvate narā iṣam janāya vahathaḥ śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_10.040.05.1{18} yuvāṃ ha ghoṣā paryaśvinā yatī rājña ūce duhitāpṛche vāṃ narā
analyzed: yuvām ha ghoṣā paryaśvinā yatī rājñaḥ ūce duhitā apṛcche vām narā

original: RV_10.040.05.2{18} bhūtaṃ me ahna uta bhūtamaktave'śvāvate rathine śaktamarvate
analyzed: bhūtam me ahne uta bhūtam aktave iśvāvate rathine śaktam arvate

original: RV_10.040.06.1{19} yuvaṃ kavī ṣṭhaḥ paryaśvinā rathaṃ viśo na kutsojariturnaśāyathaḥ
analyzed: yuvam kavī ṣṭhaḥ pari aśvinā ratham viśaḥ na kutsaḥ jarituḥ naśāyathaḥ

original: RV_10.040.06.2{19} yuvorha makṣā paryaśvinā madhvāsā bharata niṣkṛtaṃ na yoṣaṇā
analyzed: yuvoḥ ha makṣā paryaśvinā madhvāsā bharata niṣkṛtam na yoṣaṇā

original: RV_10.040.07.1{19} yuvaṃ ha bhujyuṃ yuvamaśvinā vaśaṃ yuvaṃ śiñjāramuśanāmupārathuḥ
analyzed: yuvam ha bhujyum yuvam aśvinā vaśam yuvam śiñjāram uśanām upārathuḥ

original: RV_10.040.07.2{19} yuvo rarāvā pari sakhyamāsate yuvorahamavasā sumnamā cake
analyzed: yuvoḥ rarāvā pari sakhyam āsate yuvoḥ aham avasā sumnam ā cake

original: RV_10.040.08.1{19} yuvaṃ ha kṛśaṃ yuvamaśvinā śayuṃ yuvaṃ vidhantaṃvidhavāmuruṣyathaḥ
analyzed: yuvam ha kṛśam yuvam aśvinā śayum yuvam vidhantam vidhavām uruṣyathaḥ

original: RV_10.040.08.2{19} yuvaṃ sanibhya stanayantamaśvināpavrajamūrṇuthaḥ saptāsyam
analyzed: yuvam sanibhyaḥ stanayantam aśvinā apavrajam ūrṇuthaḥ sapta āsyam

original: RV_10.040.09.1{19} janiṣṭa yoṣā patayat kanīnako vi cāruhan vīrudhodaṃsanā anu
analyzed: janiṣṭa yoṣā patayat kanīnakaḥ vi cāru han vīrudhaḥ daṃsanāḥ anu

original: RV_10.040.09.2{19} āsmai rīyante nivaneva sindhavo 'smā ahnebhavati tat patitvanam
analyzed: ā asmai rīyante nivanā iva sindhavaḥ sma ahnebhavati tat patitvanam

original: RV_10.040.10.1{19} jīvaṃ rudanti vi mayante adhvare dīrghāmanu prasitindīdhiyurnaraḥ
analyzed: jīvam rudanti vi mayante adhvare dīrghām anu prasitin dīdhiyuḥ naraḥ

original: RV_10.040.10.2{19} vāmaṃ pitṛbhyo ya idaṃ samerire mayaḥpatibhyo janayaḥ pariṣvaje
analyzed: vāmam pitṛbhyaḥ ye idam samerire mayaḥ patibhyaḥ janayaḥ pariṣvaje

original: RV_10.040.11.1{20} na tasya vidma tadu ṣu pra vocata yuvā ha yad yuvatyāḥkṣeti yoniṣu
analyzed: na tasya vidma tat u su pra vocata yuvā ha yat yuvatyāḥkṣeti yoniṣu

original: RV_10.040.11.2{20} priyosriyasya vṛṣabhasya retino gṛhaṃgamemāśvinā taduśmasi
analyzed: priya usriyasya vṛṣabhasya retinaḥ gṛhaṃgamā imā aśvinā tat uśmasi

original: RV_10.040.12.1{20} ā vāmagan sumatirvājinīvasū nyaśvinā hṛtsu kāmāayaṃsata
analyzed: ā vām agan sumatiḥ vājinīvasū ni aśvinā hṛtsu kāmā ayaṃsata

original: RV_10.040.12.2{20} abhūtaṃ gopā mithunā śubhas patī priyāaryamṇo duryānaśīmahi
analyzed: abhūtam gopā mithunā śubhaḥ patī priyā a aryamṇaḥ

original: RV_10.040.13.1{20} tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā dhattaṃ rayiṃ sahavīraṃvacasyave
analyzed: tā mandasānā manuṣaḥ duroṇe ā dhattam rayim saha vīraṃvacasyave

original: RV_10.040.13.2{20} kṛtaṃ tīrthaṃ suprapāṇaṃ śubhas patīsthāṇuṃ patheṣṭhāmapa durmatiṃ hatam
analyzed: kṛtam tīrtham su prapāṇam śubhaḥ patīsthāṇum patheṣṭhām apa durmatim hatam

original: RV_10.040.14.1{20} kva svidadya katamāsvaśvinā vikṣu dasrā mādayeteśubhas patī
analyzed: kva svid adya katamāsu aśvinā vikṣu dasrā mādayeta īśubhaḥ patī

original: RV_10.040.14.2{20} ka īṃ ni yeme katamasya jagmaturviprasya vāyajamānasya vā gṛham
analyzed: kaḥ īm ni yeme katamasya jagmatuḥ viprasya vā a yajamānasya vā gṛham

original: RV_10.041.01.1{21} samānamu tyaṃ puruhūtamukthyaṃ rathaṃ tricakraṃ savanāganigmatam
analyzed: samānam u tyam puru hūtam ukthyam ratham tri cakram sava nāga nigmatam

original: RV_10.041.01.2{21} parijmānaṃ vidathyaṃ suvṛktibhirvayaṃvyuṣṭā uṣaso havāmahe
analyzed: parijmānam vidathyam suvṛktibhiḥ vayam vyuṣṭau uṣasaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_10.041.02.1{21} prātaryujaṃ nāsatyādhi tiṣṭhathaḥ prātaryāvāṇammadhuvāhanaṃ ratham
analyzed: prātar yujam nāsatyā adhi tiṣṭhathaḥ prātar yāvāṇam madhu vāhanam ratham

original: RV_10.041.02.2{21} viśo yena gachatho yajvarīrnarākīreścid yajñaṃ hotṛmantamaśvinā
analyzed: viśaḥ yena gachathaḥ yajvarīḥ narā akīreḥ cit yajñam hotṛmantam aśvinā

original: RV_10.041.03.1{21} adhvaryuṃ vā madhupāṇiṃ suhastyamagnidhaṃ vādhṛtadakṣaṃ damūnasam
analyzed: adhvaryum vā madhu pāṇim suhastyam agnidham vā ādhṛtadakṣam damūnasam

original: RV_10.041.03.2{21} viprasya vā yat savanani gachatho'ta ā yātaṃ madhupeyamaśvinā
analyzed: viprasya vā yat savanani gacchatha uta ā yātam madhupeyam aśvinā

original: RV_10.042.01.1{22} asteva su prataraṃ lāyamasyan bhūṣanniva pra bharāstomamasmai
analyzed: astā iva su prataram lāyam asyan bhūṣan iva pra bhara a stomam asmai

original: RV_10.042.01.2{22} vācā viprāstarata vācamaryo ni rāmayajaritaḥ soma indram
analyzed: vācā viprāstarata vācam aryaḥ ni rāmaya jaritar somaḥ indram

original: RV_10.042.02.1{22} dohena gāmupa śikṣā sakhāyaṃ pra bodhaya jaritarjāramindram
analyzed: dohena gām upa śikṣa sakhāyam pra bodhaya jaritar jāram indram

original: RV_10.042.02.2{22} kośaṃ na pūrṇaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭamā cyāvayamaghadeyāya śūram
analyzed: kośam na pūrṇam vasunā nyṛṣṭam ā cyāvaya agha deyāya śūram

original: RV_10.042.03.1{22} kimaṅga tvā maghavan bhojamāhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayantvā śṛṇomi
analyzed: kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayan tvā śṛṇomi

original: RV_10.042.03.2{22} apnasvatī mama dhīrastu śakra vasuvidambhagamindrā bharā naḥ
analyzed: apnasvatī mama dhīraḥ tu śakra vasu vidambhagam indra ā bhara naḥ

original: RV_10.042.04.1{22} tvāṃ janā mamasatyeṣvindra santasthānā vi hvayantesamīke
analyzed: tvām janāḥ mamasatyeṣu indra santasthānāḥ vi hvayante samīke

original: RV_10.042.04.2{22} atrā yujaṃ kṛṇute yo haviṣmān nāsunvatāsakhyaṃ vaṣṭi śūraḥ
analyzed: atrā yujam kṛṇute yaḥ haviṣmān na a sunvatā a sakhyam vaṣṭi śūraḥ

original: RV_10.042.05.1{22} dhanaṃ na syandraṃ bahulaṃ yo asmai tīvrān somānāsunotiprayasvān
analyzed: dhanam na syandram bahulam yaḥ asmai tīvrān somān āsunoti prayasvān

original: RV_10.042.05.2{22} tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātarahno nisvaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram
analyzed: tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātarahnaḥ nisvaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram

original: RV_10.042.06.1{23} yasmin vayaṃ dadhimā śaṃsamindre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavākāmamasme
analyzed: yasmin vayam śaṃsam indre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā akāmam asme

original: RV_10.042.06.2{23} ārāccit san bhayatāmasya śatrurnyasmaidyumnā janyā namantām
analyzed: ārāt cit san bhayatām asya śatruḥ ni asmai dyumnāḥ janyāḥ namantām

original: RV_10.042.07.1{23} ārācchatrumapa bādhasva dūramugro yaḥ śambaḥpuruhūta tena
analyzed: ārāt śatrum apa bādhasva dūram ugraḥ yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta tena

original: RV_10.042.07.2{23} asme dhehi yavamad gomadindra kṛdhī dhiyaṃjaritre vājaratnām
analyzed: asme dhehi yavamat gomat indra kṛdhi dhiyam jaritre vāja ratnām

original: RV_10.042.08.1{23} pra yamantarvṛṣasavāso agman tīvrāḥ somā bahulāntāsaindram
analyzed: pra yam antarvṛṣa savāsaḥ agman tīvrāḥ somāḥ bahula antāsā aindram

original: RV_10.042.08.2{23} nāha dāmānaṃ maghavā ni yaṃsan ni sunvate vahatibhūri vāmam
analyzed: na aha dāmānam maghavā ni yaṃsat ni sunvate vahati bhūri vāmam

original: RV_10.042.09.1{23} uta prahāmatidīvyā jayāti kṛtaṃ yacchvaghnī vicinotikāle
analyzed: uta prahā mati dīvyā jayāti kṛtam yat śvaghnī vicinoti kāle

original: RV_10.042.09.2{23} yo devakāmo na dhanā ruṇaddhi samit taṃ rāyāsṛjati svadhāvān
analyzed: yaḥ deva kāmaḥ na dhanā ruṇaddhi samidh tam rāyā āsṛjati svadhāvān

original: RV_10.042.10.1{23} gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudhaṃ puruhūtaviśvām
analyzed: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām

original: RV_10.042.10.2{23} vayaṃ rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanānyasmākenavṛjanenā jayema
analyzed: vayam rājabhiḥ prathamāḥ dhanāni asmākena vṛjanena jayema

original: RV_10.042.11.1{23} bṛhaspatirnaḥ pari pātu paścādutottarasmādadharādaghāyoḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghāyoḥ

original: RV_10.042.11.2{23} idraḥ purastāduta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyovarivaḥ kṛṇotu
analyzed: idraḥ purastāt uta madhyatas naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varivaḥ kṛṇotu

original: RV_10.043.01.1{24} achā ma indraṃ matayaḥ svarvidaḥ sadhrīcīrviśvāuśatīranūṣata
analyzed: achā me indram matayaḥ svar vidaḥ sadhrīcīḥ viśvāḥ auśatīḥ anūṣata

original: RV_10.043.01.2{24} pari ṣvajante janayo yathā patiṃ maryaṃna śundhyuṃ maghavānamūtaye
analyzed: pari svajante janayaḥ yathā patim maryaṃna śundhyum maghavānam ūtaye

original: RV_10.043.02.1{24} na ghā tvadrigapa veti me manastve it kāmaṃ puruhūtaśiśraya
analyzed: na ghā tvadrigapa veti me manaḥ tve id kāmam puruhūta śiśraya

original: RV_10.043.02.2{24} rājeva dasma ni ṣado 'dhi barhiṣyasmin su some'vapānamastu te
analyzed: rājā iva dasma ni sadaḥ dhi barhiṣi asmin su soma iva pānam astu te

original: RV_10.043.03.1{24} viṣūvṛdindro amateruta kṣudhaḥ sa id rāyo maghavāvasva īśate
analyzed: viṣūvṛt indraḥ amateḥ uta kṣudhaḥ saḥ id rāyaḥ maghavā avasvaḥ īśate

original: RV_10.043.03.2{24} tasyedime pravaṇe sapta sindhavo vayovardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya id ime pravaṇe sapta sindhavaḥ vayaḥ vardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ

original: RV_10.043.04.1{24} vayo na vṛkṣaṃ supalāśamāsadan somāsa indraṃ mandinaścamūṣadaḥ
analyzed: vayaḥ na vṛkṣam su palāśam āsadan somāsaḥ indram mandinaḥ camūṣadaḥ

original: RV_10.043.04.2{24} praiṣāmanīkaṃ śavasā davidyutad vidatsvarmanave jyotirāryam
analyzed: pra eṣām anīkam śavasā davidyutat vidat svar manave jyotiḥ āryam

original: RV_10.043.05.1{24} kṛtaṃ na śvaghnī vi cinoti devane saṃvargaṃ yan maghavāsūryaṃ jayat
analyzed: kṛtam na śvaghnī vi cinoti devane saṃvargam yat maghavā asūryam jayat

original: RV_10.043.05.2{24} na tat te anyo anu vīryaṃ śakan napurāṇo maghavan nota nūtanaḥ
analyzed: na tat te anyaḥ anu vīryam śakat na purāṇaḥ maghavan na uta nūtanaḥ

original: RV_10.043.06.1{25} viśaṃ-viśaṃ maghavā paryaśāyata janānāṃ dhenāavacākaśad vṛṣā
analyzed: viśam viśam maghavā paryaśāyata janānām dhenā avacākaśat vṛṣā

original: RV_10.043.06.2{25} yasyāha śakraḥ savaneṣu raṇyati satīvraiḥ somaiḥ sahate pṛtanyataḥ
analyzed: yasya āha śakraḥ savaneṣu raṇyati satīvraiḥ somaiḥ sahate pṛtanyataḥ

original: RV_10.043.07.1{25} āpo na sindhumabhi yat samakṣaran somāsa indraṃ kulyāiva hradam
analyzed: āpaḥ na sindhum abhi yat samakṣaran somāsaḥ indram kulyāḥ iva hradam

original: RV_10.043.07.2{25} vardhanti viprā maho asya sādane yavaṃ navṛṣṭirdivyena dānunā
analyzed: vardhanti viprāḥ mahaḥ asya sādane yavam navṛṣṭiḥ divyena dānunā

original: RV_10.043.08.1{25} vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayad rajassvā yo aryapatnīrakṛṇodimā apaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayat rajassvā yaḥ arya patnīḥ akṛṇot imāḥ apaḥ

original: RV_10.043.08.2{25} sa sunvate maghavā jīradānave 'vindajjyotirmanave haviṣmate
analyzed: sa sunvate maghavā jīra dānave vindat jyotiḥ manave haviṣmate

original: RV_10.043.09.1{25} ujjāyatāṃ paraśurjyotiṣā saha bhūyā ṛtasya sudughāpurāṇavat
analyzed: ujjāyatām paraśuḥ jyotiṣā saha bhūyāḥ ṛtasya sudughā purāṇa vat

original: RV_10.043.09.2{25} vi rocatāmaruṣo bhānunā śuciḥ svarṇaśukraṃ śuśucīta satpatiḥ
analyzed: vi rocatām aruṣaḥ bhānunā śuciḥ svarṇa śukram śuśucīta sat patiḥ

original: RV_10.043.10.1{25} gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ ...
analyzed: gobhiḥ tarema amatim

original: RV_10.043.11.1{25} bṛhaspatirnaḥ pari ...
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari

original: RV_10.044.01.1{26} ā yātvindraḥ svapatirmadāya yo dharmaṇā tūtujānastuviṣmān
analyzed: ā yātu indraḥ sva patiḥ madāya yaḥ dharmaṇā tūtujānaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_10.044.01.2{26} pratvakṣāṇo ati viśvā sahāṃsyapāreṇamahatā vṛṣṇyena
analyzed: pratvakṣāṇaḥ ati viśvā sahāṃsi apāreṇa mahatā vṛṣṇyena

original: RV_10.044.02.1{26} suṣṭhāmā rathaḥ suyamā harī te mimyakṣa vajro nṛpategabhastau
analyzed: suṣṭhāmā rathaḥ su yamā harī te mimyakṣa vajraḥ nṛpate gabhastau

original: RV_10.044.02.2{26} śībhaṃ rājan supathā yāhyarvāṃ vardhāmate papuṣo vṛṣṇyāni
analyzed: śībham rājan su pathā yāhi arvām vardhāmate papuṣaḥ vṛṣṇyāni

original: RV_10.044.03.1{26} endravāho nṛpatiṃ vajrabāhumugramugrāsastaviṣāsa enam
analyzed: ā indravāhaḥ nṛpatim vajra bāhum ugram ugrāsaḥ taviṣāsaḥ enam

original: RV_10.044.03.2{26} pratvakṣasaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ satyaśuṣmamemasmatrā sadhamādovahantu
analyzed: pratvakṣasam vṛṣabham satya śuṣmam ā imasmatrā sadhamādaḥ vahantu

original: RV_10.044.04.1{26} evā patiṃ droṇasācaṃ sacetasamūrja skambhaṃ dharuṇaā vṛṣāyase
analyzed: eva patim droṇasācam sacetasam ūrjaḥ skambham dharuṇaā vṛṣāyase

original: RV_10.044.04.2{26} ojaḥ kṛṣva saṃ gṛbhāya tve apyaso yathākenipānāmino vṛdhe
analyzed: ojaḥ kṛṣva sam gṛbhāya tve apyasaḥ yathā kenipānāminaḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_10.044.05.1{26} gamannasme vasūnyā hi śaṃsiṣaṃ svāśiṣaṃ bharamāyāhi sominaḥ
analyzed: gaman asme vasūni ā hi śaṃsiṣam su āśiṣam bharam āyāhi sominaḥ

original: RV_10.044.05.2{26} tvamīśiṣe sāsminnā satsi barhiṣyanādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi dharmaṇā
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe sā asmin ā satsi barhiṣi anādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi dharmaṇā

original: RV_10.044.06.1{27} pṛthak prāyan prathamā devahūtayo 'kṛṇvata śravasyāniduṣṭarā
analyzed: pṛthak prāyan prathamāḥ deva hūtayaḥ kṛṇvata śravasyā aniduṣṭarā

original: RV_10.044.06.2{27} na ye śekuryajñiyāṃ nāvamāruhamīrmaivate nyaviśanta kepayaḥ
analyzed: na ye śekuḥ yajñiyām nāvam āruhamīḥ maivate nyaviśanta kepayaḥ

original: RV_10.044.07.1{27} evaivāpāgapare santu dūḍhyo 'śvā yeṣāṃ duryujaāyuyujre
analyzed: eva eva apāk apare santu śvā yeṣām duryujaḥ āyuyujre

original: RV_10.044.07.2{27} itthā ye prāgupare santi dāvane purūṇiyatra vayunāni bhojanā
analyzed: itthā ye prāk upare santi dāvane purūṇiyatra vayunāni bhojanā

original: RV_10.044.08.1{27} girīnrajrān rejamānānadhārayad dyauḥ krandadantarikṣāṇi kopayat
analyzed: girīn rajrān rejamānān adhārayat dyauḥ krandat antarikṣāṇi kopayat

original: RV_10.044.08.2{27} samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi ṣkabhāyativṛṣṇaḥ pītvā mada ukthāni śaṃsati
analyzed: samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi skabhāyati vṛṣṇaḥ pītvā made ukthāni śaṃsati

original: RV_10.044.09.1{27} imaṃ bibharmi sukṛtaṃ te aṅkuśaṃ yenārujāsi maghavañchaphārujaḥ
analyzed: imam bibharmi su kṛtam te aṅkuśam yena ārujāsi maghavan śaphārujaḥ

original: RV_10.044.09.2{27} asmin su te savane astvokyaṃ suta iṣṭaumaghavan bodhyābhagaḥ
analyzed: asmin su te savane astu okyam sute iṣṭau maghavan bodhyā bhagaḥ

original: RV_10.044.10.1{27} gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ ...
analyzed: gobhiḥ tarema amatim

original: RV_10.044.11.1{27} bṛhaspatirnaḥ pari ...
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari

original: RV_10.045.01.1{28} divas pari prathamaṃ jajñe agnirasmad dvitīyaṃ parijātavedāḥ
analyzed: divaḥ pari prathamam jajñe agniḥ asmat dvitīyam parijātavedāḥ

original: RV_10.045.01.2{28} tṛtīyamapsu nṛmaṇā ajasramindhāna enaṃjarate svādhīḥ
analyzed: tṛtīyam apsu nṛmaṇāḥ ajasram indhānaḥ enam jarate svādhīḥ

original: RV_10.045.02.1{28} vidmā te agne tredhā trayāṇi vidmā te dhāma vibhṛtāpurutrā
analyzed: vidma te agne tredhā trayāṇi vidma te dhāma vibhṛtā purutrā

original: RV_10.045.02.2{28} vidmā te nāma paramaṃ guhā yad vidmā tamutsaṃ yata ājagantha
analyzed: vidma te nāma paramam guhā yat vidma tam utsam yatas ājagantha

original: RV_10.045.03.1{28} samudre tvā nṛmaṇā apsvantarnṛcakṣā īdhe divo agnaūdhan
analyzed: samudre tvā nṛmaṇāḥ apsu antar nṛ cakṣāḥ īdhe divaḥ agni ūdhan

original: RV_10.045.03.2{28} tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivāṃsamapāmupasthemahiṣā avardhan
analyzed: tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivāṃsam apām upasthe mahiṣāḥ avardhan

original: RV_10.045.04.1{28} akrandadagni stanayanniva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihad vīrudhaḥsamañjan
analyzed: akrandat agniḥ stanayan iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihat vīrudhaḥ samañjan

original: RV_10.045.04.2{28} sadyo jajñāno vi hīmiddho akhyadā rodasībhānunā bhātyantaḥ
analyzed: sadyas jajñānaḥ vi hi īm iddhaḥ akhyadāḥ rodasī bhānunā bhāti antar

original: RV_10.045.05.1{28} śrīṇāmudāro dharuṇo rayīṇāṃ manīṣāṇāmprārpaṇaḥ somagopāḥ
analyzed: śrīṇām udāraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām manīṣāṇām prārpaṇaḥ soma gopāḥ

original: RV_10.045.05.2{28} vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahaso apsu rājāvi bhātyagra uṣasāmidhānaḥ
analyzed: vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahasaḥ apsu rājā avi bhāti agre uṣasā amidhānaḥ

original: RV_10.045.06.1{28} viśvasya keturbhuvanasya garbha ā rodasī apṛṇājjāyamānaḥ
analyzed: viśvasya ketuḥ bhuvanasya garbhaḥ ā rodasī apṛṇāt jāyamānaḥ

original: RV_10.045.06.2{28} vīḷuṃ cidadrimabhinat parāyañ janā yadagnimayajanta pañca
analyzed: vīḷum cit adrim abhinat parāyam janāḥ yat agnim ayajanta pañca

original: RV_10.045.07.1{29} uśik pāvako aratiḥ sumedhā marteṣvagniramṛto ni dhāyi
analyzed: uśij pāvakaḥ aratiḥ sumedhāḥ marteṣu agniḥ amṛtaḥ ni dhāyi

original: RV_10.045.07.2{29} iyarti dhūmamaruṣaṃ bharibhraducchukreṇa śociṣādyā inakṣan
analyzed: iyarti dhūmam aruṣam bharibhrat ucchukreṇa śociṣā adyāḥ inakṣan

original: RV_10.045.08.1{29} dṛśāno rukma urviyā vyadyaud durmarṣamāyuḥ śriyerucānaḥ
analyzed: dṛśānaḥ rukmaḥ urviyā vyadyaut durmarṣam āyuḥ śriyerucānaḥ

original: RV_10.045.08.2{29} agniramṛto abhavad vayobhiryadenaṃ dyaurjanayat suretāḥ
analyzed: agniḥ amṛtaḥ abhavat vayobhiḥ yat enam dyauḥ janayat su retāḥ

original: RV_10.045.09.1{29} yaste adya kṛṇavad bhadraśoce 'pūpaṃ deva ghṛtavantamagne
analyzed: yaḥ te adya kṛṇavat bhadra śoce pūpam deva ghṛtavantam agne

original: RV_10.045.09.2{29} pra taṃ naya prataraṃ vasyo achābhi sumnaṃ devabhaktaṃyaviṣṭha
analyzed: pra tam naya prataram vasyaḥ acha abhi sumnam deva bhaktaṃyaviṣṭha

original: RV_10.045.10.1{29} ā taṃ bhaja sauśravaseṣvagna ukthauktha ā bhaja śasyamāne
analyzed: ā tam bhaja sauśravaseṣu agne ukthaukthe ā bhaja śasyamāne

original: RV_10.045.10.2{29} priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavātyujjātena bhinadadujjanitvaiḥ
analyzed: priyaḥ sūrye priyaḥ agnā bhavāti ujjātena bhinadat ujjanitvaiḥ

original: RV_10.045.11.1{29} tvāmagne yajamānā anu dyūn viśvā vasu dadhire vāryāṇi
analyzed: tvām agne yajamānāḥ anu dyūn viśvā vasu dadhire vāryāṇi

original: RV_10.045.11.2{29} tvayā saha draviṇamichamānā vrajaṃ gomantamuśijo vivavruḥ
analyzed: tvayā saha draviṇam icchamānāḥ vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vivavruḥ

original: RV_10.045.12.1{29} astāvyagnirnarāṃ suśevo vaiśvānara ṛṣibhiḥsomagopāḥ
analyzed: astāvi agniḥ narām su śevaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ ṛṣibhiḥ soma gopāḥ

original: RV_10.045.12.2{29} adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayimasme suvīram
analyzed: a dveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devāḥ dhatta rayim asme su vīram

original: RV_10.046.01.1{01} pra hotā jāto mahān nabhovin nṛṣadvā sīdadapāmupasthe
analyzed: pra hotā jātaḥ mahān nabhaḥ vid nṛṣadvā sīdat apām upasthe

original: RV_10.046.01.2{01} dadhiryo dhāyi sa te vayāṃsi yantā vasūni vidhatetanūpāḥ
analyzed: dadhiḥ yaḥ dhāyi sa te vayāṃsi yantā vasūni

original: RV_10.046.02.1{01} imaṃ vidhanto apāṃ sadhasthe paśuṃ na naṣṭaṃ padairanu gman
analyzed: imam vidhantaḥ apām sadhasthe paśum na naṣṭam padaiḥ anu gman

original: RV_10.046.02.2{01} guhā catantamuśijo namobhirichanto dhīrābhṛgavo 'vindan
analyzed: guhā catantam uśijaḥ namobhiḥ ichantaḥ dhīrābhṛgavaḥ vindan

original: RV_10.046.03.1{01} imaṃ trito bhūryavindadichan vaibhūvaso mūrdhanyaghnyāyāḥ
analyzed: imam tritaḥ bhūri avindat icchan vaibhūvasaḥ mūrdhani aghnyāyāḥ

original: RV_10.046.03.2{01} sa śevṛdho jāta ā harmyeṣu nābhiryuvābhavati rocanasya
analyzed: sa śevṛdhaḥ jātaḥ ā harmyeṣu nābhiḥ yuvā bhavati rocanasya

original: RV_10.046.04.1{01} mandraṃ hotāramuśijo namobhiḥ prāñcaṃ yajñaṃ netāramadhvarāṇām
analyzed: mandram hotāram uśijaḥ namobhiḥ prāñcam yajñam netāram adhvarāṇām

original: RV_10.046.04.2{01} viśāmakṛṇvannaratiṃ pāvakaṃ havyavāhandadhato mānuṣeṣu
analyzed: viśām akṛṇvan aratim pāvakam havyavāhan dadhataḥ mānuṣeṣu

original: RV_10.046.05.1{01} pra bhūrjayantaṃ mahāṃ vipodhāṃ mūrā amūraṃ purāndarmāṇam
analyzed: pra bhūrjayantam mahām vipodhām mūrāḥ amūram purāndarmāṇam

original: RV_10.046.05.2{01} nayanto garbhaṃ vanāṃ dhiyaṃ dhurhiriśmaśruṃ nārvāṇaṃ dhanarcam
analyzed: nayantaḥ garbham vanām dhiyam dhurhiri śmaśrum na arvāṇam dhana ṛcam

original: RV_10.046.06.1{02} ni pastyāsu trita stabhūyan parivīto yonau sīdadantaḥ
analyzed: ni pastyāsu trita stabhūyan parivītaḥ yonau sīdat antaḥ

original: RV_10.046.06.2{02} ataḥ saṃgṛbhyā viśāṃ damūnā vidharmaṇāyantrairīyatenṝn
analyzed: atas saṃgṛbhyā viśām damūnāḥ vidharmaṇā ayantraiḥ īyatenṝn

original: RV_10.046.07.1{02} asyājarāso damāmaritrā arcaddhūmāso agnayaḥ pāvakāḥ
analyzed: asya ajarāsaḥ dama a maritrāḥ arcat dhūmāsaḥ agnayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: RV_10.046.07.2{02} śvitīcayaḥ śvātrāso bhuraṇyavo vanarṣado vāyavo nasomāḥ
analyzed: śvitīcayaḥ śvātrāsaḥ bhuraṇyavaḥ vanarṣadaḥ vāyavaḥ na somāḥ

original: RV_10.046.08.1{02} pra jihvayā bharate vepo agniḥ pra vayunāni cetasāpṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: pra jihvayā bharate vepaḥ agniḥ pra vayunāni cetasā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_10.046.08.2{02} tamāyavaḥ śucayantaṃ pāvakaṃ mandraṃhotāraṃ dadhire yajiṣṭham
analyzed: tam āyavaḥ śucayantam pāvakam mandraṃhotāram dadhire yajiṣṭham

original: RV_10.046.09.1{02} dyāvā yamagniṃ pṛthivī janiṣṭāmāpastvaṣṭā bhṛgavoyaṃ sahobhiḥ
analyzed: dyāvā yam agnim pṛthivī janiṣṭa āma apaḥ tvaṣṭā bhṛgavaḥ yam sahobhiḥ

original: RV_10.046.09.2{02} īḷenyaṃ prathamaṃ mātariśvā devāstatakṣurmanave yajatram
analyzed: īḍenyam prathamam mātariśvā devāḥ tatakṣuḥ manave yajatram

original: RV_10.046.10.1{02} yaṃ tvā devā dadhire havyavāhaṃ puruspṛho mānuṣāsoyajatram
analyzed: yam tvā devāḥ dadhire havya vāham puruspṛhaḥ mānuṣāsaḥ yajatram

original: RV_10.046.10.2{02} sa yāmannagne stuvate vayo dhāḥ pra devayanyaśasaḥ saṃ hi pūrvīḥ
analyzed: sa yāman agne stuvate vayaḥ dhāḥ pra devayan yaśasaḥ sam hi pūrvīḥ

original: RV_10.047.01.1{03} jagṛbhmā te dakṣiṇamindra hastaṃ vasūyavo vasupatevasūnām
analyzed: jagṛbhma te dakṣiṇam indra hastam vasūyavaḥ vasu pate vasūnām

original: RV_10.047.01.2{03} vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonāmasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: vidma hi tvā go patim śūra gonām asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_10.047.02.1{03} svāyudhaṃ svavasaṃ sunīthaṃ catuḥsamudraṃ dharunaṃrayīṇām
analyzed: su āyudham su avasam su nītham catur samudram dharunam rayīṇām

original: RV_10.047.02.2{03} carkṛtyaṃ śaṃsyaṃ bhūrivāramasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: carkṛtyam śaṃsyam bhūri vāram asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_10.047.03.1{03} subrahmāṇaṃ devavantaṃ bṛhantamuruṃ gabhīraṃ pṛthubudhnamindra
analyzed: su brahmāṇam devavantam bṛhantam urum gabhīram pṛthu budhnam indra

original: RV_10.047.03.2{03} śrutaṛṣimugramabhimātiṣāhamasmabhyaṃ citraṃvṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: śruta ṛṣim ugram abhimātiṣāham asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_10.047.04.1{03} sanadvājaṃ vipravīraṃ tarutraṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃsudakṣam
analyzed: sanat vājam vipra vīram tarutram dhana spṛtam śūśuvāṃsam su dakṣam

original: RV_10.047.04.2{03} dasyuhanaṃ pūrbhidamindra satyamasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: dasyu hanam pūrbhidam indra satyam asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_10.047.05.1{03} aśvāvantaṃ rathinaṃ vīravantaṃ sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃvājamindra
analyzed: aśvāvantam rathinam vīravantam sahasriṇam śatinam vājam indra

original: RV_10.047.05.2{03} bhadravrātaṃ vipravīraṃ svarṣāmasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: bhadra vrātam vipra vīram svarṣām asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_10.047.06.1{04} pra saptagum ṛtadhītiṃ sumedhāṃ bṛhaspatiṃ matirachājigāti
analyzed: pra saptagum ṛta dhītim su medhām bṛhaspatim matiḥ achā ājigāti

original: RV_10.047.06.2{04} ya āṅgiraso namasopasadyo 'smabhyaṃ citraṃvṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ āṅgirasaḥ namasā upasadyaḥ smabhyam citraṃvṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_10.047.07.1{04} vanīvāno mama dūtāsa indraṃ stomāścaranti sumatīriyānāḥ
analyzed: vanīvānaḥ mama dūtāsaḥ indram stomāḥ caranti sumatīḥ iyānāḥ

original: RV_10.047.07.2{04} hṛdispṛśo manasā vacyamānā asmabhyaṃ citraṃvṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: hṛdispṛśaḥ manasā vacyamānāḥ asmabhyam citraṃvṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_10.047.08.1{04} yat tvā yāmi daddhi tan na indra bṛhantaṃ kṣayamasamaṃjanānām
analyzed: yat tvā yāmi daddhi tat naḥ indra bṛhantam kṣayamasamaṃjanānām

original: RV_10.047.08.2{04} abhi tad dyāvāpṛthivī gṛṇītāmasmabhyaṃcitraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: abhi tat dyāvāpṛthivī gṛṇītām asmabhyam citram vṛṣaṇam rayim dāḥ

original: RV_10.048.01.1{05} ahaṃ bhuvaṃ vasunaḥ pūrvyas patirahaṃ dhanāni saṃjayāmi śaśvataḥ
analyzed: aham bhuvam vasunaḥ pūrvyaḥ patiḥ aham dhanāni saṃjayāmi śaśvataḥ

original: RV_10.048.01.2{05} māṃ havante pitaraṃ na jantavo 'handāśuṣe vi bhajāmi bhojanam
analyzed: mām havante pitaram na jantavaḥ handa aśuṣe vi bhajāmi bhojanam

original: RV_10.048.02.1{05} ahamindro rodho vakṣo atharvaṇastritāya gā ajanayamaheradhi
analyzed: aham indraḥ rodhaḥ vakṣaḥ atharvaṇaḥ tritāya gāḥ ajanayam aheḥ adhi

original: RV_10.048.02.2{05} ahaṃ dasyubhyaḥ pari nṛmṇamā dade gotrā śikṣandadhīce mātariśvane
analyzed: aham dasyubhyaḥ pari nṛmṇamā dade gotrā śikṣan dadhīce mātariśvane

original: RV_10.048.03.1{05} mahyaṃ tvaṣṭā vajramatakṣadāyasaṃ mayi devāso 'vṛjannapi kratum
analyzed: mahyam tvaṣṭā vajram atakṣat āyasam mayi devāsaḥ vṛjan api kratum

original: RV_10.048.03.2{05} mamānīkaṃ sūryasyeva duṣṭaraṃ māmāryantikṛtena kartvena ca
analyzed: mama anīkam sūryasya iva duṣṭaram mām āryanti kṛtena kartvena ca

original: RV_10.048.04.1{05} ahametaṃ gavyayamaśvyaṃ paśuṃ purīṣiṇaṃ sāyakenāhiraṇyayam
analyzed: aham etam gavyayam aśvyam paśum purīṣiṇam sāyakena a hiraṇyayam

original: RV_10.048.04.2{05} purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi dāśuṣe yan māsomāsa ukthino amandiṣuḥ
analyzed: purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi dāśuṣe yat mā asomāsaḥ ukthinaḥ amandiṣuḥ

original: RV_10.048.05.1{05} ahamindro na parā jigya id dhanaṃ na mṛtyave 'va tasthekadā cana
analyzed: aham indraḥ na parā jigye id dhanam na mṛtyave tastha ikadā cana

original: RV_10.048.05.2{05} somamin mā sunvanto yācatā vasu na mepūravaḥ sakhye riṣāthana
analyzed: somam id mā sunvantaḥ yācata vasu na mepūravaḥ sakhye riṣāthana

original: RV_10.048.06.1{06} ahametāñchāśvasato dvā-dvendraṃ ye vajraṃ yudhaye'kṛṇvata
analyzed: aham etān śāśvasataḥ dvādvā indram ye vajram yudhayekṛṇvata

original: RV_10.048.06.2{06} āhvayamānānava hanmanāhanaṃ dṛḷā vadannanamasyurnamasvinaḥ
analyzed: āhvayamānān ava hanmanā ahanam dṛḍā vadan anamasyuḥ namasvinaḥ

original: RV_10.048.07.1{06} abhīdamekameko asmi niṣṣāḷ abhī dvā kimu trayaḥkaranti
analyzed: abhi idam ekam ekaḥ asmi niṣṣāh abhī dvā kimu trayaḥ karanti

original: RV_10.048.07.2{06} khale na parṣān prati hanmi bhūri kiṃ mā nindantiśatravo 'nindrāḥ
analyzed: khale na parṣān prati hanmi bhūri kim mā nindanti śatravaḥ n indrāḥ

original: RV_10.048.08.1{06} ahaṃ guṅgubhyo atithigvamiṣkaramiṣaṃ na vṛtraturaṃvikṣu dhārayam
analyzed: aham guṅgubhyaḥ na vṛtra turaṃvikṣu

original: RV_10.048.08.2{06} yat parṇayaghna uta vā karañjahe prāhammahe vṛtrahatye aśuśravi
analyzed: yat parṇaya ghne uta vā karañja he prāhammahe vṛtra hatye aśuśravi

original: RV_10.048.09.1{06} pra me namī sāpya iṣe bhuje bhūd gavāmeṣe sakhyākṛṇuta dvitā
analyzed: pra me namī sāpyaḥ iṣe bhuje bhūt gavām iṣe sakhyā akṛṇuta dvitā

original: RV_10.048.09.2{06} didyuṃ yadasya samitheṣu maṃhayamādidenaṃ śaṃsyamukthyaṃ karam
analyzed: didyum yat asya samitheṣu maṃhayam ādidenam śaṃsyam ukthyam karam

original: RV_10.048.10.1{06} pra nemasmin dadṛśe somo antargopā nemamāvirasthākṛṇoti
analyzed: pra nemasmin dadṛśe somaḥ antargopāḥ

original: RV_10.048.10.2{06} sa tigmaśṛṅgaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yuyutsan druhastasthaubahule baddho antaḥ
analyzed: sa tigma śṛṅgam vṛṣabham yuyutsan druhaḥ tasthau bahule baddhaḥ antar

original: RV_10.048.11.1{06} ādityānāṃ vasūnāṃ rudriyāṇāṃ devo devānāṃ namināmi dhāma
analyzed: ādityānām vasūnām rudriyāṇām devaḥ devānām namināmi dhāma

original: RV_10.048.11.2{06} te mā bhadrāya śavase tatakṣuraparājitamastṛtamaṣāḷam
analyzed: te mā bhadrāya śavase tatakṣuḥ aparājitam astṛtam aṣāḍam

original: RV_10.049.01.1{07} ahaṃ dāṃ gṛṇate pūrvyaṃ vasvahaṃ brahma kṛṇavaṃ mahyaṃvardhanam
analyzed: aham dām gṛṇate pūrvyam vasu aham brahma kṛṇavam mahyam vardhanam

original: RV_10.049.01.2{07} ahaṃ bhuvaṃ yajamānasya coditāyajvanaḥ sākṣiviśvasmin bhare
analyzed: aham bhuvam yajamānasya codita ayajvanaḥ sākṣi viśvasmin bhare

original: RV_10.049.02.1{07} māṃ dhurindraṃ nāma devatā divaśca gmaścāpāṃ cajantavaḥ
analyzed: mām dhuḥ indram nāma devatāḥ divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca apām ca jantavaḥ

original: RV_10.049.02.2{07} ahaṃ harī vṛṣaṇā vivratā raghū ahaṃvajraṃ śavase dhṛṣṇvā dade
analyzed: aham harī vṛṣaṇā vivratā raghū aham vajram śavase dhṛṣṇvā dade

original: RV_10.049.03.1{07} ahamatkaṃ kavaye śiśnathaṃ hathairahaṃ kutsamāvamābhirūtibhiḥ
analyzed: kavaye śiśnatham hathaiḥ aham

original: RV_10.049.03.2{07} ahaṃ śuṣṇasya śnathitā vadharyamaṃna yo rara āryaṃ nāma dasyave
analyzed: aham śuṣṇasya śnathitā vadharyamaṃna yaḥ rare āryam nāma dasyave

original: RV_10.049.04.1{07} ahaṃ piteva vetasūnrabhiṣṭaye tugraṃ kutsāya smadibhaṃca randhayam
analyzed: aham pitā iva vetasūn rabhiṣṭaye tugram kutsāya smadibham ca randhayam

original: RV_10.049.04.2{07} ahaṃ bhuvaṃ yajamānasya rājani pra yad bharetujaye na priyādhṛṣe
analyzed: aham bhuvam yajamānasya rājani pra yat bharetujaye na priyādhṛṣe

original: RV_10.049.05.1{07} ahaṃ randhayaṃ mṛgayaṃ śrutarvaṇe yan mājihīta vayunācanānuṣak
analyzed: aham randhayam mṛgayam śrutarvaṇe yat mā ājihīta vayunā cana anuṣak

original: RV_10.049.05.2{07} ahaṃ veśaṃ namramāyave 'karamahaṃsavyāya paḍgṛbhimarandhayam
analyzed: aham veśam namra māyave karama haṃsavyāya paḍgṛbhim arandhayam

original: RV_10.049.06.1{08} ahaṃ sa yo navavāstvaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ saṃ vṛtreva dāsaṃvṛtrahārujam
analyzed: aham sa yaḥ navavāstvam bṛhat ratham sam vṛtrā iva dāsam vṛtra hā arujam

original: RV_10.049.06.2{08} yad vardhayantaṃ prathayantamānuṣag dūrepāre rajaso rocanākaram
analyzed: yat vardhayantam prathayantam ānuṣak dūrepāre rajasaḥ rocana ākaram

original: RV_10.049.07.1{08} ahaṃ sūryasya pari yāmyāśubhiḥ praitaśebhirvahamānaojasā
analyzed: aham sūryasya pari yāmi āśubhiḥ pra etaśebhiḥ vahamānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_10.049.07.2{08} yan mā sāvo manuṣa āha nirṇija ṛdhak kṛṣedāsaṃ kṛtvyaṃ hathaiḥ
analyzed: yat mā sāvaḥ manuṣe āha nirṇijaḥ ṛdhak kṛṣedāsam kṛtvyam hathaiḥ

original: RV_10.049.08.1{08} ahaṃ saptahā nahuṣo nahuṣṭaraḥ prāśrāva yaṃ śavasāturvaśaṃ yadum
analyzed: aham sapta hā nahuṣaḥ nahuṣṭaraḥ prāśrāva yam śavasā āturvaśam yadum

original: RV_10.049.08.2{08} ahaṃ nyanyaṃ sahasā sahas karaṃ navavrādhato navatiṃ ca vakṣayam
analyzed: aham nyanyam sahasā sahaḥ karam nava vrādhataḥ navatim ca vakṣayam

original: RV_10.049.09.1{08} ahaṃ sapta sravato dhārayaṃ vṛṣā dravitnvaḥ pṛthivyāṃsīrā adhi
analyzed: aham sapta sravataḥ dhārayam vṛṣā dravitnvaḥ pṛthivyām irāḥ adhi

original: RV_10.049.09.2{08} ahamarṇāṃsi vi tirāmi sukraturyudhā vidammanave gātumiṣṭaye
analyzed: aham arṇāṃsi vi tirāmi su kratuḥ yudhā vidam manave gātum iṣṭaye

original: RV_10.049.10.1{08} ahaṃ tadāsu dhārayaṃ yadāsu na devaścanatvaṣṭādhārayad ruśat
analyzed: aham tadā āsu dhārayam yadā āsu na devaḥ cana tvaṣṭā adhārayat ruśat

original: RV_10.049.10.2{08} spārhaṃ gavāmūdhassuvakṣaṇāsvā madhormadhu śvātryaṃ somamāśiram
analyzed: spārham gavām ūdhaḥ su vakṣaṇāsva ā madhoḥ madhu śvātryam somam āśiram

original: RV_10.049.11.1{08} evā devānindro vivye nṝn pra cyautnena maghavāsatyarādhāḥ
analyzed: eva devān indraḥ vivye nṝn pra cyautnena maghavā asatya rādhāḥ

original: RV_10.049.11.2{08} viśvet tā te harivaḥ śacīvo 'bhiturāsaḥ svayaśo gṛṇanti
analyzed: viśvā id tā te harivas śacīvas bhiturāsaḥ sva yaśaḥ gṛṇanti

original: RV_10.050.01.1{09} pra vo mahe mandamānāyāndhaso 'rcā viśvānarāyaviśvābhuve
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mandamānāya andhasaḥ rcā viśvānarāya viśvābhuve

original: RV_10.050.01.2{09} indrasya yasya sumakhaṃ saho mahi śravonṛmṇaṃ ca rodasī saparyataḥ
analyzed: indrasya yasya su makham sahaḥ mahi śravaḥ nṛmṇam ca rodasī saparyataḥ

original: RV_10.050.02.1{09} so cin nu sakhyā narya ina stutaścarkṛtya indro māvatenare
analyzed: saḥ cit nu sakhyā naryaḥ inaḥ stutaḥ carkṛtyaḥ indraḥ māvatenare

original: RV_10.050.02.2{09} viśvāsu dhūrṣu vājakṛtyeṣu satpate vṛtre vāpsvabhi śūra mandase
analyzed: viśvāsu dhūrṣu vājakṛtyeṣu satpate vṛtre vā apsu abhi śūra mandase

original: RV_10.050.03.1{09} ke te nara indra ye ta iṣe ye te sumnaṃ sadhanyamiyakṣān
analyzed: ke te naraḥ indra ye te iṣe ye te sumnam sa dhanyam iyakṣān

original: RV_10.050.03.2{09} ke te vājāyāsuryāya hinvire ke apsu svāsūrvarāsupauṃsye
analyzed: ke te vājāya asuryāya hinvire ke apsu svāsu urvarāsu pauṃsye

original: RV_10.050.04.1{09} bhuvastvamindra brahmaṇā mahān bhuvo viśveṣu savaneṣuyajñiyaḥ
analyzed: bhuvaḥ tvam indra brahmaṇā mahān bhuvaḥ viśveṣu savaneṣu yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_10.050.04.2{09} bhuvo nṝṃścyautno viśvasmin bharejyeṣṭhaśca mantro viśvacarṣaṇe
analyzed: bhuvaḥ nṝn cyautnaḥ viśvasmin bharejyeṣṭhaḥ ca mantraḥ viśvacarṣaṇe

original: RV_10.050.05.1{09} avā nu kaṃ jyāyān yajñavanaso mahīṃ ta omātrāṃkṛṣṭayo viduḥ
analyzed: avā nu kam jyāyān yajñavanasaḥ mahīm te omātrāṃkṛṣṭayaḥ viduḥ

original: RV_10.050.05.2{09} aso nu kamajaro vardhāśca viśvedetāsavanā tūtumā kṛṣe
analyzed: asaḥ nu kam ajaraḥ vardhāḥ ca viśvā id etā asavanā tūtumā kṛṣe

original: RV_10.050.06.1{09} etā viśvā savanā tūtumākṛṣe svayaṃ sūno sahaso yānidadhiṣe
analyzed: etā viśvā savanā tūtuma ākṛṣe svayam sūno sahasaḥ yā nidadhiṣe

original: RV_10.050.06.2{09} varāya te pātraṃ dharmaṇe tanā yajño mantrobrahmodyataṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: varāya te pātram dharmaṇe tanā yajñaḥ mantraḥ brahma udyatam vacaḥ
