original: RV_10.050.07.1{09} ye te vipra brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā vasūnāṃ ca vasunaścadāvane
analyzed: ye te vipra brahma kṛtaḥ sute sacā vasūnām ca

original: RV_10.050.07.2{09} pra te sumnasya manasā pathā bhuvan made sutasyasomyasyāndhasaḥ
analyzed: pra te sumnasya manasā pathā bhuvan made sutasya somyasya andhasaḥ

original: RV_10.051.01.1{10} mahat tadulbaṃ sthaviraṃ tadāsīd yenāviṣṭitaḥpraviveśithāpaḥ
analyzed: mahat tat ulbam sthaviram tadā āsīt yena āviṣṭitaḥ praviveśitha apaḥ

original: RV_10.051.01.2{10} viśvā apaśyad bahudhā te agne jātavedastanvo deva ekaḥ
analyzed: viśvāḥ apaśyat bahudhā te agne jātavedaḥ tanvaḥ devaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_10.051.02.1{10} ko mā dadarśa katamaḥ sa devo yo me tanvo bahudhāparyapaśyat
analyzed: kaḥ mā dadarśa katamaḥ sa devaḥ yaḥ me tanvaḥ bahudhā aparyapaśyat

original: RV_10.051.02.2{10} kvāha mitrāvaruṇā kṣiyantyagnervisvāḥsamidho devayānīḥ
analyzed: kva aha mitrāvaruṇā kṣiyanti agneḥ visvāḥ samidhaḥ deva yānīḥ

original: RV_10.051.03.1{10} aichāma tvā bahudhā jātavedaḥ praviṣṭamagne apsvoṣadhīṣu
analyzed: aichāma tvā bahudhā jātavedaḥ praviṣṭam agne apsu oṣadhīṣu

original: RV_10.051.03.2{10} taṃ tvā yamo acikeccitrabhāno daśāntaruṣyādatirocamānam
analyzed: tam tvā yamaḥ aciket citrabhāno daśa antaruṣyāt atirocamānam

original: RV_10.051.04.1{10} hotrādahaṃ varuṇa bibhyadāyaṃ nedeva mā yunajannatradevāḥ
analyzed: hotrāt aham varuṇa bibhyat āyam na id eva mā yunajan atra devāḥ

original: RV_10.051.04.2{10} tasya me tanvo bahudhā niviṣṭā etamarthaṃ naciketāhamagniḥ
analyzed: tasya me tanvaḥ bahudhā niviṣṭāḥ etam artham naciketā aham agniḥ

original: RV_10.051.05.1{10} ehi manurdevayuryajñakāmo 'raṃkṛtyā tamasi kṣeṣyagne
analyzed: ehi manuḥ devayuḥ yajña kāmaḥ raṃkṛtya ā tamasi kṣeṣi agne

original: RV_10.051.05.2{10} sugān pathaḥ kṛṇuhi devayānān vaha havyānisumanasyamānaḥ
analyzed: su gān pathaḥ kṛṇuhi deva yānān vaha havyānisumanasyamānaḥ

original: RV_10.051.06.1{11} agneḥ pūrve bhrātaro arthametaṃ rathīvādhvānamanvāvarīvuḥ
analyzed: agneḥ pūrve bhrātaraḥ artham etam rathī iva adhvānam anvāvarīvuḥ

original: RV_10.051.06.2{11} tasmād bhiyā varuṇa dūramāyaṃ gauro nakṣepnoravije jyāyāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt bhiyā varuṇa dūram āyam gauraḥ nakṣepnoḥ avije jyāyāḥ

original: RV_10.051.07.1{11} kurmasta āyurajaraṃ yadagne yathā yukto jātavedo nariṣyāḥ
analyzed: kurmaḥ te āyuḥ ajaram yat agne yathā yuktaḥ jātavedaḥ nariṣyāḥ

original: RV_10.051.07.2{11} athā vahāsi sumanasyamāno bhāgaṃ devebhyohaviṣaḥ sujāta
analyzed: atha ā vahāsi sumanasyamānaḥ bhāgam devebhyaḥ haviṣaḥ su jāta

original: RV_10.051.08.1{11} prayājān me anuyājāṃśca kevalānūrjasvantaṃ haviṣodatta bhāgam
analyzed: prayājān me anuyājān ca kevalān ūrjasvantam haviṣā datta bhāgam

original: RV_10.051.08.2{11} ghṛtaṃ cāpāṃ puruṣaṃ cauṣadhīnāmagneśca dīrghamāyurastu devāḥ
analyzed: ghṛtam ca apām puruṣam ca oṣadhīnām agneḥ ca dīrgham āyuḥ astu devāḥ

original: RV_10.051.09.1{11} tava prayājā anuyājāśca kevala ūrjasvanto haviṣaḥ santubhāgāḥ
analyzed: tava prayājāḥ anuyājāḥ ca kevale ūrjasvantaḥ haviṣaḥ santu bhāgāḥ

original: RV_10.051.09.2{11} tavāgne yajño 'yamastu sarvastubhyaṃ namantāmpradiśaścatasraḥ
analyzed: tava agne yajñaḥ yamaḥ tu sarvaḥ tubhyam namantām pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: RV_10.052.01.1{12} viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yatheha hotā vṛto manavai yanniṣadya
analyzed: viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yathā iha hotā vṛtaḥ manavai yat niṣadya

original: RV_10.052.01.2{12} pra me brūta bhāgadheyaṃ yathā vo yena pathāhavyamā vo vahāni
analyzed: pra me brūta bhāgadheyam yathā vaḥ yena pathā ahavyamā vaḥ vahāni

original: RV_10.052.02.1{12} ahaṃ hotā nyasīdaṃ yajīyān viśve devā maruto mājunanti
analyzed: aham hotā nyasīdam yajīyān viśve devāḥ marutaḥ mā ājunanti

original: RV_10.052.02.2{12} ahar-aharaśvinādhvaryavaṃ vāṃ brahmā samid bhavatisāhutirvām
analyzed: ahar ahar aśvinā ādhvaryavam vām brahmā samidh bhavati sa āhutiḥ vām

original: RV_10.052.03.1{12} ayaṃ yo hotā kiru sa yamasya kamapyūhe yat samañjantidevāḥ
analyzed: ayam yaḥ hotā kiru sa yamasya kam api ūhe yat samañjantidevāḥ

original: RV_10.052.03.2{12} ahar-aharjāyate māsi-māsyathā devā dadhirehavyavāham
analyzed: ahar ahar jāyate māsi māsi athā devāḥ dadhire havyavāham

original: RV_10.052.04.1{12} māṃ devā dadhire havyavāhamapamluktaṃ bahu kṛchrācarantam
analyzed: mām devāḥ dadhire havya vāham apamluktam bahu kṛchra ācarantam

original: RV_10.052.04.2{12} agnirvidvān yajñaṃ naḥ kalpayāti pañcayāmantrivṛtaṃ saptatantum
analyzed: agniḥ vidvān yajñam naḥ kalpayāti pañca yāmān trivṛtam sapta tantum

original: RV_10.052.05.1{12} ā vo yakṣyamṛtatvaṃ suvīraṃ yathā vo devā varivaḥkarāṇi
analyzed: ā vaḥ yakṣi amṛta tvam su vīram yathā vaḥ devāḥ varivaḥ karāṇi

original: RV_10.052.05.2{12} ā bāhvorvajramindrasya dheyāmathemāviśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāti
analyzed: ā bāhvoḥ vajram indrasya dheyām atha imāḥ viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ jayāti

original: RV_10.052.06.1{12} trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇyagniṃ triṃśacca devā navacāsaparyan
analyzed: trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇi agnim triṃśat ca devāḥ nava ca asaparyan

original: RV_10.052.06.2{12} aukṣan ghṛtairastṛṇan barhirasmā ādiddhotāraṃ nyasādayanta
analyzed: aukṣan ghṛtaiḥ astṛṇan barhiḥ asmai ādit hotāram nyasādayanta

original: RV_10.053.01.1{13} yamaichāma manasā so 'yamāgād yajñasya vidvānparuṣaścikitvān
analyzed: yam aichāma manasā saḥ yam āgāt yajñasya vidvān paruṣaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_10.053.01.2{13} sa no yakṣad devatātā yajīyān ni hiṣatsadantaraḥ pūrvo asmat
analyzed: sa naḥ yakṣat devatātā yajīyān ni hiṣatsat antaraḥ pūrvaḥ asmat

original: RV_10.053.02.1{13} arādhi hotā niṣadā yajīyanabhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hikhyat
analyzed: arādhi hotā niṣadā yajīyan abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hikhyat

original: RV_10.053.02.2{13} yajāmahai yajñiyān hanta devānīḷāmahāīḍyānājyena
analyzed: yajāmahai yajñiyān hanta devān īḍāmahai īḍyān ājyena

original: RV_10.053.03.1{13} sādhvīmakardevavītiṃ no adya yajñasya jihvāmavidāmaguhyām
analyzed: sādhvīm akaḥ deva vītim naḥ adya yajñasya jihvām avidām aguhyām

original: RV_10.053.03.2{13} sa āyurāgāt surabhirvasāno bhadrāmakardevahūtiṃ no adya
analyzed: saḥ āyuḥ āgāt surabhiḥ vasānaḥ bhadrām akaḥ deva hūtim naḥ adya

original: RV_10.053.04.1{13} tadadya vācaḥ prathamaṃ masīya yenāsurānabhi devāasāma
analyzed: tat adya vācaḥ prathamam masīya yena asurān abhi devāḥ asāma

original: RV_10.053.04.2{13} ūrjāda uta yajñiyasaḥ pañca janā mama hotraṃjuṣadhvam
analyzed: ūrjādaḥ uta yajñiyasaḥ pañca janāḥ mama hotram juṣadhvam

original: RV_10.053.05.1{13} pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣantāṃ gojātā uta yeyajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: pañca janāḥ mama hotram juṣantām go jātāḥ uta yeyajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_10.053.05.2{13} pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātvaṃ)
analyzed: pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātvam

original: aso'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātvasmān
analyzed: asaḥ ntarikṣam divyāt pātu asmān

original: RV_10.053.06.1{14} tantuṃ tanvan rajaso bhānumanvihi jyotiṣmataḥ pathorakṣa dhiyā kṛtān
analyzed: tantum tanvan rajasaḥ bhānum anvihi jyotiṣmataḥ pathoḥ akṣa dhiyā kṛtān

original: RV_10.053.06.2{14} anulbaṇaṃ vayata joguvāmapo manurbhava janayā daivyaṃ janam
analyzed: anulbaṇam vayata joguvām apaḥ manuḥ bhava janaya daivyam janam

original: RV_10.053.07.1{14} akṣānaho nahyatanota somyā iṣkṛṇudhvaṃ raśanā otapiṃśata
analyzed: akṣānahaḥ nahyatana uta somyāḥ iṣkṛṇudhvam raśanāḥ otapiṃśata

original: RV_10.053.07.2{14} aṣṭāvandhuraṃ vahatābhito rathaṃ yena devāsoanayannabhi priyam
analyzed: aṣṭāvandhuram vahata abhitas ratham yena devāsaḥ anayan abhi priyam

original: RV_10.053.08.1{14} aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvamut tiṣṭhata pra taratāsakhāyaḥ
analyzed: aśmanvatī rīyate sam rabhadhvam ud tiṣṭhata pra tarata a sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10.053.08.2{14} atrā jahāma ye asannaśevāḥ śivān vayamuttaremābhi vājān
analyzed: atra jahāma ye a sanna śevāḥ śivān vayam uttarema abhi vājān

original: RV_10.053.09.1{14} tvaṣṭā māyā vedapasāmapastamo bibhrat pātrādevapānāni śantamā
analyzed: tvaṣṭā māyāḥ vedapasām apastamaḥ bibhrat pātrā deva pānāni śantamā

original: RV_10.053.09.2{14} śiśīte nūnaṃ paraśuṃ svāyasaṃyena vṛścādetaśo brahmaṇas patiḥ
analyzed: śiśīte nūnam paraśum su āyasam yena vṛścāt etaśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10.053.10.1{14} sato nūnaṃ kavayaḥ saṃ śiśīta vāśībhiryābhiramṛtāya takṣatha
analyzed: sataḥ nūnam kavayaḥ sam śiśīta vāśībhiḥ yābhiḥ amṛtāya takṣatha

original: RV_10.053.10.2{14} vidvāṃsaḥ padā guhyāni kartana yenadevāso amṛtatvamānaśuḥ
analyzed: vidvāṃsaḥ padā guhyāni kartana yena devāsaḥ amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_10.053.11.1{14} garbhe yoṣāmadadhurvatsamāsanyapīcyena manasotajihvayā
analyzed: garbhe yoṣām adadhuḥ vatsam āsani apīcyena manasā uta jihvayā

original: RV_10.053.11.2{14} sa viśvāhā sumanā yogyā abhi siṣāsanirvanatekāra ijjitim
analyzed: sa viśvāhā sumanāḥ yogyāḥ abhi siṣāsaniḥ vanatekāraḥ id jitim

original: RV_10.054.01.1{15} tāṃ su te kīrtiṃ maghavan mahitvā yat tvā bhīte rodasīahvayetām
analyzed: tām su te kīrtim maghavan mahitvā yat tvā bhīte rodasī ahvayetām

original: RV_10.054.01.2{15} prāvo devānātiro dāsamojaḥ prajāyaitvasyai yadaśikṣa indra
analyzed: prāvaḥ devān ātiraḥ dāsam ojaḥ prajāyai etu asyai yat aśikṣaḥ indra

original: RV_10.054.02.1{15} yadacarastanvā vāvṛdhāno balānīndra prabruvāṇo janeṣu
analyzed: yat acaraḥ tanvāḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ balāni indra prabruvāṇaḥ janeṣu

original: RV_10.054.02.2{15} māyet sā te yāni yuddhānyāhurnādya śatruṃ nanupurā vivitse
analyzed: mā ayet sā te yāni yuddhāni āhuḥ na adya śatrum nanu purā vivitse

original: RV_10.054.03.1{15} ka u nu te mahimanaḥ samasyāsmat pūrva ṛṣayo 'ntamāpuḥ
analyzed: kaḥ u nu te mahimanaḥ samasya asmat pūrve ṛṣayaḥ ntam āpuḥ

original: RV_10.054.03.2{15} yan mātaraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca sākamajanayathāstanvaḥsvāyāḥ
analyzed: yat mātaram ca pitaram ca sākam ajanayathāḥ tanvaḥ svāyāḥ

original: RV_10.054.04.1{15} catvāri te asuryāṇi nāmādābhyāni mahiṣasya santi
analyzed: catvāri te asuryāṇi nāma adābhyāni mahiṣasya santi

original: RV_10.054.04.2{15} tvamaṅga tāni viśvāni vitse yebhiḥ karmāṇi maghavañcakartha
analyzed: tvam aṅga tāni viśvāni vitse yebhiḥ karmāṇi maghavan cakartha

original: RV_10.054.05.1{15} tvaṃ viśvā dadhiṣe kevalāni yānyāviryā ca guhāvasūni
analyzed: tvam viśvā dadhiṣe kevalāni yāni āvis yā ca guhāvasūni

original: RV_10.054.05.2{15} kāmamin me maghavan mā vi tārīstvamājñātātvamindrāsi dātā
analyzed: kāmam id me maghavan mā vi tārīḥ tvam ājñātā tvam indra asi dātā

original: RV_10.054.06.1{15} yo adadhājjyotiṣi jyotirantaryo asṛjan madhunā sammadhūni
analyzed: yaḥ adadhāt jyotiṣi jyotiḥ antar yaḥ asṛjat madhunā sammadhūni

original: RV_10.054.06.2{15} adha priyaṃ śūṣamindrāya manma brahmakṛtobṛhadukthādavāci
analyzed: adha priyam śūṣam indrāya manma brahma kṛtaḥ bṛhat ukthāt avāci

original: RV_10.055.01.1{16} dūre tan nāma guhyaṃ parācairyat tvā bhīte ahvayetāṃvayodhai
analyzed: dūre tat nāma guhyam parācais yat tvā bhīte

original: RV_10.055.01.2{16} udastabhnāḥ pṛthivīṃ dyāmabhīke bhrātuḥputrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ
analyzed: udastabhnāḥ pṛthivīm dyām abhīke bhrātuḥ putrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_10.055.02.1{16} mahat tan nāma guhyaṃ puruspṛg yena bhūtaṃ janayo yenabhavyam
analyzed: mahat tat nāma guhyam puruspṛh yena bhūtam janayaḥ yena bhavyam

original: RV_10.055.02.2{16} pratnaṃ jātaṃ jyotiryadasya priyaṃ priyāḥ samaviśanta pañca
analyzed: pratnam jātam jyotiḥ yat asya priyam priyāḥ samaviśanta pañca

original: RV_10.055.03.1{16} ā rodasī apṛṇādota madhyaṃ pañca devān ṛtuśaḥ sapta sapta
analyzed: ā rodasī apṛṇāt ā uta madhyam pañca devān ṛtuśas sapta sapta

original: RV_10.055.03.2{16} catustriṃśatā purudhā vi caṣṭe sarūpeṇa jyotiṣāvivratena
analyzed: catustriṃśatā purudhā vi caṣṭe sa rūpeṇa jyotiṣā a vi vratena

original: RV_10.055.04.1{16} yaduṣa auchaḥ prathamā vibhānāmajanayo yena puṣṭasyapuṣṭam
analyzed: yat uṣaḥ auchaḥ prathamā vibhānām ajanayaḥ yena puṣṭasya puṣṭam

original: RV_10.055.04.2{16} yat te jāmitvamavaraṃ parasyā mahan mahatyāasuratvamekam
analyzed: yat te jāmi tvam avaram parasyāḥ mahat mahatyāḥ asura tvam ekam

original: RV_10.055.05.1{16} vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnāṃ yuvānaṃ santaṃ palitojagāra
analyzed: vidhum dadrāṇam samane bahūnām yuvānam santam palitaḥ ujagāra

original: RV_10.055.05.2{16} devasya paśya kāvyaṃ mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥsamāna
analyzed: devasya paśya kāvyam mahi tvāt yā mamāra sa hyas samāna

original: RV_10.055.06.1{17} śākmanā śāko aruṇaḥ suparṇa ā yo mahaḥ śūraḥsanādanīḷaḥ
analyzed: śākmanā śākaḥ aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ ā yaḥ mahaḥ śūraḥ sanādanīḍaḥ

original: RV_10.055.06.2{17} yacciketa satyamit tan na moghaṃ vasuspārhamuta jetota dātā
analyzed: yat ciketa satyam id tat na mogham vasu spārham uta jetā uta dātā

original: RV_10.055.07.1{17} aibhirdade vṛṣṇyā pauṃsyāni yebhiraukṣad vṛtrahatyāyavajrī
analyzed: ā ebhiḥ dade vṛṣṇyā pauṃsyāni yebhiḥ aukṣat vṛtra hatyāya vajrī

original: RV_10.055.07.2{17} ye karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasya mahna ṛtekarmamudajāyanta devāḥ
analyzed: ye karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasya mahnaḥ ṛtekarmam udajāyanta devāḥ

original: RV_10.055.08.1{17} yujā karmāṇi janayan viśvaujā aśastithā viśvamanāsturāṣāṭ
analyzed: yujā karmāṇi janayan viśva ojāḥ aśastithā viśva manāḥ turāṣāh

original: RV_10.055.08.2{17} pītvī somasya diva ā vṛdhānaḥ śūro niryudhādhamad dasyūn
analyzed: pītvī somasya divaḥ ā vṛdhānaḥ śūraḥ niryudhā adhamat dasyūn

original: RV_10.056.01.1{18} idaṃ ta ekaṃ para ū ta ekaṃ tṛtīyena jyotiṣā saṃviśasva
analyzed: idam te ekam paras te ekam tṛtīyena jyotiṣā saṃviśasva

original: RV_10.056.01.2{18} saṃveśane tanvaścāruredhi priyo devānāmparame janitre
analyzed: saṃveśane tanvaḥ cāruḥ edhi priyaḥ devānām parame janitre

original: RV_10.056.02.1{18} tanūṣ ṭe vājin tanvaṃ nayantī vāmamasmabhyaṃ dhātuśarma tubhyam
analyzed: tanūḥ te vājin tanvam nayantī vāmam asmabhyam dhātu śarma tubhyam

original: RV_10.056.02.2{18} ahruto maho dharuṇāya devān divīvajyotiḥ svamā mimīyāḥ
analyzed: ahrutaḥ mahaḥ dharuṇāya devān divi iva jyotiḥ svamā mimīyāḥ

original: RV_10.056.03.1{18} vājyasi vājinenā suvenīḥ suvita stomaṃ suvito divaṃgāḥ
analyzed: vājī asi vājinena suvenīḥ suvitaḥ stomam suvitaḥ divaṃgāḥ

original: RV_10.056.03.2{18} suvito dharma prathamānu satyā suvito devān suvito'nu patma
analyzed: suvitaḥ dharma prathamā anu satyā suvitaḥ devān suvitaḥ unu patma

original: RV_10.056.04.1{18} mahimna eṣāṃ pitaraścaneśire devā deveṣvadadhurapikratum
analyzed: mahimnaḥ eṣām pitaraḥ cana īśire devāḥ deveṣu adadhuḥ apikratum

original: RV_10.056.04.2{18} samavivyacuruta yānyatviṣuraiṣāṃ tanūṣu niviviśuḥ punaḥ
analyzed: samavivyacuḥ uta yāni atviṣuḥ ā eṣām tanūṣu niviviśuḥ punar

original: RV_10.056.05.1{18} sahobhirviśvaṃ pari cakramū rajaḥ pūrvā dhāmānyamitāmimānāḥ
analyzed: sahobhiḥ viśvam pari cakramuḥ rajaḥ pūrvā dhāmāni amita āmimānāḥ

original: RV_10.056.05.2{18} tanūṣu viśvā bhuvanā ni yemire prāsārayantapurudha prajā anu
analyzed: tanūṣu viśvā bhuvanā ni yemire prāsārayantapurudha prajāḥ anu

original: RV_10.056.06.1{18} dvidhā sūnavo 'suraṃ svarvidamāsthāpayanta tṛtīyenakarmaṇā
analyzed: dvidhā sūnavaḥ suram svar vidam āsthāpayanta tṛtīyena karmaṇā

original: RV_10.056.06.2{18} svāṃ prajāṃ pitaraḥ pitryaṃ saha āvareṣvadadhustantumātatam
analyzed: svām prajām pitaraḥ pitryam sahaḥ ā avareṣu adadhuḥ tantum ātatam

original: RV_10.056.07.1{18} nāvā na kṣodaḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ svastibhiratidurgāṇi viśvā
analyzed: nāvā na kṣodaḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ svastibhiḥ ati durgāṇi viśvā

original: RV_10.056.07.2{18} svāṃ prajāṃ bṛhaduktho mahitvāvareṣvadadhādā pareṣu
analyzed: svām prajām bṛhadukthaḥ mahitvā avareṣu adadhāt ā pareṣu

original: RV_10.057.01.1{19} mā pra gāma patho vayaṃ mā yajñādindra sominaḥ
analyzed: mā pra gāma pathaḥ vayam mā yajñāt indra sominaḥ

original: RV_10.057.01.2{19} mānta sthurno arātayaḥ
analyzed: mā antar sthuḥ naḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_10.057.02.1{19} yo yajñasya prasādhanastanturdeveṣvātataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ yajñasya prasādhanaḥ tantuḥ deveṣu ātataḥ

original: RV_10.057.02.2{19} tamāhutaṃ naśīmahi
analyzed: tam āhutam naśīmahi

original: RV_10.057.03.1{19} mano nvā huvāmahe nārāśaṃsena somena
analyzed: manaḥ nu ā huvāmahe nārāśaṃsena somena

original: RV_10.057.03.2{19} pitṝṇāṃ camanmabhiḥ
analyzed: pitṝṇām ca manmabhiḥ

original: RV_10.057.04.1{19} ā ta etu manaḥ punaḥ kratve dakṣāya jīvase
analyzed: ā te etu manaḥ punar kratve dakṣāya jīvase

original: RV_10.057.04.2{19} jyok casūryaṃ dṛśe
analyzed: jyok ca sūryam dṛśe

original: RV_10.057.05.1{19} punarnaḥ pitaro mano dadātu daivyo janaḥ
analyzed: punar naḥ pitaraḥ manaḥ dadātu daivyaḥ janaḥ

original: RV_10.057.05.2{19} jīvaṃ vrātaṃsacemahi
analyzed: jīvam vrātaṃsacemahi

original: RV_10.057.06.1{19} vayaṃ soma vrate tava manastanūṣu bibhrataḥ
analyzed: vayam soma vrate tava manaḥ tanūṣu bibhrataḥ

original: RV_10.057.06.2{19} prajāvantaḥ sacemahi
analyzed: prajāvantaḥ sacemahi

original: RV_10.058.01.1{20} yat te yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te yamam vaivasvatam manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10.058.01.2{20} tat ta āvartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase
analyzed: tat te āvartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10.058.02.1{20} yat te divaṃ yat pṛthivīṃ mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te divam yat pṛthivīm manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.03.1{20} yat te bhūmiṃ caturbhṛṣṭiṃ mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te bhūmim catur bhṛṣṭim manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.04.1{20} yat te catasraḥ pradiśo mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te catasraḥ pradiśaḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.05.1{20} yat te samudramarṇavaṃ mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te samudram arṇavam manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.06.1{20} yat te marīcīḥ pravato mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te marīcīḥ pravataḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.07.1{21} yat te apo yadoṣadhīrmano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te apaḥ yat oṣadhīḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.08.1{21} yat te sūryaṃ yaduṣasaṃ mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te sūryam yat uṣasam manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.09.1{21} yat te parvatān bṛhato mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te parvatān bṛhataḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.10.1{21} yat te viśvamidaṃ jagan mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te viśvam idam jagat manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.11.1{21} yat te parāḥ parāvato mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te parāḥ parāvataḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.058.12.1{21} yat te bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca mano jagāma dūrakam
analyzed: yat te bhūtam ca bhavyam ca manaḥ jagāma dūrakam
tat te

original: RV_10.059.01.1{22} pra tāryāyuḥ prataraṃ navīya sthātāreva kratumatārathasya
analyzed: pra tārya āyuḥ prataram navīya sthātārā iva kratumatā rathasya

original: RV_10.059.01.2{22} adha cyavāna ut tavītyarthaṃ parātaraṃ sOG“ā̆m
analyzed: adha cyavānaḥ ud tavi iti artham parātaram sogām

original: RV_10.059.02.1{22} sāman nu rāye nidhiman nvannaṃ karāmahe su purudhaśravāṃsi
analyzed: sāman nu rāye nidhimat nu annam karāmahe su purudha śravāṃsi

original: RV_10.059.02.2{22} tā no viśvāni jaritā mamattu parātaraṃ sunir{ṛ}tirjihītām
analyzed: tā naḥ viśvāni jaritā mamattu parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām

original: RV_10.059.03.1{22} abhī ṣvaryaḥ pauṃsyairbhavema dyaurna bhūmiṃ girayonājran
analyzed: abhi su aryaḥ pauṃsyaiḥ bhavema dyauḥ na bhūmim girayaḥ na ajran

original: RV_10.059.03.2{22} tā no viśvāni jaritā ciketa parātaraṃ sunir{ṛ}tirjihītām
analyzed: tā naḥ viśvāni jaritā ciketa parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām

original: RV_10.059.04.1{22} mo ṣu ṇaḥ soma mṛtyave parā dāḥ paśyema nu sūryamuccarantam
analyzed: mā u su naḥ soma mṛtyave parā dāḥ paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam

original: RV_10.059.04.2{22} dyubhirhito jarimā sū no astu parātaraṃ sunir{ṛ}tirjihītām
analyzed: dyubhiḥ hitaḥ jarimā su naḥ astu parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām

original: RV_10.059.05.1{22} asunīte mano asmāsu dhāraya jīvātave su pra tirā naāyuḥ
analyzed: asunīte manaḥ asmāsu dhāraya jīvātave su pra tira naāyuḥ

original: RV_10.059.05.2{22} rārandhi naḥ sūryasya sandṛśi ghṛtena tvantanvaṃ vardhayasva
analyzed: rārandhi naḥ sūryasya sandṛśi ghṛtena tvantanvam vardhayasva

original: RV_10.059.06.1{23} asunīte punarasmāsu cakṣuḥ punaḥ prāṇamiha no dhehibhogam
analyzed: asunīte punar asmāsu cakṣuḥ punar prāṇam iha naḥ dhehi bhogam

original: RV_10.059.06.2{23} jyok paśyema sūryamuccarantamanumate mṛḷayā nahsvasti
analyzed: jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam anumate mṛḍaya nahsvasti

original: RV_10.059.07.1{23} punarno asuṃ pṛthivī dadātu punardyaurdevī punarantarikṣam
analyzed: punar naḥ asum pṛthivī dadātu punar dyauḥ devī punar antarikṣam

original: RV_10.059.07.2{23} punarnaḥ somastanvaṃ dadātu punaḥ pūṣāpathyāṃ yā svastiḥ
analyzed: punar naḥ somaḥ tanvam dadātu punar pūṣā apathyām yā svastiḥ

original: RV_10.059.08.1{23} śaṃ rodasī subandhave yahvī ṛtasya mātarā
analyzed: śam rodasī su bandhave yahvī ṛtasya mātarā

original: RV_10.059.08.2{23} bharatāmapa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃcanāmamat
analyzed: bharata amapa yat rapaḥ dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ mā u su te kiṃcana amamat

original: RV_10.059.09.1{23} ava dvake ava trikā divaścaranti bheṣajā
analyzed: ava dvake ava trikā divaḥ caranti bheṣajā

original: RV_10.059.09.2{23} kṣamācariṣṇvekakaṃ bharatāmapa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamārapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat
analyzed: kṣamā cariṣṇu ekakam bharata amapa yat rapaḥ dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ mā u su te kim cana amamat

original: RV_10.059.10.1{23} samindreraya gāmanaḍvāhaṃ ya āvahaduśīnarāṇyāanaḥ
analyzed: sam indra īraya gām anaḍvāham yaḥ āvahat uśīnarāṇyā aanaḥ

original: RV_10.059.10.2{23} bharatāmapa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo moṣu te kiṃ canāmamat
analyzed: bharata amapa yat rapaḥ dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ mā u su te kim cana amamat

original: RV_10.060.01.1{24} ā janaṃ tveṣasandṛśaṃ māhīnānāmupastutam
analyzed: ā janam tveṣa sandṛśam māhīnānām upastutam

original: RV_10.060.01.2{24} aganmabibhrato namaḥ
analyzed: aganma bibhrataḥ namaḥ

original: RV_10.060.02.1{24} asamātiṃ nitośanaṃ tveṣaṃ niyayinaṃ ratham
analyzed: asamātim nitośanam tveṣam niyayinam ratham

original: RV_10.060.02.2{24} bhajerathasya satpatim
analyzed: bhajerathasya sat patim

original: RV_10.060.03.1{24} yo janān mahiṣānivātitasthau pavīravān
analyzed: yaḥ janān mahiṣān iva atitasthau pavīravān

original: RV_10.060.03.2{24} utāpavīravānyudhā
analyzed: uta a pavīravān yudhā

original: RV_10.060.04.1{24} yasyekṣvākurupa vrate revān marāyyedhate
analyzed: yasya ikṣvākuḥ upa vrate revān marāyī edhate

original: RV_10.060.04.2{24} divīvapañca kṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: divi ivapañca kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_10.060.05.1{24} indra kṣatrāsamātiṣu rathaproṣṭheṣu dhāraya
analyzed: indra kṣatrāsamātiṣu rathaproṣṭheṣu dhāraya

original: RV_10.060.05.2{24} divīvasūryaṃ dṛśe
analyzed: divīvasūryam dṛśe

original: RV_10.060.06.1{24} agastyasya nadbhyaḥ saptī yunakṣi rohitā
analyzed: agastyasya nadbhyaḥ saptī yunakṣi rohitā

original: RV_10.060.06.2{24} paṇīn nyakramīrabhi viśvān rājannarādhasaḥ
analyzed: paṇīn nyakramīḥ abhi viśvān rājan arādhasaḥ

original: RV_10.060.07.1{25} ayaṃ mātāyaṃ pitāyaṃ jīvāturāgamat
analyzed: ayam mātā ayam pitā ayam jīvātuḥ āgamat

original: RV_10.060.07.2{25} idaṃ tavaprasarpaṇaṃ subandhavehi nirihi
analyzed: idam tava prasarpaṇam subandhava ihi nirihi

original: RV_10.060.08.1{25} yathā yugaṃ varatrayā nahyanti dharuṇāya kam
analyzed: yathā yugam varatrayā nahyanti dharuṇāya kam

original: RV_10.060.08.2{25} evādādhāra te mano jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye
analyzed: eva adādhāra te manaḥ jīvātave na mṛtyave thaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: RV_10.060.09.1{25} yatheyaṃ pṛthivī mahī dādhāremān vanaspatīn
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra imān vanaspatīn

original: RV_10.060.09.2{25} evādādhāra te mano jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye
analyzed: eva adādhāra te manaḥ jīvātave na mṛtyave thaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: RV_10.060.10.1{25} yamādahaṃ vaivasvatāt subandhormana ābharam
analyzed: yamāt aham vaivasvatāt subandhoḥ manaḥ ābharam

original: RV_10.060.10.2{25} jīvātavena mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye
analyzed: jīvātavena mṛtyave thaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: RV_10.060.11.1{25} nyag vāto 'va vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ
analyzed: nyak vātaḥ va vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ

original: RV_10.060.11.2{25} nīcīnamaghnyāduhe nyag bhavatu te rapaḥ
analyzed: nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyak bhavatu te rapaḥ

original: RV_10.060.12.1{25} ayaṃ me hasto bhagavānayaṃ me bhagavattaraḥ
analyzed: ayam me hastaḥ bhagavān ayam me bhagavattaraḥ

original: RV_10.060.12.2{25} ayaṃ meviśvabheṣajo 'yaṃ śivābhimarśanaḥ
analyzed: ayam me viśva bheṣajaḥ yam śiva abhimarśanaḥ

original: RV_10.061.01.1{26} idamitthā raudraṃ gūrtavacā brahma kratvā śacyāmantarājau
analyzed: idam itthā raudram gūrta vacāḥ brahma kratvā śacyām antarājau

original: RV_10.061.01.2{26} krāṇā yadasya pitarā maṃhaneṣṭhāḥ parṣatpakthe ahannā sapta hotṝn
analyzed: krāṇāḥ yat asya pitarā maṃhaneṣṭhāḥ parṣat pakthe ahannā sapta hotṝn

original: RV_10.061.02.1{26} sa id dānāya dabhyāya vanvañcyavānaḥ sūdairamimītavedim
analyzed: saḥ id dānāya dabhyāya vanvan cyavānaḥ sūdaiḥ amimīta vedim

original: RV_10.061.02.2{26} tūrvayāṇo gūrtavacastamaḥ kṣodo na reta itaūtisiñcat
analyzed: tūrvayāṇaḥ gūrta vacastamaḥ kṣodaḥ na retaḥ itaūtisiñcat

original: RV_10.061.03.1{26} mano na yeṣu havaneṣu tigmaṃ vipaḥ śacyā vanuthodravantā
analyzed: manaḥ na yeṣu havaneṣu tigmam vipaḥ śacyā vanutha udravantā

original: RV_10.061.03.2{26} ā yaḥ śaryabhistuvinṛmṇoasyāśrīṇītādiśaṃ gabhastau
analyzed: ā yaḥ śari abhistuvi nṛmṇaḥ asya āśrīṇīta ādiśam gabhastau

original: RV_10.061.04.1{26} kṛṣṇā yad goṣvaruṇīṣu sīdad divo napātāśvināhuve vām
analyzed: kṛṣṇā yat goṣu aruṇīṣu sīdat divaḥ napātā aśvinā āhuve vām

original: RV_10.061.04.2{26} vītaṃ me yajñamā gataṃ me annaṃ vavanvāṃsāneṣamasmṛtadhrū
analyzed: vītam me yajñam ā gatam me annam vavanvāṃsa an iṣam asmṛtadhrū

original: RV_10.061.05.1{26} prathiṣṭa yasya vīrakarmamiṣṇadanuṣṭhitaṃ nu naryoapauhat
analyzed: prathiṣṭa yasya vīra karmam iṣṇat anuṣṭhitam nu

original: RV_10.061.05.2{26} punastadā vṛhati yat kanāyā duhiturāanubhṛtamanarvā
analyzed: punar tadā vṛhati yat kanāyāḥ

original: RV_10.061.06.1{27} madhyā yat kartvamabhavadabhīke kāmaṃ kṛṇvāṇepitari yuvatyām
analyzed: madhyā yat kartvam abhavat abhīke kāmam kṛṇvāṇe pitari yuvatyām

original: RV_10.061.06.2{27} manānag reto jahaturviyantā sānauniṣiktaṃ sukṛtasya yonau
analyzed: manānaś retaḥ jahatuḥ viyantā sānau niṣiktam sukṛtasya yonau

original: RV_10.061.07.1{27} pitā yat svāṃ duhitaramadhiṣkan kṣmayā retaḥsaṃjagmāno ni ṣiñcat
analyzed: pitā yat svām duhitaram adhiṣkan kṣmayā retaḥ saṃjagmānaḥ ni siñcat

original: RV_10.061.07.2{27} svādhyo 'janayan brahma devāvāstoṣ patiṃ vratapāṃ niratakṣan
analyzed: su ādhyaḥ janayan brahma devāvāstoḥ patim vrata pām niratakṣan

original: RV_10.061.08.1{27} sa īṃ vṛṣā na phenamasyadājau smadā paraidapadabhracetāḥ
analyzed: saḥ īm vṛṣā na phenam asyat ājau smadā parait apa dabhra cetāḥ

original: RV_10.061.08.2{27} sarat padā na dakṣiṇā parāvṛṃ na tā nume pṛśanyo jagṛbhre
analyzed: sarat padā na dakṣiṇā parāvṛm na tāḥ nume pṛśanyaḥ jagṛbhre

original: RV_10.061.09.1{27} makṣū na vahniḥ prajāyā upabdiragniṃ na nagna upasīdadūdhaḥ
analyzed: makṣū na vahniḥ prajāyāḥ upabdiḥ agnim na nagnaḥ upasīdat ūdhas

original: RV_10.061.09.2{27} sanitedhmaṃ sanitota vājaṃ sa dhartājajñe sahasā yavīyut
analyzed: sanitā idhmam sanitā uta vājam sa dhartā ājajñe sahasā yavīyudh

original: RV_10.061.10.1{27} makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyaṃ navagvā ṛtaṃ vadanta ṛtayuktimagman
analyzed: makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyam navagvāḥ ṛtam vadantaḥ ṛta yuktim agman

original: RV_10.061.10.2{27} dvibarhaso ya upa gopamāguradakṣiṇāso acyutādudukṣan
analyzed: dvibarhasaḥ ye upa gopam āguḥ a dakṣiṇāsaḥ acyutāt udukṣan

original: RV_10.061.11.1{28} makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyaṃ navīyo rādho na reta ṛtamitturaṇyan
analyzed: makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyam navīyaḥ rādhaḥ na retaḥ ṛtam id turaṇyan

original: RV_10.061.11.2{28} śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ payausriyāyāḥ
analyzed: śuci yat te rekṇaḥ āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ payausriyāyāḥ

original: RV_10.061.12.1{28} paśvā yat paścā viyutā budhanteti bravīti vaktarīrarāṇaḥ
analyzed: paśvā yat paścā viyutā budhanta iti bravīti vaktari īrarāṇaḥ

original: RV_10.061.12.2{28} vasorvasutvā kāravo 'nehā viśvaṃ viveṣṭidraviṇamupa kṣu
analyzed: vasoḥ vasu tvā kāravaḥ nehāḥ viśvam viveṣṭi draviṇam upa kṣu

original: RV_10.061.13.1{28} tadin nvasya pariṣadvāno agman purū sadanto nārṣadambibhitsan
analyzed: tat id nu asya pariṣadvānaḥ agman purū sadantaḥ nārṣadam bibhitsan

original: RV_10.061.13.2{28} vi śuṣṇasya saṃgrathitamanarvā vidatpuruprajātasya guhā yat
analyzed: vi śuṣṇasya saṃgrathitam anarvā vidat puru prajātasya guhā yat

original: RV_10.061.14.1{28} bhargo ha nāmota yasya devāḥ svarṇa ye triṣadhastheniṣeduḥ
analyzed: bhargaḥ ha nāma uta yasya devāḥ ye

original: RV_10.061.14.2{28} agnirha nāmota jātavedāḥ śrudhī no hotar{ṛ}tasya hotādhruk
analyzed: agniḥ ha nāma uta jātavedāḥ śrudhi naḥ hotar ṛtasya hotā adhruk

original: RV_10.061.15.1{28} uta tyā me raudrāvarcimantā nāsatyāvindra gūrtayeyajadhyai
analyzed: uta tyā me raudrau arcimantā nāsatyau indra gūrtayā iyajadhyai

original: RV_10.061.15.2{28} manuṣvad vṛktabarhiṣe rarāṇā mandūhitaprayasā vikṣu yajyū
analyzed: manuṣvat vṛktabarhiṣe rarāṇā mandūhita prayasā vikṣu yajyū

original: RV_10.061.16.1{29} ayaṃ stuto rājā vandi vedhā apaś va viprastaratisvasetuḥ
analyzed: ayam stutaḥ rājā vandi vedhāḥ

original: RV_10.061.16.2{29} sa kakṣīvantaṃ rejayat so agniṃ nemiṃ nacakramarvato raghudru
analyzed: sa kakṣīvantam rejayat saḥ agnim nemim na cakra marvataḥ raghudru

original: RV_10.061.17.1{29} sa dvibandhurvaitaraṇo yaṣṭā sabardhuṃ dhenumasvanduhadhyai
analyzed: sa dvi bandhuḥ vaitaraṇaḥ yaṣṭā sabardhum dhenum asvan duhadhyai

original: RV_10.061.17.2{29} saṃ yan mitrāvaruṇā vṛñja ukthairjyeṣṭhebhiraryamaṇaṃ varūthaiḥ
analyzed: sam yat mitrāvaruṇā vṛñje ukthaiḥ jyeṣṭhebhiḥ aryamaṇam varūthaiḥ

original: RV_10.061.18.1{29} tadbandhuḥ sūrirdivi te dhiyandhā nābhānediṣṭho rapatipra venan
analyzed: tad bandhuḥ sūriḥ divi te dhiyan dhāḥ nābhānediṣṭhaḥ rapati pra venan

original: RV_10.061.18.2{29} sā no nābhiḥ paramāsya vā ghāhaṃ tatpaścā katithaścidāsa
analyzed: sā naḥ nābhiḥ paramā asya vā gha aham tad paścā katithaḥ cit āsa

original: RV_10.061.19.1{29} iyaṃ me nābhiriha me sadhasthamime me devā ayamasmisarvaḥ
analyzed: iyam me nābhiḥ iha me sadhastham ime me devāḥ ayam asmi sarvaḥ

original: RV_10.061.19.2{29} dvijā aha prathamajā ṛtasyedaṃ dhenuraduhajjāyamānā
analyzed: dvijāḥ aha prathama jāḥ ṛtasya idam dhenuḥ aduhat jāyamānā

original: RV_10.061.20.1{29} adhāsu mandro aratirvibhāvāva syati dvivartanirvaneṣāṭ
analyzed: mandraḥ aratiḥ vibhāvā ava syati dvi vartaniḥ vaneṣāh

original: RV_10.061.20.2{29} ūrdhvā yacchreṇirna śiśurdan makṣū sthiraṃśevṛdhaṃ sūta mātā
analyzed: ūrdhvā yat śreṇiḥ na śiśuḥ dat makṣū sthiram śevṛdham sūta mātā

original: RV_10.061.21.1{30} adhā gāva upamātiṃ kanāyā anu śvāntasya kasya citpareyuḥ
analyzed: adhā gāvaḥ upamātim kanāyāḥ anu śvāntasya kasya cit pareyuḥ

original: RV_10.061.21.2{30} śrudhi tvaṃ sudraviṇo nastvaṃ yāḷ āśvaghnasyava“vṛdhe sūnṛtābhiḥ
analyzed: śrudhi tvam su draviṇaḥ naḥ tvam yāṭ āśvaghnasi avavṛdhe sūnṛtābhiḥ

original: RV_10.061.22.1{30} adha tvamindra viddhyasmān maho rāye nṛpate vajrabāhuḥ
analyzed: adha tvam indra viddhi asmān mahaḥ rāye nṛpate vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_10.061.22.2{30} rakṣā ca no maghonah pāhi sūrīnanehasaste harivoabhiṣṭau
analyzed: rakṣā ca naḥ maghonah pāhi sūrīn anehasaḥ te harivas abhiṣṭau

original: RV_10.061.23.1{30} adha yad rājānā gaviṣṭau sarat saraṇyuḥ kāravejaraṇyuḥ
analyzed: adha yat rājānā gaviṣṭau sarat saraṇyuḥ kāravejaraṇyuḥ

original: RV_10.061.23.2{30} vipraḥ preṣṭhaḥ sa hyeṣāṃ babhūva parā cavakṣaduta parṣadenān
analyzed: vipraḥ preṣṭhaḥ sa hi eṣām babhūva parā cavakṣat uta parṣat enān

original: RV_10.061.24.1{30} adhā nvasya jenyasya puṣṭau vṛthā rebhanta īmahe tadūnu
analyzed: adhā nu asya jenyasya puṣṭau vṛthā rebhantaḥ īmahe tad ūnu

original: RV_10.061.24.2{30} saraṇyurasya sūnuraśvo vipraścāsi śravasaścasātau
analyzed: saraṇyuḥ asya sūnuḥ aśvaḥ vipraḥ ca asi śravasaścasātau

original: RV_10.061.25.1{30} yuvoryadi sakhyāyāsme śardhāya stomaṃ jujuṣe namasvānviśvatra yasminnā giraḥ samīcīḥ pūrvīva gatūrdāśat sūnṛtāyai
analyzed: yuvoḥ yadi sakhyāya asme śardhāya stomam jujuṣe namasvān viśvatra yasmin ā giraḥ samīcīḥ pūrvīḥ iva gatūḥ dāśat sūnṛtāyai

original: RV_10.061.26.1{30} sa gṛṇāno adbhirdevavāniti subandhurnamasā sūktaiḥ
analyzed: sa gṛṇānaḥ adbhiḥ devavān iti su bandhuḥ namasā sūktaiḥ

original: RV_10.061.26.2{30} vardhadukthairvacobhirā hi nūnaṃ vyadhvaiti payasausriyāyāḥ
analyzed: vardhat ukthaiḥ vacobhiḥ ā hi nūnam vyadhvā eti payasā ausriyāyāḥ

original: RV_10.061.27.1{30} ta ū ṣu ṇo maho yajatrā bhūta devāsa ūtaye sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: te ū su naḥ yajatrāḥ bhūta devāsaḥ ūtaye sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10.061.27.2{30} ye vājānanayatā viyanto ye sthā nicetāro amūrāḥ
analyzed: ye vājān anayatāḥ viyantaḥ ye stha nicetāraḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_10.062.01.1{01} ye yajñena dakṣiṇayā samaktā indrasya sakhyamamṛtatvamānaśa
analyzed: ye yajñena dakṣiṇayā samaktāḥ indrasya sakhyam amṛta tvam ānaśa

original: RV_10.062.01.2{01} tebhyo bhadramaṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇītamānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ bhadram aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu prati gṛbhṇītam ānavam sumedhasaḥ

original: RV_10.062.02.1{01} ya udājan pitaro gomayaṃ vasv ṛtenābhindan parivatsarevalam
analyzed: ye udājan pitaraḥ go mayam vasu ṛtena abhindan parivatsarevalam

original: RV_10.062.02.2{01} dīrghāyutvamaṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇītamānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ
analyzed: dīrgha āyu tvam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu prati gṛbhṇītam ānavam sumedhasaḥ

original: RV_10.062.03.1{01} ya ṛtena sūryamārohayan divyaprathayan pṛthivīṃ mātaraṃvi
analyzed: ye ṛtena sūryam ārohayan divi aprathayan pṛthivīm mātaraṃvi

original: RV_10.062.03.2{01} suprajāstvamaṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃsumedhasaḥ
analyzed: suprajāstvam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavan sumedhasaḥ

original: RV_10.062.04.1{01} ayaṃ nābhā vadati valgu vo gṛhe devaputrā ṛṣayastacchṛṇotana
analyzed: ayam nābhā vadati valgu vaḥ gṛhe deva putrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ tat śṛṇotana

original: RV_10.062.04.2{01} subrahmaṇyamaṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇītamānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ
analyzed: subrahmaṇyam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu prati gṛbhṇītam ānavam sumedhasaḥ

original: RV_10.062.05.1{01} virūpāsa id ṛṣayasta id gambhīravepasaḥ
analyzed: virūpāsaḥ id ṛṣayaḥ te id gambhīra vepasaḥ

original: RV_10.062.05.2{01} te aṅgirasaḥsūnavaste agneḥ pari jajñire
analyzed: te aṅgirasaḥ sūnavaḥ te agneḥ pari jajñire

original: RV_10.062.06.1{02} ye agneḥ pari jajñire virūpāso divas pari
analyzed: ye agneḥ pari jajñire virūpāsaḥ divaḥ pari

original: RV_10.062.06.2{02} navagvo nudaśagvo aṅgirastamo sacā deveṣu maṃ)ate
analyzed: navagvaḥ nu daśagvaḥ aṅgirastamaḥ sacā deveṣu maṃate

original: RV_10.062.07.1{02} indreṇa yujā niḥ sṛjanta vāghato vrajaṃ gomantamaśvinam
analyzed: indreṇa yujā niḥ sṛjanta vāghataḥ vrajam gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_10.062.07.2{02} sahasraṃ me dadato aṣṭakarṇyaḥ śravo deveṣvakrata
analyzed: sahasram me dadataḥ aṣṭakarṇyaḥ śravaḥ deveṣu akrata

original: RV_10.062.08.1{02} pra nūnaṃ jāyatāmayaṃ manustokmeva rohatu
analyzed: pra nūnam jāyatām ayam manuḥ tokmā iva rohatu

original: RV_10.062.08.2{02} yaḥ sahasraṃśatāśvaṃ sadyo dānāya maṃhate
analyzed: yaḥ sahasram śata aśvam sadyas dānāya maṃhate

original: RV_10.062.09.1{02} na tamaśnoti kaścana diva iva sānvārabham
analyzed: na tam aśnoti kaścana divaḥ iva sa anvārabham

original: RV_10.062.09.2{02} sāvarṇyasya dakṣiṇā vi sindhuriva paprathe
analyzed: sāvarṇyasya dakṣiṇā vi sindhuḥ iva paprathe

original: RV_10.062.10.1{02} uta dāsā pariviṣe smaddiṣṭī goparīṇasā
analyzed: uta dāsā pariviṣe smaddiṣṭī go parīṇasā

original: RV_10.062.10.2{02} yadusturvaśca māmahe
analyzed: yaduḥ turvaḥ ca māmahe

original: RV_10.062.11.1{02} sahasradā grāmaṇīrmā riṣan manuḥ sūryeṇāsyayatamānaitu dakṣiṇā
analyzed: sahasra dāḥ grāmaṇīḥ mā riṣat manuḥ sūryeṇa asya yatamānā etu dakṣiṇā

original: RV_10.062.11.2{02} sāvarṇerdevāḥ pra tirantvāyuryasminnaśrāntā asanāma vājam
analyzed: sāvarṇeḥ devāḥ pra tirantu āyuḥ yasmin a śrāntāḥ asanāma vājam

original: RV_10.063.01.1{03} parāvato ye didhiṣanta āpyaṃ manuprītāso janimāvivasvataḥ
analyzed: parāvataḥ ye didhiṣante āpyam manu prītāsaḥ janimā vivasvataḥ

original: RV_10.063.01.2{03} yayāterye nahuṣyasya barhiṣi devā āsate teadhi bruvantu naḥ
analyzed: yayāteḥ ye nahuṣyasya barhiṣi devāḥ āsate te adhi bruvantu naḥ

original: RV_10.063.02.1{03} viśvā hi vo namasyāni vandyā nāmāni devā uta yajñiyānivaḥ
analyzed: viśvā hi vaḥ namasyāni vandyā nāmāni devāḥ uta

original: RV_10.063.02.2{03} ye stha jātā aditerabdhyas pari ye pṛthivyāstema iha śrutā havam
analyzed: ye stha jātāḥ aditeḥ abdhyaḥ pari ye pṛthivyāḥ te ime iha śruta havam

original: RV_10.063.03.1{03} yebhyo mātā madhumat pinvate payaḥ pīyūṣaṃ dyauraditiradribarhāḥ
analyzed: yebhyaḥ mātā madhumat pinvate payaḥ pīyūṣam dyauḥ aditiḥ adri barhāḥ

original: RV_10.063.03.2{03} ukthaśuṣmān vṛṣabharān svapnasastānādityānanu madā svastaye
analyzed: uktha śuṣmān vṛṣa bharān svapnasaḥ tān ādityān anu madā svastaye

original: RV_10.063.04.1{03} nṛcakṣaso animiṣanto arhaṇā bṛhad devāso amṛtatvamānaśuḥ
analyzed: nṛ cakṣasaḥ a nimiṣantaḥ arhaṇā bṛhat devāsaḥ amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_10.063.04.2{03} jyotīrathā ahimāyā anāgaso divo varṣmāṇaṃvasate svastaye
analyzed: jyotīrathāḥ ahi māyāḥ anāgasaḥ divaḥ varṣmāṇam vasate svastaye

original: RV_10.063.05.1{03} samrājo ye suvṛdho yajñamāyayuraparihvṛtā dadhire divikṣayam
analyzed: samrājaḥ ye suvṛdhaḥ yajñam āyayuḥ aparihvṛtāḥ dadhire divikṣayam

original: RV_10.063.05.2{03} tānā vivāsa namasā suvṛktibhirmaho ādityānaditiṃ svastaye
analyzed: tān ā vivāsa namasā suvṛktibhiḥ mahas ādityān aditim svastaye

original: RV_10.063.06.1{04} ko va stomaṃ rādhati yaṃ jujoṣatha viśve devāso manuṣoyati ṣṭhana
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ stomam rādhati yam jujoṣatha viśve devāsaḥ manuṣaḥ yati ṣṭhana

original: RV_10.063.06.2{04} ko vo 'dhvaraṃ tuvijātā araṃ karad yo naḥparṣadatyaṃhaḥ svastaye
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ dhvaram tuvi jātāḥ aram karat yaḥ naḥparṣat ati aṃhaḥ svastaye

original: RV_10.063.07.1{04} yebhyo hotrāṃ prathamāmāyeje manuḥ samiddhāgnirmanasāsapta hotṛbhiḥ
analyzed: yebhyaḥ hotrām prathamām āyeje manuḥ samiddha agniḥ manasā asapta hotṛbhiḥ

original: RV_10.063.07.2{04} ta ādityā abhayaṃ śarma yachata sugā naḥkarta supathā svastaye
analyzed: te ādityāḥ abhayam śarma yacchata sugā naḥ karta su pathā svastaye

original: RV_10.063.08.1{04} ya īśire bhuvanasya pracetaso viśvasya sthāturjagataścamantavaḥ
analyzed: ye īśire bhuvanasya pracetasaḥ viśvasya sthātuḥ jagataḥ camantavaḥ

original: RV_10.063.08.2{04} te naḥ kṛtādakṛtādenasas paryadyā devāsaḥpipṛtā svastaye
analyzed: te naḥ kṛtāt a kṛtāt enasaḥ pari adyā devāsaḥ pipṛta svastaye

original: RV_10.063.09.1{04} bhareṣvindraṃ suhavaṃ havāmahe 'ṃhomucaṃ sukṛtandaivyaṃ janam
analyzed: bhareṣu indram su havam havāmahe ṃhaḥ mucam su kṛtan daivyam janam

original: RV_10.063.09.2{04} agniṃ mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagandyāvāpṛthivī marutaḥ svastaye
analyzed: agnim mitram varuṇam sātaye bhagan dyāvāpṛthivī marutaḥ svastaye

original: RV_10.063.10.1{04} sutrāmāṇaṃ pṛthivīṃ dyāmanehasaṃ suśarmāṇamaditiṃsupraṇītim
analyzed: su trāmāṇam pṛthivīm dyām anehasam su śarmāṇam aditim su praṇītim

original: RV_10.063.10.2{04} daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrāmanāgasamasravantīmā ruhemā svastaye
analyzed: daivīm nāvam su aritrām anāgasam asravantī imāḥ ruhema svastaye

original: RV_10.063.11.1{05} viśve yajatrā adhi vocatotaye trāyadhvaṃ no durevāyāabhihrutaḥ
analyzed: viśve yajatrāḥ adhi vocata ūtaye trāyadhvam naḥ durevāya aabhihrutaḥ

original: RV_10.063.11.2{05} satyayā vo devahūtyā huvema śṛṇvato devāavase svastaye
analyzed: satyayā vaḥ deva hūtyā huvema śṛṇvataḥ devāavase svastaye

original: RV_10.063.12.1{05} apāmīvāmapa viśvāmanāhutimapārātiṃ durvidatrāmaghāyataḥ
analyzed: apa amīvām apa viśvām anāhutim apa arātim durvidatrām aghāyataḥ

original: RV_10.063.12.2{05} āre devā dveṣo asmad yuyotanoru ṇaḥ śarmayachatā svastaye
analyzed: āre devāḥ dveṣaḥ asmat yuyotana uru naḥ śarmayacchata svastaye

original: RV_10.063.13.1{05} ariṣṭaḥ sa marto viśva edhate pra prajābhirjāyatedharmaṇas pari
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ sa martaḥ viśvaḥ edhate pra prajābhiḥ jāyate dharmaṇaḥ pari

original: RV_10.063.13.2{05} yamādityāso nayathā sunītibhirativiśvāni duritā svastaye
analyzed: yam ādityāsaḥ nayathā su nītibhiḥ ati viśvāni duritā svastaye

original: RV_10.063.14.1{05} yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ śūrasātā maruto hitedhane
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ vatha vājasātau yam śūrasātau marutaḥ hitedhane

original: RV_10.063.14.2{05} prātaryāvāṇaṃ rathamindra sānasimariṣyantamāruhemā svastaye
analyzed: prātar yāvāṇam ratham indra sānasim ariṣyantam āruhema svastaye

original: RV_10.063.15.1{05} svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu svastyapsu vṛjane svarvati
analyzed: svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu svasti apsu vṛjane svarvati

original: RV_10.063.15.2{05} svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu svasti rāye maruto dadhātana
analyzed: svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu svasti rāye marutaḥ dadhātana

original: RV_10.063.16.1{05} svastirid dhi prapathe śreṣṭhā rekṇasvatyabhi yāvāmameti
analyzed: svastiḥ id hi prapathe śreṣṭhā rekṇasvatī abhi yāvāmama iti

original: RV_10.063.16.2{05} sā no amā so araṇe ni pātu svāveśā bhavatudevagopā
analyzed: sā naḥ amā saḥ araṇe ni pātu su āveśā bhavatu deva gopā

original: RV_10.063.17.1{05} evā plateḥ sūnuravīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā aditemanīṣī
analyzed: eva plateḥ sūnuḥ avīvṛdhat vaḥ viśve ādityāḥ adite manīṣī

original: RV_10.063.17.2{05} īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyogayena
analyzed: īśānāsaḥ naraḥ amartyena astāvi janaḥ divyogayena

original: RV_10.064.01.1{06} kathā devānāṃ katamasya yāmani sumantu nāma śṛṇvatāmmanāmahe
analyzed: kathā devānām katamasya yāmani sumantu nāma śṛṇvatām manāmahe

original: RV_10.064.01.2{06} ko mṛḷāti katamo no mayas karat katama ūtī abhyā vavartati
analyzed: kaḥ mṛḷāti katamaḥ naḥ mayaḥ karat katamaḥ ūtī abhyā vavartati

original: RV_10.064.02.1{06} kratūyanti kratavo hṛtsu dhītayo venanti venāḥ patayantyā diśaḥ
analyzed: kratūyanti kratavaḥ hṛtsu dhītayaḥ venanti venāḥ patayantyāḥ diśaḥ

original: RV_10.064.02.2{06} na marḍitā vidyate anya ebhyo deveṣu me adhikāmā ayaṃsata
analyzed: na marḍitā vidyate anyaḥ ebhyaḥ deveṣu me adhikāmāḥ ayaṃsata

original: RV_10.064.03.1{06} narā vā śaṃsaṃ pūṣaṇamagohyamagniṃ deveddhamabhyarcase girā
analyzed: narā vā śaṃsam pūṣaṇam agohyam agnim deva iddham abhyarcase girā

original: RV_10.064.03.2{06} sūryāmāsā candramasā yamaṃ divi tritaṃvātamuṣasamaktumaśvinā
analyzed: sūryāmāsā candramasā yamam divi tritam vātam uṣasam aktum aśvinā

original: RV_10.064.04.1{06} kathā kavistuvīravān kayā girā bṛhaspatirvāvṛdhatesuvṛktibhiḥ
analyzed: kathā kaviḥ tuvīravān kayā girā bṛhaspatiḥ vāvṛdhate suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_10.064.04.2{06} aja ekapāt suhavebhir{ṛ}kvabhirahiḥ śṛṇotubudhnyo havīmani
analyzed: ajaḥ ekapād su havebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ ahiḥ śṛṇotubudhnyaḥ havīmani

original: RV_10.064.05.1{06} dakṣasya vādite janmani vrate rājānā mitrāvaruṇāvivāsasi
analyzed: dakṣasya vā adite janmani vrate rājānā mitrāvaruṇā vivāsasi

original: RV_10.064.05.2{06} atūrtapanthāḥ pururatho aryamā saptahotāviṣurūpeṣu janmasu
analyzed: a tūrta panthāḥ puru rathaḥ aryamā sapta hotā aviṣurūpeṣu janmasu

original: RV_10.064.06.1{07} te no arvanto havanaśruto havaṃ viśve śṛṇvantu vājinomitadravaḥ
analyzed: te naḥ arvantaḥ havana śrutaḥ havam viśve śṛṇvantu vājinā umita dravaḥ

original: RV_10.064.06.2{07} sahasrasā medhasātāviva tmanā maho yedhanaṃ samitheṣu jabhrire
analyzed: sahasra sāḥ medha sātau iva tmanā mahaḥ yedhanam samitheṣu jabhrire

original: RV_10.064.07.1{07} pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujaṃ purandhiṃ stomaiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃsakhyāya pūṣaṇam
analyzed: pra vaḥ vāyum ratha yujam purandhim stomaiḥ kṛṇudhvam sa khyāya pūṣaṇam

original: RV_10.064.07.2{07} te hi devasya savituḥ savīmanikratuṃ sacante sacitaḥ sacetasaḥ
analyzed: te hi devasya savituḥ savīmanikratum sacante sacitaḥ sacetasaḥ

original: RV_10.064.08.1{07} triḥ sapta sasrā nadyo mahīrapo vanaspatīn parvatānagnimūtaye
analyzed: tris sapta sasrāḥ nadyaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ vanaspatīn parvatān agnim ūtaye

original: RV_10.064.08.2{07} kṛśānumastṝn tiṣyaṃ sadhastha ā rudraṃrudreṣu rudriyaṃ havāmahe
analyzed: kṛśānu mastṝn tiṣyam sadhasthe ā rudram rudreṣu rudriyam havāmahe

original: RV_10.064.09.1{07} sarasvatī sarayuḥ sindhurūrmibhirmaho mahīravasā yantuvakṣaṇīḥ
analyzed: sarasvatī sarayuḥ sindhuḥ ūrmibhiḥ mahaḥ mahī ravasā yantu vakṣaṇīḥ

original: RV_10.064.09.2{07} devīrāpo mātaraḥ sūdayitnvo ghṛtavat payomadhuman no arcata
analyzed: devīḥ āpaḥ mātaraḥ sūdayitnvaḥ ghṛtavat payaḥ madhumat naḥ arcata

original: RV_10.064.10.1{07} uta mātā bṛhaddivā śṛṇotu nastvaṣṭā devebhirjanibhiḥpitā vacaḥ
analyzed: uta mātā bṛhat divā śṛṇotu naḥ tvaṣṭā devebhiḥ janibhiḥ pitā vacaḥ

original: RV_10.064.10.2{07} ṛbhukṣā vājo rathaspatirbhago raṇvaḥśaṇsaḥ śaśamānasya pātu naḥ
analyzed: ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ rathaspatiḥ bhagaḥ raṇvaḥ śaṇsaḥ śaśamānasya pātu naḥ

original: RV_10.064.11.1{08} raṇvaḥ sandṛṣṭau pitumāniva kṣayo bhadrā rudrāṇāmmarutāmupastutiḥ
analyzed: raṇvaḥ san dṛṣṭau pitumān iva kṣayaḥ bhadrā rudrāṇām marutām upastutiḥ

original: RV_10.064.11.2{08} gobhiḥ ṣyāma yaśaso janeṣvā sadādevāsa iḷayā sacemahi
analyzed: gobhiḥ syāma yaśasaḥ janeṣvā sadā devāsaḥ iḷayā sacemahi

original: RV_10.064.12.1{08} yāṃ me dhiyaṃ maruta indra devā adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam
analyzed: yām me dhiyam marutaḥ indra devāḥ adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam

original: RV_10.064.12.2{08} tāṃ pīpayata payaseva dhenuṃ kuvid giro adhi rathevahātha
analyzed: tām pīpayata payasā iva dhenum kuvid giraḥ adhi

original: RV_10.064.13.1{08} kuvidaṅga prati yathā cidasya naḥ sajātyasya marutobubodhatha
analyzed: kuvid aṅga prati yathā cit asya naḥ sajātyasya marutaḥ bubodhatha

original: RV_10.064.13.2{08} nābhā yatra prathamaṃ saṃnaśāmahe tatrajāmitvamaditirdadhātu naḥ
analyzed: nābhā yatra prathamam saṃnaśāmahe tatra jāmi tvam aditiḥ dadhātu naḥ

original: RV_10.064.14.1{08} te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devāñ janmanāyajñiye itaḥ
analyzed: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devām janmanā ayajñiye itaḥ

original: RV_10.064.14.2{08} ubhe bibhṛta ubhayaṃ bharīmabhiḥ purūretāṃsi pitṛbhiśca siñcataḥ
analyzed: ubhe bibhṛtaḥ ubhayam bharīmabhiḥ purūretāṃsi pitṛbhiḥ ca siñcataḥ

original: RV_10.064.15.1{08} vi ṣā hotrā viśvamaśnoti vāryaṃ bṛhaspatiraramatiḥpanīyasī
analyzed: vi sā hotrā viśvam aśnoti vāryam bṛhaspatiḥ aramatiḥ panīyasī

original: RV_10.064.15.2{08} grāvā yatra madhuṣuducyate bṛhadavīvaśantamatibhirmanīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: grāvā yatra madhuṣut ucyate

original: RV_10.064.16.1{08} evā kavistuvīravān ṛtajñā draviṇasyurdraviṇasaścakānaḥ
analyzed: eva kaviḥ tuvīravān ṛta jñāḥ draviṇasyuḥ draviṇasaḥ cakānaḥ

original: RV_10.064.16.2{08} ukthebhiratra matibhiśca vipro 'pīpayad gayodivyāni janma
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ atra matibhiḥ ca vipraḥ pīpayat gayaḥ divyāni janma

original: RV_10.064.17.1{08} evā plateḥ sūnur...
analyzed: eva plateḥ sūnuḥ

original: RV_10.065.01.1{09} agnirindro varuṇo mitro aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatīsajoṣasaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_10.065.01.2{09} ādityā viṣṇurmarutaḥ svarbṛhat somo rudroaditirbrahmaṇas patiḥ
analyzed: ādityāḥ viṣṇuḥ marutaḥ svar bṛhat somaḥ rudraḥ aditiḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10.065.02.1{09} indrāgnī vṛtrahatyeṣu satpatī mitho hinvānā tanvāsamokasā
analyzed: indra agnī vṛtra hatyeṣu sat patī mithas hinvānā tanvā asamokasā

original: RV_10.065.02.2{09} antarikṣaṃ mahyā paprurojasā somo ghṛtaśrīrmahimānamīrayan
analyzed: antarikṣam mahyā papruḥ ojasā somaḥ ghṛtaśrīḥ mahimānam īrayan

original: RV_10.065.03.1{09} teṣāṃ hi mahnā mahatāmanarvaṇāṃ stomāniyarmyṛtajñā ṛtāvṛdhām
analyzed: teṣām hi mahnā mahatām anarvaṇām stoma aniyarmi ṛta jñāḥ ṛtāvṛdhām

original: RV_10.065.03.2{09} ye apsavamarṇavaṃ citrarādhasasteno rāsantāṃ mahaye sumitryāḥ
analyzed: ye apsavam arṇavam citra rādhasaḥ tena u rāsantām mahaye sumitryāḥ

original: RV_10.065.04.1{09} svarṇaramantarikṣāṇi rocanā dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīṃskambhurojasā
analyzed: svarṇaram antarikṣāṇi rocanā dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīṃskambhuḥ ojasā

original: RV_10.065.04.2{09} pṛkṣā iva mahayantaḥ surātayo devāstavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ
analyzed: pṛkṣāḥ iva mahayantaḥ su rātayaḥ devāḥ tavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ

original: RV_10.065.05.1{09} mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā naprayuchataḥ
analyzed: mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā naprayuchataḥ

original: RV_10.065.05.2{09} yayordhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhad yayorubherodasī nādhasī vṛtau
analyzed: yayoḥ dhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhat yayoḥ ubheḥ odasī nādhasī vṛtau

original: RV_10.065.06.1{10} yā gaurvartaniṃ paryeti niṣkṛtaṃ payo duhānā vratanīravārataḥ
analyzed: yā gauḥ vartanim paryeti niṣkṛtam payaḥ duhānā vrata nīra vārataḥ

original: RV_10.065.06.2{10} sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyodāśad dhaviṣā vivasvate
analyzed: sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyaḥ udāśat haviṣā vivasvate

original: RV_10.065.07.1{10} divakṣaso agnijihvā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtasya yoniṃ vimṛśanta āsate
analyzed: divakṣasaḥ agni jihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ṛtasya yonim vimṛśantaḥ āsate

original: RV_10.065.07.2{10} dyāṃ skabhitvyapa ā cakrurojasā yajñaṃ janitvītanvī ni māmṛjuḥ
analyzed: dyām skabhitvī apaḥ ā cakruḥ ojasā yajñam janitvī itanvī ni māmṛjuḥ

original: RV_10.065.08.1{10} parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥsamokasā
analyzed: parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥ samokasā

original: RV_10.065.08.2{10} dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payomahiṣāya pinvataḥ
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payaḥ mahiṣāya pinvataḥ

original: RV_10.065.09.1{10} parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇendravāyū varuṇo mitroaryamā
analyzed: parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇā indra vāyū varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10.065.09.2{10} devānādityānaditiṃ havāmahe ye pārthivāsodivyāso apsu ye
analyzed: devān ādityān aditim havāmahe ye pārthivāsaḥ divyāsaḥ apsu ye

original: RV_10.065.10.1{10} tvaṣṭāraṃ vāyum ṛbhavo ya ohate daivyā hotārā uṣasaṃsvastaye
analyzed: tvaṣṭāram vāyum ṛbhavaḥ yaḥ ohate daivyā hotārau uṣasam svastaye

original: RV_10.065.10.2{10} bṛhaspatiṃ vṛtrakhādaṃ sumedhasamindriyaṃsomaṃ dhanasā u īmahe
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛtra khādam sumedhasam indriyaṃsomam dhana sāḥ u īmahe

original: RV_10.065.11.1{11} brahma gāmaśvaṃ janayanta oṣadhīrvanaspatīn pṛthivīmparvatānapaḥ
analyzed: brahma gām aśvam janayantaḥ oṣadhīḥ vanaspatīn pṛthivīm parvatān apaḥ

original: RV_10.065.11.2{11} sūryaṃ divi rohayantaḥ sudānava āryāvratā visṛjanto adhi kṣami
analyzed: sūryam divi rohayantaḥ sudānavaḥ āryāvratāḥ visṛjantaḥ adhi kṣami

original: RV_10.065.12.1{11} bhujyumaṃhasaḥ pipṛtho niraśvinā śyāvaṃ putraṃvadhrimatyā ajinvatam
analyzed: bhujyum aṃhasaḥ pipṛthaḥ niḥ aśvinā śyāvam putraṃvadhrimatyāḥ ajinvatam

original: RV_10.065.12.2{11} kamadyuvaṃ vimadāyohathuryuvaṃviṣṇāpvaṃ viśvakāyāva sṛjathaḥ
analyzed: kamadyuvam vimadāya ūhathuḥ yuvam viṣṇāpvam viśvakāya ava sṛjathaḥ

original: RV_10.065.13.1{11} pāvīravī tanyaturekapādajo divo dhartā sindhurāpaḥsamudriyaḥ
analyzed: pāvīravī tanyatuḥ eka pāda jaḥ divaḥ dhartā sindhuḥ āpaḥsamudriyaḥ

original: RV_10.065.13.2{11} viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatīsaha dhībhiḥ purandhyā
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā

original: RV_10.065.14.1{11} viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manoryajatrāamṛtā ṛtajñāḥ
analyzed: viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manoḥ yajatrāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_10.065.14.2{11} rātiṣāco abhiṣācaḥ svarvidaḥ svargiro brahma sūktaṃ juṣerata
analyzed: rātiṣācaḥ abhiṣācaḥ svar vidaḥ svar giraḥ brahma sūktam juṣerata

original: RV_10.065.15.1{11} devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhipratasthuḥ
analyzed: devān vasiṣṭhaḥ amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanā abhipratasthuḥ

original: RV_10.065.15.2{11} te no rāsantāmurugāyamadya yūyaṃ pātasvastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: te naḥ rāsantām uru gāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_10.066.01.1{12} devān huve bṛhacchravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛto adhvarasyapracetasaḥ
analyzed: devān huve bṛhat śravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛtaḥ adhvarasya apracetasaḥ

original: RV_10.066.01.2{12} ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataraṃ viśvavedasaindrajyeṣṭhāso amṛtā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
analyzed: ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataram viśva vedasā aindra jyeṣṭhāsaḥ amṛtāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_10.066.02.1{12} indraprasūtā varuṇapraśiṣṭā ye sūryasya jyotiṣo bhāgamānaśuḥ
analyzed: indra prasūtāḥ varuṇa praśiṣṭāḥ ye sūryasya jyotiṣaḥ bhāgam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_10.066.02.2{12} marudgaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñaṃjanayanta sūrayaḥ
analyzed: marut gaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñaṃjanayanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_10.066.03.1{12} indro vasubhiḥ pari pātu no gayamādityairno aditḥ śarmayachtu
analyzed: indraḥ vasubhiḥ pari pātu naḥ gayam ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yacchtu

original: RV_10.066.03.2{12} rudro rudrebhirdevo mṛḷayāti nastvaṣṭā nognābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu
analyzed: rudraḥ rudrebhiḥ devaḥ mṛḍayāti naḥ tvaṣṭā na ugnābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu

original: RV_10.066.04.1{12} aditirdyāvāpṛthivī ṛtaṃ mahadindrāviṣṇū marutaḥsvarbṛhat
analyzed: aditiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtam mahat indra viṣṇū marutaḥ svar bṛhat

original: RV_10.066.04.2{12} devānādityānavase havāmahe vasūn rudrāṃsavitāraṃ sudaṃsasam
analyzed: devān ādityān avase havāmahe vasūn rudrān savitāram su daṃsasam

original: RV_10.066.05.1{12} sarasvān dhībhirvaruṇo dhṛtavratḥ pūṣā viṣṇurmahimāvāyuraśvinā
analyzed: sarasvān dhībhiḥ varuṇaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ pūṣā viṣṇuḥ mahimā vāyuḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10.066.05.2{12} brahmakṛto amṛtā viśvavedasaḥ śarma noyaṃsan trivarūthamaṃhasaḥ
analyzed: brahma kṛtaḥ amṛtāḥ viśva vedasaḥ śarma naḥ yaṃsan tri varūtham aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10.066.06.1{13} vṛṣā yajño vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyā vṛṣaṇo devāvṛṣaṇo haviṣkṛtaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā yajñaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ devāvṛṣaṇaḥ haviṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10.066.06.2{13} vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarīvṛṣā parjanyo vṛṣaṇo vṛṣastubhaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarī vṛṣā parjanyaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vṛṣa stubhaḥ

original: RV_10.066.07.1{13} agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye purupraśastā vṛṣaṇā upabruve
analyzed: agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye puru praśastā vṛṣaṇau upabruve

original: RV_10.066.07.2{13} yāvījire vṛṣaṇo devayajyayā tā naḥ śarmatrivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsataḥ
analyzed: yā avījire vṛṣaṇaḥ deva yajyayā tā naḥ śarma atri varūtham vi yaṃsataḥ

original: RV_10.066.08.1{13} dhṛtavratāḥ kṣatriyā yajñaniṣkṛto bṛhaddivā adhvarāṇāmabhiśriyaḥ
analyzed: dhṛta vratāḥ kṣatriyāḥ yajña niṣkṛtaḥ bṛhat divāḥ adhvarāṇām abhiśriyaḥ

original: RV_10.066.08.2{13} agnihotāra ṛtasāpo adruho 'po asṛjannanuvṛtratūrye
analyzed: agni hotāraḥ ṛtasāpaḥ adruhaḥ asṛjan anu vṛtratūrye

original: RV_10.066.09.1{13} dyāvāpṛthivī janayannabhi vratāpa oṣadhīrvanināniyajñiyā
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī janayan abhi vratā apaḥ oṣadhīḥ vaninā aniyajñiyā

original: RV_10.066.09.2{13} antarikṣaṃ svarā paprurūtaye vaśaṃ devāsastanvī ni māmṛjuḥ
analyzed: antarikṣam svarā papruḥ ūtaye vaśam devāsaḥ tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ

original: RV_10.066.10.1{13} dhartāro diva ṛbhavaḥ suhastā vātāparjanyā mahiṣasyatanyatoḥ
analyzed: dhartāraḥ divaḥ ṛbhavaḥ su hastāḥ vātāparjanyā mahiṣasyatanyatoḥ

original: RV_10.066.10.2{13} āpa oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu no giro bhago rātirvājino yantu me havam
analyzed: āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu naḥ giraḥ bhagaḥ rātiḥ vājinaḥ yantu me havam

original: RV_10.066.11.1{14} samudraḥ sindhū rajo antarikṣamaja ekapāt tanayitnurarṇavaḥ
analyzed: samudraḥ sindhuḥ rajaḥ antarikṣam ajaḥ ekapād tanayitnuḥ arṇavaḥ

original: RV_10.066.11.2{14} ahirbudhnyaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me viśve devāsauta sūrayo mama
analyzed: ahirbudhnyaḥ śṛṇavat vacāṃsi me viśve sūrayaḥ mama

original: RV_10.066.12.1{14} syāma vo manavo devavītaye prāñcaṃ no yajñaṃ pra ṇayatasādhuyā
analyzed: syāma vaḥ manavaḥ deva vītaye prāñcam naḥ yajñam pra nayata sādhuyā

original: RV_10.066.12.2{14} ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sudānava imā brahmaśasyamānāni jinvata
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ imā brahma śasyamānāni jinvata

original: RV_10.066.13.1{14} daivyā hotārā prathamā purohita ṛtasya panthāmanvemisādhuyā
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā purohitaḥ ṛtasya panthām anvemi sādhuyā

original: RV_10.066.13.2{14} kṣetrasya patiṃ prativeśamīmahe viśvān devānamṛtānaprayuchataḥ
analyzed: kṣetrasya patim prativeśam īmahe viśvān devān amṛtān aprayuchataḥ

original: RV_10.066.14.1{14} vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛvad vācamakrata devānīḷānā ṛṣivatsvastaye
analyzed: vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛ vat vācam akrata devān īḍānāḥ ṛṣi vat svastaye

original: RV_10.066.14.2{14} prītā iva jñātayaḥ kāmametyāsme devāso 'vadhūnutā vasu
analyzed: prītāḥ iva jñātayaḥ kāmam etya asme devāsaḥ vadhūnuta vasu

original: RV_10.066.15.1{14} devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ...
analyzed: devān vasiṣṭhaḥ amṛtān vavande

original: RV_10.067.01.1{15} imāṃ dhiyaṃ saptaśīrṣṇīṃ pitā na ṛtaprajātāṃ bṛhatīmavindat
analyzed: imām dhiyam sapta śīrṣṇīm pitā naḥ ṛta prajātām bṛhatīm avindat

original: RV_10.067.01.2{15} turīyaṃ svijjanayad viśvajanyo 'yāsya ukthamindrāya śaṃsan
analyzed: turīyam svid janayat viśvajanyaḥ yā asyaḥ uktham indrāya śaṃsan

original: RV_10.067.02.1{15} ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛju dīdhyānā divas putrāso asurasyavīrāḥ
analyzed: ṛtam śaṃsantaḥ ṛju dīdhyānāḥ divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ

original: RV_10.067.02.2{15} vipraṃ padamaṅgiraso dadhānā yajñasya dhāmaprathamaṃ mananta
analyzed: vipram padam aṅgirasaḥ dadhānāḥ yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta

original: RV_10.067.03.1{15} haṃsairiva sakhibhirvāvadadbhiraśmanmayāni nahanāvyasyan
analyzed: haṃsaiḥ iva sakhibhiḥ vāvadadbhiḥ aśmanmayāni nahanau asyan

original: RV_10.067.03.2{15} bṛhaspatirabhikanikradad gā uta prāstauduccavidvānagāyat
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ uta prāstaut ucca vidvān agāyat

original: RV_10.067.04.1{15} avo dvābhyāṃ para ekayā gā guhā tiṣṭhantīranṛtasyasetau
analyzed: avas dvābhyām paras ekayā gāḥ guhā tiṣṭhantīḥ anṛtasya setau

original: RV_10.067.04.2{15} bṛhaspatistamasi jyotirichannudusrā ākarvihi tisra āvaḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ tamasi jyotiḥ ichan udusrāḥ ākarvihi tisraḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_10.067.05.1{15} vibhidyā puraṃ śayāthemapācīṃ nistrīṇi sākamudadherakṛntat
analyzed: vibhidya puram śayātha hemapācīm nistrīṇi sākam udadheḥ akṛntat

original: RV_10.067.05.2{15} bṛhaspatiruṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gāmarkaṃviveda stanayanniva dyauḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ uṣasam sūryam gām arkam viveda stanayan iva dyauḥ

original: RV_10.067.06.1{15} indro valaṃ rakṣitāraṃ dughānāṃ kareṇeva vi cakartāraveṇa
analyzed: indraḥ valam rakṣitāram dughānām kareṇa iva vi cakarta araveṇa

original: RV_10.067.06.2{15} svedāñjibhirāśiramichamāno 'rodayat paṇimāgā amuṣṇāt
analyzed: sveda añjibhiḥ āśiram icchamānaḥ rodayat paṇim āgāḥ amuṣṇāt

original: RV_10.067.07.1{16} sa īṃ satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhirgodhāyasaṃ vidhanasairadardaḥ
analyzed: saḥ īm satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhiḥ godhāyasam vidhanasaiḥ adardar

original: RV_10.067.07.2{16} brahmaṇas patirvṛṣabhirvarāhairgharmasvedebhirdraviṇaṃ vyānaṭ
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ vṛṣabhiḥ varāhaiḥ gharma svedebhiḥ draviṇam vyānaṭ

original: RV_10.067.08.1{16} te satyena manasā gopatiṃ gā iyānāsa iṣaṇayantadhībhiḥ
analyzed: te satyena manasā go patim gāḥ iyānāsaḥ iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ

original: RV_10.067.08.2{16} bṛhaspatirmithoavadyapebhirudusriyā asṛjatasvayugbhiḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ mithoavadyapebhiḥ udusriyāḥ asṛjata svayugbhiḥ

original: RV_10.067.09.1{16} taṃ vardhayanto matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃ)
analyzed: tam vardhayantaḥ matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃ

original: amiva nānadataṃsadhasthe
analyzed: am iva nānadatam sadhasthe

original: RV_10.067.09.2{16} bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ śūrasātau bhare-bhare anumadema jiṣṇum
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam śūrasātau bharebhare anumadema jiṣṇum

original: RV_10.067.10.1{16} yadā vājamasanad viśvarūpamā dyāmarukṣaduttarāṇisadma
analyzed: yadā vājam asanat viśva rūpam ā dyām arukṣat uttarāṇi sadma

original: RV_10.067.10.2{16} bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhayanto nānā santobibhrato jyotirāsā
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam vardhayantaḥ nānā santaḥ bibhrataḥ jyotiḥ āsā

original: RV_10.067.11.1{16} satyāmāśiṣaṃ kṛṇutā vayodhai kīriṃ cid dhyavathasvebhirevaiḥ
analyzed: satyām āśiṣam kṛṇutā vayodhai kīrim cit hi avathasva ebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_10.067.11.2{16} paścā mṛdho apa bhavantu viśvāstadrodasī śṛṇutaṃ viśvaminve
analyzed: paścā mṛdhaḥ apa bhavantu viśvāḥ tat rodasī śṛṇutam viśvaminve

original: RV_10.067.12.1{16} indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vi mūrdhānamabhinadarbudasya
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinat arbudasya

original: RV_10.067.12.2{16} ahannahimariṇāt sapta sindhūn devairdyāvāpṛthivīprāvataṃ naḥ
analyzed: ahan ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī prāvatam naḥ

original: RV_10.068.01.1{17} udapruto na vayo rakṣamāṇā vāvadato abhriyasyeva ghoṣāḥ
analyzed: uda prutaḥ na vayaḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ vāvadataḥ abhriyasya iva ghoṣāḥ

original: RV_10.068.01.2{17} giribhrajo normayo madanto bṛhaspatimabhyarkā anāvan
analyzed: giri bhrajaḥ na ūrmayaḥ madantaḥ bṛhaspatim abhi arkāḥ anāvan

original: RV_10.068.02.1{17} saṃ gobhirāṅgiraso nakṣamāṇo bhaga ivedaryamaṇaṃnināya
analyzed: sam gobhiḥ āṅgirasaḥ nakṣamāṇaḥ bhagaḥ iva idam aryamaṇaṃnināya

original: RV_10.068.02.2{17} jane mitro na dampatī anakti bṛhaspatevājayāśūnrivājau
analyzed: jane mitraḥ na dampatī anakti bṛhaspatiḥ iva ajayā āśūn iva ājau

original: RV_10.068.03.1{17} sādhvaryā atithinīriṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇāanavadyarūpāḥ
analyzed: sādhvaryāḥ atithinīḥ iṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇāḥ anavadya rūpāḥ

original: RV_10.068.03.2{17} bṛhaspatiḥ parvate bhyo vitūryā nirgāūpe yavamiva sthivibhyaḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ parvate vitūrya nirgāūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ

original: RV_10.068.04.1{17} āpruṣāyan madhuna ṛtasya yonimavakṣipannarka ulkāmivadyoḥ
analyzed: āpruṣāyan madhunaḥ ṛtasya yonim avakṣipan arkaḥ ulkām iva yos

original: RV_10.068.04.2{17} bṛhaspatiruddharannaśmano gā bhūmyā udneva vitvacaṃ bibheda
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ uddharan aśmanaḥ gāḥ bhūmyāḥ udnā iva vitvacam bibheda

original: RV_10.068.05.1{17} apa jyotiṣā tamo antarikṣādudnaḥ śīpālamiva vātaājat
analyzed: apa jyotiṣā tamaḥ antarikṣāt udnaḥ śīpālam iva vāta ājat

original: RV_10.068.05.2{17} bṛhaspatiranumṛśyā valasyābhramiva vāta ā cakraā gāḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ anumṛśya valasya abhram iva vātaḥ ā gāḥ

original: RV_10.068.06.1{17} yadā valasya pīyato jasuṃ bhed bṛhaspatiragnitapobhirarkaiḥ
analyzed: yadā valasya pīyataḥ jasum bhet bṛhaspatiḥ agni tapobhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_10.068.06.2{17} dadbhirna jihvā pariviṣṭamādadāvirnidhīnrakṛṇodusriyāṇām
analyzed: dadbhiḥ na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādada āvis nidhīn rakṛṇot usriyāṇām

original: RV_10.068.07.1{18} bṛhaspatiramata hi tyadāsāṃ nāma svarīṇāṃ sadaneguhā yat
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ amata hi tyadāsām nāma svarīṇām sadaneguhā yat

original: RV_10.068.07.2{18} āṇḍeva bhittvā śakunasya garbhamudusriyāḥparvatasya tmanājat
analyzed: āṇḍā iva bhittvā śakunasya garbham udusriyāḥ parvatasya tmanā ajat

original: RV_10.068.08.1{18} aśnāpinaddhaṃ madhu paryapaśyan matsyaṃ na dīna udanikṣiyantam
analyzed: aśnā apinaddham madhu paryapaśyat matsyam na dīnaḥ udanikṣiyantam

original: RV_10.068.08.2{18} niṣ ṭajjabhāra camasaṃ na vṛkṣādbṛhaspatirviraveṇā vikṛtya
analyzed: niḥ tat jabhāra camasam na vṛkṣāt bṛhaspatiḥ viraveṇa vikṛtya

original: RV_10.068.09.1{18} soṣāmavindat sa svaḥ so agniṃ so arkeṇa vi babādhetamāṃsi
analyzed: sa uṣām avindat sa svar saḥ agnim saḥ arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi

original: RV_10.068.09.2{18} bṛhaspatirgovapuṣo valasya nirmajjānaṃ naparvaṇo jabhāra
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ go vapuṣaḥ valasya nirmajjānam na parvaṇaḥ jabhāra

original: RV_10.068.10.1{18} himeva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinākṛpayad valo gāḥ
analyzed: himā iva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinā akṛpayat valaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_10.068.10.2{18} anānukṛtyamapunaścakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mithauccarātaḥ
analyzed: anānukṛtyam apunar cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā

original: RV_10.068.11.1{18} abhi śyāvaṃ na kṛśanebhiraśvaṃ nakṣatrebhiḥ pitarodyāmapiṃśan
analyzed: abhi śyāvam na kṛśanebhiḥ aśvam nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaraḥ udyām apiṃśan

original: RV_10.068.11.2{18} rātryāṃ tamo adadhurjyotirahanbṛhaspatirbhinadadriṃ vidad gāḥ
analyzed: rātryām tamaḥ adadhuḥ jyotiḥ ahan bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ

original: RV_10.068.12.1{18} idamakarma namo abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīranvānonavīti
analyzed: idam akarma namaḥ abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīḥ anvānonavīti

original: RV_10.068.12.2{18} bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ so aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sanṛbhirno vayo dhāt
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ saḥ aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhiḥ naḥ vayaḥ dhāt

original: RV_10.069.01.1{19} bhadrā agnervadhryaśvasya sandṛśo vāmī praṇītiḥsuraṇā upetayaḥ
analyzed: bhadrāḥ agneḥ vadhryaśvasya sandṛśaḥ vāmī praṇītiḥ suraṇāḥ upetayaḥ

original: RV_10.069.01.2{19} yadīṃ sumitrā viśo agra indhateghṛtenāhuto jarate davidyutat
analyzed: yadi īm sumitrāḥ viśaḥ agre indhate ghṛtena āhutaḥ jarate davidyutat

original: RV_10.069.02.1{19} ghṛtamagnervadhryaśvasya vardhanaṃ ghṛtamannaṃ ghṛtaṃ vasya medanam
analyzed: ghṛtam agneḥ vadhryaśvasya vardhanam ghṛtam annam ghṛtam vasyaḥ medanam

original: RV_10.069.02.2{19} ghṛtenāhuta urviyā vi paprathe sūrya ivarocate sarpirāsutiḥ
analyzed: ghṛtena āhutaḥ urviyā vi paprathe sūryaḥ iva rocate sarpiḥ āsutiḥ

original: RV_10.069.03.1{19} yat te manuryadanīkaṃ sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tadidaṃnavīyaḥ
analyzed: yat te manuḥ yat anīkam sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tat idam navīyaḥ

original: RV_10.069.03.2{19} sa revacchoca sa giro juṣasva sa vājaṃ darṣisa iha śravo dhāḥ
analyzed: sa revat śoca sa giraḥ juṣasva sa vājam darṣi saḥ iha śravaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_10.069.04.1{19} yaṃ tvā pūrvamīḷito vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne sa idaṃjuṣasva
analyzed: yam tvā pūrvam īḍitaḥ vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne saḥ idam juṣasva

original: RV_10.069.04.2{19} sa na stipā uta bhavā tanūpā dātraṃ rakṣasvayadidaṃ te asme
analyzed: sa na stipāḥ uta bhavā tanū pāḥ dātram rakṣasva ayat idam te asme

original: RV_10.069.05.1{19} bhavā dyumnī vādhryaśvota gopā mā tvā tārīdabhimātirjanānām
analyzed: bhava dyumnī vādhryaśva uta gopāḥ mā tvā tārīt abhimātiḥ janānām

original: RV_10.069.05.2{19} śūra iva dhṛṣṇuścyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nuvocaṃ vādhryaśvasya nāma
analyzed: śūraḥ iva dhṛṣṇuḥ cyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nuvocam vādhryaśvasya nāma

original: RV_10.069.06.1{19} samajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇyāryā jigetha
analyzed: samajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇi āryā jigetha

original: RV_10.069.06.2{19} śūra iva dhṛṣṇuścyavano janānāṃ tvamagne pṛtanāyūnrabhi ṣyāḥ
analyzed: śūraḥ iva dhṛṣṇuḥ cyavanaḥ janānām tvam agne pṛtanāyūn abhi syāḥ

original: RV_10.069.07.1{20} dīrghatanturbṛhadukṣāyamagniḥ sahasrastarīḥ śatanīthaṛbhvā
analyzed: dīrgha tantuḥ bṛhat ukṣā ayam agniḥ sahasra starīḥ śata nītha ṛbhvā

original: RV_10.069.07.2{20} dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhirmṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayodevayatsu
analyzed: dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhiḥ mṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayaḥ udevayatsu

original: RV_10.069.08.1{20} tve dhenuḥ sudughā jātavedo 'saścateva samanā sabardhuk
analyzed: tve dhenuḥ su dughā jātavedaḥ saścatā iva samanā sabarduh

original: RV_10.069.08.2{20} tvaṃ nṛbhirdakṣiṇāvadbhiragne sumitrebhiridhyasedevayadbhiḥ
analyzed: tvam nṛbhiḥ dakṣiṇāvadbhiḥ agne sumitrebhiḥ idhyase devayadbhiḥ

original: RV_10.069.09.1{20} devāścit te amṛtā jātavedo mahimānaṃ vādhryaśva pra vocan
analyzed: devāḥ cit te amṛtāḥ jātavedaḥ mahimānam vādhryaśva pra vocan

original: RV_10.069.09.2{20} yat sampṛchaṃ mānuṣīrviśa āyan tvaṃ nṛbhirajayastvāvṛdhebhiḥ
analyzed: yat sampṛccham mānuṣīḥ viśaḥ āyan tvam nṛbhiḥ ajayaḥ tvāvṛdhebhiḥ

original: RV_10.069.10.1{20} piteva putramabibharupasthe tvāmagne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyanjuṣāṇo asya samidhaṃ yaviṣṭhota pūrvānavanorvrādhataścit
analyzed: pitā iva putram abibhar upasthe tvām agne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyan juṣāṇaḥ asya samidham yaviṣṭha uta pūrvān avanoḥ vrādhataḥ cit

original: RV_10.069.11.1{20} śaśvadagnirvadhryaśvasya śātrūn nṛbhirjigāyasutasomavadbhiḥ
analyzed: śaśvat agniḥ vadhryaśvasya śātrūn nṛbhiḥ jigāya suta somavadbhiḥ

original: RV_10.069.11.2{20} samanaṃ cidadahaścitrabhāno 'vavrādhantamabhinad vṛdhaścit
analyzed: samanam cit adahaḥ citrabhāno vavrādhantam abhinat vṛdhaḥ cit

original: RV_10.069.12.1{20} ayamagnirvadhryaśvasya vṛtrahā sanakāt preddhonamasopavākyaḥ
analyzed: ayam agniḥ vadhryaśvasya vṛtrahā sanakāt preddhaḥ namasā upavākyaḥ

original: RV_10.069.12.2{20} sa no ajāmīnruta vā vijāmīnabhitiṣṭha śardhato vādhryaśva
analyzed: sa naḥ ajāmīn ruta vā vijāmīn abhitiṣṭha śardhataḥ vādhryaśva

original: RV_10.070.01.1{21} imāṃ me agne samidhaṃ juṣasveḷas pade prati haryāghṛtācīm
analyzed: imām me agne samidham juṣasva iḍaḥ pade prati harya a ghṛtācīm

original: RV_10.070.01.2{21} varṣman pṛthivyāḥ sudinatve ahnāmūrdhvobhava sukrato devayajyā
analyzed: varṣman pṛthivyāḥ su dina tve ahnām ūrdhvaḥ bhava su krato deva yajyā

original: RV_10.070.02.1{21} ā devānāmagrayāveha yātu narāśaṃso viśvarūpebhiraśvaiḥ
analyzed: ā devānām agra yāvā iha yātu narāśaṃsaḥ viśva rūpebhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_10.070.02.2{21} ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedho devebhyo devatamaḥsuṣūdat
analyzed: ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedhaḥ devebhyaḥ devatamaḥ suṣūdat

original: RV_10.070.03.1{21} śaśvattamamīḷate dūtyāya haviṣmanto manuṣyāso agnim
analyzed: śaśvattamam īḍate dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ manuṣyāsaḥ agnim

original: RV_10.070.03.2{21} vahiṣṭhairaśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathenā devān vakṣi niṣadeha hotā
analyzed: vahiṣṭhaiḥ aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena devān vakṣi niṣadā iha hotā

original: RV_10.070.04.1{21} vi prathatāṃ devajuṣṭaṃ tiraścā dīrghaṃ drāghmāsurabhi bhūtvasme
analyzed: vi prathatām deva juṣṭam tiraścā dīrgham bhūtvā asme

original: RV_10.070.04.2{21} aheḷatā manasā deva barhirindrajyeṣṭhānuśato yakṣi devān
analyzed: a heḍatā manasā deva barhiḥ indra jyeṣṭha anuśataḥ yakṣi devān

original: RV_10.070.05.1{21} divo vā sānu spṛśatā varīyaḥ pṛthivyā vā mātrayā viśrayadhvam
analyzed: divaḥ vā sānu spṛśata varīyaḥ pṛthivyāḥ vā mātrayā viśrayadhvam

original: RV_10.070.05.2{21} uśatīrdvāro mahinā mahadbhirdevaṃ rathaṃrathayurdhārayadhvam
analyzed: uśatīḥ dvāraḥ mahinā mahadbhiḥ devam ratham rathayuḥ dhārayadhvam

original: RV_10.070.06.1{22} devī divo duhitarā suśilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ niyonau
analyzed: devī divaḥ duhitarā su śilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatām niyonau

original: RV_10.070.06.2{22} ā vāṃ devāsa uśatī uśanta urau sīdantu subhageupasthe
analyzed: ā vām devāsaḥ uśatī uśantaḥ urau sīdantu subhageupasthe

original: RV_10.070.07.1{22} ūrdhvo grāvā bṛhadagniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmānyaditerupasthe
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ grāvā bṛhat agniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmāni aditeḥ upasthe

original: RV_10.070.07.2{22} purohitāv ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarādraviṇamā yajethām
analyzed: purohitau ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarā a draviṇamā yajethām

original: RV_10.070.08.1{22} tisro devīrbarhiridaṃ varīya ā sīdata cakṛmā vaḥsyonam
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ idam varīyaḥ ā sīdata cakṛma vaḥ syonam

original: RV_10.070.08.2{22} manuṣvad yajñaṃ sudhitā havīṃṣīḷā devīghṛtapadī juṣanta
analyzed: manuṣvat yajñam sudhitā havīṃṣi iḷā devī ghṛtapadī juṣanta

original: RV_10.070.09.1{22} deva tvaṣṭaryad dha cārutvamānaḍ yadaṅgirasāmabhavaḥ sacābhūḥ
analyzed: deva tvaṣṭar yat ha cāru tvam ānaṭ yat aṅgirasām abhavaḥ sacābhūḥ

original: RV_10.070.09.2{22} sa devānāṃ pātha upa pra vidvānuśan yakṣi draviṇodaḥ suratnaḥ
analyzed: sa devānām pāthaḥ upa pra vidvān uśan yakṣi draviṇaḥ daḥ su ratnaḥ

original: RV_10.070.10.1{22} vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā devānāṃ pātha upa vakṣividvān
analyzed: vanaspate raśanayā niyūya devānām pāthaḥ upa vakṣi vidvān

original: RV_10.070.10.2{22} svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavad dhavīṃṣyavatāndyāvāpṛthivī havaṃ me
analyzed: svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavat havīṃṣi avatān dyāvāpṛthivī havam me

original: RV_10.070.11.1{22} āgne vaha varuṇamiṣṭaye na indraṃ divo marutoantarikṣāt
analyzed: ā agne vaha varuṇam iṣṭaye naḥ indram divaḥ marutaḥ antarikṣāt

original: RV_10.070.11.2{22} sīdantu barhirviśva ā yajatrāḥ svāhādevā amṛtā mādayantām
analyzed: sīdantu barhiḥ viśve ā yajatrāḥ svāhā devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayantām

original: RV_10.071.01.1{23} bṛhaspate prathamaṃ vāco agraṃ yat prairata nāmadheyandadhānāḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspate prathamam vācaḥ agram yat prairata nāmadheyan dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10.071.01.2{23} yadeṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yadaripramāsītpreṇā tadeṣāṃ nihitaṃ guhāviḥ
analyzed: yat eṣām śreṣṭham yat aripram āsīt preṇā tat eṣām nihitam guhā āvis

original: RV_10.071.02.1{23} saktumiva-tita-unā punanto yatra dhīrā manasā vācamakrata
analyzed: saktum iva titaunā punantaḥ yatra dhīrāḥ manasā vācam akrata

original: RV_10.071.02.2{23} atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadraiṣāṃlakṣmīrnihitādhi vāci
analyzed: atra sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadrā eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci

original: RV_10.071.03.1{23} yajñena vācaḥ padavīyamāyan tāmanvavindannṛṣiṣupraviṣṭām
analyzed: yajñena vācaḥ padavīyam āyan tām anvavindan ṛṣi ṣu praviṣṭām

original: RV_10.071.03.2{23} tāmābhṛtyā vyadadhuḥ purutrā tāṃ saptarebhā abhi saṃ navante
analyzed: tām ābhṛtyāḥ vyadadhuḥ purutrā tām sapta rebhāḥ abhi sam navante

original: RV_10.071.04.1{23} uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācamuta tvaḥ śṛṇvan naśṛṇotyenām
analyzed: uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācam uta tvaḥ śṛṇvan na śṛṇoti enām

original: RV_10.071.04.2{23} uto tvasmai tanvaṃ vi sasre jāyeva patyauśatī suvāsāḥ
analyzed: uta u tvasmai tanvam vi sasre jāyā iva patyau śatī su vāsāḥ

original: RV_10.071.05.1{23} uta tvaṃ sakhye sthirapītamāhurnainaṃ hinvantyapivājineṣu
analyzed: uta tvam sakhye sthira pītam āhuḥ na enam hinvanti api vājineṣu

original: RV_10.071.05.2{23} adhenvā carati māyayaiṣa vācaṃ śuśruvānaphalāmapuṣpām
analyzed: a dhenvā carati māyayā eṣa vācam śuśruvān aphalām apuṣpām

original: RV_10.071.06.1{24} yastityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācyapi bhāgoasti
analyzed: yaḥ tityāja sacividam sakhāyam na tasya vāci api

original: RV_10.071.06.2{24} yadīṃ śṛṇotyalakaṃ śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasyapanthām
analyzed: yadi īm śṛṇoti alakam śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasya panthām

original: RV_10.071.07.1{24} akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyo manojaveṣvasamābabhūvuḥ
analyzed: akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ manojaveṣu a samābabhūvuḥ

original: RV_10.071.07.2{24} ādaghnāsa upakakṣāsa u tve hradā iva snātvā utve dadṛśre
analyzed: ādaghnāsaḥ upakakṣāsaḥ u tve hradāḥ iva snātvā utve dadṛśre

original: RV_10.071.08.1{24} hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manaso javeṣu yad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajantesakhāyaḥ
analyzed: hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manasaḥ javeṣu yat brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajante sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10.071.08.2{24} atrāha tvaṃ vi jahurvedyābhirohabrahmāṇo vicarantyu tve
analyzed: atra aha tvam vi jahuḥ vedyā abhiroha brahmāṇaḥ vicaranti u tve

original: RV_10.071.09.1{24} ime ye nārvāṃ na paraścaranti na brāhmaṇāso nasutekarāsaḥ
analyzed: ime ye na arvām na paras caranti na brāhmaṇāsaḥ na sutekarāsaḥ

original: RV_10.071.09.2{24} ta ete vācamabhipadya pāpayā sirīstantraṃ tanvate aprajajñayaḥ
analyzed: te ete vācam abhipadya pāpayā sirīḥ tantram tanvate a prajajñayaḥ

original: RV_10.071.10.1{24} sarve nandanti yaśasāgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: sarve nandanti yaśasā āgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10.071.10.2{24} kilbiṣaspṛt pituṣaṇirhyeṣāmaraṃ hito bhavativājināya
analyzed: kilbiṣa spṛt pituṣaṇiḥ hi eṣā amaram hitaḥ bhavati vājināya

original: RV_10.071.11.1{24} ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣamāste pupuṣvān gāyatraṃ tvo gāyatiśakvarīṣu
analyzed: ṛcām tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatram tvaḥ gāyati śakvarīṣu

original: RV_10.071.11.2{24} brahmā tvo vadati jātavidyāṃ yajñasyamātrāṃ vi mimīta u tvaḥ
analyzed: brahmā tvaḥ vadati jāta vidyām yajñasyamātrām vi mimīte u tvaḥ

original: RV_10.072.01.1{01} devānāṃ nu vayaṃ jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā
analyzed: devānām nu vayam jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā

original: RV_10.072.01.2{01} uktheṣuśasyamāneṣu yaḥ paśyāduttare yuge
analyzed: uktheṣu śasyamāneṣu yaḥ paśyāt uttare yuge

original: RV_10.072.02.1{01} brahmaṇas patiretā saṃ karmāra ivādhamat
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ etā sam karmāraḥ iva adhamat

original: RV_10.072.02.2{01} devānāmpūrvye yuge 'sataḥ sadajāyata
analyzed: devānām pūrvye yuge sataḥ sat ajāyata

original: RV_10.072.03.1{01} devānāṃ yuge prathame 'sataḥ sadajāyata
analyzed: devānām yuge prathame sataḥ sat ajāyata

original: RV_10.072.03.2{01} tadāśā anvajāyanta taduttānapadas pari
analyzed: tad āśāḥ anvajāyanta tat uttāna padaḥ pari

original: RV_10.072.04.1{01} bhūrjajña uttānapado bhuva āśā ajāyanta
analyzed: bhūrja jñaḥ uttānapadaḥ bhuvaḥ āśāḥ ajāyanta

original: RV_10.072.04.2{01} aditerdakṣoajāyata dakṣād vaditiḥ pari
analyzed: aditeḥ dakṣaḥ ajāyata dakṣāt vaditiḥ pari

original: RV_10.072.05.1{01} aditirhyajaniṣṭa dakṣa yā duhitā tava
analyzed: aditiḥ hi ajaniṣṭa dakṣa yā duhitā tava

original: RV_10.072.05.2{01} tāṃ devāanvajāyanta bhadrā amṛtabandhavaḥ
analyzed: tām devāḥ anvajāyanta bhadrāḥ amṛta bandhavaḥ

original: RV_10.072.06.1{02} yad devā adaḥ salile susaṃrabdhā atiṣṭhata
analyzed: yat devāḥ adaḥ salile su saṃrabdhāḥ atiṣṭhata

original: RV_10.072.06.2{02} atrā vonṛtyatāmiva tīvro reṇurapāyata
analyzed: atrā vaḥ nṛtyatām iva tīvraḥ reṇuḥ apāyata

original: RV_10.072.07.1{02} yad devā yatayo yathā bhuvanānyapinvata
analyzed: yat devāḥ yatayaḥ yathā bhuvanāni apinvata

original: RV_10.072.07.2{02} atrā samudraā gūḷamā sūryamajabhartana
analyzed: atra samudraāḥ gūḷam ā sūryam ajabhartana

original: RV_10.072.08.1{02} aṣṭau putrāso aditerye jātāstanvas pari
analyzed: aṣṭau putrāsaḥ aditeḥ ye jātāḥ tanvaḥ pari

original: RV_10.072.08.2{02} devānupaprait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍamāsyat
analyzed: devān upaprait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍam āsyat

original: RV_10.072.09.1{02} saptabhiḥ putrairaditirupa prait pūrvyaṃ yugam
analyzed: saptabhiḥ putraiḥ aditiḥ upa prait pūrvyam yugam

original: RV_10.072.09.2{02} prajāyai mṛtyave tvat punarmārtāṇḍamābharat
analyzed: prajāyai mṛtyave tvat punar mārtāṇḍam ābharat

original: RV_10.073.01.1{03} janiṣthā ugraḥ sahase turāya mandra ojiṣṭhobahulābhimānaḥ
analyzed: janiṣthāḥ ugraḥ sahase turāya mandraḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ bahula abhimānaḥ

original: RV_10.073.01.2{03} avardhannindraṃ marutaścidatra mātāyad vīraṃ dadhanad dhaniṣṭhā
analyzed: avardhan indram marutaḥ cit atra mātāyat vīram dadhanat dhaniṣṭhā

original: RV_10.073.02.1{03} druho niṣattā pṛśanī cidevaiḥ purū śaṃsena vāvṛdhuṣṭa indram
analyzed: druhaḥ niṣattā pṛśanī cit evaiḥ purū śaṃsena vāvṛdhuṣṭaḥ indram

original: RV_10.073.02.2{03} abhīvṛteva tā mahāpadena dhvāntāt prapitvādudaranta garbhāḥ
analyzed: abhīvṛtā iva tāḥ mahā padena dhvāntāt prapitvāt udaranta garbhāḥ

original: RV_10.073.03.1{03} ṛṣvā te pādā pra yajjigāsyavardhan vājā uta ye cidatra
analyzed: ṛṣvā te pādā pra yat jigāsya avardhan vājāḥ uta ye cit atra

original: RV_10.073.03.2{03} tvamindra sālāvṛkān sahasramāsan dadhiṣe aśvināvavṛtyāḥ
analyzed: tvam indra sālāvṛkān sahasram āsan dadhiṣe aśvinau avṛtyāḥ

original: RV_10.073.04.1{03} samanā tūrṇirupa yāsi yajñamā nāsatyā sakhyāyavakṣi
analyzed: samanā tūrṇiḥ upa yāsi yajñamā nāsatyā sakhyāya vakṣi

original: RV_10.073.04.2{03} vasāvyāmindra dhārayaḥ sahasrāśvinā śūra dadaturmaghāni
analyzed: vasāvyām indra dhārayaḥ sahasrā aśvinā śūra dadatuḥ maghāni

original: RV_10.073.05.1{03} mandamāna ṛtādadhi prajāyai sakhibhirindra iṣirebhirartham
analyzed: mandamānaḥ ṛtāt adhi prajāyai sakhibhiḥ indraḥ iṣirebhiḥ artham

original: RV_10.073.05.2{03} ābhirhi māyā upa dasyumāgān mihaḥ pratamrā avapat tamāṃsi
analyzed: ābhiḥ hi māyāḥ upa dasyum āgāt mihaḥ pratamrāḥ avapat tamāṃsi

original: RV_10.073.06.1{04} sanāmānā cid dhvasayo nyasmā avāhannindra uṣasoyathānaḥ ṛṣvairagachaḥ sakhibhirnikāmaiḥ sākampratiṣṭhā hṛdyā jaghantha
analyzed: sanāmānā cit dhvasayaḥ ni asmai avāhan indraḥ uṣasaḥ yathā anaḥ ṛṣvaiḥ agachaḥ sakhibhiḥ nikāmaiḥ sākampratiṣṭhāḥ hṛdyāḥ jaghantha

original: RV_10.073.07.1{04} tvaṃ jaghantha namuciṃ makhasyuṃ dāsaṃ kṛṇvāna ṛṣayevimāyam
analyzed: tvam jaghantha namucim makhasyum dāsam kṛṇvānaḥ

original: RV_10.073.07.2{04} tvaṃ cakartha manave syonān patho devatrāñjasevayānān
analyzed: tvam cakartha manave syonān pathaḥ devatrā añjasā iva yānān

original: RV_10.073.08.1{04} tvametāni papriṣe vi nāmeśāna indra dadhiṣe gabhastau
analyzed: tvam etāni papriṣe vi nāma īśānaḥ indra dadhiṣe gabhastau
