original: RV_10.073.08.2{04} anu tvā devāḥ śavasā madantyuparibudhnān vaninaścakartha
analyzed: anu tvā devāḥ śavasā madanti uparibudhnān vaninaḥ cakartha

original: RV_10.073.09.1{04} cakraṃ yadasyāpsvā niṣattamuto tadasmai madhviccachadyāt
analyzed: cakram yat asya apsvā niṣattam uta u tat asmai madhu id cachadyāt

original: RV_10.073.09.2{04} pṛthivyāmatiṣitaṃ yadūdhaḥ payo goṣvadadhā oṣadhīṣu
analyzed: pṛthivyām atiṣitam yat ūdhar payaḥ goṣu adadhāḥ oṣadhīṣu

original: RV_10.073.10.1{04} aśvādiyāyeti yad vadantyojaso jātamuta manya enam
analyzed: aśvāt iyāya iti yat vadanti ojasaḥ jātam uta manye enam

original: RV_10.073.10.2{04} manyoriyāya harmyeṣu tasthau yataḥ prajajña indro asya veda
analyzed: manyoriyāya harmyeṣu tasthau yatas prajajñe indraḥ asya veda

original: RV_10.073.11.1{04} vayaḥ suparṇā upa sedurindraṃ priyamedhā ṛṣayonādhamānāḥ
analyzed: vayaḥ suparṇāḥ upa seduḥ indram priyamedhāḥ ṛṣayaḥ nādhamānāḥ

original: RV_10.073.11.2{04} apa dhvāntamūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣurmumugdhyasmān nidhayeva baddhān
analyzed: apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣuḥ mumugdhi asmān nidhayā iva baddhān

original: RV_10.074.01.1{05} vasūnāṃ vā carkṛṣa iyakṣan dhiyā vā yajñairvārodasyoḥ
analyzed: vasūnām vā carkṛṣe iyakṣan dhiyā vā yajñaiḥ vārodasyoḥ

original: RV_10.074.01.2{05} arvanto vā ye rayimantaḥ sātau vanuṃ vā yesuśruṇaṃ suśruto dhuḥ
analyzed: arvantaḥ vā ye rayimantaḥ sātau vanum vā yesuśruṇam su śrutaḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_10.074.02.1{05} hava eṣāmasuro nakṣata dyāṃ śravasyatā manasā niṃsatakṣā
analyzed: have eṣām asuraḥ nakṣata dyām śravasyatā manasā niṃsatakṣā

original: RV_10.074.02.2{05} cakṣāṇā yatra suvitāya devā dyaurna vārebhiḥkṛṇavanta svaiḥ
analyzed: cakṣāṇāḥ yatra suvitāya devāḥ dyauḥ na vārebhiḥ kṛṇavanta svaiḥ

original: RV_10.074.03.1{05} iyameṣāmamṛtānāṃ gīḥ sarvatātā ye kṛpaṇanta ratnam
analyzed: iyam eṣām amṛtānām gīḥ sarvatātā ye kṛpaṇanta ratnam

original: RV_10.074.03.2{05} dhiyaṃ ca yajñaṃ ca sādhantaste no dhāntu vasavyamasāmi
analyzed: dhiyam ca yajñam ca sādhantaḥ te naḥ dhāntu vasavyam asāmi

original: RV_10.074.04.1{05} ā tat ta indrāyavaḥ panantabhi ya ūrvaṃ gomantantitṛtsān
analyzed: ā tat te indra āyavaḥ pananta abhi yaḥ ūrvam gomantantitṛtsān

original: RV_10.074.04.2{05} sakṛtsvaṃ ye puruputrāṃ mahīṃ sahasradhārāmbṛhatīṃ dudukṣan
analyzed: sakṛtsvam ye puru putrām mahīm sahasra dhārām bṛhatīm dudukṣan

original: RV_10.074.05.1{05} śacīva indramavase kṛṇudhvamanānataṃ damayantaṃ pṛtanyūn
analyzed: śacīvas indram avase kṛṇudhvam an ānatam damayantam pṛtanyūn

original: RV_10.074.05.2{05} ṛbhukṣaṇaṃ maghavānaṃ suvṛktiṃ bhartā yo vajraṃ naryampurukṣuḥ
analyzed: ṛbhukṣaṇam maghavānam suvṛktim bhartā yaḥ vajram naryam purukṣuḥ

original: RV_10.074.06.1{05} yad vāvāna purutamaṃ purāṣāḷ ā vṛtrahendro nāmānyaprāḥ
analyzed: yat vāvāna purutamam purāṣāh ā vṛtra hā indraḥ nāmāni aprāḥ

original: RV_10.074.06.2{05} aceti prāsahas patistuviṣmān yadīmuśmasikartave karat tat
analyzed: aceti prāsahaḥ patiḥ stuviṣmān karat tat

original: RV_10.075.01.1{06} pra su va āpo mahimānamuttamaṃ kārurvocāti sadanevivasvataḥ
analyzed: pra su vaḥ āpaḥ mahimānam uttamam kāruḥ vocāti sadanevivasvataḥ

original: RV_10.075.01.2{06} pra sapta-sapta tredhā hi cakramuḥ prasṛtvarīṇāmati sindhurojasā
analyzed: pra sapta sapta tredhā hi cakramuḥ prasṛtvarīṇām ati sindhuḥ ojasā

original: RV_10.075.02.1{06} pra te 'radad varuṇo yātave pathaḥ sindho yad vājānabhyadravastvam
analyzed: pra te radat varuṇaḥ yātave pathaḥ sindho yat vājān abhyadravaḥ tvam

original: RV_10.075.02.2{06} bhūmyā adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā yadeṣāmagraṃ jagatāmirajyasi
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā yat eṣām agram jagatām irajyasi

original: RV_10.075.03.1{06} divi svano yatate bhūmyoparyanantaṃ śuṣmamudiyartibhānunā
analyzed: divi svanaḥ yatate bhūmyā upari anantam śuṣmam udiyarti bhānunā

original: RV_10.075.03.2{06} abhrādiva pra stanayanti vṛṣṭayaḥ sindhuryadeti vṛṣabho na roruvat
analyzed: abhrāt iva pra stanayanti vṛṣṭayaḥ sindhuḥ yadā iti vṛṣabhaḥ na roruvat

original: RV_10.075.04.1{06} abhi tvā sindho śiśumin na mātaro vāśrā arṣantipayaseva dhenavaḥ
analyzed: abhi tvā sindho śiśumit na mātaraḥ vāśrāḥ arṣanti payasā iva dhenavaḥ

original: RV_10.075.04.2{06} rājeva yudhvā nayasi tvamit sicau yadāsāmagraṃ pravatāminakṣasi
analyzed: rājā iva yudhvā nayasi tvam id sicau yat āsām agram pravatā aminakṣasi

original: RV_10.075.05.1{06} imaṃ me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri stemaṃ sacatā paruṣṇyā
analyzed: imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri stemam sacata paruṣṇyā

original: RV_10.075.05.2{06} asiknyā marudvṛdhe vitastayārjīkīye śṛṇuhyāsuṣomayā
analyzed: asiknyā marut vṛdhe vitastayā ārjīkīye śṛṇuhi āsuṣomayā

original: RV_10.075.06.1{07} tṛṣṭāmayā prathamaṃ yātave sajūḥ sasartvā rasayāśvetyā tyā
analyzed: tṛṣṭā āmayā prathamam yātave sajūs sasartvā rasayā aśvā ityā tyā

original: RV_10.075.06.2{07} tvaṃ sindho kubhayā gomatīṃ krumummehatnvā sarathaṃ yābhirīyase
analyzed: tvam sindho kubhayā gomatīm krumum mehatnvā sa ratham yābhiḥ īyase

original: RV_10.075.07.1{07} ṛjītyenī ruśatī mahitvā pari jrayāṃsi bharate rajāṃsi
analyzed: ṛjītyenī ruśatī mahitvā pari jrayāṃsi bharate rajāṃsi

original: RV_10.075.07.2{07} adabdhā sindhurapasāmapastamāśvā na citrāvapuṣīva darśatā
analyzed: adabdhā sindhuḥ apasām apastamā aśvāḥ na citrā vapuṣī iva darśatā

original: RV_10.075.08.1{07} svaśvā sindhuḥ surathā suvāsā hiraṇyayī sukṛtāvājinīvatī
analyzed: su aśvā sindhuḥ su rathā su vāsāḥ hiraṇyayī su kṛtā vājinīvatī

original: RV_10.075.08.2{07} ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvatyutādhi vastesubhagā madhuvṛdham
analyzed: ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvatī uta adhi vaste subhagā madhuvṛdham

original: RV_10.075.09.1{07} sukhaṃ rathaṃ yuyuje sidhuraśvinaṃ tena vājaṃ saniṣadasminnājau
analyzed: sukham ratham yuyuje sidhuḥ aśvinam tena vājam saniṣadasmin ājau

original: RV_10.075.09.2{07} mahān hyasya mahimā panasyate 'dabdhasyasvayaśaso virapśinaḥ
analyzed: mahān hi asya mahimā panasyate dabdhasya a sva yaśasaḥ virapśinaḥ

original: RV_10.076.01.1{08} ā va ṛñjasa ūrjāṃ vyuṣṭiṣvindraṃ maruto rodasīanaktana
analyzed: ā vaḥ ṛñjasaḥ ūrjām vyuṣṭiṣu indram marutaḥ rodasī īanaktana

original: RV_10.076.01.2{08} ubhe yathā no ahanī sacābhuvā sadaḥ-sadovarivasyāta udbhidā
analyzed: ubhe yathā naḥ ahanī sacābhuvā sadaḥ sadaḥ varivasyā atas udbhidā

original: RV_10.076.02.1{08} tadu śreṣṭhaṃ savanaṃ sunotanā?
analyzed: tat u śreṣṭham savanam sunotana

original: tyo na hastayato adriḥsotari
analyzed: tyaḥ na hasta yataḥ adriḥsotari

original: RV_10.076.02.2{08} vidad dhyaryo abhibhūti pauṃsyaṃ maho rāye cittarute yadarvataḥ
analyzed: vidat hi aryaḥ abhibhūti pauṃsyam mahaḥ rāye citta rute yat arvataḥ

original: RV_10.076.03.1{08} tadid dhyasya savanaṃ viverapo yathā purā manavegātumaśret
analyzed: tat id hi asya savanam viverapaḥ yathā purā

original: RV_10.076.03.2{08} goarṇasi tvāṣṭre aśvanirṇiji premadhvareṣvadhvarānaśiśrayuḥ
analyzed: go arṇasi tvāṣṭre aśva nirṇiji prem adhvareṣu adhvarān aśiśrayuḥ

original: RV_10.076.04.1{08} apa hata rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvata skabhāyata nir{ṛ}tiṃsedhatāmatim
analyzed: apa hata rakṣasaḥ bhaṅgurāvataḥ skabhāyata

original: RV_10.076.04.2{08} ā no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ sunotana devāvyambharata ślokamadrayaḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ rayim sarva vīram sunotana deva avyambharata ślokam adrayaḥ

original: RV_10.076.05.1{08} divaścidā vo 'mavattarebhyo vibhvanā cidāśvapastarebhyaḥ
analyzed: divaḥ cidā vaḥ mavattarebhyaḥ vibhvanā cit aśva apastarebhyaḥ

original: RV_10.076.05.2{08} vāyościda somarabhastarebhyo 'gneścidarcapitukṛttarebhyaḥ
analyzed: vāyoḥ cit soma rabhastarebhyaḥ gneḥ cit arca pitukṛttarebhyaḥ

original: RV_10.076.06.1{09} bhurantu no yaśasaḥ sotvandhaso grāvāṇo vācā divitādivitmatā
analyzed: bhurantu naḥ yaśasaḥ sotu andhasaḥ grāvāṇaḥ vācā divitā a divitmatā

original: RV_10.076.06.2{09} naro yatra duhate kāmyaṃ madhvāghoṣayantoabhito mithasturaḥ
analyzed: naraḥ yatra duhate kāmyam madhu āghoṣayantaḥ abhitas mithas turaḥ

original: RV_10.076.07.1{09} sunvanti somaṃ rathirāso adrayo nirasya rasaṃ gaviṣoduhanti te
analyzed: sunvanti somam rathirāsaḥ adrayaḥ nirasya rasam gaviṣā duhanti te

original: RV_10.076.07.2{09} duhantyūdharupasecanāya kaṃ naro havya nāmarjayanta āsabhiḥ
analyzed: duhanti ūdhar upasecanāya kam naraḥ havya na amarjayantaḥ āsabhiḥ

original: RV_10.076.08.1{09} ete naraḥ svapaso abhūtana ya indrāya sunutha somamadrayaḥ
analyzed: ete naraḥ su apasaḥ abhūtana ye indrāya sunutha somam adrayaḥ

original: RV_10.076.08.2{09} vāmaṃ-vāmaṃ vo divyāya dhāmne vasu-vasu vaḥ pārthivayasunvate
analyzed: vāmam vāmam vaḥ divyāya dhāmne vasu vasu vaḥ pārthivaya sunvate

original: RV_10.077.01.1{10} abhrapruṣo na vācā pruṣā vasu haviṣmanto na yajñāvijānuṣaḥ
analyzed: abhrapruṣaḥ na vācā pruṣā vasu haviṣmantaḥ na yajña avijānuṣaḥ

original: RV_10.077.01.2{10} sumārutaṃ na brahmāṇamarhase gaṇamastoṣyeṣāṃ na śobhase
analyzed: su mārutam na brahmāṇam arhase gaṇam astoṣi eṣām na śobhase

original: RV_10.077.02.1{10} śriye maryāso añjīnrakṛṇvata sumarutaṃ na pūrviratikṣapaḥ
analyzed: śriye maryāsaḥ añjīn rakṛṇvata su marutam na pūrviratikṣapaḥ

original: RV_10.077.02.2{10} divas putrāsa etā na yetira ādityāsaste akrana vāvṛdhuḥ
analyzed: divaḥ putrāsaḥ etāḥ na yetire ādityāsaḥ te akrana vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_10.077.03.1{10} pra ye divaḥ pṛthivya na barhaṇā tmanā riricre abhrānna sūryaḥ
analyzed: pra ye divaḥ pṛthivya na barhaṇā tmanā riricre abhrāt na sūryaḥ

original: RV_10.077.03.2{10} pājasvanto na vīrāḥ panasyavo riśādaso namaryā abhidyavaḥ
analyzed: pājasvantaḥ na vīrāḥ panasyavaḥ riśādasaḥ namaryāḥ abhidyavaḥ

original: RV_10.077.04.1{10} yuṣmākaṃ budhne apāṃ na yāmani vithuryati na mahīśratharyati
analyzed: yuṣmākam budhne apām na yāmani vithuryati na mahīśratharyati

original: RV_10.077.04.2{10} viśvapsuryajño arvāgayaṃ su vaḥprayasvanto na satrāca ā gata
analyzed: viśvapsuḥ yajñaḥ arvāk ayam su vaḥ prayasvantaḥ na satrācaḥ ā gata

original: RV_10.077.05.1{10} yūyaṃ dhūrṣu prayujo na raśmibhirjyotiṣmanto na bhāsāvyuṣṭiṣu
analyzed: yūyam dhūrṣu prayujaḥ na raśmibhiḥ jyotiṣmantaḥ na bhāsā vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_10.077.05.2{10} śyenāso na svayaśaso riśādasaḥ pravāsona prasitāsaḥ paripruṣaḥ
analyzed: śyenāsaḥ na sva yaśasaḥ riśādasaḥ pravāsona prasitāsaḥ paripruṣaḥ

original: RV_10.077.06.1{11} pra yad vahadhve marutaḥ parākād yūyaṃ mahaḥsaṃvaraṇasya vasvaḥ
analyzed: pra yat vahadhve marutaḥ parākāt yūyam mahaḥ saṃvaraṇasya vasvaḥ

original: RV_10.077.06.2{11} vidānāso vasavo rādhyasyārācciddveṣaḥ sanutaryuyota
analyzed: vidānāsaḥ vasavaḥ rādhyasya ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyota

original: RV_10.077.07.1{11} ya udṛci yajñe adhvareṣṭhā marudbhyo na mānuṣo dadāśat
analyzed: yaḥ udṛci yajñe adhvareṣṭhāḥ marudbhyaḥ na mānuṣaḥ dadāśat

original: RV_10.077.07.2{11} revat sa vayo dadhate suvīraṃ sa devānāmapi gopītheastu
analyzed: revat sa vayaḥ dadhate su vīram sa devānām api gopīthe astu

original: RV_10.077.08.1{11} te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmā ādityena nāmnāśambhaviṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsaḥ ūmāḥ ādityena nāmnā aśambhaviṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_10.077.08.2{11} te no 'vantu rathatūrmanīṣāṃ mahaścayāmannadhvare cakānāḥ
analyzed: te naḥ vantu rathatūrmanīṣām mahaḥ cayāman adhvare cakānāḥ

original: RV_10.078.01.1{12} viprāso na manmabhiḥ svādhyo devāvyo na yajñaiḥsvapnasaḥ
analyzed: viprāsaḥ na manmabhiḥ su ādhyaḥ na yajñaiḥsvapnasaḥ

original: RV_10.078.01.2{12} rājāno na citrāḥ susandṛśaḥ kṣitīnāṃ namaryā arepasaḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ na citrāḥ su sandṛśaḥ kṣitīnām namaryāḥ arepasaḥ

original: RV_10.078.02.1{12} agnirna ye bhājasā rukmavakṣaso vātāso na svayujaḥsadyaūtayaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ na ye bhājasā rukma vakṣasaḥ vātāsaḥ na sva yujaḥ sadyaūtayaḥ

original: RV_10.078.02.2{12} prajñātāro na jyeṣṭhāḥ sunītayaḥsuśarmāṇo na somā ṛtaṃ yate
analyzed: prajñātāraḥ na jyeṣṭhāḥ su nītayaḥ su śarmāṇaḥ na somāḥ ṛtam yate

original: RV_10.078.03.1{12} vātāso na ye dhunayo jigatnavo 'gnīnāṃ na jihvāvirokiṇaḥ
analyzed: vātāsaḥ na ye dhunayaḥ jigatnavaḥ gnīnām na jihvā virokiṇaḥ

original: RV_10.078.03.2{12} varmaṇvanto na yodhāḥ śimīvantaḥ pitṝṇāṃna śaṃsāḥ surātayaḥ
analyzed: varmaṇvantaḥ na yodhāḥ śimīvantaḥ pitṝṇām na śaṃsāḥ su rātayaḥ

original: RV_10.078.04.1{12} rathānāṃ na ye 'rāḥ sanābhayo jigīvāṃso na śūrāabhidyavaḥ
analyzed: rathānām na ye rāḥ sanābhayaḥ jigīvāṃsaḥ na śūrāḥ abhidyavaḥ

original: RV_10.078.04.2{12} vareyavo na maryā ghṛtapruṣo 'bhisvartāroarkaṃ na suṣṭubhaḥ
analyzed: vareyavaḥ na maryāḥ ghṛta pruṣaḥ bhisvartāraḥ arkam na suṣṭubhaḥ

original: RV_10.078.05.1{12} aśvāso na ye jyeṣṭhāsa āśavo didhiṣavo na rathyaḥsudānavaḥ
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ na ye jyeṣṭhāsaḥ āśavaḥ didhiṣavaḥ na rathyaḥsudānavaḥ

original: RV_10.078.05.2{12} āpo na nimnairudabhirjigatnavo viśvarūpāaṅgiraso na sāmabhiḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ na nimnaiḥ udabhiḥ jigatnavaḥ viśva rūpāḥ aṅgirasaḥ na sāmabhiḥ

original: RV_10.078.06.1{13} grāvāṇo na sūrayaḥ sindhumātara ādardirāso adrayo naviśvahā
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ na sūrayaḥ sindhu mātaraḥ ādardirāsaḥ adrayaḥ na viśvahā

original: RV_10.078.06.2{13} śiśūlā na krīḷayaḥ sumātaro mahāgrāmo nayāmannuta tviṣā
analyzed: śiśūlāḥ na krīḍayaḥ su mātaraḥ mahā grāmaḥ na yāman uta tviṣā

original: RV_10.078.07.1{13} uṣasāṃ na ketavo 'dhvaraśriyaḥ śubhaṃyavo nāñjibhirvyaśvitan
analyzed: uṣasām na ketavaḥ dhvara śriyaḥ śubhaṃyavaḥ nā añjibhiḥ vyaśvitan

original: RV_10.078.07.2{13} sindhavo na yayiyo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ parāvato nayojanāni mamire
analyzed: sindhavaḥ na bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ parāvataḥ na yojanāni mamire

original: RV_10.078.08.1{13} subhāgān no devāḥ kṛṇutā suratnānasmān stotṝn marutovāvṛdhānāḥ
analyzed: subhāgān naḥ devāḥ kṛṇutā su ratnān asmān stotṝn marutaḥ vāvṛdhānāḥ

original: RV_10.078.08.2{13} adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gāta sanād dhi voratnadheyāni santi
analyzed: adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gāta sanāt hi vaḥ ratna dheyāni santi

original: RV_10.079.01.1{14} apaśyamasya mahato mahitvamamartyasya martyāsu vikṣu
analyzed: apaśyam asya mahataḥ mahi tvam amartyasya martyāsu vikṣu

original: RV_10.079.01.2{14} nānā hanū vibhṛte saṃ bharete asinvatī bapsatī bhūryattaḥ
analyzed: nānā hanū vibhṛte sam bharete asinvatī bapsatī bhūryattaḥ

original: RV_10.079.02.1{14} guhā śiro nihitam ṛdhagakṣī asinvannatti jihvayāvanāni
analyzed: guhā śiraḥ nihitam ṛdhak akṣī asinvan atti jihvayā avanāni

original: RV_10.079.02.2{14} atrāṇyasmai paḍbhiḥ saṃ bharantyuttānahastānamasādhi vikṣu
analyzed: atrāṇi asmai paḍbhiḥ sam bharanti uttāna hastānam asādhi vikṣu

original: RV_10.079.03.1{14} pra mātuḥ prataraṃ guhyamichan kumāro na vīrudhaḥsarpadurvīḥ
analyzed: pra mātuḥ prataram guhyam icchan kumāraḥ na

original: RV_10.079.03.2{14} sasaṃ na pakvamavidacchucantaṃririhvāṃsaṃ ripa upasthe antaḥ
analyzed: sasam na pakvam avidat śucantam ririhvāṃsam ripaḥ upasthe antar

original: RV_10.079.04.1{14} tad vām ṛtaṃ rodasī pra bravīmi jāyamāno mātarā garbhoatti
analyzed: tat vām ṛtam rodasī pra bravīmi jāyamānaḥ mātarā garbhā uatti

original: RV_10.079.04.2{14} nāhaṃ devasya martyaściketāgniraṅga vicetāḥ sapracetāḥ
analyzed: na aham devasya martyaḥ ciketa agniḥ aṅga vicetāḥ sa pracetāḥ

original: RV_10.079.05.1{14} yo asmā annaṃ tṛṣvādadhātyājyairghṛtairjuhotipuṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ asmai annam tṛṣu ādadhāti ājyaiḥ ghṛtaiḥ juhoti puṣyati

original: RV_10.079.05.2{14} tasmai sahasramakṣabhirvi cakṣe 'gne viśvataḥpratyaṃṃ asi tvam
analyzed: tasmai sahasram akṣabhiḥ vi cakṣe gne viśvatas pratyaṃ asi tvam

original: RV_10.079.06.1{14} kiṃ deveṣu tyaja enaścakarthāgne pṛchāmi nu tvāmavidvān
analyzed: kim deveṣu tyajaḥ enaḥ cakartha agne pṛcchāmi nu tvām avidvān

original: RV_10.079.06.2{14} akrīḷan krīḷan harirattave 'dan vi parvaśaścakarta gāmivāsiḥ
analyzed: a krīḍan krīḍan vi parvaśas cakarta gāmi vā asiḥ

original: RV_10.079.07.1{14} viṣūco aśvān yuyuje vanejā ṛjītibhī raśanābhirgṛbhītān
analyzed: viṣūcaḥ aśvān yuyuje vanejāḥ ṛjītibhiḥ raśanābhiḥ gṛbhītān

original: RV_10.079.07.2{14} cakṣade mitro vasubhiḥ sujātaḥ samānṛdheparvabhirvāvṛdhānaḥ
analyzed: cakṣade mitraḥ vasubhiḥ su jātaḥ samānṛdhe parvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_10.080.01.1{15} agniḥ saptiṃ vājambharaṃ dadātyagnirvīraṃ śrutyaṃkarmaniṣṭhām
analyzed: agniḥ saptim vājambharam dadāti agniḥ vīram śrutyam karma niṣṭhām

original: RV_10.080.01.2{15} agnī rodasī vi carat samañjannagnirnārīṃ vīrakukṣiṃ purandhim
analyzed: agniḥ rodasī vi carat samañjan agniḥ nārīm vīra kukṣim purandhim

original: RV_10.080.02.1{15} agnerapnasaḥ samidastu bhadrāgnirmahī rodasī ā viveśa
analyzed: agneḥ apnasaḥ samidh astu bhadrā agniḥ mahī rodasī ā viveśa

original: RV_10.080.02.2{15} agnirekaṃ codayat samatsvagnirvṛtrāṇi dayate purūṇi
analyzed: agniḥ ekam codayat samatsu agniḥ vṛtrāṇi dayate purūṇi

original: RV_10.080.03.1{15} agnirha tyaṃ jarataḥ karṇamāvāgniradbhyo niradahajjarūtham
analyzed: agniḥ ha tyam jarataḥ karṇam āvā agniḥ adbhyaḥ niradahat jarūtham

original: RV_10.080.03.2{15} agniratriṃ gharma uruṣyadantaragnirnṛmedhampra jayāsṛjat sam
analyzed: agniḥ atrim gharmaḥ uruṣyat antar agniḥ nṛmedham pra jaya asṛjat sam

original: RV_10.080.04.1{15} agnirdād draviṇaṃ vīrapeśā agnir{ṛ}ṣiṃ yaḥ sahasrāsanoti
analyzed: agniḥ dāt draviṇam vīra peśāḥ agniḥ ṛṣim yaḥ sahasrā āsanoti

original: RV_10.080.04.2{15} agnirdivi havyamā tatānāgnerdhāmānivibhṛtā purutrā
analyzed: agniḥ divi havyamā tatāna agneḥ dhāma ani vibhṛtā purutrā

original: RV_10.080.05.1{15} agnimukthair{ṛ}ṣayo vi hvayante 'gniṃ naro yāmanibādhitāsaḥ
analyzed: agnim ukthaiḥ ṛṣayaḥ vi hvayante gnim naraḥ yāma nibādhitāsaḥ

original: RV_10.080.05.2{15} agniṃ vayo antarikṣe patanto 'gniḥ sahasrāpari yāti gonām
analyzed: agnim vayaḥ antarikṣe patantaḥ gniḥ sahasrā apari yāti gonām

original: RV_10.080.06.1{15} agniṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīryā agniṃ manuṣo nahuṣo vijātāḥ
analyzed: agnim viśaḥ īḍate mānuṣīryāḥ agnim manuṣaḥ nahuṣaḥ vijātāḥ

original: RV_10.080.06.2{15} agnirgāndharvīṃ pathyām ṛtasyāgnergavyūtirghṛta ā niṣattā
analyzed: agniḥ gāndharvīm pathyām ṛtasya agneḥ gavyūtiḥ ghṛte ā niṣattā

original: RV_10.080.07.1{15} agnaye brahma ṛbhavastatakṣuragniṃ mahāmavocāmā suvṛktim
analyzed: agnaye brahma ṛbhavaḥ tatakṣuḥ agnim mahām avocāma suvṛktim

original: RV_10.080.07.2{15} agne prāva jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭhāgne mahi draviṇamāyajasva
analyzed: agne prāva jaritāram yaviṣṭha agne mahi draviṇam āyajasva

original: RV_10.081.01.1{16} ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvad ṛṣirhotā nyasīdatpitā naḥ
analyzed: yaḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvat ṛṣiḥ hotā nyasīdat pitā naḥ

original: RV_10.081.01.2{16} sa āśiṣā draviṇamichamānaḥ prathamachadavarānā viveśa
analyzed: saḥ āśiṣā draviṇam ichamānaḥ viveśa

original: RV_10.081.02.1{16} kiṃ svidāsīdadhiṣṭhanamārambhaṇaṃ katamat svitkathāsīt
analyzed: kim svid āsīt adhiṣṭhanam ārambhaṇam katamat svid kathā āsīt

original: RV_10.081.02.2{16} yato bhūmiṃ janayan viśvakarma vi dyāmaurṇon mahinā viśvacakṣāḥ
analyzed: yatas bhūmim janayan viśva karma vi dyām aurṇot mahinā viśva cakṣāḥ

original: RV_10.081.03.1{16} viśvataścakṣuruta viśvatomukho viśvatobāhurutaviśvataspāt
analyzed: viśvatas cakṣuḥ uta viśvatomukhaḥ viśvatobāhuḥ uta viśvataspād

original: RV_10.081.03.2{16} saṃ bāhubhyāṃ dhamati saṃ patatrairdyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ
analyzed: sam bāhubhyām dhamati sam patatraiḥ dyāvābhūmī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_10.081.04.1{16} kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivīniṣṭatakṣuḥ
analyzed: kim svid vanam kaḥ u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsa yatas dyāvāpṛthivīn iṣṭatakṣuḥ

original: RV_10.081.04.2{16} manīṣiṇo manasā pṛchatedu tad yadadhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan
analyzed: manīṣiṇaḥ manasā pṛcchata idu tat yat adhyatiṣṭhat bhuvanāni dhārayan

original: RV_10.081.05.1{16} yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yāvamā yā madhyamāviśvakarmannutemā
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yā avamā yā madhyamā viśvakarman uta imā

original: RV_10.081.05.2{16} śikṣā sakhibhyo haviṣi svadhāvaḥsvayaṃ yajasva tanvaṃ vṛdhānaḥ
analyzed: śikṣa sakhibhyaḥ haviṣi svadhāvas svayam yajasva tanvam vṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_10.081.06.1{16} viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayaṃ yajasva pṛthivīmuta dyām
analyzed: viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayam yajasva pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_10.081.06.2{16} muhyantvanye abhito janāsa ihāsmākaṃ maghavāsūrirastu
analyzed: muhyantu anye abhitas janāsaḥ iha asmākam maghavā asūriḥ astu

original: RV_10.081.07.1{16} vācas patiṃ viśvakarmāṇamūtaye manojuvaṃ vāje adyāhuvema
analyzed: vācaḥ patim viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manaḥ juvam vāje adya āhuvema

original: RV_10.081.07.2{16} sa no viśvāni havanāni joṣad viśvaśambhūravasesādhukarmā
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvāni havanāni joṣat viśva śambhūḥ avase sādhu karmā

original: RV_10.082.01.1{17} cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīro ghṛtamene ajanannannamāne
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīraḥ ghṛtam ene ajanan annamāne

original: RV_10.082.01.2{17} yadedantā adadṛhanta pūrva ādiddyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām
analyzed: yadā idantāḥ adadṛhanta pūrve ādit dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām

original: RV_10.082.02.1{17} viśvakarmā vimanā ād vihāyā dhātā vidhātā paramotasandṛk
analyzed: viśvakarmā vimanāḥ āt vihāyāḥ dhātā vidhātā parama uta sandṛś

original: RV_10.082.02.2{17} teṣāmiṣṭāni samiṣā madanti yatrāsaptaṛṣīn para ekamāhuḥ
analyzed: teṣām iṣṭāni samiṣā madanti yatra a sapta ṛṣīn paras ekam āhuḥ

original: RV_10.082.03.1{17} yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāniviśvā
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ pitā janitā yaḥ vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10.082.03.2{17} yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eka eva taṃ sampraśnambhuvanā yantyanyā
analyzed: yaḥ devānām nāmadhāḥ ekaḥ eva tam sampraśnambhuvanāḥ yanti anyā

original: RV_10.082.04.1{17} ta āyajanta draviṇaṃ samasmā ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāro nabhūnā
analyzed: te āyajanta draviṇam samasmai ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāraḥ nabhūnā

original: RV_10.082.04.2{17} asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye bhūtānisamakṛṇvannimāni
analyzed: asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye

original: RV_10.082.05.1{17} paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhirasurairyadasti
analyzed: paras divā paras enā pṛthivyā paras devebhiḥ asuraiḥ yat asti

original: RV_10.082.05.2{17} kaṃ svid garbhaṃ prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥsamapaśyanta viśve
analyzed: kam svid garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ yatra devāḥ samapaśyanta viśve

original: RV_10.082.06.1{17} tamid garbhaṃ prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥsamagachanta viśve
analyzed: tam id garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ yatra devāḥ samagacchanta viśve

original: RV_10.082.06.2{17} ajasya nābhāvadhyekamarpitaṃyasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ
analyzed: ajasya nābhau adhi ekam arpitam yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ

original: RV_10.082.07.1{17} na taṃ vidātha ya imā jajānāyad yuṣmākamantarambabhūva
analyzed: na tam vidātha yaḥ imāḥ jajānāyat yuṣmākam antaram babhūva

original: RV_10.082.07.2{17} nīhāreṇa prāvṛtā jalpyā cāsutṛpa ukthaśāsaścaranti
analyzed: nīhāreṇa prāvṛtāḥ jalpyā ca asutṛpaḥ uktha śāsaḥ caranti

original: RV_10.083.01.1{18} yaste manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvamānuṣak
analyzed: yaḥ te manyo vidhat vajra sāyaka sahaḥ ojaḥ puṣyati viśva mānuṣak

original: RV_10.083.01.2{18} sāhyāma dāsamāryaṃ tvayā yujā sahaskṛtenasahasā sahasvatā
analyzed: sāhyāma dāsam āryam tvayā yujā sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā

original: RV_10.083.02.1{18} manyurindro manyurevāsa devo manyurhotā varuṇojātavedāḥ
analyzed: manyuḥ indraḥ manyuḥ eva āsa devaḥ manyuḥ hotā varuṇaḥ jātavedāḥ

original: RV_10.083.02.2{18} manyuṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīryāḥ pāhi nomanyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: manyum viśaḥ īḍate mānuṣīryāḥ pāhi nomanyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10.083.03.1{18} abhīhi manyo tavasastavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn
analyzed: abhīhi manyo tavasaḥ tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn

original: RV_10.083.03.2{18} amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūnyā bharātvaṃ naḥ
analyzed: amitra hā vṛtra hā dasyu hā ca viśvā vasūni ā bharātvam naḥ

original: RV_10.083.04.1{18} tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayambhūrbhāmoabhimātiṣāhaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi manyo abhibhūti ojāḥ svayambhūḥ bhāmaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: RV_10.083.04.2{18} viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahāvānasmāsvojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi
analyzed: viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahāvān asmāsu ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi

original: RV_10.083.05.1{18} abhāgaḥ sannapa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasyapracetaḥ
analyzed: a bhāgaḥ san apa paretaḥ asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya apracetaḥ

original: RV_10.083.05.2{18} taṃ tvā manyo akraturjihīḷāhaṃ svā tanūrbaladeyāya mehi
analyzed: tam tvā manyo akratuḥ jihīḍa aham svā tanūḥ bala deyāya mā ihi

original: RV_10.083.06.1{18} ayaṃ te asmyupa mehyarvāṃ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadhāyaḥ
analyzed: ayam te asmi upa mā ihi arvām pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśva dhāyaḥ

original: RV_10.083.06.2{18} manyo vajrinnabhi māmā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūnrutabodhyāpeḥ
analyzed: manyo vajrin abhi mā amā ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūn ruta bodhyāpeḥ

original: RV_10.083.07.1{18} abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāvabhūri
analyzed: abhi prehi dakṣiṇatas bhava me dhāḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanau abhūri

original: RV_10.083.07.2{18} juhomi te dharuṇaṃ madhvo agramubhā upāṃśuprathamā pibāva
analyzed: juhomi te dharuṇam madhvaḥ agram ubhau upāṃśu prathamā pibāva

original: RV_10.084.01.1{19} tvayā manyo sarathamārujanto harṣamāṇāso dhṛṣitāmarutvaḥ
analyzed: tvayā manyo sa ratham ārujantaḥ harṣamāṇāsaḥ

original: RV_10.084.01.2{19} tigmeṣava āyudhā saṃśiśānā abhi pra yantunaro agnirūpāḥ
analyzed: tigma iṣavaḥ āyudhā saṃśiśānāḥ abhi pra yantunaraḥ agni rūpāḥ

original: RV_10.084.02.1{19} agniriva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senānīrnaḥ sahure hūtaedhi
analyzed: agniḥ iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senā nīḥ naḥ sahure hūtaḥ edhi

original: RV_10.084.02.2{19} hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva veda ojo mimāno vi mṛdhonudasva
analyzed: hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva vedaḥ ojaḥ mimānaḥ vi mṛdhonudasva

original: RV_10.084.03.1{19} sahasva manyo abhimātimasme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehiśatrūn
analyzed: sahasva manyo abhimātim asme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn

original: RV_10.084.03.2{19} ugraṃ te pājo nanvā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃnayasa ekaja tvam
analyzed: ugram te pājaḥ nanvā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃnayase eka ja tvam

original: RV_10.084.04.1{19} eko bahūnāmasi manyavīḷito viśaṃ-viśaṃ yudhaye saṃśiśādhi
analyzed: ekaḥ bahūnām asi manya vīḍitaḥ viśam viśam yudhaye saṃśiśādhi

original: RV_10.084.04.2{19} akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣaṃvijayāya kṛṇmahe
analyzed: a kṛtta ruc tvayā yujā vayam dyumantam ghoṣam vijayāya kṛṇmahe

original: RV_10.084.05.1{19} vijeṣakṛdindra ivānavabravo 'smākaṃ manyo adhipā bhaveha
analyzed: vijeṣa kṛt indraḥ iva anavabravaḥ smākam manyo adhipāḥ bhava iha

original: RV_10.084.05.2{19} priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tamutsaṃ yataābabhūtha
analyzed: priyam te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidma tam utsam yatas ābabhūtha

original: RV_10.084.06.1{19} ābhūtyā sahajā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣyabhibhūtauttaram
analyzed: ābhūtyā sahajāḥ vajra sāyaka sahaḥ bibharṣi abhibhūta auttaram

original: RV_10.084.06.2{19} kratvā no manyo saha?
analyzed: kratvā naḥ manyo saha

original: medyedhi mahādhanasya puruhūtasaṃsṛji
analyzed: medyā idhi mahādhanasya puruhūta saṃsṛji

original: RV_10.084.07.1{19} saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanamubhayaṃ samākṛtamasmabhyaṃ dattāṃvaruṇaśca manyuḥ
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭam dhanam ubhayam samākṛtam asmabhyam dattām varuṇaḥ ca manyuḥ

original: RV_10.084.07.2{19} bhiyaṃ dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥparājitāso apa ni layantām
analyzed: bhiyam dadhānāḥ hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitāsaḥ apa ni layantām

original: RV_10.085.01.1{20} satyenottabhitā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇottabhitā dyauḥ
analyzed: satyena uttabhitā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇa uttabhitā dyauḥ

original: RV_10.085.01.2{20} ṛtenādityāstiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ
analyzed: ṛtena ādityāḥ tiṣṭhanti divi somaḥ adhi śritaḥ

original: RV_10.085.02.1{20} somenādityā balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī
analyzed: somena ādityāḥ balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī

original: RV_10.085.02.2{20} athonakṣatrāṇāmeṣāmupasthe soma āhitaḥ
analyzed: atha ūnakṣatrāṇām eṣām upasthe somaḥ āhitaḥ

original: RV_10.085.03.1{20} somaṃ manyate papivan yat sampiṃṣantyoṣadhim
analyzed: somam manyate papivan yat sampiṃṣanti oṣadhim

original: RV_10.085.03.2{20} somaṃ yambrahmāṇo vidurna tasyāśnāti kaścana
analyzed: somam yam brahmāṇaḥ viduḥ na tasya aśnāti kaścana

original: RV_10.085.04.1{20} āchadvidhānairgupito bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ
analyzed: āchad vidhānaiḥ gupitaḥ bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ

original: RV_10.085.04.2{20} gravṇāmicchṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ
analyzed: gravṇām id śṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ

original: RV_10.085.05.1{20} yat tvā deva prapibanti tata ā pyāyase punaḥ
analyzed: yat tvā deva prapibanti tatas ā pyāyase punar

original: RV_10.085.05.2{20} vāyuḥsomasya rakṣitā samānāṃ māsa ākṛtiḥ
analyzed: vāyuḥsomasya rakṣitā samānām māsaḥ ākṛtiḥ

original: RV_10.085.06.1{21} raibhyāsīdanudeyī nārāśaṃsi nyocanī
analyzed: raibhī āsīt anudeyī nārāśaṃsi nyocanī

original: RV_10.085.06.2{21} sūryāyābhadramid vāso gāthayaiti pariṣkṛtam
analyzed: sūryāya abhadram id vāsaḥ gāthayā eti pariṣkṛtam

original: RV_10.085.07.1{21} cittirā upabarhaṇaṃ cakṣurā abhyañjanam
analyzed: cittirāḥ upabarhaṇam cakṣurāḥ abhyañjanam

original: RV_10.085.07.2{21} dyaurbhūmiḥkośa āsīd yadayāt sūryā patim
analyzed: dyauḥ bhūmiḥ kośaḥ āsīt yat ayāt sūryā patim

original: RV_10.085.08.1{21} stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kuriraṃ chanda opaśaḥ
analyzed: stomāḥ āsan pratidhayaḥ kuriram chandaḥ opaśaḥ

original: RV_10.085.08.2{21} sūryāyāaśvinā varāgnirāsīt purogavaḥ
analyzed: varā agniḥ āsīt purogavaḥ

original: RV_10.085.09.1{21} somo vadhūyurabhavadaśvināstāmubhā varā
analyzed: somaḥ vadhūyuḥ abhavat aśvinā āstām ubhā varā

original: RV_10.085.09.2{21} sūryāṃyat patye śaṃsantīṃ manasā savitādadāt
analyzed: sūryāṃyat patye śaṃsantīm manasā savitā adadāt

original: RV_10.085.10.1{21} mano asyā ana āsīd dyaurāsīduta chadiḥ
analyzed: manaḥ asyāḥ anaḥ āsīt dyauḥ āsīt uta chadiḥ

original: RV_10.085.10.2{21} śukrāvanaḍvāhavāstāṃ yadayāt sūryā bṛham
analyzed: śukrau anaḍvāhau āstām yat ayāt sūryā bṛham

original: RV_10.085.11.1{22} ṛksāmābhyāmabhihitau gāvau te sāmanāvitaḥ
analyzed: ṛk sāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāma nāvitaḥ

original: RV_10.085.11.2{22} śrotraṃ tecakre āstāṃ divi panthāścarācāraḥ
analyzed: śrotram te cakre āstām divi panthāḥ cara ācāraḥ

original: RV_10.085.12.1{22} śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ
analyzed: śucī te cakre yātyāḥ vyānaḥ akṣaḥ āhataḥ

original: RV_10.085.12.2{22} anomanasmayaṃ sūryārohat prayati patim
analyzed: anaḥ manasmayam sūryā ārohat prayati patim

original: RV_10.085.13.1{22} sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yamavāsṛjat
analyzed: sūryāyāḥ vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat

original: RV_10.085.13.2{22} aghāsuhanyante gāvo 'rjunyoḥ paryuhyate
analyzed: gāvaḥ rjunyoḥ paryuhyate

original: RV_10.085.14.1{22} yadaśvinā pṛchamānāvayātaṃ tricakreṇa vahatuṃsūryāyāḥ
analyzed: yat aśvinā pṛcchamānau ayātam tri cakreṇa

original: RV_10.085.14.2{22} viśve devā anu tad vāmajānan putraḥpitarāvavṛṇīta pūṣā
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anu tat vām ajānan putraḥ pitarau avṛṇīta pūṣā

original: RV_10.085.15.1{22} yadayātaṃ śubhas patī vareyaṃ sūryāmupa
analyzed: yat ayātam śubhaḥ patī vareyam sūryām upa

original: RV_10.085.15.2{22} kvaikaṃcakraṃ vāmāsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ
analyzed: kva ekaṃcakram vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ

original: RV_10.085.16.1{23} dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtutha viduḥ
analyzed: dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇaḥ viduḥ

original: RV_10.085.16.2{23} athaikaṃcakraṃ yad guhā tadaddhātaya id viduḥ
analyzed: atha ekaṃcakram yat guhā tat addhātayaḥ id viduḥ

original: RV_10.085.17.1{23} sūryāyai devebhyo mitrāya varuṇāya ca
analyzed: sūryāyai devebhyaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya ca

original: RV_10.085.17.2{23} ye bhūtasyapracetasa idaṃ tebhyo 'karaṃ namaḥ
analyzed: ye bhūtasya pracetasaḥ idam tebhyaḥ karam namaḥ

original: RV_10.085.18.1{23} pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū kriḷantau pari yatoadhvaram
analyzed: pūrva aparam carataḥ māyayā etau śiśū kriḍantau pari yatas adhvaram

original: RV_10.085.18.2{23} viśvānyanyo bhuvanābhicaṣṭa ṛtunranyovidadhajjāyate punaḥ
analyzed: viśvāni anyaḥ bhuvanā abhicaṣṭe ṛtun anyaḥ vidadhat jāyate punar

original: RV_10.085.19.1{23} navo-navo bhavati jāyamāno 'hnāṃ keturuṣasāmetyagram
analyzed: navaḥ navaḥ bhavati jāyamānaḥ hnām ketuḥ uṣasām eti agram

original: RV_10.085.19.2{23} bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhātyāyan pra candramāstiratedīrghamayuḥ
analyzed: bhāgam devebhyaḥ vi dadhāti āyan pra candramāḥ tirate dīrgham ayuḥ

original: RV_10.085.20.1{23} sukiṃśukaṃ śalmaliṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ suvṛtaṃsucakram
analyzed: su kiṃśukam śalmalim viśva rūpam hiraṇya varṇam suvṛtam su cakram

original: RV_10.085.20.2{23} ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokaṃ syonaṃ patye vahatuṃkṛṇuṣva
analyzed: ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokam syonam patye vahatuṃkṛṇuṣva

original: RV_10.085.21.1{24} udīrṣvātaḥ pativatī hyeṣā viśvāvasuṃ namasāgīrbhirīḷe
analyzed: ud īrṣva atas pativatī hi eṣā viśvāvasum namasā a gīrbhiḥ īḍe

original: RV_10.085.21.2{24} anyāmicha pitṛṣadaṃ vyaktāṃ sa te bhāgojanuṣā tasya viddhi
analyzed: anyām icha pitṛṣadam vyaktām sa te bhāgaḥ januṣā tasya viddhi

original: RV_10.085.22.1{24} udīrṣvāto viśvāvaso namaseḷā mahe tvā
analyzed: udīrṣva atas viśvāvaso namasā iḍā mahe tvā

original: RV_10.085.22.2{24} anyāmichaprapharvyaṃ saṃ jāyāṃ patyā sṛja
analyzed: anyām ichaprapharvyam sam jāyām patyā sṛja

original: RV_10.085.23.1{24} anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthā yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti novareyam
analyzed: anṛkṣarāḥ ṛjavaḥ santu panthāḥ yebhiḥ sakhāyaḥ yanti novareyam

original: RV_10.085.23.2{24} samaryamā saṃ bhago no ninīyāt saṃ jaspatyaṃsuyamamastu devāḥ
analyzed: sam aryamā sam bhagaḥ naḥ ninīyāt sam jaspati aṃsuyamam astu devāḥ

original: RV_10.085.24.1{24} pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitāsuśevaḥ
analyzed: pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt yena tvā abadhnāt savitā asu śevaḥ

original: RV_10.085.24.2{24} ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke 'riṣṭāṃ tvā sahapatyā dadhāmi
analyzed: ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke riṣṭām tvā sahapatyā dadhāmi

original: RV_10.085.25.1{24} preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ subaddhāmamutas karam
analyzed: pretaḥ muñcāmi na amutas su baddhām amutas karam

original: RV_10.085.25.2{24} yatheyamindra mīḍhvaḥ suputrā subhagāsati
analyzed: yathā iyam indra mīḍhvaḥ su putrā subhagā asati

original: RV_10.085.26.1{25} pūṣā tveto nayatu hastagṛhyāśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃrathena
analyzed: pūṣā tvā itas nayatu hasta gṛhya aśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃrathena

original: RV_10.085.26.2{25} gṛhān gacha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃvidathamā vadāsi
analyzed: gṛhān gacha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvaṃvidathamā vadāsi

original: RV_10.085.27.1{25} iha priyaṃ prajayā te sam ṛdhyatāmasmin gṛhe gārhapatyāyajāgṛhi
analyzed: iha priyam prajayā te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi

original: RV_10.085.27.2{25} enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ sṛjasvādhā jivrī vidathamā vadāthaḥ
analyzed: enā patyā tanvam sam sṛjasva adhā jivrī vidathamā vadāthaḥ

original: RV_10.085.28.1{25} nīlalohitaṃ bhavati kṛtyāsaktirvyajyate
analyzed: nīla lohitam bhavati kṛtyā āsaktiḥ vyajyate

original: RV_10.085.28.2{25} edhante asyājñātayaḥ patirbandheṣu badhyate
analyzed: edhante asya ajñātayaḥ patiḥ bandheṣu badhyate

original: RV_10.085.29.1{25} parā dehi śāmulyaṃ brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu
analyzed: parā dehi śāmulyam brahmabhyaḥ vi bhajā vasu

original: RV_10.085.29.2{25} kṛtyaiṣāpadvatī bhūtvyā jāyā viśate patim
analyzed: kṛtyā eṣā āpadvatī bhūtvā ā jāyā viśate patim

original: RV_10.085.30.1{25} aśrīrā tanūrbhavati ruśatī pāpayāmuyā
analyzed: aśrīrā tanūḥ bhavati ruśatī pāpayā amuyā

original: RV_10.085.30.2{25} patiryadvadhvo vāsasā svamaṅgamabhidhitsate
analyzed: patiḥ yat vadhvaḥ vāsasā svam aṅgam abhidhitsate

original: RV_10.085.31.1{26} ye vadhvaścandraṃ vahatuṃ yakṣmā yanti janādanu
analyzed: ye vadhvaḥ candram vahatum yakṣmāḥ yanti janāt anu

original: RV_10.085.31.2{26} punastān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ
analyzed: punar tān yajñiyāḥ devāḥ nayantu yatas āgatāḥ

original: RV_10.085.32.1{26} mā vidan paripanthino ya āsīdanti dampatī
analyzed: mā vidan paripanthinaḥ ye āsīdanti dampatī

original: RV_10.085.32.2{26} sugebhirdurgamatītāmapa drāntvarātayaḥ
analyzed: sugebhiḥ durgam atītām apa drāntu arātayaḥ

original: RV_10.085.33.1{26} sumaṅgalīriyaṃ vadhūrimāṃ sameta paśyata
analyzed: su maṅgalīḥ iyam vadhūḥ imām sameta paśyata

original: RV_10.085.33.2{26} saubhāgyamasyai dattvāyāthāstaṃ vi paretana
analyzed: saubhāgyam asyai dattvāya atha astam vi parā itana

original: RV_10.085.34.1{26} tṛṣṭametat kaṭukametadapāṣṭhavad viṣavan naitadattave
analyzed: tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam etat apāṣṭhavat viṣavat na etat attave

original: RV_10.085.34.2{26} sūryāṃ yo brahmā vidyāt sa id vādhūyamarhati
analyzed: sūryām yaḥ brahmā vidyāt saḥ id vādhūyam arhati

original: RV_10.085.35.1{26} āśasanaṃ viśasanamatho adhivikartanam
analyzed: āśasanam viśasanam atho adhivikartanam

original: RV_10.085.35.2{26} sūryāyaḥ paśyarūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati
analyzed: sūrya ayaḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati

original: RV_10.085.36.1{27} gṛbhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastaṃ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭiryathāsaḥ
analyzed: gṛbhṇāmi te saubhaga tvāya hastam mayā patyā jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asaḥ

original: RV_10.085.36.2{27} bhago aryamā savitā purandhirmahyaṃ tvādurgārhapatyāya devāḥ
analyzed: bhagaḥ aryamā savitā purandhiḥ mahyam tvā a dus gārhapatyāya devāḥ

original: RV_10.085.37.1{27} tāṃ pūṣañchivatamāmerayasva yasyāṃ bījaṃ manuṣyāvapanti
analyzed: tām pūṣan śivatamām erayasva yasyām bījam manuṣya āvapanti

original: RV_10.085.37.2{27} yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāte yasyāmuśantaḥpraharāma śepam
analyzed: yā naḥ ūrū uśatī viśrayāte yasyām uśantaḥ praharāma śepam

original: RV_10.085.38.1{27} tubhyamagre paryavahan sūryāṃ vahatunā saha
analyzed: tubhyam agre paryavahan sūryām vahatunā saha

original: RV_10.085.38.2{27} punaḥpatibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha
analyzed: punaḥpatibhyaḥ jāyām dāḥ agne prajayā saha

original: RV_10.085.39.1{27} punaḥ patnīmagniradādāyuṣā saha varcasā
analyzed: punar patnīm agniḥ adāt āyuṣā saha varcasā

original: RV_10.085.39.2{27} dīrghāyurasyā yaḥ patirjīvāti śaradaḥ śatam
analyzed: dīrgha āyuḥ asyāḥ yaḥ patiḥ jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam

original: RV_10.085.40.1{27} somaḥ prathamo vivide gandharvo vivida uttaraḥ
analyzed: somaḥ prathamaḥ vivide gandharvaḥ vivide uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.085.40.2{27} tṛtīyoagniṣ ṭe patisturīyaste manuṣyajāḥ
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ agniḥ te patiḥ turīyaḥ te manuṣya jāḥ

original: RV_10.085.41.1{28} somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadadagnaye
analyzed: somaḥ dadat gandharvāya gandharvaḥ dadat agnaye

original: RV_10.085.41.2{28} rayiṃ caputrāṃścādādagnirmahyamatho imām
analyzed: rayim ca putrān ca adāt agniḥ mahyam atha u imām

original: RV_10.085.42.1{28} ihaiva staṃ mā vi yauṣṭaṃ viśvamāyurvyaśnutam
analyzed: iha eva stam mā vi viśvam āyuḥ vyaśnutam

original: RV_10.085.42.2{28} kṝḷantau putrairnaptṛbhirmodamānau sve gṛhe
analyzed: kṝḷantau putraiḥ naptṛbhiḥ modamānau sve gṛhe

original: RV_10.085.43.1{28} ā naḥ prajāṃ hanayatu prajāpatirājarasāya samanaktvaryamā
analyzed: ā naḥ prajām hanayatu prajāpatiḥ āja rasāya samanaktu aryamā

original: RV_10.085.43.2{28} adurmaṅgalīḥ patilokamā viśa śaṃ no bhavadvipade śaṃ catuṣpade
analyzed: adurmaṅgalīḥ pati lokam ā viśa śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: RV_10.085.44.1{28} aghoracakṣurapatighnyedhi śivā paśubhyaḥ sumanāḥsuvarcāḥ
analyzed: aghora cakṣuḥ a pati ghnī edhi śivā paśubhyaḥ sumanāḥ suvarcāḥ

original: RV_10.085.44.2{28} vīrasūrdevakāmā syonā śaṃ no bhava dvipadeśaṃ catuṣpade
analyzed: vīra sūḥ deva kāmā syonā śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: RV_10.085.45.1{28} imāṃ tvamindra mīḍhvaḥ suputrāṃ subhagāṃ kṛṇu
analyzed: imām tvam indra mīḍhvaḥ su putrām subhagām kṛṇu

original: RV_10.085.45.2{28} daśāsyāṃ putrānā dhehi patimekādaśaṃ kṛdhi
analyzed: daśa asyām putrān ā dhehi patim ekādaśam kṛdhi

original: RV_10.085.46.1{28} samrājñī śvaśure bhava samrājñī śvaśrvāṃ bhava
analyzed: samrājñī śvaśure bhava samrājñī śvaśrvām bhava

original: RV_10.085.46.2{28} nanāndari samrājñī bhava samrājñī adhi devṛṣu
analyzed: nanāndari samrājñī bhava samrājñī adhi devṛṣu

original: RV_10.085.47.1{28} samañjantu viśve devāḥ samāpo hṛdayāni nau
analyzed: samañjantu viśve devāḥ sama apaḥ hṛdayāni nau

original: RV_10.085.47.2{28} sammātariśvā saṃ dhātā samu deṣṭrī dadhātu nau
analyzed: sam mātariśvā sam dhātā samu deṣṭrī dadhātu nau

original: RV_10.086.01.1{01} vi hi sotorasṛkṣata nendraṃ devamamaṃsata
analyzed: vi hi sotoḥ asṛkṣata na indram devam amaṃsata

original: RV_10.086.01.2{01} yatrāmadadvṛṣākapiraryaḥ puṣṭeṣu matsakhā viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: yatra amadat vṛṣākapiḥ aryaḥ puṣṭeṣu mad sakhā viśvasmāt indrauttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.02.1{01} parā hīndra dhāvasi vṛṣākaperati vyathiḥ
analyzed: parā hi indra dhāvasi vṛṣākapeḥ ati vyathiḥ

original: RV_10.086.02.2{01} no aha pravindasyanyatra somapītaye viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: na u aha pravindasi anyatra soma pītaye viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.03.1{01} kimayaṃ tvāṃ vṛṣākapiścakāra harito mṛgaḥ
analyzed: kim ayam tvām vṛṣākapiḥ cakāra haritaḥ mṛgaḥ

original: RV_10.086.03.2{01} yasmāirasyasīdu nvaryo vā puṣṭimad vasu viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: nu aryaḥ vā puṣṭimat vasu viśvasmāt indra auttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.04.1{01} yamimaṃ tvaṃ vṛṣākapiṃ priyamindrābhirakṣasi
analyzed: yam imam tvam vṛṣākapim priyam indra abhirakṣasi

original: RV_10.086.04.2{01} śvā nvasya jambhis“adapi karṇe varahayurviśvasmadindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: śvā nu asya jambhisad api karṇe vara hayuḥ viśvasmat indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.05.1{01} priyā taṣṭāni me kapirvyaktā vyadūduṣat
analyzed: priyā taṣṭāni me kapiḥ vyaktā vyadūduṣat

original: RV_10.086.05.2{01} śiro nvasya rāviṣaṃ na sugaṃ duṣkṛte bhuvaṃ viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: śiraḥ nu asya rāviṣam na sugam duṣkṛte bhuvam viśvasmāt indrauttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.06.1{02} na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat
analyzed: na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat

original: RV_10.086.06.2{02} na matpraticyavīyasī na sakthyudyamīyasī viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: na mat praticyavīyasī na sakthi udyamīyasī viśvasmāt indra auttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.07.1{02} uve amba sulābhike yathevāṅga bhaviṣyati
analyzed: amba su lābhike yathā iva aṅga bhaviṣyati

original: RV_10.086.07.2{02} bhasan me ambasakthi me śiro me vīva hṛṣyati viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: bhasad me amba sakthi me śiraḥ me vi iva hṛṣyati viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.08.1{02} kiṃ subāho svaṅgure pṛthuṣṭo pṛthujāghane
analyzed: kim su bāho su aṅgure

original: RV_10.086.08.2{02} kiṃ śūrapatninastvamabhyamīṣi vṛṣākapiṃ viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: kim śūra patninaḥ tvam abhyamīṣi vṛṣākapim viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.09.1{02} avīrāmiva māmayaṃ śarārurabhi manyate
analyzed: avīrām iva mām ayam śarāruḥ abhi manyate

original: RV_10.086.09.2{02} utāhamasmivīriṇīndrapatnī marutsakhā viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: uta aham asmi vīriṇī indra patnī marut sakhā viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.10.1{02} saṃhotraṃ sma purā nārī samanaṃ vāva gachati
analyzed: saṃhotram sma purā nārī samanam vāva gacchati

original: RV_10.086.10.2{02} vedhāṛtasya vīriṇīndrapatnī mahīyate viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: vedhā aṛtasya vīriṇī indra patnī mahīyate viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.11.1{03} indrāṇīmāsu nāriṣu subhagāmahamaśravam
analyzed: indrāṇi imāsu nāriṣu subhagām aham aśravam

original: RV_10.086.11.2{03} nahyasyāaparaṃ cana jarasā marate patirviśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: na hi asyāḥ aparam cana jarasā marate patiḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.12.1{03} nāhamindrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyurvṛṣākaper{ṛ}te
analyzed: na aham indrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyuḥ vṛṣākapeḥ ṛte

original: RV_10.086.12.2{03} yasyedamapyaṃ haviḥ priyaṃ deveṣu gachati viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: yasya idam apyam haviḥ priyam deveṣu gacchati viśvasmāt indra auttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.13.1{03} vṛṣākapāyi revati sūputra ādu susnuṣe
analyzed: vṛṣākapāyi revati su putre ādu su snuṣe

original: RV_10.086.13.2{03} ghasat ta indraukṣaṇaḥ priyaṃ kācitkaraṃ havirviśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: ghasat te indraukṣaṇaḥ priyam kācitkaram haviḥ viśvasmāt indrauttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.14.1{03} ukṣṇo hi me pañcadaśa sākaṃ pacanti viṃśatim
analyzed: ukṣṇaḥ hi me pañcadaśa sākam pacanti viṃśatim

original: RV_10.086.14.2{03} utāhamadmi pīva idubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: uta aham admi pīvaḥ id ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmāt indra auttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.15.1{03} vṛṣabho na tigmaśṛṅgo 'ntaryūtheṣu roruvat
analyzed: vṛṣabhaḥ na tigma śṛṅgaḥ ntar yūtheṣu roruvat

original: RV_10.086.15.2{03} manthastaindra śaṃ hṛde yaṃ te sunoti bhāvayurviśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: manthaḥ taindra śam hṛde yam te sunoti bhāvayuḥ viśvasmāt indrauttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.16.1{04} na seśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛt
analyzed: na sa īśe yasya rambate ntarā kapṛth

original: RV_10.086.16.2{04} sedīśeyasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: romaśam niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate viśvasmāt indrauttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.17.1{04} na seśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate
analyzed: na sa īśe yasya romaśam niṣeduṣaḥ vijṛmbhate

original: RV_10.086.17.2{04} sedīśeyasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛd viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: rambate ntarā kapṛth viśvasmāt indra auttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.18.1{04} ayamindra vṛṣākapiḥ parasvantaṃ hataṃ vidat
analyzed: ayam indra vṛṣākapiḥ parasvantam hatam vidat

original: RV_10.086.18.2{04} asiṃsūnāṃ navaṃ carumādedhasyāna ācitaṃ viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: asiṃsūnām navam carum ā dedhasya anaḥ ācitam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.19.1{04} ayamemi vicākaśad vicinvan dāsamāryam
analyzed: ayam emi vicākaśat vicinvan dāsam āryam

original: RV_10.086.19.2{04} pibāmipākasutvano 'bhi dhīramacākaśaṃ viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: pibāmipākasutvanaḥ bhi dhīram acākaśam viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.20.1{04} dhanva ca yat kṛntatraṃ ca kati svit tā vi yojanā
analyzed: dhanva ca yat kṛntatram ca kati svid tā vi yojanā

original: RV_10.086.20.2{04} nedīyāso vṛṣākape 'stamehi gṛhānupa viśvasmādindrauttarah
analyzed: nedīyāsaḥ vṛṣākape stam ehi gṛhān upa viśvasmāt indra auttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.21.1{04} punarehi vṛṣākape suvitā kalpayāvahai
analyzed: punar ehi vṛṣākape suvitā kalpayāvahai

original: RV_10.086.21.2{04} ya eṣasvapnanaṃśano 'stameṣi patha punarviśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ stam eṣi patha punar viśvasmāt indra auttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.22.1{04} yadudañco vṛṣākape gṛhamindrājagantana
analyzed: yat udañcaḥ vṛṣākape gṛham indra ajagantana

original: RV_10.086.22.2{04} kva sya pulvaghomṛgaḥ kamagañ janayopano viśvasmādindra uttaraḥ
analyzed: kva sya pulu aghaḥ mṛgaḥ kam agam jana yopanaḥ viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ

original: RV_10.086.23.1{04} parśurha nāma mānavi sākaṃ sasūva viṃśa tim
analyzed: parśuḥ ha nāma mānavi sākam sasūva viṃśa tim

original: RV_10.086.23.2{04} bhadrambhala tyasyā abhūd yasyā udaramamayad viśvasmādindrauttaraḥ
analyzed: bhadrambhala viśvasmāt indra auttaraḥ

original: RV_10.087.01.1{05} rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinamā jigharmi mitraṃ prathiṣṭhamupayāmi śarma
analyzed: rakṣaḥ haṇam vājinam ā jigharmi mitram prathiṣṭham upayāmi śarma

original: RV_10.087.01.2{05} śiśāno agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa nodivā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam
analyzed: śiśānaḥ agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam

original: RV_10.087.02.1{05} ayodaṃṣṭro arciṣā yātudhānānupa spṛśa jātavedaḥsamiddhaḥ
analyzed: ayaḥ daṃṣṭraḥ arciṣā yātudhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ

original: RV_10.087.02.2{05} ā jihvayā muradevān rabhasva kravyādo vṛktvyapi dhatsvāsan
analyzed: ā jihvayā muradevān rabhasva kravyādaḥ vṛktvī api dhatsva āsan

original: RV_10.087.03.1{05} ubhobhayāvinnupa dhehi daṃṣṭrā hiṃsraḥ śiśāno 'varamparaṃ ca
analyzed: ubhā ubhayāvin upa dhehi daṃṣṭrā hiṃsraḥ śiśānaḥ varamparam ca

original: RV_10.087.03.2{05} utāntarikṣe pari yāhi rājañ jambhaiḥ sandhehyabhi yātudhānān
analyzed: uta antarikṣe pari yāhi rājam jambhaiḥ sandhehi abhi yātudhānān

original: RV_10.087.04.1{05} yajñairiṣūḥ saṃnamamāno agne vācā śalyānaśanibhirdihānaḥ
analyzed: yajñaiḥ iṣūḥ saṃnamamānaḥ agne vācā śalyān aśanibhiḥ dihānaḥ

original: RV_10.087.04.2{05} tābhirvidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīco bāhūnprati bhaṃdhyeṣām
analyzed: tābhiḥ vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīcaḥ bāhūn prati bhaṃdhi eṣām

original: RV_10.087.05.1{05} agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsrāśanirharasāhantvenam
analyzed: agne tvacam yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsra aśaniḥ harasā ahantu enam

original: RV_10.087.05.2{05} pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyātkraviṣṇurvi cinotu vṛkṇam
analyzed: pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyād kraviṣṇuḥ vi cinotu vṛkṇam

original: RV_10.087.06.1{06} yatredānīṃ paśyasi jātavedastiṣṭhantamagna uta vācarantam
analyzed: yatra idānīm paśyasi jātavedaḥ tiṣṭhantam agne uta vā ācarantam

original: RV_10.087.06.2{06} yad vāntarikṣe pathibhiḥ patantaṃ tamastāvidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ
analyzed: yat vā antarikṣe pathibhiḥ patantam śarvā śiśānaḥ

original: RV_10.087.07.1{06} utālabdhaṃ spṛṇuhi jātaveda ālebhānād ṛṣṭibhiryātudhānāt
analyzed: uta ālabdham spṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ ālebhānāt ṛṣṭibhiḥ yātudhānāt

original: RV_10.087.07.2{06} agne pūrvo ni jahi śośucāna āmādaḥkṣviṅkāstamadantvenīḥ
analyzed: agne pūrvaḥ ni jahi śośucānaḥ

original: RV_10.087.08.1{06} iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ so agne yo yātudhāno ya idaṃkṛṇoti
analyzed: iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ saḥ agne yaḥ yātudhānaḥ yaḥ idaṃkṛṇoti

original: RV_10.087.08.2{06} tamā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛcakṣasaścakṣuṣe randhayainam
analyzed: tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛ cakṣasaḥ cakṣuṣe randhaya enam

original: RV_10.087.09.1{06} tīkṣṇenāgne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñaṃ prāñcaṃ vasubhyaḥpra ṇaya pracetaḥ
analyzed: tīkṣṇena agne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñam prāñcam vasubhyaḥ pra naya pracetaḥ

original: RV_10.087.09.2{06} hiṃsraṃ rakṣāṃsyabhi śośucānammā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ
analyzed: hiṃsram rakṣāṃsi abhi śośuca anam mā tvā dabhan yātudhānāḥ nṛ cakṣaḥ

original: RV_10.087.10.1{06} nṛcakṣā rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi pratiśṛṇīhyagrā
analyzed: nṛ cakṣāḥ rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi pratiśṛṇīhi agrā

original: RV_10.087.10.2{06} tasyāgne pṛṣṭīrharasā śṛṇīhi tredhāmūlaṃ yātudhānasya vṛśca
analyzed: tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca

original: RV_10.087.11.1{07} triryātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ ta etv ṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti
analyzed: tris yātudhānaḥ prasitim te etu ṛtam yaḥ agne anṛtena hanti

original: RV_10.087.11.2{07} tamarciṣā sphūrjayañ jātavedaḥ samakṣamenaṃ gṛṇateni vṛṃdhi
analyzed: tam arciṣā sphūrjayam jātavedaḥ samakṣam enam vṛṃdhi

original: RV_10.087.12.1{07} tadagne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaṃ yenapaśyasi yātudhānam
analyzed: tat agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujam yena paśyasi yātudhānam

original: RV_10.087.12.2{07} atharvavajjyotiṣā daivyena satyandhūrvantamacitaṃ nyoṣa
analyzed: atharva vat jyotiṣā daivyena satyan dhūrvantam acitam nyoṣa

original: RV_10.087.13.1{07} yadagne adya mithunā śapāto yad vācastṛṣṭaṃ janayantarebhāḥ
analyzed: yat agne adya mithunā śapātaḥ yat vācaḥ tṛṣṭam janayanta rebhāḥ

original: RV_10.087.13.2{07} manyormanasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhyahṛdaye yātudhānān
analyzed: manyoḥ manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān

original: RV_10.087.14.1{07} parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasāśṛṇīhi
analyzed: parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parā agne rakṣaḥ harasā āśṛṇīhi

original: RV_10.087.14.2{07} parārciṣā mūradevāñchṛṇīhi parāsutṛpo abhiśośucānaḥ
analyzed: parā arciṣā mūradevān śṛṇīhi parā asutṛpaḥ abhiśośucānaḥ

original: RV_10.087.15.1{07} parādya devā vṛjinaṃ śṛṇantu pratyagenaṃ śapathā yantutṛṣṭāḥ
analyzed: parā adya devāḥ vṛjinam śṛṇantu pratyak enam śapathāḥ yantu tṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_10.087.15.2{07} vācāstenaṃ śarava ṛchantu marman viśvasyaituprasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ
analyzed: vācāstenam śaravaḥ ṛchantu marman viśvasya aituprasitim yātudhānaḥ

original: RV_10.087.16.1{08} yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yo aśveyena paśunāyātudhānaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yaḥ aśveyena paśunā a yātudhānaḥ

original: RV_10.087.16.2{08} yo aghnyāyā bharati kṣīramagne teṣāṃśīrṣāṇi harasāpi vṛśca
analyzed: yaḥ aghnyāyāḥ bharati kṣīram agne teṣām śīrṣāṇi harasā api vṛśca

original: RV_10.087.17.1{08} saṃvatsarīṇaṃ paya usriyāyāstasya māśīd yātudhānonṛcakṣaḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsarīṇam payaḥ usriyāyāḥ tasya mā aśīt yātudhānā unṛ cakṣaḥ

original: RV_10.087.17.2{08} pīyūṣamagne yatamastitṛpsāt taṃ pratyañcamarciṣā vidhya marman
analyzed: pīyūṣam agne yatamaḥ titṛpsāt tam pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marman

original: RV_10.087.18.1{08} viṣaṃ gavāṃ yātudhānāḥ pibantvā vṛścyantāmaditayedurevāḥ
analyzed: viṣam gavām yātudhānāḥ pibantvā vṛścyantām aditayā idurevāḥ

original: RV_10.087.18.2{08} parainān devaḥ savitā dadātu parā bhāgamoṣadhīnāṃ jayantām
analyzed: parā enān devaḥ savitā dadātu parā bhāgam oṣadhīnām jayantām

original: RV_10.087.19.1{08} sanādagne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsujigyuḥ
analyzed: sanāt agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ

original: RV_10.087.19.2{08} anu daha sahamūrān kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣatadaivyāyāḥ
analyzed: anu daha sahamūrān kravyādaḥ mā te hetyāḥ mukṣata daivyāyāḥ

original: RV_10.087.20.1{08} tvaṃ no agne adharādudaktāt tvaṃ paścāduta rakṣāpurastāt
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne adharāt udaktāt tvam paścāt uta rakṣa apurastāt

original: RV_10.087.20.2{08} prati te te ajarāsastapiṣṭhā aghaśaṃsaṃśośucato dahantu
analyzed: prati te te ajarāsaḥ tapiṣṭhāḥ agha śaṃsam śośucataḥ dahantu

original: RV_10.087.21.1{09} paścāt purastādadharādudaktāt kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhirājan
analyzed: paścāt purastāt adharāt udaktāt kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhi rājan

original: RV_10.087.21.2{09} sakhe sakhāyamajaro jarimṇe 'gne martānamartyastvaṃ naḥ
analyzed: sakhe sakhāyam ajaraḥ jarimṇe gne martān amartyaḥ tvam naḥ

original: RV_10.087.22.1{09} pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi
analyzed: pari tvā agne puram vayam vipram sahasya dhīmahi

original: RV_10.087.22.2{09} dhṛṣadvarṇaṃ dive-dive hantāraṃ bhaṅgurāvatām
analyzed: dhṛṣat varṇam dive dive hantāram bhaṅgurāvatām

original: RV_10.087.23.1{09} viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati ṣma rakṣaso daha
analyzed: viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati sma rakṣasaḥ daha

original: RV_10.087.23.2{09} agnetigmena śociṣā tapuragrābhir{ṛ}ṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: agne tigmena śociṣā tapuḥ agrābhiḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: RV_10.087.24.1{09} pratyagne mithuna daha yātudhānā kimīdinā
analyzed: pratyagne mithuna daha yātudhānā kimīdinā

original: RV_10.087.24.2{09} saṃ tvāśiśāmi jābṛhyadabdhaṃ vipra manmabhiḥ
analyzed: sam tvā āśiśāmi vipra manmabhiḥ

original: RV_10.087.25.1{09} pratyagne harasā haraḥ śṛṇīhi viśvataḥ prati
analyzed: prati agne harasā haraḥ śṛṇīhi viśvatas prati

original: RV_10.087.25.2{09} yātudhānasya rakṣaso balaṃ vi ruja vīryam
analyzed: yātudhānasya rakṣasaḥ balam vi ruja vīryam

original: RV_10.088.01.1{10} haviṣ pāntamajaraṃ svarvidi divispṛśyāhutaṃ juṣṭamagnau
analyzed: haviḥ pāntam ajaram svarvidi divispṛśi āhutam juṣṭam agnau

original: RV_10.088.01.2{10} tasya bharmaṇe bhuvanāya devā dharmaṇe kaṃsvadhayā paprathanta
analyzed: tasya bharmaṇe bhuvanāya devāḥ dharmaṇe kaṃsvadhayā paprathanta

original: RV_10.088.02.1{10} gīrṇaṃ bhuvanaṃ tamasapagūḷamāviḥ svarabhavajjāteagnau
analyzed: gīrṇam bhuvanam āvis svar abhavat jāte agnau

original: RV_10.088.02.2{10} tasya devāḥ pṛthivi dyaurutāpo 'raṇayannoṣadhīḥ sakhye asya
analyzed: tasya devāḥ pṛthivi dyauḥ uta apaḥ raṇayan oṣadhīḥ sakhye asya

original: RV_10.088.03.1{10} devebhirnviṣito yajñiyebhiragniṃ stoṣāṇyajarambṛhantam
analyzed: devebhiḥ nu iṣitaḥ yajñiyebhiḥ agnim stoṣāṇi ajaram bṛhantam

original: RV_10.088.03.2{10} yo bhānunā pṛthiviṃ dyāmutemāmātatānarodasī antarikṣam
analyzed: yaḥ bhānunā pṛthivim dyām uta imām ātatāna rodasī antarikṣam

original: RV_10.088.04.1{10} yo hotāsīt prathamo devajuṣṭo yaṃ samañjannājyenāvṛṇānaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ hotā āsīt prathamaḥ deva juṣṭaḥ yam samañjan ājyena āvṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_10.088.04.2{10} sa patatrītvaraṃ stha jagad yacchvātramagnirakṛnojjātavedaḥ
analyzed: sa patatrītvaram stha jagat yat śvātram agniḥ akṛnot jātavedaḥ

original: RV_10.088.05.1{10} yajjatavedo bhuvanasya mūrdhannatiṣṭho agne saha rocanena
analyzed: yat jata vedaḥ bhuvanasya mūrdhan atiṣṭhaḥ agne saha rocanena

original: RV_10.088.05.2{10} taṃ tvahema matibhirgīrbhirukthaiḥ sa yajñiyo abhavorodasiprāḥ
analyzed: tam tvahema matibhiḥ gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ sa yajñiyaḥ abhava uroda siprāḥ

original: RV_10.088.06.1{11} mūrdhā bhuvo bhavati naktamagnistataḥ suryo jāyateprātarudyan
analyzed: mūrdhā bhuvaḥ bhavati naktam agniḥ tatas suryaḥ jāyate prātar udyan

original: RV_10.088.06.2{11} mayāmu tu yajñiyānāmetamapo yattūrṇiścarati prajānan
analyzed: mayā āmu tu yajñiyānām etam apaḥ yat tūrṇiḥ carati prajānan

original: RV_10.088.07.1{11} dṛśenyo yo mahinā samiddho 'rocata diviyonirvibhāvā
analyzed: dṛśenyaḥ yaḥ mahinā samiddhaḥ rocata diviyoniḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_10.088.07.2{11} tasminnagnau sūktavākena devā havirviśva ajuhavustanūpāḥ
analyzed: tasmin agnau sūktavākena devāḥ haviḥ viśve ajuhavuḥ tanū pāḥ

original: RV_10.088.08.1{11} sūktavakaṃ prathamamādidagnimādid dhavirajanayantadevāḥ
analyzed: sūktavakam prathamam ādit agnim ādit haviḥ ajanayanta devāḥ

original: RV_10.088.08.2{11} sa eṣāṃ yajño abhavat tanūpastaṃ dyaurvedataṃ prithivi tamāpaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣām yajñaḥ abhavat tanū paḥ tam dyauḥ vedatam prithivi tam āpaḥ

original: RV_10.088.09.1{11} yaṃ devāso ajanayantāgniṃ yasminnājuhavurbhuvanāniviśvā
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ ajanayanta agnim yasmin ājuhavuḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10.088.09.2{11} so arciṣā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemām ṛjūyamānoatapan mahitvā
analyzed: saḥ arciṣā pṛthivīm dyām uta imām ṛjūyamānaḥ atapat mahitvā

original: RV_10.088.10.1{11} stomena hi divi devāso agnimajījanañchaktibhīrodasiprām
analyzed: stomena hi divi devāsaḥ agnim ajījanan śaktibhīrodasiprām

original: RV_10.088.10.2{11} tamū akṛṇvan tredhā bhuve kaṃ sa oṣadhīḥpacati viśvarūpāḥ
analyzed: tam ū akṛṇvan tredhā bhuve kam saḥ oṣadhīḥ pacati viśva rūpāḥ

original: RV_10.088.11.1{12} yadedenamadadhuryajñiyāso divi devāḥ sūryamāditeyam
analyzed: yadā id enam adadhuḥ yajñiyāsaḥ divi devāḥ sūryam āditeyam

original: RV_10.088.11.2{12} yadā cariṣṇū mithunāvabhūtāmādit prāpaśyanbhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: yadā cariṣṇū mithunau abhūtām ādit prāpaśyan bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10.088.12.1{12} viśvasmā agniṃ bhuvanāya devā vaiśvānaraṃ ketumahnāmakṛṇvan
analyzed: viśvasmai agnim bhuvanāya devāḥ vaiśvānaram ketum ahnām akṛṇvan

original: RV_10.088.12.2{12} ā yastatānoṣaso vibhātīrapo ūrṇoti tamoarciṣā yan
analyzed: ā yaḥ tatāna uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ apaḥ ūrṇoti tamaḥ arciṣā yan

original: RV_10.088.13.1{12} vaiśvānaraṃ kavayo yajñiyāso 'gniṃ devā ajanayannajuryam
analyzed: vaiśvānaram kavayaḥ yajñiyāsaḥ gnim devāḥ ajanayan ajuryam

original: RV_10.088.13.2{12} nakṣatraṃ pratnamaminaccariṣṇu yakṣasyādhyakṣantaviṣaṃ bṛhantam
analyzed: nakṣatram pratnam aminat cariṣṇu yakṣasya adhyakṣantaviṣam bṛhantam

original: RV_10.088.14.1{12} vaiśvānaraṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsaṃ mantrairagniṃ kavimachā vadāmaḥ
analyzed: vaiśvānaram viśvahā dīdivāṃsam mantraiḥ agnim kavim achā vadāmaḥ

original: RV_10.088.14.2{12} yo mahimnā paribabhūvorvī utāvastādutadevaḥ parastāt
analyzed: yaḥ mahimnā paribabhūva urvī uta avastāt uta devaḥ parastāt

original: RV_10.088.15.1{12} dve srutī aśṛṇavaṃ pitṝṇāmahaṃ devānāmutamartyānām
analyzed: dve srutī aśṛṇavam pitṝṇām aham devānām uta martyānām

original: RV_10.088.15.2{12} tābhyāmidaṃ viśvamejat sameti yadantarāpitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
analyzed: tābhyām idam viśvam ejat sameti yat antarā pitaram mātaram ca

original: RV_10.088.16.1{13} dve samīcī bibhṛtaścarantaṃ śīrṣato jātaṃ manasāvimṛṣṭam
analyzed: dve samīcī bibhṛtaḥ carantam śīrṣataḥ jātam manasā a vimṛṣṭam

original: RV_10.088.16.2{13} sa pratyaṃ viśvā bhuvanāni tasthāvaprayuchantaraṇirbhrājamānaḥ
analyzed: sa pratyam viśvā bhuvanāni tasthau aprayuchanta raṇiḥ bhrājamānaḥ

original: RV_10.088.17.1{13} yatrā vadete avaraḥ paraśca yajñanyoḥ kataro nau vi veda
analyzed: yatra vadete avaraḥ paraḥ ca yajñanyoḥ kataraḥ nau vi veda

original: RV_10.088.17.2{13} ā śekurit sadhamādaṃ sakhāyo nakṣanta yajñaṃ kaidaṃ vi vocat
analyzed: ā śekuḥ id sadhamādam sakhāyaḥ nakṣanta yajñam kā idam vi vocat

original: RV_10.088.18.1{13} katyagnayaḥ kati sūryāsaḥ katyuṣāsaḥ katyu svidāpaḥ
analyzed: kati agnayaḥ kati sūryāsaḥ kati uṣāsaḥ kati u svid apaḥ

original: RV_10.088.18.2{13} nopaspijaṃ vaḥ pitaro vadāmi pṛchāmi vaḥ kavayovidmane kam
analyzed: na upaspijam vaḥ pitaraḥ vadāmi pṛcchāmi vaḥ kavayaḥ vidmane kam

original: RV_10.088.19.1{13} yāvanmātramuṣaso na pratīkaṃ suparṇyo vasatemātariśvaḥ
analyzed: yāvanmātram uṣasaḥ na pratīkam suparṇyaḥ vasate mātariśvaḥ

original: RV_10.088.19.2{13} tāvad dadhātyupa yajñamāyan brāhmaṇohoturavaro niṣīdan
analyzed: tāvat dadhāti upa yajñam āyan brāhmaṇaḥ hotuḥ avaraḥ niṣīdan

original: RV_10.089.01.1{14} indraṃ stavā nṛtamaṃ yasya mahnā vibabādhe rocanā vi jmoantān
analyzed: indram stavā nṛtamam yasya mahnā vibabādhe rocanā vi jmaḥ antān

original: RV_10.089.01.2{14} ā yaḥ paprau carṣaṇīdhṛd varobhiḥ prasindhubhyo riricāno mahitvā
analyzed: ā yaḥ paprau carṣaṇī dhṛt varobhiḥ prasindhubhyaḥ riricānaḥ mahitvā

original: RV_10.089.02.1{14} sa sūryaḥ paryurū varāṃsyendro vavṛtyād rathyevacakrā
analyzed: sa sūryaḥ paryurū varāṃsi indraḥ vavṛtyāt rathyā iva cakrā

original: RV_10.089.02.2{14} atiṣṭhantamapasyaṃ na sargaṃ kṛṣṇā tamāṃsitviṣyā jaghāna
analyzed: atiṣṭhantam apasyam na sargam kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi tviṣyā jaghāna

original: RV_10.089.03.1{14} samānamasmā anapāvṛdarca kṣmayā divo asamaṃ brahmanavyam
analyzed: samānam asmai an apāvṛt arca kṣmayā divaḥ asamam brahma navyam

original: RV_10.089.03.2{14} vi yaḥ pṛṣṭheva janimānyarya indraścikāya nasakhāyamīṣe
analyzed: vi yaḥ pṛṣṭhā iva janimāni aryaḥ indraḥ cikāya na sakhāyam īṣe

original: RV_10.089.04.1{14} indrāya giro aniśitasargā apaḥ prerayaṃ sagarasya budhnāt
analyzed: indrāya giraḥ aniśita sargāḥ apaḥ prerayam sagarasya budhnāt

original: RV_10.089.04.2{14} yo akṣeṇeva cakriyā śacībhirviṣvak tastambhapṛthivīmuta dyām
analyzed: yaḥ akṣeṇa iva cakriyā śacībhiḥ viṣvak tastambha pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_10.089.05.1{14} āpāntamanyustṛpalaprabharmā dhuniḥ śimīvāñcharumānṛjīṣī
analyzed: āpāntamanyuḥ tṛpala prabharmā dhuniḥ śimīvān śarumān ṛjīṣī

original: RV_10.089.05.2{14} somo viśvānyatasā vanāni nārvāgindrampratimānāni debhuḥ
analyzed: somaḥ viśvāni atasā vanāni na arvāk indram pratimānāni debhuḥ

original: RV_10.089.06.1{15} na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī na dhanva nāntarikṣaṃ nādrayaḥsomo akṣāḥ
analyzed: na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī na dhanva na antarikṣam na adrayaḥ somaḥ akṣāḥ

original: RV_10.089.06.2{15} yadasya manyuradhinīyamānaḥ sṛṇāti vīḷurujati sthirāṇi
analyzed: yat asya manyuḥ adhinīyamānaḥ sṛṇāti vīḷuḥ ujati sthirāṇi

original: RV_10.089.07.1{15} jaghāna vṛtraṃ svadhitirvaneva ruroja puro aradan nasindhūn
analyzed: jaghāna vṛtram svadhitiḥ vanā iva ruroja puraḥ aradat na sindhūn

original: RV_10.089.07.2{15} bibheda giriṃ navamin na kumbhamā gā indroakṛṇuta svayugbhiḥ
analyzed: bibheda girim navamin na kumbhamā gāḥ indraḥ akṛṇuta svayugbhiḥ

original: RV_10.089.08.1{15} tvaṃ ha tyad ṛṇayā indra dhīro 'sirna parva vṛjināśṛṇāsi
analyzed: tvam ha tyad ṛṇayāḥ indra dhīraḥ sirna parva vṛjinā aśṛṇāsi

original: RV_10.089.08.2{15} pra ye mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma yujaṃ na janāminanti mitram
analyzed: pra ye mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma yujam na jana āminanti mitram

original: RV_10.089.09.1{15} pra ye mitraṃ prāryamaṇaṃ durevāḥ pra saṃgiraḥ pravaruṇaṃ minanti
analyzed: pra ye mitram pra aryamaṇam durevāḥ pra saṃgiraḥ pravaruṇam minanti

original: RV_10.089.09.2{15} nyamitreṣu vadhamindra tumraṃ vṛṣanvṛṣāṇamaruṣaṃ śiśīhi
analyzed: nyamitreṣu vadham indra tumram vṛṣan vṛṣāṇam aruṣam śiśīhi

original: RV_10.089.10.1{15} indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apāmindra itparvatānām
analyzed: indraḥ divaḥ indraḥ īśe pṛthivyāḥ indraḥ apām indraḥ id parvatānām

original: RV_10.089.10.2{15} indro vṛdhāmindra in medhirāṇāmindraḥkṣeme yoge havya indraḥ
analyzed: indraḥ vṛdhām indraḥ id medhirāṇām indraḥ kṣeme yoge havyaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_10.089.11.1{16} prāktubhya indraḥ pra vṛdho ahabhyaḥ prāntarikṣāt prasamudrasya dhāseḥ
analyzed: pra aktubhyaḥ indraḥ pra vṛdhaḥ ahabhyaḥ pra antarikṣāt pra samudrasya dhāseḥ

original: RV_10.089.11.2{16} pra vātasya prathasaḥ pra jmo antātpra sindhubhyo ririce pra kṣitibhyaḥ
analyzed: pra vātasya prathasaḥ pra jmaḥ antāt pra sindhubhyaḥ ririce pra kṣitibhyaḥ

original: RV_10.089.12.1{16} pra śośucatyā uṣaso na keturasinvā te vartatāmindrahetiḥ
analyzed: pra śośucatyāḥ uṣasaḥ na ketuḥ asin vā te vartatām indra hetiḥ

original: RV_10.089.12.2{16} aśmeva vidhya diva ā sṛjānastapiṣṭhena heṣasādroghamitrān
analyzed: aśmā iva vidhya divaḥ ā sṛjānaḥ tapiṣṭhena heṣasā adrogha mitrān

original: RV_10.089.13.1{16} anvaha māsā anvid vanānyanvoṣadhīranu parvatāsaḥ
analyzed: anu aha māsāḥ anu id vanāni anu oṣadhīḥ anu parvatāsaḥ

original: RV_10.089.13.2{16} anvindraṃ rodasī vāvaśāne anvāpo ajihatajāyamānam
analyzed: anu indram rodasī vāvaśāne anu apaḥ ajihata jāyamānam

original: RV_10.089.14.1{16} karhi svit sā ta indra cetyāsadaghasya yad bhinado rakṣaeṣat
analyzed: karhi svid sā te indra cetyā asat aghasya yat bhinadaḥ rakṣaḥ eṣat

original: RV_10.089.14.2{16} mitrakruvo yacchasane na gāvaḥ pṛthivyā āpṛgamuyā śayante
analyzed: mitra kruvaḥ yat śasane na gāvaḥ pṛthivyāḥ āpṛgamuyā śayante

original: RV_10.089.15.1{16} śatrūyanto abhi ye nastatasre mahi vrādhanta ogaṇāsaindra
analyzed: śatrūyantaḥ abhi ye nastatasre mahi vrādhantaḥ ogaṇāsa indra

original: RV_10.089.15.2{16} andhenāmitrāstamasā sacantāṃ sujyotiṣo aktavastānabhi ṣyuḥ
analyzed: andhena amitrāḥ tamasā sacantām su jyotiṣaḥ aktavaḥ tān abhi syuḥ

original: RV_10.089.16.1{16} purūṇi hi tvā savanā janānāṃ brahmāṇi mandan gṛṇatāmṛṣīṇām
analyzed: purūṇi hi tvā savanā janānām brahmāṇi mandan gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_10.089.16.2{16} imāmāghoṣannavasā sahūtiṃ tiro viśvānarcato yāhyarvāṃ
analyzed: imām āghoṣan avasā sahūtim tiras viśvān arcataḥ yāhi arvān

original: RV_10.089.17.1{16} evā te vayamindra bhuñjatīnāṃ vidyāma sumatīnāṃnavānām
analyzed: eva te vayam indra bhuñjatīnām vidyāma sumatīnāṃnavānām

original: RV_10.089.17.2{16} vidyāma vastoravasā gṛṇanto viśvāmitrā utata indra nūnam
analyzed: vidyāma vastoḥ avasā gṛṇantaḥ viśvāmitrāḥ utatas indra nūnam

original: RV_10.089.18.1{16} śunaṃ huvema maghavānaṃ ...
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam

original: RV_10.090.01.1{17} sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt
analyzed: sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasra akṣaḥ sahasra pād

original: RV_10.090.01.2{17} sabhūmiṃ viśvato vṛtvātyatiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam
analyzed: sa bhūmim viśvatas vṛtvā atyatiṣṭhat daśa aṅgulam

original: RV_10.090.02.1{17} puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yacca bhavyam
analyzed: puruṣaḥ eva idam sarvam yat bhūtam yat ca bhavyam

original: RV_10.090.02.2{17} utāmṛtatvasyeśāno yadannenātirohati
analyzed: uta amṛta tvasya īśānaḥ yat annena atirohati

original: RV_10.090.03.1{17} etāvānasya mahimāto jyāyāṃśca pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: etāvān asya mahimā atas jyāyān ca pūruṣaḥ

original: RV_10.090.03.2{17} pādo 'syaviśvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi
analyzed: pādaḥ sya viśvā bhūtāni tri pādasya amṛtam divi

original: RV_10.090.04.1{17} tripādūrdhva udait puruṣaḥ pādo 'syehābhavat punaḥ
analyzed: tri pād ūrdhvaḥ udait puruṣaḥ pādaḥ u sya iha abhavat punar

original: RV_10.090.04.2{17} tato viṣvaṃ vyakrāmat sāśanānaśane abhi
analyzed: tatas viṣvam vyakrāmat sa aśana anaśane abhi

original: RV_10.090.05.1{17} tasmād virāḷ ajāyata virājo adhi pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt virāj ajāyata virājaḥ adhi pūruṣaḥ

original: RV_10.090.05.2{17} sa jātoatyaricyata paścād bhūmimatho puraḥ
analyzed: sa jātaḥ atyaricyata paścāt bhūmim atho puras

original: RV_10.090.06.1{18} yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñamatanvata
analyzed: yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devāḥ yajñam atanvata

original: RV_10.090.06.2{18} vasantoasyāsīdājyaṃ grīṣma idhmaḥ śarad dhaviḥ
analyzed: vasantoasya āsīt ājyam grīṣmaḥ idhmaḥ śarad haviḥ

original: RV_10.090.07.1{18} taṃ yajñaṃ barhiṣi praukṣan puruṣaṃ jātamagrataḥ
analyzed: tam yajñam barhiṣi praukṣan puruṣam jātam agratas

original: RV_10.090.07.2{18} tena devā ayajanta sādhyā ṛṣayaśca ye
analyzed: tena devāḥ ayajanta sādhyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca ye

original: RV_10.090.08.1{18} tasmād yajñāt sarvahutaḥ sambhṛtaṃ pṛṣadājyam
analyzed: tasmāt yajñāt sarva hutaḥ sambhṛtam pṛṣadājyam

original: RV_10.090.08.2{18} paśūntāṃścakre vāyavyānāraṇyān grāmyāśca ye
analyzed: paśūn tān cakre vāyavyān āraṇyān grāmyāḥ ca ye

original: RV_10.090.09.1{18} tasmād yajñāt sarvahuta ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire
analyzed: tasmāt yajñāt sarva hutaḥ ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire

original: RV_10.090.09.2{18} chandāṃsijajñire tasmād yajustasmādajāyata
analyzed: chandāṃsi jajñire tasmāt yajuḥ tasmāt ajāyata

original: RV_10.090.10.1{18} tasmādaśvā ajāyanta ye ke cobhayādataḥ
analyzed: tasmāt aśvāḥ ajāyanta ye ke ca ubhayāt atas

original: RV_10.090.10.2{18} gāvo hajajñire tasmāt tasmājjātā ajāvayaḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ hajajñire tasmāt tasmāt jātāḥ aja avayaḥ

original: RV_10.090.11.1{19} yat puruṣaṃ vyadadhuḥ katidhā vyakalpayan
analyzed: yat puruṣam vyadadhuḥ katidhā vyakalpayan

original: RV_10.090.11.2{19} mukhaṃ kimasya kau bāhū kā ūrū pādā ucyete
analyzed: mukham kim asya kau bāhū kau ūrū pādau ucyete

original: RV_10.090.12.1{19} brāhmaṇo 'sya mukhamāsīd bāhū rājanyaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ sya mukham āsīt bāhū rājanyaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: RV_10.090.12.2{19} ūrūtadasya yad vaiśyaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata
analyzed: ūrūtadasya yat vaiśyaḥ padbhyām śūdraḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10.090.13.1{19} candramā manaso jātaścakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata
analyzed: candramāḥ manasaḥ jātaḥ cakṣoḥ sūryaḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10.090.13.2{19} mukhādindraścāgniśca prāṇād vāyurajāyata
analyzed: mukhāt indraḥ ca agniḥ ca prāṇāt vāyuḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10.090.14.1{19} nābhyā āsīdantarikṣaṃ śīrṣṇo dyauḥ samavartata
analyzed: nābhyāḥ āsīt antarikṣam śīrṣṇaḥ dyauḥ samavartata

original: RV_10.090.14.2{19} padbhyāṃ bhūmirdiśaḥ śrotrāt tathā lokānakalpayan
analyzed: padbhyām bhūmiḥ diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā lokān akalpayan

original: RV_10.090.15.1{19} saptāsyāsan paridhayastriḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: sapta asya āsan paridhayaḥ tris sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ

original: RV_10.090.15.2{19} devāyad yajñaṃ tanvānā abadhnan puruṣaṃ paśum
analyzed: devāyat yajñam tanvānāḥ abadhnan puruṣam paśum

original: RV_10.090.16.1{19} yajñena yajñamayajanta devāstāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan
analyzed: yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan

original: RV_10.090.16.2{19} te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥsanti devāḥ
analyzed: te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ

original: RV_10.091.01.1{20} saṃ jāgṛvadbhirjaramāṇa idhyate dame damūnā iṣayanniḷas pade
analyzed: sam jāgṛvadbhiḥ jaramāṇaḥ idhyate dame damūnāḥ iṣayan iḍaḥ pade

original: RV_10.091.01.2{20} viśvasya hotā haviṣo vareṇyo vibhurvibhāvāsuṣakhā sakhīyate
analyzed: viśvasya hotā haviṣaḥ vareṇyaḥ vibhuḥ vibhāvā asu sakhā sakhīyate

original: RV_10.091.02.1{20} sa darśataśrīratithirgṛhe-gṛhe vane-vane śiśriyetakvavīriva
analyzed: sa darśata śrīḥ atithiḥ gṛhe gṛhe vane vane śiśriyeta kvavīḥ iva

original: RV_10.091.02.2{20} janaṃ-janaṃ janyo nāti manyate viśa ākṣeti viśyo viśaṃ viśam
analyzed: janaṃjanam janyaḥ na ati manyate viśaḥ ākṣeti viśyaḥ viśam viśam

original: RV_10.091.03.1{20} sudakṣo dakṣaiḥ kratunāsi sukraturagne kaviḥ kāvyenāsiviśvavit
analyzed: su dakṣaḥ dakṣaiḥ kratunā asi su kratuḥ agne kaviḥ kāvyena asi viśva vid

original: RV_10.091.03.2{20} vasurvasūnāṃ kṣayasi tvameka id dyāvā cayāni pṛthivī ca puṣyataḥ
analyzed: vasuḥ vasūnām kṣayasi tvam ekaḥ id dyāvā cayāni pṛthivī ca puṣyataḥ

original: RV_10.091.04.1{20} prajānannagne tava yonim ṛtviyamiḷāyās pade ghṛtavantamāsadaḥ
analyzed: prajānan agne tava yonim ṛtviyam iḷāyāḥ pade ghṛtavantam āsadaḥ

original: RV_10.091.04.2{20} ā te cikitra uṣasāmivetayo 'repasaḥ sūryasyevaraśmayaḥ
analyzed: ā te cikitre uṣasām iva etayaḥ repasaḥ sūryasya iva raśmayaḥ

original: RV_10.091.05.1{20} tava śriyo varṣyasyeva vidyutaścitrāścikitra uṣasāṃna ketavaḥ
analyzed: tava śriyaḥ varṣyasya iva vidyutaḥ citrāḥ cikitre uṣasām na ketavaḥ

original: RV_10.091.05.2{20} yadoṣadhīrabhisṛṣṭo vanāni ca parisvayaṃ cinuṣe annamāsye
analyzed: yat oṣadhīḥ abhisṛṣṭaḥ vanāni ca pari svayam cinuṣe annam āsye

original: RV_10.091.06.1{21} tamoṣadhīrdadhire garbham ṛtviyaṃ tamāpo agniṃjanayanta mātaraḥ
analyzed: tam oṣadhīḥ dadhire garbham ṛtviyam tam āpaḥ agnim janayanta mātaraḥ

original: RV_10.091.06.2{21} tamit samānaṃ vaninaśca vīrudho'ntarvatīśca suvate ca viśvahā
analyzed: tam id samānam vaninaḥ ca vīrudhaḥ ntarvatīḥ ca suvate ca viśvahā

original: RV_10.091.07.1{21} vātopadhūta iṣito vaśānanu tṛṣu yadannā veviṣadvitiṣṭhase
analyzed: vāta upadhūtaḥ iṣitaḥ vaśān anu tṛṣu yat annā veviṣat vitiṣṭhase

original: RV_10.091.07.2{21} ā te yatante rathyo yathā pṛthak chardhāṃsyagne ajarāṇi dhakṣataḥ
analyzed: ā te yatante rathyaḥ yathā pṛthak chardhāṃsi agne ajarāṇi dhakṣataḥ

original: RV_10.091.08.1{21} medhākāraṃ vidathasya prasādhanamagniṃ hotāramparibhūtamaṃ matim
analyzed: medhā kāram vidathasya prasādhanam agnim hotāram paribhūtamam matim

original: RV_10.091.08.2{21} tamidarbhe haviṣyā samānamittamin mahe vṛṇate nānyaṃ tvat
analyzed: tamidarbhe haviṣyā samānam id tamid mahe vṛṇate na anyam tvat

original: RV_10.091.09.1{21} tvāmidatra vṛṇate tvāyavo hotāramagne vidatheṣuvedhasaḥ
analyzed: tvām id atra vṛṇate tvāyavaḥ hotāram agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ

original: RV_10.091.09.2{21} yad devayanto dadhati prayāṇsi te haviṣmantomanavo vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
analyzed: yat devayantaḥ dadhati prayāṇsi te haviṣmantaḥ manavaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_10.091.10.1{21} tavāgne hotraṃ tava potram ṛtviyaṃ tava neṣṭraṃ tvamagnid ṛtāyataḥ
analyzed: tava agne hotram tava potram ṛtviyam tava neṣṭram tvam agnidh ṛta āyataḥ

original: RV_10.091.10.2{21} tava praśāstraṃ tvamadhvarīyasi brahmācāsi gṛhapatiśca no dame
analyzed: tava praśāstram tvam adhvarīyasi brahmā acā asi gṛhapatiḥ ca naḥ dame

original: RV_10.091.11.1{22} yastubhyamagne amṛtāya martyaḥ samidhā dāśaduta vāhaviṣkṛti
analyzed: yaḥ tubhyam agne amṛtāya martyaḥ samidhā dāśat uta vā a haviṣkṛti

original: RV_10.091.11.2{22} tasya hotā bhavasi yāsi dūtyamupa brūṣeyajasyadhvarīyasi
analyzed: tasya hotā bhavasi yāsi dūtyam upa brūṣeyajasi adhvarīyasi

original: RV_10.091.12.1{22} imā asmai matayo vāco asmadān ṛco giraḥ suṣṭutayaḥsamagmata
analyzed: imāḥ asmai matayaḥ vācaḥ asmadān ṛcaḥ giraḥ suṣṭutayaḥ samagmata

original: RV_10.091.12.2{22} vasūyavo vasave jātavedase vṛddhāsu cid vardhanoyāsu cākanat
analyzed: vasūyavaḥ vasave jātavedase vṛddhāsu cit vardhanoyāsu cākanat

original: RV_10.091.13.1{22} imāṃ pratnāya suṣṭutiṃ navīyasīṃ voceyamasmā uśateśṛṇotu naḥ
analyzed: imām pratnāya suṣṭutim navīyasīm voceyam asmai uśate śṛṇotu naḥ

original: RV_10.091.13.2{22} bhūyā antarā hṛdyasya nispṛśe jāyevapatya uśatī suvāsāḥ
analyzed: bhūyāḥ antarā hṛdyasya nispṛśe uśatī su vāsāḥ

original: RV_10.091.14.1{22} yasminnaśvāsa ṛṣabhāsa ukṣaṇo vaśā meṣāavasṛṣṭāsa āhutāḥ
analyzed: yasmin aśvāsaḥ ṛṣabhāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ vaśāḥ meṣāavasṛṣṭāsaḥ āhutāḥ

original: RV_10.091.14.2{22} kīlālape somapṛṣṭhāya vedhasehṛdā matiṃ janaye cārumagnaye
analyzed: kīlāla pe soma pṛṣṭhāya matim janaye cārum agnaye

original: RV_10.091.15.1{22} ahāvyagne havirāsye te srucīva ghṛtaṃ camvīva somaḥ
analyzed: ahāvyagne haviḥ āsye te sruci iva ghṛtam camvi iva somaḥ

original: RV_10.091.15.2{22} vājasaniṃ rayimasme suvīraṃ praśastaṃ dhehi yaśasambṛhantam
analyzed: vāja sanim rayim asme su vīram praśastam dhehi yaśasam bṛhantam

original: RV_10.092.01.1{23} yajñasya vo rathyaṃ viśpatiṃ viśāṃ hotāramaktoratithiṃ vibhāvasum
analyzed: yajñasya vaḥ rathyam viśpatim viśām hotāram aktoḥ atithim vibhāvasum

original: RV_10.092.01.2{23} śocañchuṣkāsu hariṇīṣu jarbhuradvṛṣā keturyajato dyāmaśāyata
analyzed: śocan śuṣkāsu hariṇīṣu jarbhurat vṛṣā ketuḥ yajataḥ dyām aśāyata

original: RV_10.092.02.1{23} imamañjaspāmubhaye akṛṇvata dharmāṇamagniṃ vidathasyasādhanam
analyzed: imam añjaspām ubhaye akṛṇvata dharmāṇam agnim vidathasya sādhanam

original: RV_10.092.02.2{23} aktuṃ na yahvamuṣasaḥ purohitaṃ tanūnapātamaruṣasya niṃsate
analyzed: aktum na yahvam uṣasaḥ purohitam tanū napātam aruṣasya niṃsate

original: RV_10.092.03.1{23} baḷ asya nīthā vi paṇeśca manmahe vayā asya prahutāāsurattave
analyzed: baṭ asya nīthā vi paṇeḥ ca manmahe vayāḥ asya

original: RV_10.092.03.2{23} yadā ghorāso amṛtatvamāśatādijjanasyadaivyasya carkiran
analyzed: yadā ghorāsaḥ amṛta tvam āśata adit janasya daivyasya carkiran

original: RV_10.092.04.1{23} ṛtasya hi prasitirdyaururu vyaco namo mahyaramatiḥpanīyasī
analyzed: ṛtasya hi prasitiḥ dyauḥ uru vyacaḥ namaḥ mahya ramatiḥ panīyasī

original: RV_10.092.04.2{23} indro mitro varuṇaḥ saṃ cikitrire 'tho bhagaḥsavitā pūtadakṣasaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ sam cikitrire thaḥ bhagaḥ savitā pūta dakṣasaḥ

original: RV_10.092.05.1{23} pra rudreṇa yayinā yanti sindhavastiro mahīmaramatindadhanvire
analyzed: pra rudreṇa yayinā yanti sindhavaḥ tiras mahīm aramatin dadhanvire

original: RV_10.092.05.2{23} yebhiḥ parijmā pariyannuru jrayo vi roruvajjaṭhare viśvamukṣate
analyzed: yebhiḥ parijmā pariyan uru jrayaḥ vi roruvat jaṭhare viśvam ukṣate

original: RV_10.092.06.1{24} krāṇā rudrā maruto viśvakṛṣṭayo divaḥ śyenāsoasurasya nīḷayaḥ
analyzed: krāṇāḥ rudrāḥ marutaḥ viśvakṛṣṭayaḥ divaḥ śyenāsaḥ asurasya nīḷayaḥ

original: RV_10.092.06.2{24} tebhiścaṣṭe varuṇo mitro aryamendrodevebhirarvaśebhirarvaśaḥ
analyzed: tebhiḥ caṣṭe varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā indraḥ devebhiḥ arvaśebhiḥ arvaśaḥ

original: RV_10.092.07.1{24} indre bhujaṃ śaśamānāsa āśata sūro dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaśca pauṃsye
analyzed: indre bhujam śaśamānāsaḥ āśata sūraḥ dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaḥ ca pauṃsye

original: RV_10.092.07.2{24} pra ye nvasyārhaṇā tatakṣire yujaṃ vajraṃnṛṣadaneṣu kāravaḥ
analyzed: pra ye nu asya arhaṇā tatakṣire yujam vajraṃnṛṣadaneṣu kāravaḥ

original: RV_10.092.08.1{24} sūraścidā harito asya rīramadindrādā kaścid bhayatetavīyasaḥ
analyzed: sūraścidā haritaḥ asya rīramat indra adā kaścid bhayatetavīyasaḥ

original: RV_10.092.08.2{24} bhīmasya vṛṣṇo jaṭharādabhiśvaso dive-divesahuri stannabādhitaḥ
analyzed: bhīmasya vṛṣṇaḥ jaṭharāt abhiśvasaḥ divedivesahuri stanna bādhitaḥ

original: RV_10.092.09.1{24} stomaṃ vo adya rudrāya śikvase kṣayadvīrāya namasādidiṣṭana
analyzed: stomam vaḥ adya rudrāya śikvase kṣayadvīrāya namasā ādidiṣṭana

original: RV_10.092.09.2{24} yebhiḥ śivaḥ svavānevayāvabhirdivaḥsiṣakti svayaśā nikāmabhiḥ
analyzed: yebhiḥ śivaḥ svavān eva yāvabhiḥ divaḥ siṣakti sva yaśāḥ nikāmabhiḥ

original: RV_10.092.10.1{24} te hi prajāyā abharanta vi śravo bṛhaspatirvṛṣabhaḥsomajāmayaḥ
analyzed: te hi prajāyai abharanta vi śravaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ soma jāmayaḥ

original: RV_10.092.10.2{24} yajñairatharvā prathamo vi dhārayad devādakṣairbhṛgavaḥ saṃ cikitrire
analyzed: yajñaiḥ atharvā prathamaḥ vi dhārayat devādakṣaiḥ bhṛgavaḥ sam cikitrire

original: RV_10.092.11.1{25} te hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā narāśaṃsaścaturaṅgoyamo 'ditiḥ
analyzed: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri retasā narāśaṃsaḥ catur aṅgaḥ yamaḥ ditiḥ

original: RV_10.092.11.2{25} devastvaṣṭā draviṇodā ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ prarodasī maruto viṣṇurarhire
analyzed: devaḥ tvaṣṭā draviṇaḥ dāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ prarodasī marutaḥ viṣṇuḥ arhire

original: RV_10.092.12.1{25} uta sya na uśijāmurviyā kavirahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyohavīmani
analyzed: uta sya naḥ uśijām urviyā kaviḥ ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyaḥ havīmani

original: RV_10.092.12.2{25} sūryāmāsā vicarantā divikṣitā dhiyāśamīnahuṣī asya bodhatam
analyzed: sūryāmāsā vicarantā divikṣitā dhiyā śamī nahuṣī asya bodhatam

original: RV_10.092.13.1{25} pra naḥ pūṣā carathaṃ viśvadevyo 'pāṃ napādavatuvāyuriṣṭaye
analyzed: pra naḥ pūṣā caratham viśvadevyā u pām napāt avatu vāyuḥ iṣṭaye

original: RV_10.092.13.2{25} ātmānaṃ vasyo abhi vātamarcata tadaśvinā suhavā yāmani śrutam
analyzed: ātmānam vasyaḥ abhi vātam arcata tat aśvinā su havā yāmani śrutam

original: RV_10.092.14.1{25} viśāmāsāmabhayānāmadhikṣitaṃ gīrbhiru svayaśasaṃgṛṇīmasi
analyzed: viśām āsām abhayānām adhikṣitam gīrbhiḥ u sva yaśasam gṛṇīmasi

original: RV_10.092.14.2{25} gnābhirviśvābhiraditimanarvaṇamaktoryuvānaṃ nṛmaṇā adhā patim
