analyzed: gnābhiḥ viśvābhiḥ aditim anarvaṇam aktoḥ yuvānam nṛmaṇāḥ adhā patim

original: RV_10.092.15.1{25} rebhadatra januṣā pūrvo aṅgirā grāvāṇa ūrdhvā abhicakṣuradhvaram
analyzed: rebhat atra januṣā pūrvaḥ aṅgirāḥ grāvāṇaḥ ūrdhvāḥ abhicakṣuḥ adhvaram

original: RV_10.092.15.2{25} yebhirvihāyā abhavad vicakṣaṇaḥpāthaḥ sumekaṃ svadhitirvananvati
analyzed: yebhiḥ vihāyāḥ abhavat vicakṣaṇaḥ pāthaḥ sumekam svadhitiḥ vananvati

original: RV_10.093.01.1{26} mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūtamurvī nārī yahvī na rodasīsadaṃ naḥ
analyzed: mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūtam urvī nārī yahvī na rodasīsadam naḥ

original: RV_10.093.01.2{26} tebhirnaḥ pātaṃ sahyasa ebhirnaḥ pātaṃśūṣaṇi
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ pātam sahyasaḥ ebhiḥ naḥ pātam śūṣaṇi

original: RV_10.093.02.1{26} yajñe-yajñe sa martyo devān saparyati
analyzed: yajñeyajñe sa martyaḥ devān saparyati

original: RV_10.093.02.2{26} yaḥ sumnairdīrghaśruttama āvivāsatyenān
analyzed: yaḥ sumnaiḥ dīrghaśruttamaḥ āvivāsati enān

original: RV_10.093.03.1{26} viśveṣāmirajyavo devānāṃ vārmahaḥ
analyzed: viśveṣām irajyavaḥ devānām vārmahaḥ

original: RV_10.093.03.2{26} viśve hiviśvamahaso viśve yajñeṣu yajñiyāḥ
analyzed: viśve hi viśva mahasaḥ viśve yajñeṣu yajñiyāḥ

original: RV_10.093.04.1{26} te ghā rājāno amṛtasya mandrā aryamā mitro varuṇaḥparijmā
analyzed: te gha rājānaḥ amṛtasya mandrāḥ aryamā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ parijmā

original: RV_10.093.04.2{26} kad rudro nṛṇāṃ stuto marutaḥ pūṣaṇo bhagaḥ
analyzed: kad rudraḥ nṛṇām stutaḥ marutaḥ pūṣaṇaḥ bhagaḥ

original: RV_10.093.05.1{26} uta no naktamapāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū sūryāmāsā sadanāyasadhanyā
analyzed: uta naḥ naktam apām vṛṣaṇvasū sūryāmāsā sadanāyasa dhanyā

original: RV_10.093.05.2{26} sacā yat sādyeṣāmahirbudhneṣu budhnyaḥ
analyzed: sacā yat sādi eṣām ahirbudhneṣu budhnyaḥ

original: RV_10.093.06.1{27} uta no devāvaśvinā śubhas patī dhāmabhirmitrāvaruṇāuruṣyatām
analyzed: uta naḥ devau aśvinā śubhaḥ patī dhāmabhiḥ mitrāvaruṇau auruṣyatām

original: RV_10.093.06.2{27} mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate 'ti dhanveva duritā
analyzed: mahaḥ sa rāyaḥ eṣate ti dhanva iva duritā

original: RV_10.093.07.1{27} uta no rudrā cin mṛḷatāmaśvinā viśve devāso rathaspatirbhagaḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ rudrā cit mṛḍatām aśvinā viśve devāsaḥ rathaspatiḥ bhagaḥ

original: RV_10.093.07.2{27} ṛbhurvāja ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ parijmā viśvavedasaḥ
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ vājaḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ parijmā viśva vedasaḥ

original: RV_10.093.08.1{27} ṛbhur{ṛ}bhukṣā ṛbhurvidhato mada ā te harī jūjuvānasyavājinā
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ ṛbhuḥ vidhataḥ madaḥ ā te harī jūjuvānasya vājinā

original: RV_10.093.08.2{27} duṣṭaraṃ yasya sāma cid ṛdhag yajño namānuṣaḥ
analyzed: duṣṭaram yasya sāma cit ṛdhak yajñaḥ namānuṣaḥ

original: RV_10.093.09.1{27} kṛdhī no ahrayo deva savitaḥ sa ca stuṣe maghonām
analyzed: kṛdhī naḥ ahrayaḥ deva savitar sa ca stuṣe maghonām

original: RV_10.093.09.2{27} saho naindro vahnibhirnyeṣāṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ cakraṃ raśmiṃ nayoyuve
analyzed: sahaḥ na aindraḥ vahnibhiḥ ni eṣām carṣaṇīnām cakram raśmim nayoyuve

original: RV_10.093.10.1{27} aiṣu dyāvāpṛthivī dhātaṃ mahadasme vīreṣu viśvacarṣaṇiśravaḥ
analyzed: ā eṣu dyāvāpṛthivī dhātam mahat asme vīreṣu viśvacarṣaṇi śravaḥ

original: RV_10.093.10.2{27} pṛkṣaṃ vājasya sātaye pṛkṣaṃ rāyotaturvaṇe
analyzed: pṛkṣam vājasya sātaye pṛkṣam rāyā utaturvaṇe

original: RV_10.093.11.1{28} etaṃ śaṃsamindrāsmayuṣ ṭvaṃ kūcit santaṃ sahasāvannabhiṣṭaye sadā pāhyabhiṣṭaye
analyzed: etam śaṃsam indra asmayuḥ tvam kūcid santam sahasāvan abhiṣṭaye sadā pāhi abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_10.093.11.2{28} medatāṃ vedatā vaso
analyzed: medatām vedata vaso

original: RV_10.093.12.1{28} etaṃ me stomaṃ tanā na sūrye dyutadyāmānaṃ vāvṛdhantanṛṇām
analyzed: etam me stomam tanā na sūrye dyutat yāmānam vāvṛdhanta nṛṇām

original: RV_10.093.12.2{28} saṃvananaṃ nāśvyaṃ taṣṭevānapacyutam
analyzed: saṃvananam na aśvyam taṣṭā iva an apacyutam

original: RV_10.093.13.1{28} vāvarta yeṣāṃ rāyā yuktaiṣāṃ hiraṇyayī
analyzed: vāvarta yeṣām rāyā yuktā eṣām hiraṇyayī

original: RV_10.093.13.2{28} nemadhitāna pauṃsyā vṛtheva viṣṭāntā
analyzed: pauṃsyā vṛthā iva viṣṭa antā

original: RV_10.093.14.1{28} pra tad duḥśīme pṛthavāne vene pra rāme vocamasuremaghavatsu
analyzed: pra tat duḥśīme pṛthavāne vene pra rāme

original: RV_10.093.14.2{28} ye yuktvāya pañca śatāsmayu pathā viśrāvyeṣām
analyzed: ye yuktvāya pañca śatā asmayu pathā viśrāvyeṣām

original: RV_10.093.15.1{28} adhīn nvatra saptatiṃ ca sapta ca
analyzed: adhi id nu atra saptatim ca sapta ca

original: RV_10.093.15.2{28} sadyo didiṣṭa tānvaḥsadyo didiṣṭa pārthyaḥ sadyo didiṣṭa māyavaḥ
analyzed: sadyas didiṣṭa tānvaḥ sadyas didiṣṭa pārthyaḥ sadyas didiṣṭa māyavaḥ

original: RV_10.094.01.1{29} praite vadantu pra vayaṃ vadāma grāvabhyo vācaṃ vadatāvadadbhyaḥ
analyzed: pra ete vadantu pra vayam vadāma grāvabhyaḥ vācam vadata a vadadbhyaḥ

original: RV_10.094.01.2{29} yadadrayaḥ parvatāḥ sākamāśavaḥ ślokaṃghoṣaṃ bharathendrāya sominaḥ
analyzed: yat adrayaḥ parvatāḥ sākamāśavaḥ ślokaṃghoṣam bharatha indrāya sominaḥ

original: RV_10.094.02.1{29} ete vadanti śatavat sahasravadabhi krandanti haritebhirāsabhiḥ
analyzed: ete vadanti śatavat sahasravat abhi krandanti haritebhiḥ āsabhiḥ

original: RV_10.094.02.2{29} viṣṭvī grāvāṇaḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā hotuścit pūrve haviradyamāśata
analyzed: viṣṭvī grāvāṇaḥ su kṛtaḥ su kṛtyayā hotuḥ cit pūrve haviḥ adyam āśata

original: RV_10.094.03.1{29} ete vadantyavidannanā madhu nyūṅkhayante adhi pakvaāmiṣi
analyzed: ete madhu nyūṅkhayante adhi pakva āmiṣi

original: RV_10.094.03.2{29} vṛkṣasya śākhāmaruṇasya bapsataste sūbharvāvṛṣabhāḥ premarāviṣuḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣasya śākhām aruṇasya bapsataḥ te sūbharvāvṛṣabhāḥ prema rāviṣuḥ

original: RV_10.094.04.1{29} bṛhad vadanti madireṇa mandinendraṃ krośanto 'vidannanāmadhu
analyzed: bṛhat vadanti madireṇa mandinā indram krośantaḥ

original: RV_10.094.04.2{29} saṃrabhyā dhīrāḥ svasṛbhiranartiṣurāghoṣayantaḥ pṛthivīmupabdibhiḥ
analyzed: saṃrabhyāḥ dhīrāḥ svasṛbhiḥ anartiṣuḥ āghoṣayantaḥ pṛthivīm upabdibhiḥ

original: RV_10.094.05.1{29} suparṇā vācamakratopa dyavyākhare kṛṣṇā iṣirāanartiṣuḥ
analyzed: suparṇāḥ vācam akrata upa dyavi ākhare kṛṣṇāḥ iṣirāḥ anartiṣuḥ

original: RV_10.094.05.2{29} nyaṃ ni yantyuparasya niṣkṛtaṃ purū retodadhire sūryaśvitaḥ
analyzed: ni yanti uparasya niṣkṛtam purū retaḥ udadhire sūryaśvitaḥ

original: RV_10.094.06.1{30} ugrā iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ sākaṃ yuktā vṛṣaṇobibhrato dhuraḥ
analyzed: ugrāḥ iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ sākam yuktāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ bibhrataḥ dhuraḥ

original: RV_10.094.06.2{30} yacchvasanto jagrasānā arāviṣuḥśṛṇva eṣāṃ prothatho arvatāmiva
analyzed: yat śvasantaḥ jagrasānāḥ arāviṣuḥ śṛṇvaḥ eṣām prothathaḥ arvatām iva

original: RV_10.094.07.1{30} daśāvanibhyo daśakakṣyebhyo daśayoktrebhyo daśayojanebhyaḥ
analyzed: daśa avanibhyaḥ daśa kakṣyebhyaḥ daśa yoktrebhyaḥ daśa yojanebhyaḥ

original: RV_10.094.07.2{30} daśābhīśubhyo arcatājarebhyo daśa dhuro daśa yuktāvahadbhyaḥ
analyzed: daśa abhīśubhyaḥ arcata ajarebhyaḥ daśa dhuraḥ daśa yuktā vahadbhyaḥ

original: RV_10.094.08.1{30} te adrayo daśayantrāsa āśavasteṣāmādhānaṃ paryetiharyatam
analyzed: te adrayaḥ daśa yantrāsaḥ āśavaḥ teṣām ādhānam paryetiharyatam

original: RV_10.094.08.2{30} ta ū sutasya somyasyāndhaso 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣamprathamasya bhejire
analyzed: te ū sutasya somyasya andhasaḥ u ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamasya bhejire

original: RV_10.094.09.1{30} te somādo harī indrasya niṃsate 'ṃśuṃ duhanto adhyāsategavi
analyzed: te somādaḥ harī indrasya niṃsate ṃśum duhantaḥ adhyāsategavi

original: RV_10.094.09.2{30} tebhirdugdhaṃ papivān somyaṃ madhvindro vardhateprathate vṛṣāyate
analyzed: tebhiḥ dugdham papivān somyam madhu indraḥ vardhate prathate vṛṣāyate

original: RV_10.094.10.1{30} vṛṣā vo aṃśurna kilā riṣāthanelāvantaḥ sadamitsthanāśitāḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā vaḥ aṃśuḥ na kilā riṣāthana ilāvantaḥ sadamidh sthana āśitāḥ

original: RV_10.094.10.2{30} raivatyeva mahasā cārava sthana yasyagrāvāṇo ajuṣadhvamadhvaram
analyzed: raivatyā iva mahasā cāravaḥ sthana yasya agrāvāṇaḥ ajuṣadhvam adhvaram

original: RV_10.094.11.1{31} tṛdilā atṛdilāso adrayo 'śramaṇā aśṛthitā amṛtyavaḥ
analyzed: tṛdilāḥ atṛdilāsaḥ adrayaḥ śramaṇāḥ aśṛthitāḥ amṛtyavaḥ

original: RV_10.094.11.2{31} anāturā ajarā sthāmaviṣṇavaḥ supīvaso atṛṣitāatṛṣṇajaḥ
analyzed: anāturāḥ ajarāḥ stha a maviṣṇavaḥ su pīvasaḥ atṛṣitāḥ atṛṣṇajaḥ

original: RV_10.094.12.1{31} dhruvā eva vaḥ pitaro yuge-yuge kṣemakāmāsaḥ sadaso nayuñjate
analyzed: dhruvāḥ eva vaḥ pitaraḥ yuge yuge kṣema kāmāsaḥ sadasaḥ na yuñjate

original: RV_10.094.12.2{31} ajuryāso hariṣāco haridrava ā dyāṃ raveṇapṛthivīmaśuśravuḥ
analyzed: ajuryāsaḥ hari dravaḥ ā dyām raveṇa pṛthivīm aśuśravuḥ

original: RV_10.094.13.1{31} tadid vadantyadrayo vimocane yāmannañjaspā iva ghedupabdibhiḥ
analyzed: tat id vadanti adrayaḥ vimocane yāman añjaspāḥ iva gha idupabdibhiḥ

original: RV_10.094.13.2{31} vapanto bījamiva dhānyākṛtaḥ pṛñcantisomaṃ na minanti bapsataḥ
analyzed: vapantaḥ bījam iva dhānyākṛtaḥ pṛñcanti somam na minanti bapsataḥ

original: RV_10.094.14.1{31} sute adhvare adhi vācamakratā krīḷayo na mātarantudantaḥ
analyzed: sute adhvare adhi vācam akratā krīḍayaḥ na mātar antudantaḥ

original: RV_10.094.14.2{31} vi ṣū muñcā suṣuvuṣo manīṣāṃ vi vartantāmadrayaścāyamānāḥ
analyzed: vi su muñca suṣuvuṣaḥ manīṣām vi vartantām adrayaḥ cāyamānāḥ

original: RV_10.095.01.1{01} haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi miśrākṛṇavāvahai nu
analyzed: haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi nu

original: RV_10.095.01.2{01} na nau mantrā anuditāsa ete mayas karanparatare canāhan
analyzed: na nau mantrāḥ anuditāsaḥ ete mayaḥ karan paratare cana ahan

original: RV_10.095.02.1{01} kimetā vācā kṛṇavā tavāhaṃ prākramiṣamuṣasāmagriyeva
analyzed: kim etāḥ vācā kṛṇavā tava aham prākramiṣam uṣasām agriyā iva

original: RV_10.095.02.2{01} purūravaḥ punarastaṃ parehi durāpanā vātaivāhamasmi
analyzed: purūravaḥ punar astam parehi durāpanā vātā eva aham asmi

original: RV_10.095.03.1{01} iṣurna śriya iṣudherasanā goṣāḥ śatasā na raṃhiḥ
analyzed: iṣuḥ na śriyaḥ iṣudheḥ asanā goṣāḥ śata sāḥ na raṃhiḥ

original: RV_10.095.03.2{01} avīre kratau vi davidyutan norā na māyuṃ citayantadhunayaḥ
analyzed: avīre kratau vi davidyutan nā urāḥ na māyum

original: RV_10.095.04.1{01} sā vasu dadhatī śvaśurāya vaya uṣo yadi vaṣṭyantigṛhāt
analyzed: sā vasu dadhatī śvaśurāya vayaḥ uṣaḥ yadi

original: RV_10.095.04.2{01} astaṃ nanakṣe yasmiñcākan divā naktaṃśnathitā vaitasena
analyzed: astam nanakṣe yasmin cākan divā naktaṃśnathitā vaitasena

original: RV_10.095.05.1{01} triḥ sma māhnaḥ śnathayo vaitasenota sma me 'vyatyaipṛṇāsi
analyzed: tris sma mā ahnaḥ śnathayaḥ vaitasena uta sma me

original: RV_10.095.05.2{01} purūravo 'nu te ketamāyaṃ rājā me vīra tanvastadāsīḥ
analyzed: purūravaḥ nu te keta māyam rājā me vīra tanvaḥ tadā āsīḥ

original: RV_10.095.06.1{02} yā sujūrṇiḥ śreṇiḥ sumnaāpirhradecakṣurna granthinīcaraṇyuḥ
analyzed: yā sujūrṇiḥ śreṇiḥ sumnaāpiḥ hradecakṣuḥ na granthinīcaraṇyuḥ

original: RV_10.095.06.2{02} tā añjayo 'ruṇayo na sasruḥ śriye gāvo nadhenavo 'navanta
analyzed: tāḥ añjayaḥ ruṇayaḥ na sasruḥ śriye gāvaḥ na dhenavaḥ navanta

original: RV_10.095.07.1{02} samasmiñ jāyamāna āsata gnā utemavardhan nadyaḥsvagūrtāḥ
analyzed: samasmin jāyamāne āsata gnāḥ nadyaḥ sva gūrtāḥ

original: RV_10.095.07.2{02} mahe yat tvā purūravo raṇāyāvardhayandasyuhatyāya devāḥ
analyzed: mahe yat tvā purūravaḥ raṇāya avardhayan dasyu hatyāya devāḥ

original: RV_10.095.08.1{02} sacā yadāsu jahatīṣvatkamamānuṣīṣu mānuṣo niṣeve
analyzed: sacā yadā āsu jahatīṣu atkam amānuṣīṣu mānuṣaḥ niṣeve

original: RV_10.095.08.2{02} apa sma mat tarasantī na bhujyustā atrasan rathaspṛśonāśvāḥ
analyzed: apa sma mat tarasantī na bhujyustāḥ atrasan ratha spṛśaḥ ūna aśvāḥ

original: RV_10.095.09.1{02} yadāsu marto amṛtāsu nispṛk saṃ kṣoṇībhiḥ kratubhirnapṛṅkte
analyzed: yadā āsu martaḥ amṛtāsu nispṛś sam kṣoṇībhiḥ kratubhiḥ na pṛṅkte

original: RV_10.095.09.2{02} tā ātayo na tanvaḥ śumbhata svā aśvāso nakrīḷayo dandaśānāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ ātayaḥ na tanvaḥ śumbhata svāḥ aśvāsaḥ nakrīḍayaḥ dandaśānāḥ

original: RV_10.095.10.1{02} vidyun na yā patantī davidyod bharantī me apyā kāmyāni
analyzed: vidyut na yā patantī davidyot bharantī me apyā kāmyāni

original: RV_10.095.10.2{02} janiṣṭo apo naryaḥ sujātaḥ prorvaśī tirata dīrghamāyuḥ
analyzed: janiṣṭa u apaḥ naryaḥ su jātaḥ pra urvaśī tirata dīrgham āyuḥ

original: RV_10.095.11.1{03} jajñiṣa itthā gopīthyāya hi dadhātha tat purūravo maojaḥ
analyzed: jajñiṣe itthā gopīthyāya hi tat purūravaḥ maojaḥ

original: RV_10.095.11.2{03} aśāsaṃ tvā viduṣī sasminnahan na ma āśṛṇoḥkimabhug vadāsi
analyzed: aśāsam tvā viduṣī na me āśṛṇoḥ kim abhuj vadāsi

original: RV_10.095.12.1{03} kadā sūnuḥ pitaraṃ jāta ichāccakran nāśru vartayadvijānan
analyzed: kadā sūnuḥ pitaram jātaḥ ichāt cakran na aśru vartayat vijānan

original: RV_10.095.12.2{03} ko dampatī samanasā vi yūyodadha yadagniḥśvaśureṣu dīdayat
analyzed: kaḥ dampatī samanasā vi yat agniḥ śvaśureṣu dīdayat

original: RV_10.095.13.1{03} prati bravāṇi vartayate aśru cakran na krandadādhyeśivāyai
analyzed: prati bravāṇi vartayate aśru na

original: RV_10.095.13.2{03} pra tat te hinavā yat te asme parehyastaṃ nahimūra māpaḥ
analyzed: pra tat te hinavā yat te asme parehi astam nahimūra mā āpaḥ

original: RV_10.095.14.1{03} sudevo adya prapatedanāvṛt parāvataṃ paramāṃ gantavā u
analyzed: sudevaḥ adya prapatet anāvṛt parāvatam paramām gantavai u

original: RV_10.095.14.2{03} adhā śayīta nir{ṛ}terupasthe 'dhainaṃ vṛkā rabhasāsoadyuḥ
analyzed: adhā śayīta nirṛteḥ upasthe dhā enam vṛkāḥ rabhasāsaḥ adyuḥ

original: RV_10.095.15.1{03} purūravo mā mṛthā mā pra papto mā tvā vṛkāso aśivāsa ukṣan
analyzed: purūravaḥ mā mṛthāḥ mā pra paptaḥ mā tvā vṛkāsaḥ aśivāsaḥ ukṣan

original: RV_10.095.15.2{03} na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi sālāvṛkāṇāṃhṛdayānyetā
analyzed: na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi śālāvṛkāṇām hṛdayāni etā

original: RV_10.095.16.1{04} yad virūpācaraṃ martyeṣvavasaṃ rātrīḥ śaradaścatasraḥ
analyzed: yat virūpā acaram martyeṣu avasam rātrīḥ śaradaḥ catasraḥ

original: RV_10.095.16.2{04} ghṛtasya stokaṃ sakṛdahna āśnāṃ tādevedantātṛpāṇā carāmi
analyzed: ghṛtasya stokam sakṛt ahnaḥ āśnām carāmi

original: RV_10.095.17.1{04} antarikṣaprāṃ rajaso vimānīmupa śikṣāmyurvaśīṃvasiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: antarikṣa prām rajasaḥ vimānīm upa śikṣāmi urvaśīm vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_10.095.17.2{04} upa tvā rātiḥ sukṛtasya tiṣṭhān ni vartasvahṛdayaṃ tapyate me
analyzed: upa tvā rātiḥ sukṛtasya tiṣṭhāt ni vartasva hṛdayam tapyate me

original: RV_10.095.18.1{04} iti tvā devā ima āhuraiḷa yathemetad bhavasimṛtyubandhuḥ
analyzed: iti tvā devāḥ ime āhuḥ aiḍa yathā imā itat bhavasi mṛtyu bandhuḥ

original: RV_10.095.18.2{04} prajā te devān haviṣā yajāti svarga u tvamapi mādayāse
analyzed: prajā te devān haviṣā yajāti svarge u tvam api mādayāse

original: RV_10.096.01.1{05} pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣaṃ harī pra te vanve vanuṣoharyataṃ madam
analyzed: pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣam harī pra te vanve vanuṣoharyatam madam

original: RV_10.096.01.2{05} ghṛtaṃ na yo haribhiścāru secata ā tvāviśantu harivarpasaṃ giraḥ
analyzed: ghṛtam na yaḥ haribhiḥ cāru secate ā tvā āviśantu hari varpasam giraḥ

original: RV_10.096.02.1{05} hariṃ hi yonimabhi ye samasvaran hinvanto harī divyaṃyathā sadaḥ
analyzed: harim hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvantaḥ harī divyaṃyathā sadaḥ

original: RV_10.096.02.2{05} ā yaṃ pṛṇanti haribhirna dhenava indrāyaśūṣaṃ harivantamarcata
analyzed: ā yam pṛṇanti haribhiḥ na dhenavaḥ indra āyaśūṣam harivantam arcata

original: RV_10.096.03.1{05} so asya vajro harito ya āyaso harirnikāmo harirāgabhastyoḥ
analyzed: saḥ asya vajraḥ haritaḥ yaḥ āyasaḥ hariḥ nikāmaḥ hariḥ ā gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_10.096.03.2{05} dyumnī suśipro harimanyusāyaka indre ni rūpāharitā mimikṣire
analyzed: dyumnī su śipraḥ harimanyusāyakaḥ indre ni rūpāharitāḥ mimikṣire

original: RV_10.096.04.1{05} divi na keturadhi dhāyi haryato vivyacad vajro harito naraṃhyā
analyzed: divi na ketuḥ adhi dhāyi haryataḥ vivyacat vajraḥ haritaḥ na raṃhyā

original: RV_10.096.04.2{05} tudadahiṃ hariśipro ya āyasaḥ sahasraśokāabhavad dharimbharaḥ
analyzed: tudat ahim hari śipraḥ yaḥ āyasaḥ sahasraśokāḥ abhavat harimbharaḥ

original: RV_10.096.05.1{05} tvaṃ-tvamaharyathā upastutaḥ pūrvebhirindra harikeśayajvabhiḥ
analyzed: tvam tvam ahar yathā upastutaḥ pūrvebhiḥ indra hari keśa yajvabhiḥ

original: RV_10.096.05.2{05} tvaṃ haryasi tava viśvamukthyamasāmi rādhoharijāta haryatam
analyzed: tvam haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam asāmi rādhaḥ hari jāta haryatam

original: RV_10.096.06.1{06} tā vajriṇaṃ mandinaṃ stomyaṃ mada indraṃ rathe vahatoharyatā harī
analyzed: tā vajriṇam mandinam stomyam made indram rathe vahatoharyatā harī

original: RV_10.096.06.2{06} purūṇyasmai savanāni haryata indrāyasomā harayo dadhanvire
analyzed: purūṇi asmai savanāni haryate indra ayasomāḥ harayaḥ dadhanvire

original: RV_10.096.07.1{06} araṃ kāmāya harayo dadhanvire sthirāya hinvan harayo harīturā
analyzed: aram kāmāya harayaḥ dadhanvire sthirāya hinvan harayaḥ harīturā

original: RV_10.096.07.2{06} arvadbhiryo haribhirjoṣamīyate so asya kāmaṃharivantamānaśe
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ yaḥ haribhiḥ joṣam īyate saḥ asya kāmam harivantam ānaśe

original: RV_10.096.08.1{06} hariśmaśārurharikeśa āyasasturaspeye yo haripāavardhata
analyzed: hari śmaśāruḥ hari keśaḥ āyasaḥ turaspeye yaḥ hari pāḥ avardhata

original: RV_10.096.08.2{06} arvadbhiryo haribhirvājinīvasurati viśvāduritā pāriṣad dharī
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ yaḥ haribhiḥ vājinīvasuḥ ati viśvā duritā pāriṣat harī

original: RV_10.096.09.1{06} sruveva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇīdavidhvataḥ
analyzed: sruvā iva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya

original: RV_10.096.09.2{06} pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjad dharī pītvāmadasya hayatasyādhasaḥ
analyzed: pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjat harī pītvā amadasya hayatasya adhasaḥ

original: RV_10.096.10.1{06} uta sma sadma haryatasya pastyoratyo na vājaṃ harivānacikradat
analyzed: uta sma sadma haryatasya pastyoḥ atyaḥ na vājam harivān acikradat

original: RV_10.096.10.2{06} mahī cid dhi dhiṣaṇāharyadojasā bṛhad vayodadhiṣe haryataścidā
analyzed: mahī cit hi dhiṣaṇā haryat ojasā bṛhat vayaḥ udadhiṣe haryataścidā

original: RV_10.096.11.1{07} ā rodasī haryamāṇo mahitvā navyaṃ-navyaṃ haryasi manmanu priyam
analyzed: ā rodasī haryamāṇaḥ mahitvā navyam navyam haryasi manmanu priyam

original: RV_10.096.11.2{07} pra pastyamasura haryataṃ gorāviṣkṛdhi harayesūryāya
analyzed: pra pastyam asura haryatam goḥ āviṣkṛdhi haraye sūryāya

original: RV_10.096.12.1{07} ā tvā haryantaṃ prayujo janānāṃ rathe vahantu hariśipramindra
analyzed: ā tvā haryantam prayujaḥ janānām rathe vahantu hari śipram indra

original: RV_10.096.12.2{07} pibā yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvo haryan yajñaṃsadhamāde daśoṇim
analyzed: pibāḥ yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ haryan yajñaṃsadhamāde daśa ūṇim

original: RV_10.096.13.1{07} apāḥ pūrveṣāṃ harivaḥ sutānāmatho idaṃ savanaṃkevalaṃ te
analyzed: apāḥ pūrveṣām harivas sutānām atho idam savanam kevalam te

original: RV_10.096.13.2{07} mamaddhi somaṃ madhumantamindra satrā vṛṣañjaṭhara ā vṛṣasva
analyzed: mamaddhi somam madhumantam indra satrā vṛṣan jaṭhare ā vṛṣasva

original: RV_10.097.01.1{08} yā oṣadhīḥ pūrvā jātā devebhyastriyugaṃ purā
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhīḥ pūrvāḥ jātāḥ devebhyaḥ tri yugam purā

original: RV_10.097.01.2{08} manainu babhrūṇāmahaṃ śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ca
analyzed: babhrūṇām aham śatam dhāmāni sapta ca

original: RV_10.097.02.1{08} śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni sahasramuta vo ruhaḥ
analyzed: śatam vaḥ amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vaḥ ruhaḥ

original: RV_10.097.02.2{08} adhāśatakratvo yūyamimaṃ me agadaṃ kṛta
analyzed: adha a śata kratvaḥ yūyam imam me agadam kṛta

original: RV_10.097.03.1{08} oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvaṃ puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ
analyzed: oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvam puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ

original: RV_10.097.03.2{08} aśvāiva sajitvarīrvīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇvaḥ
analyzed: aśvāḥ iva sa jitvarīḥ vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇvaḥ

original: RV_10.097.04.1{08} oṣadhīriti mātarastad vo devīrupa bruve
analyzed: oṣadhīḥ iti mātaraḥ tat vaḥ devīḥ upa bruve

original: RV_10.097.04.2{08} saneyamaśvaṃgāṃ vāsa ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa
analyzed: saneyam aśvaṃgām vāsaḥ ātmānam tava pūruṣa

original: RV_10.097.05.1{08} aśvatthe vo niṣadanaṃ parṇe vo vasatiṣ kṛtā
analyzed: aśvatthe vaḥ niṣadanam parṇe vaḥ vasatiḥ kṛtā

original: RV_10.097.05.2{08} gobhāja itkilāsatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam
analyzed: go bhājaḥ itkila asatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam

original: RV_10.097.06.1{09} yatrauṣadhīḥ samagmata rājānaḥ samitāviva
analyzed: yatra oṣadhīḥ samagmata rājānaḥ samitau iva

original: RV_10.097.06.2{09} vipraḥ saucyate bhiṣag rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ
analyzed: vipraḥ saḥ ucyate bhiṣaj rakṣaḥ hā amīva cātanaḥ

original: RV_10.097.07.1{09} aśvāvatīṃ somāvatīmūrjayantīmudojasam
analyzed: aśvāvatīm somāvatīm ūrjayantīm udojasam

original: RV_10.097.07.2{09} āvitsisarvā oṣadhīrasmā ariṣṭatātaye
analyzed: āvitsi sarvāḥ oṣadhīḥ asmai ariṣṭatātaye

original: RV_10.097.08.1{09} ucchuṣmā oṣadhīnāṃ gāvo goṣṭhādiverate
analyzed: ud śuṣmāḥ oṣadhīnām gāvaḥ goṣṭhāt iva īrate

original: RV_10.097.08.2{09} dhanaṃsaniṣyantīnāmātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa
analyzed: dhanaṃsaniṣyantīnām ātmānam tava pūruṣa

original: RV_10.097.09.1{09} iṣkṛtirnāma vo mātātho yūyaṃ stha niṣkṛtīḥ
analyzed: iṣkṛtiḥ nāma vaḥ mātā atha u yūyam stha niṣkṛtīḥ

original: RV_10.097.09.2{09} sīrāḥpatatṛṇī sthana yadāmayati niṣ kṛtha
analyzed: sīrāḥpatatṛṇīḥ sthana yadā āmayati niḥ kṛtha

original: RV_10.097.10.1{09} ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhā stena iva vrajamakramuḥ
analyzed: ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhāḥ stenaḥ iva vrajam akramuḥ

original: RV_10.097.10.2{09} oṣadhīḥprācucyavuryat kiṃ ca tanvo rapaḥ
analyzed: oṣadhīḥ prācucyavuḥ yat kim ca tanvaḥ rapaḥ

original: RV_10.097.11.1{10} yadimā vājayannahamoṣadhīrhasta ādadhe
analyzed: yat imāḥ vājayan aham oṣadhīḥ haste ādadhe

original: RV_10.097.11.2{10} ātmāyakṣmasya naśyati purā jīvagṛbho yathā
analyzed: ātmā ayakṣmasya naśyati purā jīva gṛbhaḥ yathā

original: RV_10.097.12.1{10} yasyauṣadhīḥ prasarpathāṅgam-añgaṃ paruṣ-paruḥ
analyzed: yasya oṣadhīḥ prasarpatha aṅgam añgam paruḥ paruḥ

original: RV_10.097.12.2{10} tatoyakṣmaṃ vi bādhadhva ugro madhyamaśīriva
analyzed: tatas yakṣmam vi bādhadhve ugraḥ madhyamaśīḥ iva

original: RV_10.097.13.1{10} sākaṃ yakṣma pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvinā
analyzed: sākam yakṣma pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvinā

original: RV_10.097.13.2{10} sākaṃvātasya dhrājyā sākaṃ naśya nihākayā
analyzed: sākaṃvātasya dhrājyā sākam naśya nihākayā

original: RV_10.097.14.1{10} anyā vo anyāmavatvanyānyasyā upāvata
analyzed: anyā vaḥ anyām avatu anyā anyasyai upāvata

original: RV_10.097.14.2{10} tāḥ sarvāḥsaṃvidānā idaṃ me prāvatā vacaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ sarvāḥ saṃvidānāḥ idam me prāvata vacaḥ

original: RV_10.097.15.1{10} yāḥ phalinīryā aphalā apuṣpā yāśca puṣpiṇīḥ
analyzed: yāḥ phalinīḥ yāḥ aphalāḥ apuṣpāḥ yāḥ ca puṣpiṇīḥ

original: RV_10.097.15.2{10} bṛhaspatiprasūtāstā no muñcantvaṃhasaḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspati prasūtāḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10.097.16.1{11} muñcantu mā śapathyādatho varuṇyāduta
analyzed: muñcantu mā śapathyāt atha u varuṇyāt uta

original: RV_10.097.16.2{11} atho yamasyapaḍbīśāt sarvasmād devakilbiṣāt
analyzed: atha u sarvasmāt deva kilbiṣāt

original: RV_10.097.17.1{11} avapatantīravadan diva oṣadhayas pari
analyzed: avapatantīḥ avadan divaḥ oṣadhayaḥ pari

original: RV_10.097.17.2{11} yaṃ jīvamaśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: yam jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ

original: RV_10.097.18.1{11} yā oṣadhīḥ somarājñīrbahvīḥ śatavicakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhīḥ soma rājñīḥ bahvīḥ śata vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: RV_10.097.18.2{11} tāsāṃ tvamasyuttamāraṃ kāmāya śaṃ hṛde
analyzed: tāsām tvam asi uttamā aram kāmāya śam hṛde

original: RV_10.097.19.1{11} yā oṣadhīḥ somarājñīrviṣṭhitāḥ pṛthivīmanu
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhīḥ soma rājñīḥ viṣṭhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu

original: RV_10.097.19.2{11} bṛhaspatiprasūtā asyai saṃ datta vīryam
analyzed: bṛhaspati prasūtāḥ asyai sam datta vīryam

original: RV_10.097.20.1{11} mā vo riṣat khanitā yasmai cāhaṃ khanāmi vaḥ
analyzed: mā vaḥ riṣat khanitā yasmai ca aham khanāmi vaḥ

original: RV_10.097.20.2{11} dvipaccatuṣpadasmākaṃ sarvamastvanāturam
analyzed: dvipad catuṣpada asmākam sarvam astu anāturam

original: RV_10.097.21.1{11} yāścedamupaśṛṇvanti yāśca dūraṃ parāgatāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ ca idam upaśṛṇvanti yāḥ ca dūram parāgatāḥ

original: RV_10.097.21.2{11} sarvāḥ saṃgatya vīrudho 'syai saṃ datta vīryam
analyzed: sarvāḥ saṃgatya vīrudhaḥ syai sam datta vīryam

original: RV_10.097.22.1{11} oṣadhayaḥ saṃ vadante somena saha rājñā
analyzed: oṣadhayaḥ sam vadante somena saha rājñā

original: RV_10.097.22.2{11} yasmai kṛṇotibrāhmaṇastaṃ rājan pārayāmasi
analyzed: yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇaḥ tam rājan pārayāmasi

original: RV_10.097.23.1{11} tvamuttamāsyoṣadhe tava vṛkṣā upastayaḥ
analyzed: tvam uttamā asi oṣadhe tava vṛkṣāḥ upastayaḥ

original: RV_10.097.23.2{11} upastirastuso 'smākaṃ yo asmānabhidāsati
analyzed: upastiḥ astusaḥ smākam yaḥ asmān abhidāsati

original: RV_10.098.01.1{12} bṛhaspate prati me devatāmihi mitro vā yad varuṇo vāsipūṣā
analyzed: bṛhaspate prati me devatā āmihi mitraḥ vā yat varuṇaḥ vā asi pūṣā

original: RV_10.098.01.2{12} ādityairvā yad vasubhirmarutvān sa parjanyaṃśantanave vṛṣāya
analyzed: ādityaiḥ vā yat vasubhiḥ marutvān sa parjanyam śantanave vṛṣāya

original: RV_10.098.02.1{12} ā devo dūto ajiraścikitvān tvad devāpe abhi māmagachat
analyzed: ā devaḥ dūtaḥ ajiraḥ cikitvān tvat devāpe abhi mām agacchat

original: RV_10.098.02.2{12} pratīcīnaḥ prati māmā vavṛtsva dadhāmi te dyumatīṃvācamāsan
analyzed: pratīcīnaḥ prati mām ā vavṛtsva dadhāmi te dyumatīm vācam āsan

original: RV_10.098.03.1{12} asme dhehi dyumatīṃ vācamāsan bṛhaspate anamīvāmiṣirām
analyzed: asme dhehi dyumatīm vācam āsan bṛhaspate anamīvām iṣirām

original: RV_10.098.03.2{12} yayā vṛṣṭiṃ śantanave vanāva divo drapsomadhumānā viveśa
analyzed: yayā vṛṣṭim śantanave vanāva divaḥ drapsaḥ madhumānā viveśa

original: RV_10.098.04.1{12} ā no drapsā madhumanto viśantvindra dehyadhirathaṃsahasram
analyzed: ā naḥ drapsāḥ madhumantaḥ viśantu indra dehi adhiratham sahasram

original: RV_10.098.04.2{12} ni ṣīda hotram ṛtuthā yajasva devān devāpehaviṣā saparya
analyzed: ni sīda hotram ṛtuthā yajasva devān devāpe haviṣā saparya

original: RV_10.098.05.1{12} ārṣṭiṣeṇo hotram ṛṣirniṣīdan devāpirdevasumatiṃcikitvān
analyzed: ārṣṭiṣeṇaḥ hotram ṛṣiḥ niṣīdan devāpiḥ deva sumatim cikitvān

original: RV_10.098.05.2{12} sa uttarasmādadharaṃ samudramapo divyā asṛjadvarṣyā abhi
analyzed: saḥ uttarasmāt adharam samudram apaḥ divyāḥ asṛjat varṣyāḥ abhi

original: RV_10.098.06.1{12} asmin samudre adhyuttarasminnāpo devebhirnivṛtā atiṣṭhan
analyzed: asmin samudre adhi uttarasmin āpaḥ devebhiḥ nivṛtāḥ atiṣṭhan

original: RV_10.098.06.2{12} tā adravannārṣṭiṣeṇena sṛṣṭā devāpinā preṣitāmṛkṣiṇīṣu
analyzed: tāḥ adravan ārṣṭiṣeṇena sṛṣṭāḥ devāpinā preṣitām ṛkṣiṇīṣu

original: RV_10.098.07.1{13} yad devāpiḥ śantanave purohito hotrāya vṛtaḥ kṛpayannadīdhet
analyzed: yat devāpiḥ śantanave purohitaḥ hotrāya vṛtaḥ kṛpayan adīdhet

original: RV_10.098.07.2{13} devaśrutaṃ vṛṣṭivaniṃ rarāṇo bṛhaspatirvācamasmā ayachat
analyzed: deva śrutam vṛṣṭi vanim rarāṇaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vācam asmai ayacchat

original: RV_10.098.08.1{13} yaṃ tvā devāpiḥ śuśucāno agna ārṣṭiṣeṇo manuṣyaḥsamīdhe
analyzed: yam tvā devāpiḥ śuśucānaḥ agne ārṣṭiṣeṇaḥ manuṣyaḥ samīdhe

original: RV_10.098.08.2{13} viśvebhirdevairanumadyamānaḥ pra parjanyamīrayā vṛṣṭimantam
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ anumadyamānaḥ pra parjanyam īraya vṛṣṭimantam

original: RV_10.098.09.1{13} tvāṃ pūrva ṛṣayo gīrbhirāyan tvāmadhvareṣu puruhūtaviśve
analyzed: tvām pūrve ṛṣayaḥ gīrbhiḥ āyan tvām adhvareṣu puruhūta viśve

original: RV_10.098.09.2{13} sahasrāṇyadhirathānyasme ā no yajñaṃrohidaśvopa yāhi
analyzed: sahasrāṇi adhirathāni asme ā naḥ yajñaṃrohit aśva upa yāhi

original: RV_10.098.10.1{13} etānyagne navatirnava tve āhutānyadhirathā sahasra
analyzed: etāni agne navatiḥ nava tve āhutāni adhirathā sahasra

original: RV_10.098.10.2{13} tebhirvardhasva tanvaḥ śūra pūrvīrdivo no vṛṣṭimiṣitorirīhi
analyzed: tebhiḥ vardhasva tanvaḥ śūra pūrvīḥ divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim iṣitaḥ urirīhi

original: RV_10.098.11.1{13} etānyagne navatiṃ sahasrā saṃ pra yacha vṛṣṇa indrāyabhāgam
analyzed: etāni agne navatim sahasrā sam pra yaccha vṛṣṇe indrāyabhāgam

original: RV_10.098.11.2{13} vidvān patha ṛtuśo devayānānapyaulānaṃ divideveṣu dhehi
analyzed: vidvān pathaḥ ṛtuśas deva yānān api aulānam divideveṣu dhehi

original: RV_10.098.12.1{13} agne bādhasva vi mṛdho vi durgahāpāmīvāmaparakṣāṃsi sedha
analyzed: agne bādhasva vi mṛdhaḥ vi durgaha apa amīvām aparakṣāṃsi sedha

original: RV_10.098.12.2{13} asmāt samudrād bṛhato divo no 'pāmbhūmānamupa naḥ sṛjeha
analyzed: asmāt samudrāt bṛhataḥ divaḥ naḥ pāmbhūmānam upa naḥ sṛja iha

original: RV_10.099.01.1{14} kaṃ naścitramiṣaṇyasi cikitvān pṛthugmānaṃ vāśraṃvāvṛdhadhyai
analyzed: kam naḥ citram iṣaṇyasi cikitvān pṛthugmānam

original: RV_10.099.01.2{14} kat tasya dātu śavaso vyuṣṭau takṣadvajraṃ vṛtraturamapinvat
analyzed: kad tasya dātu śavasaḥ vyuṣṭau takṣat vajram vṛtra turam apinvat

original: RV_10.099.02.1{14} sa hi dyutā vidyutā veti sāma pṛthuṃ yonimasuratvāsasāda
analyzed: sa hi dyutā vidyutā veti sāma pṛthum yonim asura tvā āsasāda

original: RV_10.099.02.2{14} sa sanīḷebhiḥ prasahāno asya bhrāturna ṛtesaptathasya māyāḥ
analyzed: sa sanīḍebhiḥ prasahānaḥ asya bhrātuḥ na ṛtesaptathasya māyāḥ

original: RV_10.099.03.1{14} sa vājaṃ yātāpaduṣpadā yan svarṣātā pari ṣadatsaniṣyan
analyzed: sa vājam yātā apaduṣpadā yan svarṣātā pari sadat saniṣyan

original: RV_10.099.03.2{14} anarvā yacchatadurasya vedo ghnañchiśnadevānabhi varpasā bhūt
analyzed: anarvā yat śatadurasya vedaḥ ghnan śiśna devān abhi varpasā bhūt

original: RV_10.099.04.1{14} sa yahvyo 'vanīrgoṣvarvā juhoti pradhanyāsu sasriḥ
analyzed: sa yahvyaḥ vanīḥ goṣu arvā juhoti pradhanyāsu sasriḥ

original: RV_10.099.04.2{14} apādo yatra yujyāso 'rathā droṇyaśvāsa īrate ghṛtaṃvāḥ
analyzed: a pādaḥ yatra yujyāsaḥ rathāḥ droṇī aśvāsaḥ īrate ghṛtaṃvāḥ

original: RV_10.099.05.1{14} sa rudrebhiraśastavāra ṛbhvā hitvī gayamāreavadyaāgāt
analyzed: sa rudrebhiḥ aśasta vāraḥ ṛbhvā hitvī gayam āreavadya āgāt

original: RV_10.099.05.2{14} vamrasya manye mithunā vivavrī annamabhītyārodayanmuṣāyan
analyzed: vamrasya manye mithunā vivavrī annam abhītya arodayat muṣāyan

original: RV_10.099.06.1{14} sa id dāsaṃ tuvīravaṃ patirdan ṣaḷakṣantriśīrṣāṇaṃ damanyat
analyzed: saḥ id dāsam tuvīravam patirdan ṣaṣ akṣan tri śīrṣāṇam damanyat

original: RV_10.099.06.2{14} asya trito nvojasā vṛdhāno vipāvarāhamayoagrayā han
analyzed: asya tritaḥ nu ojasā vṛdhānaḥ vipāvarāham ayoagrayā han

original: RV_10.099.07.1{15} sa druhvaṇe manuṣa ūrdhvasāna ā sāviṣadarśasānāyaśarum
analyzed: sa druhvaṇe manuṣe ūrdhvasānaḥ ā sāviṣa darśasāna ayaśarum

original: RV_10.099.07.2{15} sa nṛtamo nahuṣo 'smat sujātaḥ puro 'bhinadarhandasyuhatye
analyzed: sa nṛtamaḥ nahuṣaḥ smat su jātaḥ puraḥ bhinat arhan dasyu hatye

original: RV_10.099.08.1{15} so abhriyo na yavasa udanyan kṣayāya gātuṃ vidan no asme
analyzed: saḥ abhriyaḥ na yavasaḥ udanyan kṣayāya gātum vidat naḥ asme

original: RV_10.099.08.2{15} upa yat sīdadinduṃ śarīraiḥ śyeno 'yopāṣṭirhantidasyūn
analyzed: upa yat sīdat indum śarīraiḥ śyenaḥ yopāṣṭiḥ hanti dasyūn

original: RV_10.099.09.1{15} sa vrādhataḥ śavasānebhirasya kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ kṛpaṇeparādāt
analyzed: sa vrādhataḥ śavasānebhiḥ asya kutsāya śuṣṇam kṛpaṇeparādāt

original: RV_10.099.09.2{15} ayaṃ kavimanayacchasyamānamatkaṃ vo asyasanitota nṛṇām
analyzed: ayam kavim anayat śasyamānam atkam vaḥ nṛṇām

original: RV_10.099.10.1{15} ayaṃ daśasyan naryebhirasya dasmo devebhirvaruṇo namāyī
analyzed: ayam daśasyan naryebhiḥ asya dasmaḥ devebhiḥ varuṇaḥ namāyī

original: RV_10.099.10.2{15} ayaṃ kanīna ṛtupā avedyamimītāraruṃ yaścatuṣpāt
analyzed: ayam kanīnaḥ ṛtu pāḥ avet yamimīta ararum yaḥ catuṣpād

original: RV_10.099.11.1{15} asya stomebhirauśija ṛjiśvā vrajaṃ darayad vṛṣabheṇapiproḥ
analyzed: asya stomebhiḥ auśijaḥ ṛjiśvā vrajam darayat vṛṣabheṇapiproḥ

original: RV_10.099.11.2{15} sutvā yad yajato dīdayad gīḥ pura iyāno abhivarpasā bhūt
analyzed: sutvā yat yajataḥ dīdayat gīḥ puras iyānaḥ abhivarpasā bhūt

original: RV_10.099.12.1{15} evā maho asura vakṣathāya vamrakaḥ paḍbhirupa sarpadindram
analyzed: eva mahaḥ asura vakṣathāya vamrakaḥ paḍbhiḥ upa sarpat indram

original: RV_10.099.12.2{15} sa iyānaḥ karati svastimasmā iṣamūrjaṃsukṣitiṃ viśvamābhāḥ
analyzed: saḥ iyānaḥ karati svastim asmai iṣam ūrjam su kṣitim viśvam ābhāḥ

original: RV_10.100.01.1{16} indra dṛhya maghavan tvāvadid bhuja iha stutaḥ sutapābodhi no vṛdhe
analyzed: indra dṛhya maghavan tvāvadid bhuja iha stutaḥ suta pābodhi naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_10.100.01.2{16} devebhirnaḥ savitā prāvatu śrutamāsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: devebhiḥ naḥ savitā prāvatu śrutam āsarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.02.1{16} bharāya su bharata bhāgam ṛtviyaṃ pra vāyave śucipekrandadiṣṭaye
analyzed: bharāya su bharata bhāgam ṛtviyam pra vāyave śuci pekrandat iṣṭaye

original: RV_10.100.02.2{16} gaurasya yaḥ payasaḥ pītimānaśa āsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: gaurasya yaḥ payasaḥ pītimān aśe āsarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.03.1{16} ā no devaḥ savitā sāviṣad vaya ṛjūyate yajamānāyasunvate
analyzed: ā naḥ devaḥ savitā sāviṣat vayaḥ ṛjūyate yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_10.100.03.2{16} yathā devān pratibhūṣema pākavadā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: yathā devān pratibhūṣema pākavadā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.04.1{16} indro asme sumanā astu viśvahā rājā somaḥ suvitasyādhyetu naḥ
analyzed: indraḥ asme sumanāḥ astu viśvahā rājā somaḥ suvitasya adhyetu naḥ

original: RV_10.100.04.2{16} yathā-yathā mitradhitāni sandadhurā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: yathā yathā mitradhitāni sandadhurā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.05.1{16} indra ukthena śavasā parurdadhe bṛhaspate pratarītāsyāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ ukthena śavasā parurdadhe bṛhaspate pratarītā asya āyuṣaḥ

original: RV_10.100.05.2{16} yajño manuḥ pramatirnaḥ pitā hi kamāsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: yajñaḥ manuḥ pramatiḥ naḥ pitā hi kam asarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.06.1{16} indrasya nu sukṛtaṃ daivyaṃ saho 'gnirgṛhe jaritāmedhiraḥ kaviḥ
analyzed: indrasya nu su kṛtam daivyam sahaḥ gniḥ gṛhe jaritāmedhiraḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_10.100.06.2{16} yajñaśca bhūd vidathe cārurantama āsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: yajñaḥ ca bhūt vidathe cāruḥ antamaḥ āsarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.07.1{17} na vo guhā cakṛma bhūri duṣkṛtaṃ nāviṣṭyaṃ vasavodevaheḷanam
analyzed: na vaḥ guhā cakṛma bhūri duṣkṛtam na āviṣṭyam vasavaḥ deva heḍanam

original: RV_10.100.07.2{17} mākirno devā anṛtasya varpasa ā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: mākir naḥ devāḥ anṛtasya varpasaḥ ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.08.1{17} apāmīvāṃ savitā sāviṣan nyag varīya idapa sedhantvadrayaḥ
analyzed: apa amīvām savitā sāviṣat varīyaḥ id apa sedhantu adrayaḥ

original: RV_10.100.08.2{17} grāvā yatra madhuṣuducyate bṛhadāsarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: grāvā yatra madhuṣut ucyate bṛhat āsarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.09.1{17} ūrdhvo grāvā vasavo 'stu sotari viśvā dveṣāṃsi sanutaryuyota
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ grāvā vasavaḥ stu sotari viśvā dveṣāṃsi sanutarā uyota

original: RV_10.100.09.2{17} sa no devaḥ savitā pāyurīḍya ā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: sa naḥ devaḥ savitā pāyuḥ īḍyaḥ ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.10.1{17} ūrjaṃ gāvo yavase pīvo attana ṛtasya yāḥ sadane kośeaṅgdhve
analyzed: ūrjam gāvaḥ yavase pīvaḥ attana ṛtasya yāḥ sadane kośe aṅgdhve

original: RV_10.100.10.2{17} tanūreva tanvo astu bheṣajamā sarvatātiṃaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: tanūḥ eva tanvaḥ astu bheṣajam ā sarvatātiṃaditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.11.1{17} kratuprāvā jaritā śaśvatāmava indra id bhadrāpramatiḥ sutāvatām
analyzed: kratuprāvā jaritā śaśvatām avaḥ indraḥ id bhadra apramatiḥ sutāvatām

original: RV_10.100.11.2{17} pūrṇamūdhardivyaṃ yasya siktayaā sarvatātimaditiṃ vṛṇīmahe
analyzed: pūrṇa mūdhar divyam yasya siktaye ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10.100.12.1{17} citraste bhānuḥ kratuprā abhiṣṭiḥ santi spṛdhojaraṇiprā adhṛṣṭāḥ
analyzed: citraḥ te bhānuḥ kratu prāḥ abhiṣṭiḥ santi spṛdhaḥ jaraṇi prāḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_10.100.12.2{17} rajiṣṭhayā rajyā paśva ā gostūtūrṣaty paryagraṃ duvasyuḥ
analyzed: rajiṣṭhayā rajyā paśve ā goḥ tūtūrṣati paryagram duvasyuḥ

original: RV_10.101.01.1{18} ud budhyadhvaṃ samanasaḥ sakhāyaḥ samagnimindhvaṃ bahavaḥsanīḷāḥ
analyzed: ud budhyadhvam samanasaḥ sakhāyaḥ sam agnim indhvam bahavaḥ sanīḍāḥ

original: RV_10.101.01.2{18} dadhikrāmagnimuṣasaṃ ca devīmindrāvato'vase ni hvaye vaḥ
analyzed: dadhikrām agnim uṣasam ca devīm indrāvatovase ni hvaye vaḥ

original: RV_10.101.02.1{18} mandrā kṛṇudhvaṃ dhiya ā tanudhvaṃ nāvamaritraparaṇīṃkṛṇudhvam
analyzed: mandrā kṛṇudhvam dhiyaḥ ā tanudhvam nāva maritra paraṇīṃkṛṇudhvam

original: RV_10.101.02.2{18} iṣkṛṇudhvamāyudhāraṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ prāñcaṃyajñaṃ pra ṇayatā sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: iṣkṛṇudhvam āyudhā aram kṛṇudhvam prāñcaṃyajñam pra nayata sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10.101.03.1{18} yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanudhvaṃ kṛte yonau vapateha bījam
analyzed: yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanudhvam kṛte yonau vapata iha bījam

original: RV_10.101.03.2{18} girā ca śruṣṭiḥ śabharā asan no nedīya it sṛṇyaḥpakvameyāt
analyzed: girā ca śruṣṭiḥ śabharāḥ asat naḥ nedīyaḥ id sṛṇyaḥ pakvam eyāt

original: RV_10.101.04.1{18} sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā vi tanvate pṛthak
analyzed: sīrā yuñjanti kavayaḥ yugā vi tanvate pṛthak

original: RV_10.101.04.2{18} dhīrādeveṣu sumnayā
analyzed: dhīrādeveṣu sumnayā

original: RV_10.101.05.1{18} nirāhāvān kṛṇotana saṃ varatrā dadhātana
analyzed: nirāhāvān kṛṇotana sam varatrāḥ dadhātana

original: RV_10.101.05.2{18} siñcāmahāavatamudriṇaṃ vayaṃ suṣekamanupakṣitam
analyzed: siñcāmahai avata mudriṇam vayam suṣekam an upakṣitam

original: RV_10.101.06.1{18} iṣkṛtāhāvamavataṃ suvaratraṃ suṣecanam
analyzed: iṣkṛta āhāvam avatam su varatram suṣecanam

original: RV_10.101.06.2{18} udriṇaṃ siñceakṣitam
analyzed: udriṇam siñca īakṣitam

original: RV_10.101.07.1{19} prīṇītāśvān hitaṃ jayātha svastivāhaṃ rathamitkṛṇudhvam
analyzed: prīṇīta aśvān hitam jayātha svasti vāham ratham id kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_10.101.07.2{19} droṇāhāvamavatamaśmacakramaṃsatrakośaṃsiñcatā nṛpāṇam
analyzed: droṇa āhāvam avatam aśma cakram aṃsatra kośam siñcata nṛpāṇam

original: RV_10.101.08.1{19} vrajaṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ sa hi vo nṛpāṇo varma sīvyadhvaṃ bahulāpṛthūni
analyzed: vrajam kṛṇudhvam sa hi vaḥ nṛpāṇaḥ varma sīvyadhvam bahulāpṛthūni

original: RV_10.101.08.2{19} puraḥ kṛṇudhvamāyasīradhṛṣṭā mā vaḥ susroccamaso dṛṃhatā tam
analyzed: puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ mā vaḥ susrot camasaḥ dṛṃhata tam

original: RV_10.101.09.1{19} ā vo dhiyaṃ yajñiyāṃ varta ūtaye devā devīṃ yajatāṃyajñiyāmiha
analyzed: ā vaḥ dhiyam yajñiyām varte ūtaye devāḥ devīm yajatām yajñiyām iha

original: RV_10.101.09.2{19} sā no duhīyad yavaseva gatvī sahasradhārāpayasā mahī gauḥ
analyzed: sā naḥ duhīyat yavasā iva gatvī sahasra dhārā payasā mahī gauḥ

original: RV_10.101.10.1{19} ā tū ṣiñca harimīṃ drorupasthe vāśībhistakṣatāśmanmayībhiḥ
analyzed: ā tu siñca harimīm droḥ upasthe vāśībhiḥ takṣata aśmanmayībhiḥ

original: RV_10.101.10.2{19} pari ṣvajadhvaṃ daśa kakṣyābhirubhe dhurau prati vahniṃ yunakta
analyzed: pari svajadhvam daśa kakṣyābhiḥ ubhe dhurau prati vahnim yunakta

original: RV_10.101.11.1{19} ubhe dhurau vahnirāpibdamāno 'ntaryoneva carati dvijāniḥ
analyzed: ubhe dhurau vahniḥ āpibdamānaḥ ntaryonā iva carati dvi jāniḥ

original: RV_10.101.11.2{19} vanaspatiṃ vana āsthāpayadhvaṃ ni ṣū dadhidhvamakhananta utsam
analyzed: vanaspatim vane āsthāpayadhvam ni su dadhidhvam a khanantaḥ utsam

original: RV_10.101.12.1{19} kapṛn naraḥ kapṛthamud dadhātana codayata khudatavājasātaye
analyzed: kapṛth naraḥ kapṛtham ud dadhātana codayata khudata vājasātaye

original: RV_10.101.12.2{19} niṣṭigryaḥ putramā cyāvayotaya indraṃsabādha iha somapītaye
analyzed: niṣṭigryaḥ putram ā cyāvaya ūtaye indraṃsabādhaḥ iha soma pītaye

original: RV_10.102.01.1{20} pra te rathaṃ mithūkṛtamindro 'vatu dhṛṣṇuyā
analyzed: pra te ratham mithūkṛtam indraḥ vatu dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_10.102.01.2{20} asminnājau puruhūta śravāyye dhanabhakṣeṣu no 'va
analyzed: asmin ājau puruhūta śravāyye dhana bhakṣeṣu naḥ vaḥ

original: RV_10.102.02.1{20} ut sma vāto vahati vāso 'syā adhirathaṃ yadajayat sahasram
analyzed: ud sma vātaḥ vahati vāsaḥ syāḥ adhiratham yat ajayat sahasram

original: RV_10.102.02.2{20} rathīrabhūn mudgalānī gaviṣṭau bhare kṛtaṃ vyacedindrasenā
analyzed: rathīḥ abhūt mudgalānī gaviṣṭau bhare kṛtam vyacet indrasenā

original: RV_10.102.03.1{20} antaryacha jighāṃsato vajramindrābhidāsataḥ
analyzed: antaryaccha jighāṃsataḥ vajram indra abhidāsataḥ

original: RV_10.102.03.2{20} dāsasyavā maghavannāryasya vā sanutaryavayā vadham
analyzed: maghavan āryasya vā sanutaryavayā vadham

original: RV_10.102.04.1{20} udno hradamapibajjarhṛṣāṇaḥ kūṭaṃ sma tṛṃhadabhimātimeti
analyzed: udnaḥ hradam apibat jarhṛṣāṇaḥ kūṭam sma tṛṃhat abhimātim eti

original: RV_10.102.04.2{20} pra muṣkabhāraḥ śrava ichamāno 'jirambāhū abharat siṣāsan
analyzed: pra muṣka bhāraḥ śravaḥ icchamānaḥ jirambāhū abharat siṣāsan

original: RV_10.102.05.1{20} nyakrandayannupayanta enamamehayan vṛṣabhaṃ madhya ājeḥ
analyzed: nyakrandayan upayantaḥ enam amehayan vṛṣabham madhye ājeḥ

original: RV_10.102.05.2{20} tena sūbharvaṃ śatavat sahasraṃ gavāṃ mudgalaḥ pradhanejigāya
analyzed: tena sūbharvam śatavat sahasram gavām mudgalaḥ pradhane jigāya

original: RV_10.102.06.1{20} kakardave vṛṣabho yukta āsīdavāvacīt sārathirasya keśī
analyzed: kakardave vṛṣabhaḥ yuktaḥ āsīt avāvacīt sārathiḥ asya keśī

original: RV_10.102.06.2{20} dudheryuktasya dravataḥ sahānasa ṛchanti ṣmā niṣpadomudgalānīm
analyzed: dudheḥ yuktasya dravataḥ saha anase ṛchanti sma niṣpadaḥ mudgalānīm

original: RV_10.102.07.1{21} uta pradhimudahannasya vidvānupāyunag vaṃsagamatraśikṣan
analyzed: uta pradhim udahan asya vidvān upāyunak vaṃsagam atra śikṣan

original: RV_10.102.07.2{21} indra udāvat patimaghnyānāmaraṃhatapadyābhiḥ kakudmān
analyzed: indraḥ udāvat patim aghnyānām araṃhata padyābhiḥ kakudmān

original: RV_10.102.08.1{21} śunamaṣtrāvyacarat kapardī varatrāyāṃ dārvānahyamānaḥ
analyzed: śunamaṣtrā avyacarat kapardī varatrāyām dārvā nahyamānaḥ

original: RV_10.102.08.2{21} nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya gāḥpaspaśānastaviṣīradhatta
analyzed: nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya

original: RV_10.102.09.1{21} imaṃ taṃ paśya vṛṣabhasya yuñjaṃ kāṣṭhāyā madhyedrughaṇaṃ śayānam
analyzed: imam tam paśya vṛṣabhasya yuñjam kāṣṭhāyāḥ madhyedrughaṇam śayānam

original: RV_10.102.09.2{21} yena jigāya śatavat sahasraṃ gavāmmudgalaḥ pṛtanājyeṣu
analyzed: yena jigāya śatavat sahasram gavām mudgalaḥ pṛtanājyeṣu

original: RV_10.102.10.1{21} āre aghā ko nvitthā dadarśa yaṃ yuñjanti taṃ vāsthāpayanti
analyzed: āre aghā kaḥ nu itthā dadarśa yam yuñjanti tam vā āsthāpayanti

original: RV_10.102.10.2{21} nāsmai tṛṇaṃ nodakamā bharantyuttaro dhurovahati pradediśat
analyzed: na asmai tṛṇam na udakam ā bharanti uttaraḥ dhuraḥ vahati pradediśat

original: RV_10.102.11.1{21} parivṛkteva patividyamānaṭ pīpyānā kūcakreṇeva siñcan
analyzed: parivṛktā iva pati vidyamānaṭ pīpyānā kūcakreṇa iva siñcan

original: RV_10.102.11.2{21} eṣaiṣyā cid rathyā jayema sumaṅgalaṃ sinavadastu sātam
analyzed: eṣaiṣyā cit rathyā jayema su maṅgalam sinavat astu sātam

original: RV_10.102.12.1{21} tvaṃ viśvasya jagataścakṣurindrāsi cakṣuṣaḥ
analyzed: tvam viśvasya jagataḥ cakṣuḥ indra asi cakṣuṣaḥ

original: RV_10.102.12.2{21} vṛṣāyadājiṃ vṛṣaṇā siṣāsasi codayan vadhriṇā yujā
analyzed: vṛṣāyat ājim vṛṣaṇā siṣāsasi codayan vadhriṇā yujā

original: RV_10.103.01.1{22} āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaścarṣaṇīnām
analyzed: āśuḥ śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na bhīmaḥ ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_10.103.01.2{22} saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senāajayat sākamindraḥ
analyzed: saṃkrandanaḥ nimiṣaḥ eka vīraḥ śatam senāḥ ajayat sākamindraḥ

original: RV_10.103.02.1{22} saṃkrandanenānimiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā yutkāreṇa duścyavanenadhṛṣṇunā
analyzed: saṃkrandanena animiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā yutkāreṇa duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā

original: RV_10.103.02.2{22} tadindreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho naraiṣuhastena vṛṣṇā
analyzed: tat indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvam yudhaḥ nara eṣu hastena vṛṣṇā

original: RV_10.103.03.1{22} sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhirvaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudhaindro gaṇena
analyzed: saḥ iṣu hastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhiḥ vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudhā aindraḥ gaṇena

original: RV_10.103.03.2{22} saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhyugradhanvāpratihitābhirastā
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa jit soma pā bāhuśardhī ugra dhanvā apratihita abhirastā

original: RV_10.103.04.1{22} bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrānapabādhamānaḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspate pari dīya rathena rakṣaḥ hā amitrān apabādhamānaḥ

original: RV_10.103.04.2{22} prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇo yudhā jayannasmākamedhyavitā rathānām
analyzed: prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇaḥ yudhā jayan asmākamedhya vitā rathānām

original: RV_10.103.05.1{22} balavijñāya sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaugraḥ
analyzed: sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna augraḥ

original: RV_10.103.05.2{22} abhivīro abhisatvā sahojā jaitramindra rathamātiṣṭha govit
analyzed: abhivīraḥ abhisatvā sahaḥ jāḥ jaitram indra ratham ātiṣṭha go vid

original: RV_10.103.06.1{22} gotrabhidaṃ govidaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantamajma pramṛṇantamojasā
analyzed: gotrabhidam go vidam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā

original: RV_10.103.06.2{22} imaṃ sajātā anu vīrayadhvamindraṃ sakhāyo anusaṃ rabhadhvam
analyzed: imam sajātāḥ anu vīrayadhvam indram sakhāyaḥ anusam rabhadhvam

original: RV_10.103.07.1{23} abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dayo vīraḥ śatamanyurindraḥ
analyzed: abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamānaḥ dayaḥ vīraḥ śatamanyuḥ indraḥ

original: RV_10.103.07.2{23} duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ ayudhyo 'smākaṃ senāavatu pra yutsu
analyzed: duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāh ayudhyaḥ smākam senā avatu pra yutsu

original: RV_10.103.08.1{23} indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatirdakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etusomaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ āsām netā bṛhaspatiḥ dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ puras etusomaḥ

original: RV_10.103.08.2{23} devasenānāmabhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnāṃ marutoyantvagram
analyzed: deva senānām abhibhañjatīnām jayantīnām marutaḥ yantu agram

original: RV_10.103.09.1{23} indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānāṃ marutāṃśardha ugram
analyzed: indrasya vṛṣṇaḥ varuṇasya rājñaḥ ādityānām marutām śardhaḥ ugram

original: RV_10.103.09.2{23} mahāmanasāṃ bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣodevānāṃ jayatāmudasthāt
analyzed: mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānām ghoṣaḥ devānām jayatām udasthāt

original: RV_10.103.10.1{23} ud dharṣaya maghavannāyudhānyut satvanāṃ māmakānāmmanāṃsi
analyzed: ud dharṣaya maghavan āyudhāni ud satvanām māmakānām manāṃsi

original: RV_10.103.10.2{23} ud vṛtrahan vājināṃ vājinānyud rathānāṃjayatāṃ yantu ghoṣāḥ
analyzed: ud vṛtrahan vājinām vājināni ud rathānām jayatām yantu ghoṣāḥ

original: RV_10.103.11.1{23} asmākamindraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣvasmākaṃ yā iṣavastājayantu
analyzed: asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣu asmākam yāḥ iṣavaḥ tā jayantu

original: RV_10.103.11.2{23} asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantvasmānu devā avatāhaveṣu
analyzed: asmākam vīrāḥ uttare bhavantu asmān anu devāḥ avata āhaveṣu

original: RV_10.103.12.1{23} amīṣāṃ cittaṃ pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇāṅgānyapve parehi
analyzed: amīṣām cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi

original: RV_10.103.12.2{23} abhi prehi nirdaha hṛtsu śokairandhenāmitrāstamasāsacantām
analyzed: abhi prehi nirdaha hṛtsu śokaiḥ andhena amitrāḥ tamasā asacantām

original: RV_10.103.13.1{23} pretā jayatā nara indro vaḥ śarma yachatu
analyzed: pra ita jayata naraḥ indraḥ vaḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_10.103.13.2{23} ugrā vaḥ santubāhavo 'nādhṛṣyā yathāsatha
analyzed: ugrāḥ vaḥ santubāhavaḥ na adhṛṣyāḥ yathā asatha

original: RV_10.104.01.1{24} asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyaṃ haribhyāṃ yajñamupa yāhitūyam
analyzed: asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyam haribhyām yajñam upa yāhitūyam

original: RV_10.104.01.2{24} tubhyaṃ giro vipravīrā iyānā dadhanvira indrapibā sutasya
analyzed: tubhyam giraḥ vipra vīrāḥ iyānāḥ dadhanvire indra pibā sutasya

original: RV_10.104.02.1{24} apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ pibeha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharampṛṇasva
analyzed: apsu dhūtasya harivas piba iha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharampṛṇasva

original: RV_10.104.02.2{24} mimikṣuryamadraya indra tubhyaṃ tebhirvardhasvamadamukthavāhaḥ
analyzed: mimikṣuḥ yam adrayaḥ indra tubhyam tebhiḥ vardhasva amadam uktha vāhaḥ

original: RV_10.104.03.1{24} progrāṃ pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyāṃ prayai sutasyaharyaśva tubhyam
analyzed: pra ugrām pītim vṛṣṇe iyarmi satyām prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam

original: RV_10.104.03.2{24} indra dhenābhiriha mādayasva dhībhirviśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ
analyzed: indra dhenābhiḥ iha mādayasva dhībhiḥ viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_10.104.04.1{24} ūtī śacīvastava vīryeṇa vayo dadhānā uśija ṛtajñāḥ
analyzed: ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayaḥ dadhānāḥ uśijaḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_10.104.04.2{24} prajāvadindra manuṣo duroṇe tasthurgṛṇantaḥsadhamādyāsaḥ
analyzed: prajāvat indra manuṣaḥ duroṇe tasthuḥ gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ

original: RV_10.104.05.1{24} praṇītibhiṣ ṭe haryaśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya pururucojanāsaḥ
analyzed: praṇītibhiḥ te hari aśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya puru rucaḥ janāsaḥ

original: RV_10.104.05.2{24} maṃhiṣṭhāmūtiṃ vitire dadhānā stotāraindra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhā amūtim vitire dadhānā stotārā aindra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ

original: RV_10.104.06.1{25} upa brahmāṇi harivo haribhyāṃ somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi harivas haribhyām somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya

original: RV_10.104.06.2{25} indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇamānaḍ dāśvānasyadhvarasya praketaḥ
analyzed: indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇam ānaṭ dāśvānasi adhvarasya praketaḥ

original: RV_10.104.07.1{25} sahasravājamabhimātiṣāhaṃ suteraṇaṃ maghavānaṃ suvṛktim
analyzed: sahasra vājam abhimātiṣāham suta īraṇam maghavānam suvṛktim

original: RV_10.104.07.2{25} upa bhūṣanti giro apratītamindraṃ namasyā jarituḥpananta
analyzed: upa bhūṣanti giraḥ apratītam indram namasyāḥ jarituḥ pananta

original: RV_10.104.08.1{25} saptāpo devīḥ suraṇā amṛktā yābhiḥ sindhumatara indrapūrbhit
analyzed: sapta apaḥ devīḥ su raṇāḥ amṛktāḥ yābhiḥ sindhumataraḥ indra pūrbhid

original: RV_10.104.08.2{25} navatiṃ srotyā nava ca sravantīrdevebhyo gātummanuṣe ca vindaḥ
analyzed: navatim srotyāḥ nava ca sravantīḥ devebhyaḥ gātum manuṣe ca vindaḥ

original: RV_10.104.09.1{25} apo mahīrabhiśasteramuñco 'jāgarāsvadhi deva ekaḥ
analyzed: apaḥ mahīḥ abhiśasteḥ amuñcaḥ jāgarāsu adhi devaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_10.104.09.2{25} indra yāstvaṃ vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhirviśvāyustanvaṃ pupuṣyāḥ
analyzed: indra yāḥ tvam vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhiḥ viśvāyuḥ tanvam pupuṣyāḥ

original: RV_10.104.10.1{25} vīreṇyaḥ kraturindraḥ suśastirutāpi dhenā puruhūtamīṭṭe
analyzed: vīreṇyaḥ kratuḥ indraḥ su śastiḥ uta api dhenā puruhūtam īṭṭe

original: RV_10.104.10.2{25} ārdayad vṛtramakṛṇodu lokaṃ sasāhe śakraḥpṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ
analyzed: ārdayat vṛtram akṛṇot u lokam sasāhe śakraḥpṛtanāḥ abhiṣṭiḥ

original: RV_10.104.11.1{25} śunaṃ huvema maghavānamindraṃ ...
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram

original: RV_10.105.01.1{26} kadā vaso stotraṃ haryata āva śmaśā rudhad vāḥ
analyzed: kadā vasoḥ stotram haryataḥ āva śmaśā rudhat vāḥ

original: RV_10.105.01.2{26} dīrghaṃ sutaṃ vātāpyāya
analyzed: dīrgham sutam vātāpyāya

original: RV_10.105.02.1{26} harī yasya suyujā vivratā verarvantānu śepā
analyzed: harī yasya su yujā vivratā verarvantā anu śepā

original: RV_10.105.02.2{26} ubhārajī na keśinā patirdan
analyzed: ubhā arajī na keśinā

original: RV_10.105.03.1{26} apa yorindraḥ pāpaja ā marto na śaśramāṇo bibhīvān
analyzed: apa yoḥ indraḥ pāpa jaḥ ā martaḥ na śaśramāṇaḥ bibhīvān

original: RV_10.105.03.2{26} śubhe yad yuyuje taviṣīvān
analyzed: śubhe yat yuyuje taviṣīvān

original: RV_10.105.04.1{26} sacāyorindraścarkṛṣa ānupānasaḥ saparyan
analyzed: sacā ayoḥ indraḥ carkṛṣe ānupānasaḥ saparyan

original: RV_10.105.04.2{26} nadayorvivratayoḥ śūra indraḥ
analyzed: nadayoḥ vivratayoḥ śūraḥ indraḥ

original: RV_10.105.05.1{26} adhi yastasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai
analyzed: adhi yaḥ tasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai

original: RV_10.105.05.2{26} vanoti śiprābhyāṃ śipriṇīvān
analyzed: vanoti śiprābhyām śipriṇīvān

original: RV_10.105.06.1{27} prāstaud ṛṣvaujā ṛṣvebhistatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā
analyzed: prāstaut ṛṣva ojāḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā

original: RV_10.105.06.2{27} ṛbhurna kratubhirmātariśvā
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ na kratubhiḥ mātariśvā

original: RV_10.105.07.1{27} vajraṃ yaścakre suhanāya dasyave hirīmaśo hirīmān
analyzed: vajram yaḥ cakre su hanāya dasyave hirīmaśaḥ hirīmān

original: RV_10.105.07.2{27} arutahanuradbhutaṃ na rajaḥ
analyzed: a ruta hanuḥ adbhutam na rajaḥ

original: RV_10.105.08.1{27} ava no vṛjinā śiśīhy ṛcā vanemānṛcaḥ
analyzed: ava naḥ vṛjinā śiśīhi ṛcā vanema anṛcaḥ

original: RV_10.105.08.2{27} nābrahmā yajñaṛdhag joṣati tve
analyzed: na abrahmā yajñaṛdhak joṣati tve

original: RV_10.105.09.1{27} ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūd yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman
analyzed: ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūt yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman

original: RV_10.105.09.2{27} sajūrnāvaṃ svayaśasaṃ sacāyoḥ
analyzed: sajūs nāvam sva yaśasam sacā ayoḥ

original: RV_10.105.10.1{27} śriye te pṛśnirupasecanī bhūcchriye darvirarepāḥ
analyzed: śriye te pṛśniḥ upasecanī bhūt śriye darviḥ arepāḥ

original: RV_10.105.10.2{27} yayā sve pātre siñcasa ut
analyzed: yayā sve pātre siñcase ud

original: RV_10.105.11.1{27} śataṃ vā yadasurya prati tvā sumitra itthāstaud durmitraitthāstau
analyzed: śatam vā yat asurya prati tvā sumitraḥ itthā astaut durmitra etthā astau

original: RV_10.105.11.2{27} āvo yad dasyuhatye kutsaputraṃ prāvo yaddasyuhatye kutsavatsam
analyzed: āvaḥ yat dasyu hatye kutsa putram prāvaḥ yat dasyu hatye kutsa vatsam

original: RV_10.106.01.1{01} ubhā u nūnaṃ tadidarthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyovaśtrāpaseva
analyzed: ubhau u nūnam tat idarthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyovaśtrā apasā iva

original: RV_10.106.01.2{01} sadhrīcīnā yātave premajīgaḥ sudinevapṛkṣa ā taṃsayethe
analyzed: sadhrīcīnā yātave premajīgaḥ sudinā ivapṛkṣaḥ ā taṃsayethe

original: RV_10.106.02.1{01} uṣṭāreva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogeva śvātryā śāsurethaḥ
analyzed: uṣṭārā iva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogā iva śvātryā śāsurethaḥ

original: RV_10.106.02.2{01} dūteva hi ṣṭho yaśasā janeṣu māpa sthātammahiṣevāpānāt
analyzed: dūtā iva hi sthaḥ yaśasā janeṣu mā apa sthātam mahiṣā iva apānāt

original: RV_10.106.03.1{01} sākaṃyujā śakunasyeva pakṣā paśveva citrā yajurāgamiṣṭam
analyzed: sākaṃyujā śakunasya iva pakṣā paśū eva citrā yajuḥ āgamiṣṭam

original: RV_10.106.03.2{01} agniriva devayordīdivāṃsā parijmānevayajathaḥ purutrā
analyzed: agniḥ iva devayoḥ dīdivāṃsā parijmānā iva yajathaḥ purutrā

original: RV_10.106.04.1{01} āpī vo asme pitareva putrogreva rucā nṛpatīva turyai
analyzed: āpī vaḥ asme pitarā iva putrā ugrā iva rucā nṛpatī iva turyai

original: RV_10.106.04.2{01} iryeva puṣṭyai kiraṇeva bhujyai śruṣṭīvāneva havamāgamiṣṭam
analyzed: iryā iva puṣṭyai kiraṇā iva bhujyai havam āgamiṣṭam

original: RV_10.106.05.1{01} vaṃsageva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitreva ṛtā śatarāśātapantā
analyzed: vaṃsagā iva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitrā iva ṛtā śata rāśā ātapantā

original: RV_10.106.05.2{01} vājevoccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣeveṣāsaparyā purīṣā
analyzed: vājā iva uccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣā iva īṣā saparyā purīṣā

original: RV_10.106.06.1{02} sṛṇyeva jarbharī turpharītū naitośeva turpharīparpharīkā
analyzed: sṛṇyā iva jarbharī naitośā iva turpharīparpharīkā

original: RV_10.106.06.2{02} udanyajeva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyvajarammarāyu
analyzed: udanya jā iva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyū ajarammarāyu

original: RV_10.106.07.1{02} pajreva carcaraṃ jāraṃ marāyu kṣadmevārtheṣu tartarīthaugrā
analyzed: carcaram jāram marāyu kṣadma iva artheṣu tartarītha ugrā

original: RV_10.106.07.2{02} ṛbhū nāpat kharamajrā kharajrurvāyurna parpharatkṣayad rayīṇām
analyzed: ṛbhū kharamajrā kharajruḥ vāyuḥ na rayīṇām

original: RV_10.106.08.1{02} gharmeva madhu jaṭhare sanerū bhagevitā turpharīphārivāram
analyzed: gharmā iva madhu jaṭhare sanerū

original: RV_10.106.08.2{02} patareva cacarā candranirṇiṃ manaṛṅgāmananyā na jagmī
analyzed: patarā iva cacarā candra nirṇim manaṛṅgām ananyā na jagmī

original: RV_10.106.09.1{02} bṛhanteva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ pādeva gādhaṃ taratevidāthaḥ
analyzed: bṛhantā iva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhām pādā iva gādham taratā iva athaḥ

original: RV_10.106.09.2{02} karṇeva śāsuranu hi smarātho 'ṃśeva nobhajataṃ citramapnaḥ
analyzed: karṇā iva śāsuḥ anu hi smara atha u ṃśā iva naḥ ubhajatam citram apnaḥ

original: RV_10.106.10.1{02} āraṅgareva madhverayethe sāragheva gavi nīcīnabāre
analyzed: āraṅgarā iva madhū erayethe sāraghā iva gavi nīcīna bāre

original: RV_10.106.10.2{02} kīnāreva svedamāsiṣvidānā kṣāmevorjā sūyavasātsacethe
analyzed: kīnārā iva svedam āsiṣvidānā kṣāmā iva ūrjā sūyavasāt sacethe

original: RV_10.106.11.1{02} ṛdhyāma stomaṃ sanuyāma vājamā no mantraṃ sarathehopayātam
analyzed: ṛdhyāma stomam sanuyāma vājam ā naḥ mantram sa rathā iha upayātam

original: RV_10.106.11.2{02} yaśo na pakvaṃ madhu goṣvantarā bhūtāṃśoaśvinoḥ kāmamaprāḥ
analyzed: yaśaḥ na pakvam madhu goṣu antarā bhūtāṃśu aśvinoḥ kāmam aprāḥ

original: RV_10.107.01.1{03} āvirabhūn mahi māghonameṣāṃ viśvaṃ jīvaṃ tamaso niramoci
analyzed: āvirabhūt mahi māghonam eṣām viśvam jīvam tamasaḥ niramoci

original: RV_10.107.01.2{03} mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhirdattamāgāduruḥ panthādakṣiṇāyā adarśi
analyzed: mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhiḥ dattam āgāt uruḥ panthāḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ adarśi

original: RV_10.107.02.1{03} uccā divi dakṣiṇāvanto asthurye aśvadāḥ saha tesūryeṇa
analyzed: uccā divi dakṣiṇāvantaḥ asthuḥ ye aśva dāḥ saha te sūryeṇa

original: RV_10.107.02.2{03} hiraṇyadā amṛtatvaṃ bhajante vāsodāḥ soma pratiranta āyuḥ
analyzed: hiraṇya dāḥ amṛta tvam bhajante vāsaḥ dāḥ soma pratirante āyuḥ

original: RV_10.107.03.1{03} daivī pūrtirdakṣiṇā devayajyā na kavāribhyo nahi tepṛṇanti
analyzed: daivī pūrtiḥ dakṣiṇā deva yajyā na kavā aribhyaḥ nahi tepṛṇanti

original: RV_10.107.03.2{03} athā naraḥ prayatadakṣiṇāso 'vadyabhiyābahavaḥ pṛṇanti
analyzed: athā naraḥ prayata dakṣiṇāsaḥ vadya bhiyā bahavaḥ pṛṇanti

original: RV_10.107.04.1{03} śatadhāraṃ vāyumarkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasaste abhicakṣate haviḥ
analyzed: śata dhāram vāyum arkam svar vidam nṛ cakṣasaḥ te abhicakṣate haviḥ

original: RV_10.107.04.2{03} ye pṛṇanti pra ca yachanti saṃgame tedakṣiṇāṃ duhate saptamātaram
analyzed: ye pṛṇanti pra ca yacchanti saṃgame te dakṣiṇām duhate sapta mātaram

original: RV_10.107.05.1{03} dakṣiṇāvān prathamo hūta eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīragrameti
analyzed: dakṣiṇāvān prathamaḥ hūtaḥ eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīḥ agram eti

original: RV_10.107.05.2{03} tameva manye nṛpatiṃ janānāṃ yaḥ prathamodakṣiṇāmāvivāya
analyzed: tam eva manye nṛpatim janānām yaḥ prathamaḥ udakṣiṇām āvivāya

original: RV_10.107.06.1{04} tameva ṛṣiṃ tamu brahmāṇamāhuryajñanyaṃ sāmagāmukthaśāsam
analyzed: tam eva ṛṣim tam u brahmāṇam āhuḥ yajñanyam sāma gām uktha śāsam

original: RV_10.107.06.2{04} sa śukrasya tanvo veda tisro yaḥ prathamodakṣiṇayā rarādha
analyzed: sa śukrasya tanvaḥ veda tisraḥ yaḥ prathamaḥ udakṣiṇayā rarādha

original: RV_10.107.07.1{04} dakṣiṇāśvaṃ dakṣiṇā gāṃ dadāti dakṣiṇā candramuta yad dhiraṇyam
analyzed: dakṣiṇā aśvam dakṣiṇā gām dadāti dakṣiṇā candram uta yat hiraṇyam

original: RV_10.107.07.2{04} dakṣiṇānnaṃ vanute yo na ātmādakṣiṇāṃ varma kṛṇute vijānan
analyzed: dakṣiṇā annam vanute yaḥ naḥ ātmā a dakṣiṇām varma kṛṇute vijānan

original: RV_10.107.08.1{04} na bhojā mamrurna nyarthamīyurna riṣyanti na vyathante habhojāḥ
analyzed: na bhojāḥ mamruḥ na nyartham īyuḥ na riṣyanti na vyathante habhojāḥ

original: RV_10.107.08.2{04} idaṃ yad viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ svaścaitat sarvandakṣiṇaibhyo dadāti
analyzed: idam yat viśvam bhuvanam svar ca etat sarvan dakṣiṇā ebhyaḥ dadāti

original: RV_10.107.09.1{04} bhojā jigyuḥ surabhiṃ yonimagre bhojā jigyurvadhvaṃ yāsuvāsāḥ
analyzed: bhojāḥ jigyuḥ surabhim yonim agre bhojāḥ jigyuḥ vadhvam yāsu vāsāḥ

original: RV_10.107.09.2{04} bhojā jigyurantaḥpeyaṃ surāyā bhojā jigyurye ahūtāḥ prayanti
analyzed: bhojāḥ jigyuḥ antaḥpeyam surāyāḥ bhojāḥ jigyuḥ ye a hūtāḥ prayanti

original: RV_10.107.10.1{04} bhojāyāśvaṃ saṃ mṛjantyāśuṃ bhojāyāste kanyāśumbhamānā
analyzed: bhojāya aśvam sam mṛjanti āśum bhojāya āste kanyā āśumbhamānā

original: RV_10.107.10.2{04} bhojasyedaṃ puṣkariṇīva veśma pariṣkṛtandevamāneva citram
analyzed: bhojasya idam puṣkariṇī iva veśma citram

original: RV_10.107.11.1{04} bhojamaśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāho vahanti suvṛd ratho vartatedakṣiṇāyāḥ
analyzed: bhojam aśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāhaḥ vahanti suvṛt rathaḥ vartate dakṣiṇāyāḥ

original: RV_10.107.11.2{04} bhojaṃ devāso 'vatā bhareṣu bhojaḥśatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā
analyzed: bhojam devāsaḥ vatā bhareṣu bhojaḥśatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā

original: RV_10.108.01.1{05} kimichantī saramā predamānaḍ dūre hyadhvā jaguriḥparācaiḥ
analyzed: kim icchantī saramā pra idam ānaṭ dūre hi adhvā jaguriḥ parācais

original: RV_10.108.01.2{05} kāsmehitiḥ kā paritakmyāsīt kathaṃ rasāyāataraḥ payāṃsi
analyzed: kā asmehitiḥ kā paritakmyā āsīt katham payāṃsi

original: RV_10.108.02.1{05} indrasya dūtīriṣitā carāmi maha ichantī paṇayo nidhīnvaḥ
analyzed: indrasya dūtīḥ iṣitā carāmi mahaḥ ichantī paṇayaḥ nidhīn vaḥ

original: RV_10.108.02.2{05} atiṣkado bhiyasā tan na āvat tathā rasāyā atarampayāṃsi
analyzed: atiṣkadaḥ bhiyasā tat naḥ āvat tathā rasāyāḥ ataram payāṃsi

original: RV_10.108.03.1{05} kīdṛṃṃ indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasyedaṃ dūtīrasaraḥ parākāt
analyzed: kīdṛṃṃ indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasya idam dūtīra saraḥ parākāt

original: RV_10.108.03.2{05} ā ca gachān mitramenā dadhāmāthāgavāṃ gopatirno bhavāti
analyzed: ā ca gacchāt mitram enā dadhāma atha a gavām go patiḥ naḥ bhavāti

original: RV_10.108.04.1{05} nāhaṃ taṃ veda dabhyaṃ dabhat sa yasyedaṃ dūtīrasaraṃ parākāt
analyzed: na aham tam veda dabhyam dabhat sa yasya idam parākāt

original: RV_10.108.04.2{05} na taṃ gūhanti sravato gabhīrā hatāindreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve
analyzed: na tam gūhanti sravataḥ gabhīrāḥ hatāḥ aindreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve

original: RV_10.108.05.1{05} imā gāvaḥ sarame yā aichaḥ pari divo antān subhagepatantī
analyzed: imāḥ gāvaḥ sarame yāḥ aichaḥ pari divaḥ antān subhagā patantī

original: RV_10.108.05.2{05} kasta enā ava sṛjādayudhvyutāsmākamāyudhāsanti tigmā
analyzed: kaḥ te enāḥ ava sṛjāt ayudhvī uta asmākam āyudhā asanti tigmā

original: RV_10.108.06.1{06} asenyā vaḥ paṇayo vacāṃsyaniṣavyāstanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ
analyzed: asenyā vaḥ paṇayaḥ vacāṃsi aniṣavyāḥ tanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ

original: RV_10.108.06.2{06} adhṛṣṭo va etavā astu panthā bṛhaspatirva ubhayā namṛḷāt
analyzed: adhṛṣṭaḥ vaḥ etavai astu panthāḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vaḥ ubhayā namṛḷāt

original: RV_10.108.07.1{06} ayaṃ nidhiḥ sarame adribudhno gobhiraśvebhirvasubhirnyṛṣṭaḥ
analyzed: ayam nidhiḥ sarame adri budhnaḥ gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ vasubhiḥ ni ṛṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10.108.07.2{06} rakṣanti taṃ paṇayo ye sugopā reku padamalakamā jagantha
analyzed: rakṣanti tam paṇayaḥ ye su gopāḥ jagantha

original: RV_10.108.08.1{06} eha gamannṛṣayaḥ somaśitā ayāsyo aṅgiraso navagvāḥ
analyzed: ā iha gaman ṛṣayaḥ soma śitāḥ ayāsyaḥ aṅgirasaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_10.108.08.2{06} ta etamūrvaṃ vi bhajanta gonāmathaitad vacaḥ paṇayovamannit
analyzed: te etam ūrvam vi bhajanta gonām atha etat vacaḥ paṇayaḥ vaman id

original: RV_10.108.09.1{06} evā ca tvaṃ sarama ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena
analyzed: evā ca tvam sarame ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena

original: RV_10.108.09.2{06} svasāraṃ tvā kṛṇavai mā punargā apa te gavāṃ subhagebhajāma
analyzed: svasāram tvā kṛṇavai mā punar gāḥ apa te gavām subhagebhajāma

original: RV_10.108.10.1{06} nāhaṃ veda bhrātṛtvaṃ no svasṛtvamindro viduraṅgirasaśca ghorāḥ
analyzed: na aham veda bhrātṛ tvam no svasṛ tvam indraḥ viduḥ aṅgirasaḥ ca ghorāḥ

original: RV_10.108.10.2{06} gokāmā me achadayan yadāyamapāta ita paṇayovarīyaḥ
analyzed: go kāmāḥ me achadayan yadā ayam apātaḥ ita paṇayoḥ varīyaḥ

original: RV_10.108.11.1{06} dūramita paṇayo varīya ud gāvo yantu minatīr{ṛ}tena
analyzed: dūramita paṇayaḥ varīyaḥ ud gāvaḥ yantu minatīḥ ṛtena

original: RV_10.108.11.2{06} bṛhaspatiryā avindan nigūḷāḥ somo grāvāṇa ṛṣayaśca viprāḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ yāḥ avindat nigūḷāḥ somaḥ grāvāṇaḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca viprāḥ

original: RV_10.109.01.1{07} te 'vadan prathamā brahmakilbiṣe 'kūpāraḥ salilomātariśvā
analyzed: te vadan prathamāḥ brahma kilbiṣe kūpāraḥ salilomātariśvā

original: RV_10.109.01.2{07} vīḷuharāstapa ugro mayobhūrāpo devīḥprathamajā ṛtena
analyzed: vīḍu harāḥ tapaḥ ugraḥ mayaḥ bhūḥ āpaḥ devīḥ prathama jāḥ ṛtena

original: RV_10.109.02.1{07} somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyāṃ punaḥ prāyachadahṛṇīyamānaḥ
analyzed: somaḥ rājā prathamaḥ brahma jāyām punar prāyacchat a hṛṇīyamānaḥ

original: RV_10.109.02.2{07} anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīdagnirhotāhastagṛhyā nināya
analyzed: anvartitā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ āsīt agniḥ hotā a hasta gṛhya ā nināya

original: RV_10.109.03.1{07} hastenaiva grāhya ādhirasyā brahmajāyeyamiti cedavocan
analyzed: hastena eva grāhyaḥ ādhiḥ asyāḥ brahma jāyā iyam iti ced avocan

original: RV_10.109.03.2{07} na dūtāya prahye tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃkṣatriyasya
analyzed: na dūtāya prahye tasthe eṣā tathā rāṣṭram gupitam kṣatriyasya

original: RV_10.109.04.1{07} devā etasyāmavadanta pūrve saptaṛṣayastapase ye niṣeduḥ
analyzed: devāḥ etasyām avadanta pūrve sapta ṛṣayaḥ tapase ye niṣeduḥ

original: RV_10.109.04.2{07} bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyopanītā durdhāṃ dadhātiparame vyoman
analyzed: bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasya upanītā durdhām dadhāti parame vyoman

original: RV_10.109.05.1{07} brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānāṃ bhavatyekamaṅgam
analyzed: brahmacārī carati veviṣat viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavati ekam aṅgam

original: RV_10.109.05.2{07} tena jāyāmanvavindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃjuhvaṃ na devāḥ
analyzed: tena jāyām anvavindat bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītām juhvam na devāḥ

original: RV_10.109.06.1{07} punarvai devā adaduḥ punarmanuṣyā uta
analyzed: punar vai devāḥ adaduḥ punar manuṣyāḥ uta

original: RV_10.109.06.2{07} rājānaḥsatyaṃ kṛṇvānā brahmajāyāṃ punardaduḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ satyam kṛṇvānāḥ brahma jāyām punar daduḥ

original: RV_10.109.07.1{07} punardāya brahmajāyāṃ kṛtvī devairnikilbiṣam
analyzed: punar dāya brahma jāyām kṛtvī devaiḥ nikilbiṣam

original: RV_10.109.07.2{07} ūrjampṛthivyā bhaktvāyorugāyamupāsate
analyzed: ūrjam pṛthivyā bhaktvāya urugāyam upāsate

original: RV_10.110.01.1{08} samiddho adya manuṣo duroṇe devo devān yajasi jātavedaḥ
analyzed: samiddhaḥ adya manuṣaḥ duroṇe devaḥ devān yajasi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_10.110.01.2{08} ā ca vaha mitramahaścikitvān tvaṃ dūtaḥ kavirasipracetāḥ
analyzed: ā ca vaha mitra mahaḥ cikitvān tvam dūtaḥ kaviḥ asi pracetāḥ

original: RV_10.110.02.1{08} tanūnapāt patha ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadayāsujihva
analyzed: tanūnapāt pathaḥ ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadaya asujihva

original: RV_10.110.02.2{08} manmāni dhībhiruta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā cakṛṇuhyadhvaraṃ naḥ
analyzed: manmāni dhībhiḥ uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā cakṛṇuhi adhvaram naḥ

original: RV_10.110.03.1{08} ājuhvāna īḍyo vandyaścā yāhyagne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: ājuhvānaḥ īḍyaḥ vandyaḥ ca ā yāhi agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10.110.03.2{08} tvaṃ devānāmasi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān
analyzed: tvam devānām asi yahva hotā saḥ enān yakṣi iṣitaḥ yajīyān

original: RV_10.110.04.1{08} prācīnaṃ barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyā vastorasyā vṛjyateagre ahnām
analyzed: prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyāḥ vastoḥ asyāḥ vṛjyate agre ahnām

original: RV_10.110.04.2{08} vyu prathate vitaraṃ varīyo devebhyo aditayesyonam
analyzed: vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ devebhyaḥ aditaye syonam

original: RV_10.110.05.1{08} vyacasvatīrurviyā vi śrayantāṃ patibhyo na janayaḥśumbhamānāḥ
analyzed: vyacasvatīḥ urviyā vi śrayantām patibhyaḥ na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_10.110.05.2{08} devīrdvāro bṛhatīrviśvaminvā devebhyobhavata suprāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: devīḥ dvāraḥ bṛhatīḥ viśvaminvāḥ devebhyaḥ bhavata su prāyaṇāḥ

original: RV_10.110.06.1{09} ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ niyonau
analyzed: ā yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatām niyonau

original: RV_10.110.06.2{09} divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyaṃśukrapiśaṃ dadhāne
analyzed: divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī su rukme adhi śriyam śu krapiśam dadhāne

original: RV_10.110.07.1{09} daivyā hotārā prathamā suvācā mimānā yajñaṃ manuṣoyajadhyai
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā su vācā mimānā yajñam manuṣaḥ yajadhyai

original: RV_10.110.07.2{09} pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnaṃ jyotiḥpradiśā diśantā
analyzed: pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnam jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā

original: RV_10.110.08.1{09} ā no yajñaṃ bhāratī tūyametviḷā manuṣvadihacetayantī
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam bhāratī tūyam etu iḷā manuṣvat iha cetayantī

original: RV_10.110.08.2{09} tisro devīrbarhiredaṃ syonaṃ sarasvatīsvapasaḥ sadantu
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam syonam sarasvatīsu apasaḥ sadantu

original: RV_10.110.09.1{09} ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpairapiṃśad bhuvanāniviśvā
analyzed: yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpaiḥ apiṃśat bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10.110.09.2{09} tamadya hotariṣito yajīyān devaṃ tvaṣṭāramiha yakṣi vidvān
analyzed: tam adya hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān devam tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān

original: RV_10.110.10.1{09} upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānāṃ pātha ṛtuthāhavīṃṣi
analyzed: upa avasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pāthaḥ ṛtuthā havīṃṣi

original: RV_10.110.10.2{09} vanaspatiḥ śamitā devo agniḥ svadantu havyammadhunā ghṛtena
analyzed: vanaspatiḥ śamitā devaḥ agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena

original: RV_10.110.11.1{09} sadyo jāto vyamimīta yajñamagnirdevānāmabhavatpurogāḥ
analyzed: sadyas jātaḥ vyamimīta yajñam agniḥ devānām abhavat purogāḥ

original: RV_10.110.11.2{09} asya hotuḥ pradiśy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtaṃhaviradantu devāḥ
analyzed: asya hotuḥ pradiśi ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtam haviḥ adantu devāḥ

original: RV_10.111.01.1{10} manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvaṃ manīṣāṃ yathā-yathā matayaḥsanti nṛṇām
analyzed: manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvam manīṣām yathā yathā matayaḥ santi nṛṇām

original: RV_10.111.01.2{10} indraṃ satyairerayāmā kṛtebhiḥ sa hivīro girvaṇasyurvidānaḥ
analyzed: indram satyaiḥ erayāma kṛtebhiḥ sa hi vīraḥ girvaṇasyuḥ vidānaḥ

original: RV_10.111.02.1{10} ṛtasya hi sadaso dhītiradyaut saṃ gārṣṭeyo vṛṣabhogobhirānaṭ
analyzed: ṛtasya hi sadasaḥ dhītiḥ adyaut sam gārṣṭeyaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ gobhiḥ ānaṭ

original: RV_10.111.02.2{10} udatiṣṭhat taviṣeṇā raveṇa mahānti citsaṃ vivyācā rajāṃsi
analyzed: udatiṣṭhat taviṣeṇa raveṇa mahānti citsam vivyāca rajāṃsi

original: RV_10.111.03.1{10} indraḥ kila śrutyā asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛtsūryāya
analyzed: indraḥ kila śrutyāḥ asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛt sūryāya

original: RV_10.111.03.2{10} ān menāṃ kṛṇvannacyuto bhuvad goḥ patirdivaḥ sanajā apratītaḥ
analyzed: āt menām kṛṇvan acyutaḥ bhuvat goḥ patiḥ divaḥ sana jāḥ apratītaḥ

original: RV_10.111.04.1{10} indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vratāminādaṅgirobhirgṛṇānaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vratā amināt aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_10.111.04.2{10} purūṇi cin ni tatānā rajāṃsi dādhāra yodharuṇaṃ satyatātā
analyzed: purūṇi cit ni tatāna rajāṃsi dādhāra yodharuṇam satyatātā

original: RV_10.111.05.1{10} indro divaḥ pratimānaṃ pṛthivyā viśvā veda savanā hantiśuṣṇam
analyzed: indraḥ divaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ viśvā veda savanā hantiśuṣṇam

original: RV_10.111.05.2{10} mahīṃ cid dyāmātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha citkambhanena skabhīyān
analyzed: mahīm cit dyām ātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha cit kambhanena skabhīyān

original: RV_10.111.06.1{11} vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtramastaradevasya śūśuvānasyamāyāḥ
analyzed: vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtram astaradevasya śūśuvānasya māyāḥ

original: RV_10.111.06.2{11} vi dhṛṣṇo atra dhṛṣatā jaghanthāthābhavomaghavan bāhvojāḥ
analyzed: vi dhṛṣṇaḥ atra dhṛṣatā jaghantha atha abhavaḥ maghavan bāhu ojāḥ

original: RV_10.111.07.1{11} sacanta yaduṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrāmasya ketavo rāmavindan
analyzed: sacanta yat uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrāmasya ketavaḥ rāmavindan

original: RV_10.111.07.2{11} ā yan nakṣatraṃ dadṛśe divo na punaryato nakiraddhā nu veda
analyzed: ā yat nakṣatram dadṛśe divaḥ na punaryataḥ nakirat hā nu veda

original: RV_10.111.08.1{11} dūraṃ kila prathamā jagmurāsāmindrasya yāḥ prasavesasrurāpaḥ
analyzed: dūram kila prathamāḥ jagmuḥ āsām indrasya yāḥ prasavesasruḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_10.111.08.2{11} kva svidagraṃ kva budhna āsāmāpomadhyaṃ kva vo nūnamantaḥ
analyzed: kva svid agram kva budhnaḥ āsām āpaḥ madhyam kva vaḥ nūnam antaḥ

original: RV_10.111.09.1{11} sṛjaḥ sindhūnrahinā jagrasānānādidetāḥ pra vivijrejavena
analyzed: sṛjaḥ sindhūn rahinā jagrasa an an ādidetāḥ pra vivij rejavena

original: RV_10.111.09.2{11} mumukṣamāṇā uta yā mumucre 'dhedetā naramante nitiktāḥ
analyzed: mumukṣamāṇāḥ uta yāḥ mumucre dhedetāḥ naramante nitiktāḥ

original: RV_10.111.10.1{11} sadhrīcīḥ sindhumuśatīrivāyan sanājjāra āritaḥpūrbhidāsām
analyzed: sadhrīcīḥ sindhum uśatīḥ iva āyan sanāt jāraḥ āritaḥpūrbhidāsām

original: RV_10.111.10.2{11} astamā te pārthivā vasūnyasme jagmuḥsūnṛtā indra pūrvīḥ
analyzed: astamā te pārthivā vasūni asme jagmuḥ sūnṛtāḥ indra pūrvīḥ

original: RV_10.112.01.1{12} indra piba pratikāmaṃ sutasya prātaḥsāvastava hipūrvapītiḥ
analyzed: indra piba pratikāmam sutasya prātaḥsāvaḥ tava hi pūrva pītiḥ

original: RV_10.112.01.2{12} harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūnukthebhiṣ ṭevīryā pra bravāma
analyzed: harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūn ukthebhiḥ tevī iryā pra bravāma

original: RV_10.112.02.1{12} yaste ratho manaso javīyānendra tena somapeyāya yāhi
analyzed: yaḥ te rathaḥ manasaḥ javīyān indra tena soma peyāya yāhi

original: RV_10.112.02.2{12} tūyamā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhiryāsi vṛṣabhirmandamānaḥ
analyzed: tūyamā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhiḥ yāsi vṛṣabhiḥ mandamānaḥ

original: RV_10.112.03.1{12} haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhai rūpaistanvaṃsparśayasva
analyzed: haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhaiḥ rūpaiḥ tanvam sparśayasva

original: RV_10.112.03.2{12} asmābhirindra sakhibhirhuvānaḥ sadhrīcīnomādayasvā niṣadya
analyzed: asmābhiḥ indra sakhibhiḥ huvānaḥ sadhrīcīnaḥ umā ādayasva niṣadya

original: RV_10.112.04.1{12} yasya tyat te mahimānaṃ madeṣvime mahī rodasīnāviviktām
analyzed: yasya tyad te mahimānam madeṣu ime mahī rodasīn āviviktām

original: RV_10.112.04.2{12} tadoka ā haribhirindra yuktaiḥ priyebhiryāhi priyamannamacha
analyzed: tat okaḥ ā haribhiḥ indra yuktaiḥ priyebhiḥ yāhi priyam annam acha

original: RV_10.112.05.1{12} yasya śaśvat papivānindra śatrūnanānukṛtyā raṇyācakartha
analyzed: yasya śaśvat papivān indra śatrūn anā anukṛtyā

original: RV_10.112.05.2{12} sa te purandhiṃ taviṣīmiyarti sa te madāyasuta indra somaḥ
analyzed: sa te purandhim taviṣīm iyarti sa te madāya sutaḥ indra somaḥ

original: RV_10.112.06.1{13} idaṃ te pātraṃ sanavittamindra pibā somamenā śatakrato
analyzed: idam te pātram sanavittam indra piba somam enā śatakrato

original: RV_10.112.06.2{13} pūrṇa āhāvo madirasya madhvo yaṃ viśva idabhiharyantidevāḥ
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ āhāvaḥ madirasya madhvaḥ yam viśve id abhiharyanti devāḥ

original: RV_10.112.07.1{13} vi hi tvāmindra purudhā janāso hitaprayaso vṛṣabhahvayante
analyzed: vi hi tvām indra purudhā janāsaḥ hita prayasaḥ vṛṣabha hvayante

original: RV_10.112.07.2{13} asmākaṃ te madhumattamānīmā bhuvan savanā teṣuharya
analyzed: asmākam te madhumattamāni imā bhuvan savanā teṣuharya

original: RV_10.112.08.1{13} pra ta indra pūrvyāṇi pra nūnaṃ vīryā vocaṃ prathamākṛtāni
analyzed: pra te indra pūrvyāṇi pra nūnam vīryā vocam prathamākṛtāni

original: RV_10.112.08.2{13} satīnamanyuraśrathāyo adriṃ suvedanāmakṛṇorbrahmaṇe gām
analyzed: satīna manyuḥ aśrathāyaḥ adrim su vedanām akṛṇoḥ brahmaṇe gām

original: RV_10.112.09.1{13} ni ṣu sīda gaṇapate gaṇeṣu tvāmāhurvipratamaṃkavīnām
analyzed: ni su sīda gaṇapate gaṇeṣu tvām āhuḥ vipratamam kavīnām

original: RV_10.112.09.2{13} na ṛte tvat kriyate kiṃ canāre mahāmarkaṃmaghavañcitramarca
analyzed: na ṛte tvat kriyate kim cana are mahām arkam maghavan citram arca

original: RV_10.112.10.1{13} abhikhyā no maghavan nādhamānān sakhe bodhi vasupatesakhīnām
analyzed: naḥ maghavan nādhamānān sakhe bodhi vasupate sakhīnām

original: RV_10.112.10.2{13} raṇaṃ kṛdhi raṇakṛt satyaśuṣmābhakte cidābhajā rāye asmān
analyzed: raṇam kṛdhi raṇa kṛt satya śuṣma a bhakte cit ābhaja rāye asmān

original: RV_10.113.01.1{14} tamasya dyāvāpṛthivī sacetasā viśvebhirdevairanuśuṣmamāvatām
analyzed: tam asya dyāvāpṛthivī sacetasā viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ anuśuṣmam āvatām

original: RV_10.113.01.2{14} yadait kṛṇvāno mahimānamindriyampītvī somasya kratumānavardhata
analyzed: yadā ait kṛṇvānaḥ mahimānam indriyam pītvī somasya kratumān avardhata

original: RV_10.113.02.1{14} tamasya viṣṇurmahimānamojasāṃśuṃ dadhanvān madhunovi rapśate
analyzed: tam asya viṣṇuḥ mahimānam ojasā aṃśum dadhanvān madhunā uvi rapśate

original: RV_10.113.02.2{14} devebhirindro maghavā sayāvabhirvṛtraṃjaghanvānabhavad vareṇyaḥ
analyzed: devebhiḥ indraḥ maghavā sa yāvabhiḥ vṛtram jaghanvān abhavat vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_10.113.03.1{14} vṛtreṇa yadahinā bibhradāyudhā samasthithā yudhayeśaṃsamāvide
analyzed: vṛtreṇa yat ahinā bibhrat āyudhā samasthithāḥ yudhayeśaṃsam āvide

original: RV_10.113.03.2{14} viśve te atra marutaḥ saha tmanāvardhannugra mahimānamindriyam
analyzed: viśve te atra marutaḥ saha tmanā avardhan ugra mahimānam indriyam

original: RV_10.113.04.1{14} jajñāna eva vyabādhata spṛdhaḥ prāpaśyad vīro abhipauṃsyaṃ raṇam
analyzed: jajñānaḥ eva vyabādhata spṛdhaḥ prāpaśyat vīraḥ abhipauṃsyam raṇam

original: RV_10.113.04.2{14} avṛścadadrimava sasyadaḥ sṛjadastabhnān nākaṃ svapasyayā pṛthum
analyzed: avṛścat adrim ava sasyadaḥ sṛjat astabhnāt nākam su apasyayā pṛthum

original: RV_10.113.05.1{14} ādindraḥ satrā taviṣīrapatyata varīyo dyāvāpṛthivīabādhata
analyzed: āt indraḥ satrā taviṣīḥ apatyata varīyaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī abādhata

original: RV_10.113.05.2{14} avābharad dhṛṣito vajramāyasaṃ śevaṃ mitrāyavaruṇāya dāśuṣe
analyzed: avābharat dhṛṣitaḥ vajram āyasam śevam mitrāya varuṇāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_10.113.06.1{15} indrasyātra taviṣībhyo virapśina ṛghāyato araṃhayantamanyave
analyzed: indrasya atra taviṣībhyaḥ virapśinaḥ ṛghāyataḥ a raṃhayanta manyave

original: RV_10.113.06.2{15} vṛtraṃ yadugro vyavṛścadojasāpo bibhratantamasā parīvṛtam
analyzed: vṛtram yat ugraḥ vyavṛścat ojasā apaḥ bibhratan tamasā parīvṛtam

original: RV_10.113.07.1{15} yā vīryāṇi prathamāni kartvā mahitvebhiryatamānausamīyatuḥ
analyzed: yā vīryāṇi prathamāni kartvā mahitvebhiḥ yatamānau samīyatuḥ

original: RV_10.113.07.2{15} dhvāntaṃ tamo 'va dadhvase hata indro mahnāpūrvahūtāvapatyata
analyzed: dhvāntam tamaḥ vaḥ dadhvase hataḥ indraḥ mahnā apūrva hūtau apatyata

original: RV_10.113.08.1{15} viśve devāso adha vṛṣṇyāni te 'vardhayan somavatyāvacasyayā
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ adha vṛṣṇyāni te vardhayan somavatyā avacasyayā

original: RV_10.113.08.2{15} raddhaṃ vṛtramahimindrasya hanmanāgnirnajambhaistṛṣvannamāvayat
analyzed: raddham vṛtram ahim indrasya hanmanā agniḥ na jambhaiḥ tṛṣu annam āvayat

original: RV_10.113.09.1{15} bhūri dakṣebhirvacanebhir{ṛ}kvabhiḥ sakhyebhiḥ sakhyānipra vocata
analyzed: bhūri dakṣebhiḥ vacanebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ sakhyebhiḥ sakhyāni pra vocata

original: RV_10.113.09.2{15} indro dhuniṃ ca cumuriṃ ca dambhayañchraddhāmanasyā śṛṇute dabhītaye
analyzed: indraḥ dhunim ca cumurim ca dambhayan śraddhāmanasyā śṛṇute dabhītaye

original: RV_10.113.10.1{15} tvaṃ purūṇyā bharā svaśvyā yebhirmaṃsai nivacanāniśaṃsan
analyzed: tvam purūṇyā bhara su aśvyā yebhiḥ maṃsai nivacanā a niśaṃsan

original: RV_10.113.10.2{15} sugebhirviśvā duritā tarema vido ṣu ṇa urviyāgādhamadya
analyzed: sugebhiḥ viśvā duritā tarema vidaḥ su naḥ urviyā agādham adya

original: RV_10.114.01.1{16} gharmā samantā trivṛtaṃ vyāpatustayorjuṣṭimmātariśvā jagāma
analyzed: gharmā samantā trivṛtam vyāpatuḥ tayoḥ juṣṭim mātariśvā jagāma

original: RV_10.114.01.2{16} divas payo didhiṣāṇā aveṣan vidurdevāḥ sahasāmānamarkam
analyzed: divaḥ payaḥ didhiṣāṇāḥ aveṣan viduḥ devāḥ sahasāmānam arkam

original: RV_10.114.02.1{16} tisro deṣṭrāya nir{ṛ}tīrupāsate dīrghaśruto vi hijānanti vahnayaḥ
analyzed: tisraḥ deṣṭrāya nirṛtīḥ upāsate dīrgha śrutaḥ vi hi jānanti vahnayaḥ
