original: RV_10.114.02.2{16} tāsāṃ ni cikyuḥ kavayo nidānampareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu
analyzed: tāsām ni cikyuḥ kavayaḥ nidānam pareṣu yāḥ guhyeṣu vrateṣu

original: RV_10.114.03.1{16} catuṣkapardā yuvatiḥ supeśā ghṛtapratīkā vayunāni vaste
analyzed: catur kapardā yuvatiḥ supeśāḥ ghṛta pratīkā vayunāni vaste

original: RV_10.114.03.2{16} tasyāṃ suparṇā vṛṣaṇā ni ṣedaturyatra devā dadhirebhāgadheyam
analyzed: tasyām suparṇā vṛṣaṇā ni sedatuḥ yatra devāḥ dadhire bhāgadheyam

original: RV_10.114.04.1{16} ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudramā viveṣa sa idaṃ viśvambhuvanaṃ vi caṣṭe
analyzed: ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudramāḥ viveṣa saḥ idam viśvambhuvanam vi caṣṭe

original: RV_10.114.04.2{16} taṃ pākena manasāpaśyamantitastammātā reḷi sa u reḷi mātaram
analyzed: tam pākena manasā apaśyam antitas tam mātā reḍi saḥ u reḍi mātaram

original: RV_10.114.05.1{16} suparṇaṃ viprāḥ kavayo vacobhirekaṃ santaṃ bahudhākalpayanti
analyzed: suparṇam viprāḥ kavayaḥ vacobhiḥ ekam santam bahudhā kalpayanti

original: RV_10.114.05.2{16} chandāṃsi ca dadhato adhvareṣu grahān somasyamimate dvādaśa
analyzed: chandāṃsi ca dadhataḥ adhvareṣu grahān dvādaśa

original: RV_10.114.06.1{17} ṣaṭtriṃśāṃśca caturaḥ kalpayantaśchandāṃsi cadadhata ādvādaśam
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśān ca caturaḥ kalpayantaḥ chandāṃsi ca dadhataḥ ādvādaśam

original: RV_10.114.06.2{17} yajñaṃ vimāya kavayo manīṣaṛksāmābhyāṃ pra rathaṃ vartayanti
analyzed: yajñam vimāya kavayaḥ manīṣā ṛk sāmābhyām pra ratham vartayanti

original: RV_10.114.07.1{17} caturdaśānye mahimāno asya taṃ dhīrā vācā pra ṇayantisapta
analyzed: caturdaśā anye mahimānaḥ asya tam dhīrāḥ vācā pra nayanti sapta

original: RV_10.114.07.2{17} āpnānaṃ tīrthaṃ ka iha pra vocad yena pathāprapibante sutasya
analyzed: āpnānam tīrtham kaḥ iha pra vocat yena pathā a prapibante sutasya

original: RV_10.114.08.1{17} sahasradhā pañcadaśānyukthā yāvad dyāvāpṛthivītāvadit tat
analyzed: sahasradhā pañcadaśāni ukthāḥ yāvat dyāvāpṛthivī tāvat id tat

original: RV_10.114.08.2{17} sahasradhā mahimānaḥ sahasraṃ yāvadbrahma viṣṭhitaṃ tāvatī vāk
analyzed: sahasradhā mahimānaḥ sahasram yāvat brahma viṣṭhitam tāvatī vāc

original: RV_10.114.09.1{17} kaśchandasāṃ yogamā veda dhīraḥ ko dhiṣṇyāṃ prativācaṃ papāda
analyzed: kaḥ chandasām yogam ā veda dhīraḥ kaḥ dhiṣṇyām prativācam papāda

original: RV_10.114.09.2{17} kam ṛtvijāmaṣṭamaṃ śūramāhurharīindrasya ni cikāya kaḥ svit
analyzed: kam ṛtvijām aṣṭamam śūram āhuḥ harī indrasya ni cikāya kaḥ svid

original: RV_10.114.10.1{17} bhūmyā antaṃ paryeke caranti rathasya dhūrṣu yuktāsoasthuḥ
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ antam pari eke caranti rathasya dhūrṣu yuktāsaḥ asthuḥ

original: RV_10.114.10.2{17} śramasya dāyaṃ vi bhajantyebhyo yadā yamo bhavatiharmye hitaḥ
analyzed: śramasya dāyam vi bhajantyebhyaḥ yadā yamaḥ bhavati harmye hitaḥ

original: RV_10.115.01.1{18} citra icchiśostaruṇasya vakṣatho na yo mātarāvapyetidhātave
analyzed: citraḥ id śiśoḥ taruṇasya vakṣathaḥ na yaḥ mātarau apyeti dhātave

original: RV_10.115.01.2{18} anūdhā yadi jījanadadhā ca nu vavakṣa sadyomahi dūtyaṃ caran
analyzed: ca nu vavakṣa sadyomahi dūtyam caran

original: RV_10.115.02.1{18} agnirha nāma dhāyi dannapastamaḥ saṃ yo vanā yuvatebhasmanā datā
analyzed: agniḥ ha nāma dhāyi danna pastamaḥ sam yaḥ vanā yuvate bhasmanā datā

original: RV_10.115.02.2{18} abhipramurā juhvā svadhvara ino naprothamāno yavase vṛṣā
analyzed: abhipramurā juhvā su adhvaraḥ inaḥ na prothamānaḥ yavase vṛṣā

original: RV_10.115.03.1{18} taṃ vo viṃ na druṣadaṃ devamandhasa induṃ prothantampravapantamarṇavam
analyzed: tam vaḥ vim na druṣadam devam andhasaḥ indum prothantam pravapantam arṇavam

original: RV_10.115.03.2{18} āsā vahniṃ na śociṣā virapśinammahivrataṃ na sarajantamadhvanaḥ
analyzed: āsā vahnim na śociṣā virapśinam mahi vratam na sarajantam adhvanaḥ

original: RV_10.115.04.1{18} vi yasya te jrayasānasyājara dhakṣorna vātāḥ pari santyacyutāḥ
analyzed: vi yasya te jrayasānasya ajara dhakṣoḥ na vātāḥ pari santi acyutāḥ

original: RV_10.115.04.2{18} ā raṇvāso yuyudhayo na satvanaṃ tritaṃnaśanta pra śiṣanta iṣṭaye
analyzed: ā raṇvāsaḥ yuyudhayaḥ na satvanam tritaṃnaśanta pra śiṣantaḥ iṣṭaye

original: RV_10.115.05.1{18} sa idagniḥ kanvvatamaḥ kaṇvasakhāryaḥ parasyāntarasyataruṣaḥ
analyzed: saḥ id agniḥ kanvatamaḥ kaṇva sakhā āryaḥ

original: RV_10.115.05.2{18} agniḥ pātu gṛṇato agniḥ sūrīnagnirdadātuteṣāmavo naḥ
analyzed: agniḥ pātu gṛṇataḥ agniḥ sūrīn agniḥ dadātu teṣām avaḥ naḥ

original: RV_10.115.06.1{19} vājintamāya sahyase supitrya tṛṣu cyavāno anu jātavedase
analyzed: vājintamāya sahyase su pitrya tṛṣu cyavānaḥ anu jātavedase

original: RV_10.115.06.2{19} anudre cid yo dhṛṣatā varaṃ sate mahintamāya dhanvanedaviṣyate
analyzed: anudre cit yaḥ dhṛṣatā varam sate mahintamāya dhanvanā idaviṣyate

original: RV_10.115.07.1{19} evāgnirmartaiḥ saha sūribhirvasu ṣṭave sahasaḥ sūnaronṛbhiḥ
analyzed: eva agniḥ martaiḥ saha sūribhiḥ vasu stave sahasaḥ sūnaraḥ ūnṛbhiḥ

original: RV_10.115.07.2{19} mitrāso na ye sudhitā ṛtāyavo dyāvo na dyumnairabhi santi mānuṣān
analyzed: mitrāsaḥ na ye sudhitāḥ ṛtāyavaḥ dyāvaḥ na dyumnaiḥ abhi santi mānuṣān

original: RV_10.115.08.1{19} ūrjo napāt sahasāvanniti tvopastutasya vandate vṛṣā vāk
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napāt sahasāvan iti tvā upastutasya vandate vṛṣā vāc

original: RV_10.115.08.2{19} tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ pratarandadhānāḥ
analyzed: tvām stoṣāma tvayā su vīrāḥ drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataran dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10.115.09.1{19} iti tvāgne vṛṣṭihavyasya putrā upastutāsa ṛṣayo 'vocan
analyzed: iti tvā agne vṛṣṭihavyasya putrāḥ upastutāsaḥ ṛṣayaḥ vocan

original: RV_10.115.09.2{19} tāṃśca pāhi gṛṇataśca sūrīn vaṣaḍ vaṣaḷ ityūrdhvāso anakṣan namo nama ityūrdhvāso anakṣan
analyzed: tān ca pāhi gṛṇataḥ ca sūrīn vaṣaṭ vaṣaṭ iti ūrdhvāsaḥ anakṣan namaḥ namaḥ iti ūrdhvāsaḥ anakṣan

original: RV_10.116.01.1{20} pibā somaṃ mahata indriyāya pibā vṛtrāya hantaveśaviṣṭha
analyzed: piba somam mahate indriyāya piba vṛtrāya hantave śaviṣṭha

original: RV_10.116.01.2{20} piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ piba madhvastṛpadindrā vṛṣasva
analyzed: piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ piba madhvaḥ tṛpat indra ā vṛṣasva

original: RV_10.116.02.1{20} asya piba kṣumataḥ prasthitasyendra somasya varamāsutaśya
analyzed: asya piba kṣumataḥ prasthitasya indra somasya varam āsutaśya

original: RV_10.116.02.2{20} svastidā manasā mādayasvārvācīno revatesaubhagāya
analyzed: svasti dāḥ manasā mādayasva arvācīnaḥ revate saubhagāya

original: RV_10.116.03.1{20} mamattu tvā divyaḥ soma indra mamattu yaḥ sūyatepārthiveṣu
analyzed: mamattu tvā divyaḥ somaḥ indra mamattu yaḥ sūyate pārthiveṣu

original: RV_10.116.03.2{20} mamattu yena varivaścakartha mamattu yenaniriṇāsi śatrūn
analyzed: mamattu yena varivaḥ cakartha mamattu yena niriṇāsi śatrūn

original: RV_10.116.04.1{20} ā dvibarhā amino yātvindro vṛṣā haribhyāṃ pariṣiktamandhaḥ
analyzed: ā dvibarhāḥ aminaḥ yātu indraḥ vṛṣā haribhyām pariṣiktam andhaḥ

original: RV_10.116.04.2{20} gavyā sutasya prabhṛtasya madhvaḥ satrā khedāmaruśahā vṛṣasva
analyzed: gavyā sutasya prabhṛtasya madhvaḥ satrā khedāma ruśa hā vṛṣasva

original: RV_10.116.05.1{20} ni tigmāni bhrāśayan bhrāśyānyava sthirā tanuhiyātujūnām
analyzed: ni tigmāni bhrāśayan sthirā tanu hi yātu jūnām

original: RV_10.116.05.2{20} ugrāya te saho balaṃ dadāmi pratītyāśatrūn vigadeṣu vṛśca
analyzed: ugrāya te sahaḥ balam dadāmi pratītya a śatrūn vigadeṣu vṛśca

original: RV_10.116.06.1{21} vyarya indra tanuhi śravāṃsyoja sthireva dhanvano'bhimātīḥ
analyzed: vyaryaḥ indra tanuhi śravāṃsi ojaḥ sthirā iva dhanvanaḥ abhimātīḥ

original: RV_10.116.06.2{21} asmadryag vāvṛdhānaḥ sahobhiranibhṛṣṭastanvaṃ vāvṛdhasva
analyzed: asmadryak vāvṛdhānaḥ sahobhiḥ a nibhṛṣṭaḥ tanvam vāvṛdhasva

original: RV_10.116.07.1{21} idaṃ havirmaghavan tubhyaṃ rātaṃ prati samrāḷ ahṛṇānogṛbhāya
analyzed: idam haviḥ maghavan tubhyam rātam prati samrāj a hṛṇānaḥ gṛbhāya

original: RV_10.116.07.2{21} tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyaṃ pakvo 'ddhīndra pibaca prasthitasya
analyzed: tubhyam sutaḥ maghavan tubhyam pakvaḥ ddhi indra pibaca prasthitasya

original: RV_10.116.08.1{21} addhīdindra prasthitemā havīṃṣi cano dadhiṣva pacatotasomam
analyzed: addhi id indra prasthita imā havīṃṣi canaḥ dadhiṣva pacatotasomam

original: RV_10.116.08.2{21} prayasvantaḥ prati haryāmasi tvā satyāḥ santuyajamānasya kāmāḥ
analyzed: prayasvantaḥ prati haryāmasi tvā satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ

original: RV_10.116.09.1{21} prendrāgnibhyāṃ suvacasyāmiyarmi sindhāviva prerayaṃnāvamarkaiḥ
analyzed: pra indra agnibhyām suvacasyām iyarmi sindhau iva prerayaṃn avamarkaiḥ

original: RV_10.116.09.2{21} ayā iva pari caranti devā ye asmabhyandhanadā udbhidaśca
analyzed: ayāḥ iva pari caranti devāḥ ye asmabhyandhana dāḥ udbhidaḥ ca

original: RV_10.117.01.1{22} na vā u devāḥ kṣudhamid vadhaṃ dadurutāśitamupagachanti mṛtyavaḥ
analyzed: na vai u devāḥ kṣudham id vadham daduḥ uta āśitam upagacchanti mṛtyavaḥ

original: RV_10.117.01.2{22} uto rayiḥ pṛṇato nopa dasyatyutāpṛṇanmarḍitāraṃ na vindate
analyzed: uta u rayiḥ pṛṇataḥ na upa dasyati uta a pṛṇat marḍitāram na vindate

original: RV_10.117.02.1{22} ya ādhrāya cakamānāya pitvo 'nnavān sanraphitāyopajagmuṣe
analyzed: yaḥ ādhrāya cakamānāya pitvaḥ unnavān sanraphitāya upajagmuṣe

original: RV_10.117.02.2{22} sthiraṃ manaḥ kṛṇute sevate purotocit sa marḍitāraṃ na vindate
analyzed: sthiram manaḥ kṛṇute sevate purā uta ucit sa marḍitāram na vindate

original: RV_10.117.03.1{22} sa id bhojo yo gṛhave dadātyannakāmāya carate kṛśāya
analyzed: saḥ id bhojaḥ yaḥ gṛhave dadāti anna kāmāya carate kṛśāya

original: RV_10.117.03.2{22} aramasmai bhavati yāmahūtā utāparīṣu kṛṇute sakhāyam
analyzed: aramasmai bhavati yāmahūtau kṛṇute sakhāyam

original: RV_10.117.04.1{22} na sa sakhā yo na dadāti sakhye sacābhuve sacamānāyapitvaḥ
analyzed: na sa sakhā yaḥ na dadāti sakhye sacābhuve

original: RV_10.117.04.2{22} apāsmāt preyān na tadoko asti pṛṇantamanyamaraṇaṃ cidicḥet
analyzed: apa asmāt preyāt na tat okaḥ asti pṛṇantam anya maraṇam

original: RV_10.117.05.1{22} pṛṇīyādin nādhamānāya tavyān drāghīyāṃsamanupaśyeta panthām
analyzed: pṛṇīyāt id nādhamānāya tavyān drāghīyāṃsam anupaśyeta panthām

original: RV_10.117.05.2{22} o hi vartante rathyeva cakrānyam-anyamupa tiṣṭhanta rāyaḥ
analyzed: ā u hi vartante rathyā iva cakra anyam anyam upa tiṣṭhanta rāyaḥ

original: RV_10.117.06.1{23} moghamannaṃ vindate apracetāḥ satyaṃ bravīmi vadha it satasya
analyzed: mogham annam vindate apracetāḥ satyam bravīmi vadhaḥ id satasya

original: RV_10.117.06.2{23} nāryamaṇaṃ puṣyati no sakhāyaṃ kevalāgho bhavatikevalādī
analyzed: na aryamaṇam puṣyati no sakhāyam kevala aghaḥ bhavati kevala ādī

original: RV_10.117.07.1{23} kṛṣannit phāla āśitaṃ kṛṇoti yannadhvānamapa vṛṅktecaritraiḥ
analyzed: kṛṣan id phāle āśitam kṛṇoti yan adhvānam apa vṛṅkte caritraiḥ

original: RV_10.117.07.2{23} vadan brahmāvadato vanīyān pṛṇannāpirapṛṇantamabhi ṣyāt
analyzed: vadan brahmā a vadataḥ vanīyān pṛṇan āpiḥ a pṛṇantam abhi syāt

original: RV_10.117.08.1{23} ekapād bhūyo dvipado vi cakrame dvipāt tripādamabhyetipaścāt
analyzed: eka pād bhūyas dvi padaḥ vi cakrame dvi pād tri pādam abhyeti paścāt

original: RV_10.117.08.2{23} catuṣpādeti dvipadāmabhisvare sampaśyanpaṅktīrupatiṣṭhamānaḥ
analyzed: catuṣpādā iti dvipadām abhisvare sampaśyan paṅktīḥ upatiṣṭhamānaḥ

original: RV_10.117.09.1{23} samau cid dhastau na samaṃ viviṣṭaḥ sammātarā cin nasamaṃ duhāte
analyzed: samau cit hastau na samam viviṣṭaḥ sam mātarā cit na samam duhāte

original: RV_10.117.09.2{23} yamayościn na samā vīryāṇi jñātī citsantau na samaṃ pṛṇītaḥ
analyzed: yamayoḥ cit na samā vīryāṇi jñātī cit santau na samam pṛṇītaḥ

original: RV_10.118.01.1{24} agne haṃsi nyatriṇaṃ dīdyan martyeṣvā
analyzed: agne haṃsi nyatriṇam dīdyan martya iṣvā

original: RV_10.118.01.2{24} sve kṣayeśucivrata
analyzed: sve kṣaye śuci vrata

original: RV_10.118.02.1{24} ut tiṣṭhasi svāhuto ghṛtāni prati modase
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhasi su āhutaḥ ghṛtāni prati modase

original: RV_10.118.02.2{24} yat tvā srucaḥsamasthiran
analyzed: yat tvā srucaḥ samasthiran

original: RV_10.118.03.1{24} sa āhuto vi rocate 'gnirīḷenyo girā
analyzed: saḥ āhutaḥ vi rocate gniḥ īḍenyaḥ girā

original: RV_10.118.03.2{24} srucā pratīkamajyate
analyzed: srucā pratīkam ajyate

original: RV_10.118.04.1{24} ghṛtenāgniḥ samajyate madhupratīka āhutaḥ
analyzed: ghṛtena agniḥ samajyate madhu pratīkaḥ āhutaḥ

original: RV_10.118.04.2{24} rocamānovibhāvasuḥ
analyzed: rocamānaḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: RV_10.118.05.1{24} jaramāṇaḥ samidhyase devebhyo havyavāhana
analyzed: jaramāṇaḥ samidhyase devebhyaḥ havya vāhana

original: RV_10.118.05.2{24} taṃ tvā havantamartyāḥ
analyzed: tam tvā havantamartyāḥ

original: RV_10.118.06.1{25} taṃ martā amartyaṃ ghṛtenāgniṃ saparyata
analyzed: tam martāḥ amartyam ghṛtena agnim saparyata

original: RV_10.118.06.2{25} adābhyaṃgṛhapatim
analyzed: adābhyaṃgṛhapatim

original: RV_10.118.07.1{25} adābhyena śociṣāgne rakṣastvaṃ daha
analyzed: adābhyena śociṣā agne rakṣaḥ tvam daha

original: RV_10.118.07.2{25} gopā ṛtasyadīdihi
analyzed: gopāḥ ṛtasya dīdihi

original: RV_10.118.08.1{25} sa tvamagne pratīkena pratyoṣa yātudhānyaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam agne pratīkena pratyoṣa yātudhānyaḥ

original: RV_10.118.08.2{25} urukṣayeṣudīdyat
analyzed: uru kṣayeṣu dīdyat

original: RV_10.118.09.1{25} taṃ tvā gīrbhirurukṣayā havyavāhaṃ samīdhire
analyzed: tam tvā gīrbhiḥ urukṣayā havyavāham samīdhire

original: RV_10.118.09.2{25} yajiṣṭhaṃ mānuṣe jane
analyzed: yajiṣṭham mānuṣe jane

original: RV_10.119.01.1{26} iti vā iti me mano gāmaśvaṃ sanuyāmiti
analyzed: iti vai iti me manaḥ gām aśvam sanuyām iti

original: RV_10.119.01.2{26} kuvitsomasyāpāmiti
analyzed: kuvid somasya apām iti

original: RV_10.119.02.1{26} pra vātā iva dodhata un mā pītā ayaṃsata
analyzed: pra vātāḥ iva dodhataḥ ud mā pītāḥ ayaṃsata
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.03.1{26} un mā pītā ayaṃsata rathamaśvā ivāśavaḥ
analyzed: ud mā pītāḥ ayaṃsata rathamaśvāḥ iva aśavaḥ
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.04.1{26} upa mā matirasthita vāśrā putramiva priyam
analyzed: upa mā matiḥ asthita vāśrā putram iva priyam
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.05.1{26} ahaṃ taṣṭeva vandhuraṃ paryacāmi hṛdā matim
analyzed: aham taṣṭā iva vandhuram paryacāmi hṛdā matim
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.06.1{26} nahi me akṣipaccanāchāntsuḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: nahi me akṣipat cana achāntsuḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.07.1{27} nahi me rodasī ubhe anyaṃ pakṣaṃ cana prati
analyzed: nahi me rodasī ubhe anyam pakṣam cana prati
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.08.1{27} abhi dyāṃ mahinā bhuvamabhīmāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahīm
analyzed: abhi dyām mahinā bhuvam abhi imām pṛthivīm mahīm
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.09.1{27} hantāhaṃ pṛthivīmimāṃ ni dadhānīha veha vā
analyzed: hanta aham pṛthivīm imām ni dadhāni iha vā iha vā
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.10.1{27} oṣamit pṛthivīmahaṃ jaṅghanānīha veha vā
analyzed: oṣam id pṛthivīm aham jaṅghanāni iha vā iha vā
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.11.1{27} divi me anyaḥ pakṣo 'dho anyamacīkṛṣam
analyzed: divi me anyaḥ pakṣaḥ dhaḥ anyam acīkṛṣam
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.12.1{27} ahamasmi mahāmaho 'bhinabhyamudīṣitaḥ
analyzed: aham asmi mahā mahaḥ
kuvid

original: RV_10.119.13.1{27} gṛho yāmyaraṃkṛto devebhyo havyavāhanaḥ
analyzed: gṛhaḥ yāmi araṃkṛtaḥ devebhyaḥ havya vāhanaḥ
kuvid

original: RV_10.120.01.1{01} tadidāsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugrastveṣanṛmṇaḥ
analyzed: tat idāsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham yatas jajñe ugraḥ tveṣa nṛmṇaḥ

original: RV_10.120.01.2{01} sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūnanu yaṃviśve madantyūmāḥ
analyzed: sadyas jajñānaḥ ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yam viśve madanti ūmāḥ

original: RV_10.120.02.1{01} vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ śatrurdāsāya bhiyasandadhāti
analyzed: vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūri ojāḥ śatruḥ dāsāya bhiyasan dadhāti

original: RV_10.120.02.2{01} avyanacca vyanacca sasni saṃ te navanta prabhṛtāmadeṣu
analyzed: a vyanat ca vyanat ca sasni sam te navanta prabhṛtāmadeṣu

original: RV_10.120.03.1{01} tve kratumapi vṛñjanti viśve dviryadete trirbhavantyūmāḥ
analyzed: tve kratum api vṛñjanti viśve dvis yat ete tris bhavanti ūmāḥ

original: RV_10.120.03.2{01} svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā samadaḥ sumadhu madhunābhi yodhīḥ
analyzed: svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛja samadaḥ sumadhu madhunā abhi yodhīḥ

original: RV_10.120.04.1{01} iti cid dhi tvā dhanā jayantaṃ made-made anumadanti viprāḥ
analyzed: iti cit hi tvā dhanā jayantam mademade anumadanti viprāḥ

original: RV_10.120.04.2{01} ojīyo dhṛṣṇo sthiramā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhanyātudhānā durevāḥ
analyzed: ojīyaḥ dhṛṣṇo sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan yātudhānāḥ durevāḥ

original: RV_10.120.05.1{01} tvayā vayaṃ śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyānibhūri
analyzed: tvayā vayam śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyantaḥ

original: RV_10.120.05.2{01} codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ te śiśāmibrahmaṇā vayāṃsi
analyzed: codayāmi te āyudhā vacobhiḥ sam te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi

original: RV_10.120.06.1{02} stuṣeyyaṃ puruvarpasam ṛbhvaminatamamāptyamāptyānām
analyzed: stuṣeyyam puru varpasam

original: RV_10.120.06.2{02} ā darṣate śavasā sapta dānūn pra sākṣate pratimānānibhūri
analyzed: ā darṣate śavasā sapta dānūn pra sākṣate

original: RV_10.120.07.1{02} ni tad dadhiṣe 'varaṃ paraṃ ca yasminnāvithāvasā duroṇe
analyzed: ni tat dadhiṣe varam param ca yasmin nāvitha avasā duroṇe

original: RV_10.120.07.2{02} ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū ata inoṣi karvarā purūṇi
analyzed: ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū atas inoṣi karvarā purūṇi

original: RV_10.120.08.1{02} imā brahma bṛhaddivo vivaktīndrāya śūṣamagriyaḥsvarṣāḥ
analyzed: imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ vivakti indrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ

original: RV_10.120.08.2{02} maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājo duraśca viśvāavṛṇodapa svāḥ
analyzed: mahaḥ gotrasya kṣayati svarājaḥ duraḥ ca viśvāḥ avṛṇot apa svāḥ

original: RV_10.120.09.1{02} evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvāvocat svāṃ tanvamindrameva
analyzed: eva mahān bṛhaddivaḥ atharvā avocat svām tanvam indram eva

original: RV_10.120.09.2{02} svasāro mātaribhvarīrariprā hinvanti ca śavasāvardhayanti ca
analyzed: svasāraḥ mātaribhvarīḥ ariprāḥ hinvanti ca śavasā āvardhayanti ca

original: RV_10.121.01.1{03} hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patirekaāsīt
analyzed: hiraṇya garbhaḥ samavartata agre bhūtasya jātaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ āsīt

original: RV_10.121.01.2{03} sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemāṃ kasmai devāyahaviṣā vidhema
analyzed: sa dādhāra pṛthivīm dyām uta imām kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10.121.02.1{03} ya ātmadā baladā yasya viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasyadevāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ātma dāḥ bala dāḥ yasya viśve upāsate praśiṣam yasyadevāḥ

original: RV_10.121.02.2{03} yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāyahaviṣā vidhema
analyzed: yasya chāyā amṛtam yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10.121.03.1{03} yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato mahitvaika id rājā jagato babhūva
analyzed: yaḥ prāṇataḥ nimiṣataḥ mahitvā ekaḥ id rājā jagataḥ babhūva

original: RV_10.121.03.2{03} ya īśe asya dvipadaścatuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣāvidhema
analyzed: yaḥ īśe asya dvipadaḥ catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā avidhema

original: RV_10.121.04.1{03} yasyeme himavanto mahitvā yasya samudraṃ rasayā sahāhuḥ
analyzed: yasya ime himavantaḥ mahitvā yasya samudram rasayā saha āhuḥ

original: RV_10.121.04.2{03} yasyemāḥ pradiśo yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣāvidhema
analyzed: yasya imāḥ pradiśaḥ yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā avidhema

original: RV_10.121.05.1{03} yena dyaurugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḷhā yena sva stabhitaṃ yenanākaḥ
analyzed: yena dyauḥ ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā yena svar stabhitam yenanākaḥ

original: RV_10.121.05.2{03} yo antarikṣe rajaso vimānaḥ kasmai devāyahaviṣā vidhema
analyzed: yaḥ antarikṣe rajasaḥ vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10.121.06.1{04} yaṃ krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhyaikṣetāṃ manasārejamāne
analyzed: yam krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhyaikṣetām manasā arejamāne

original: RV_10.121.06.2{04} yatrādhi sūra udito vibhāti kasmai devāyahaviṣā vidhema
analyzed: yatra adhi sūraḥ uditaḥ vibhāti kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10.121.07.1{04} āpo ha yad bṛhatīrviśvamāyan garbhaṃ dadhānājanayantīragnim
analyzed: āpaḥ ha yat bṛhatīḥ viśvam āyan garbham dadhānāḥ a janayantīḥ agnim

original: RV_10.121.07.2{04} tato devānāṃ samavartatāsurekaḥkasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema
analyzed: tatas devānām samavartata āsuḥ ekaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10.121.08.1{04} yaścidāpo mahinā paryapaśyad dakṣaṃ dadhānājanayantīryajñam
analyzed: yaḥ cit āpaḥ mahinā paryapaśyat dakṣam dadhānā a janayantīḥ yajñam

original: RV_10.121.08.2{04} yo deveṣvadhi deva eka āsīt kasmaidevāya haviṣā vidhema
analyzed: yaḥ deveṣu adhi devaḥ ekaḥ āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10.121.09.1{04} mā no hiṃsījjanitā yaḥ pṛthivyā yo vā divaṃsatyadharmā jajāna
analyzed: mā naḥ hiṃsīt janitā yaḥ pṛthivyāḥ yaḥ vā jajāna

original: RV_10.121.09.2{04} yaścāpaścandrā bṛhatīrjajānakasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema
analyzed: yaḥ ca apaḥ candrāḥ bṛhatīḥ jajāna kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10.121.10.1{04} prajāpate na tvadetānyanyo viśvā jātāni pari tābabhūva
analyzed: prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ viśvā jātāni pari

original: RV_10.121.10.2{04} yatkāmāste juhumastan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayorayīṇām
analyzed: yad kāmāḥ te juhumaḥ tat naḥ astu vayam syāma pataya urayīṇām

original: RV_10.122.01.1{05} vasuṃ na citramahasaṃ gṛṇīṣe vāmaṃ śevamatithimadviṣeṇyam
analyzed: vasum na citra mahasam gṛṇīṣe vāmam śevam atithimat viṣeṇyam

original: RV_10.122.01.2{05} sa rāsate śurudho viśvadhāyaso 'gnirhotāgṛhapatiḥ suvīryam
analyzed: sa rāsate śurudhaḥ viśva dhāyasaḥ gniḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ su vīryam

original: RV_10.122.02.1{05} juṣāṇo agne prati harya me vaco viśvāni vidvān vayunānisukrato
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ agne prati harya me vacaḥ viśvāni vidvān vayunāni su krato

original: RV_10.122.02.2{05} ghṛtanirṇig brahmaṇe gātumeraya tava devāajanayannanu vratam
analyzed: ghṛta nirṇij brahmaṇe gātum eraya tava devāḥ ajanayan anu vratam

original: RV_10.122.03.1{05} sapta dhāmāni pariyannamartyo dāśad dāśuṣe sukṛtemāmahasva
analyzed: sapta dhāmāni pariyan amartyaḥ dāśat dāśuṣe su kṛtā imā āmahasva

original: RV_10.122.03.2{05} suvīreṇa rayiṇāgne svābhuvā yasta ānaṭsamidhā taṃ juṣasva
analyzed: su vīreṇa rayiṇā agne yaḥ te ānaṭ samidhā tam juṣasva

original: RV_10.122.04.1{05} yajñasya ketuṃ prathamaṃ purohitaṃ haviṣmanta īḷate saptavājinam
analyzed: yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam haviṣmantaḥ īḍate sapta vājinam

original: RV_10.122.04.2{05} śṛṇvantamagniṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhamukṣaṇampṛṇantaṃ devaṃ pṛṇate suvīryam
analyzed: śṛṇvantam agnim ghṛta pṛṣṭham ukṣaṇampṛṇantam devam pṛṇate su vīryam

original: RV_10.122.05.1{05} ṭvaṃ dūtaḥ prathamo vareṇyaḥ sa hūyamāno amṛtāyamatsva
analyzed: ṭvam dūtaḥ prathamaḥ vareṇyaḥ sa hūyamānaḥ amṛta āyamatsva

original: RV_10.122.05.2{05} tvāṃ marjayan maruto dāśuṣo gṛhe tvāṃ stomebhirbhṛgavo vi rurucuḥ
analyzed: tvām marjayan marutaḥ dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe tvām stomebhiḥ bhṛgavaḥ vi rurucuḥ

original: RV_10.122.06.1{06} iṣaṃ duhan sudughāṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ yajñapriyeyajamānāya sukrato
analyzed: iṣam duhan sudughām viśva dhāyasam yajña priye yajamānāya su krato

original: RV_10.122.06.2{06} agne ghṛtasnustrir{ṛ}tāni dīdyadvartiryajñaṃ pariyan sukratūyase
analyzed: agne ghṛtasnuḥ tris ṛtāni dīdyat vartiḥ yajñam pariyan sukratūyase

original: RV_10.122.07.1{06} tvāmidasyā uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajantamānuṣāḥ
analyzed: tvām id asyāḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu dūtam kṛṇvānāḥ ayajanta mānuṣāḥ

original: RV_10.122.07.2{06} tvāṃ devā mahayāyyāya vāvṛdhurājyamagnenimṛjanto adhvare
analyzed: tvām devāḥ mahayāyyāya vāvṛdhuḥ ājyam agne nimṛjantaḥ adhvare

original: RV_10.122.08.1{06} ni tvā vasiṣṭhā ahvanta vājinaṃ gṛṇanto agne vidatheṣuvedhasaḥ
analyzed: ni tvā vasiṣṭhāḥ ahvanta vājinam gṛṇantaḥ agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ

original: RV_10.122.08.2{06} rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhāraya yūyaṃ pātasvastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhāraya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_10.123.01.1{07} ayaṃ venaścodayat pṛśnigarbhā jyotirjarāyū rajasovimāne
analyzed: ayam venaḥ codayat pṛśni garbhāḥ jyotiḥ jarāyūḥ rajasaḥ vimāne

original: RV_10.123.01.2{07} imamapāṃ saṃgame sūryasya śiśuṃ na viprāmatibhī rihanti
analyzed: imam apām saṃgame sūryasya śiśum na vipra amatibhiḥ rihanti

original: RV_10.123.02.1{07} samudrādūrmimudiyarti veno nabhojāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃharyatasya darśi
analyzed: samudrāt ūrmim udiyarti venaḥ nabhaḥ jāḥ pṛṣṭham haryatasya darśi

original: RV_10.123.02.2{07} ṛtasya sānāvadhi viṣṭapi bhrāṭsamānaṃ yonimabhyanūṣata vrāḥ
analyzed: ṛtasya sānau adhi viṣṭapi bhrāj samānam yonim abhyanūṣata vrāḥ

original: RV_10.123.03.1{07} samānaṃ pūrvīrabhi vāvaśānāstiṣṭhan vatsasyamātaraḥ sanīḷāḥ
analyzed: samānam pūrvīḥ abhi vāvaśānāḥ tiṣṭhan vatsasya mātaraḥ sanīḍāḥ

original: RV_10.123.03.2{07} ṛtasya sānāvadhi cakramāṇārihanti madhvo amṛtasya vāṇīḥ
analyzed: ṛtasya sānau adhi cakramāṇā ari hanti madhvaḥ amṛtasya vāṇīḥ

original: RV_10.123.04.1{07} jānanto rūpamakṛpanta viprā mṛgasya ghoṣaṃ mahiṣasya higman
analyzed: jānantaḥ rūpam akṛpanta viprāḥ mṛgasya ghoṣam mahiṣasya higman

original: RV_10.123.04.2{07} ṛtena yanto adhi sindhumasthurvidad gandharvoamṛtāni nāma
analyzed: ṛtena yantaḥ adhi sindhum asthuḥ vidat gandharvaḥ amṛtāni nāma

original: RV_10.123.05.1{07} apsarā jāramupasiṣmiyāṇā yoṣā bibharti parame vyoman
analyzed: apsarāḥ jāram upasiṣmiyāṇā yoṣā bibharti parame vyoman

original: RV_10.123.05.2{07} carat priyasya yoniṣu priyaḥ san sīdat pakṣe hiraṇyayesa venaḥ
analyzed: carat priyasya yoniṣu priyaḥ san sīdat pakṣe hiraṇyayā isa venaḥ

original: RV_10.123.06.1{08} nāke suparṇamupa yat patantaṃ hṛdā venanto abhyacakṣatatvā
analyzed: nāke suparṇam upa yat patantam hṛdā venantaḥ abhyacakṣata tvā

original: RV_10.123.06.2{08} hiraṇyapakṣaṃ varuṇasya dūtaṃ yamasya yonauśakunaṃ bhuraṇyum
analyzed: hiraṇya pakṣam varuṇasya dūtam yamasya yonauśakunam bhuraṇyum

original: RV_10.123.07.1{08} ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthāt pratyaṃ citrā bibhradasyāyudhāni
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ gandharvaḥ adhi nāke asthāt pratyam citrā bibhrat asya āyudhāni

original: RV_10.123.07.2{08} vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svarṇanāma janata priyāṇi
analyzed: vasānaḥ atkam surabhim dṛśe kam svarṇa nāma janata priyāṇi

original: RV_10.123.08.1{08} drapsaḥ samudramabhi yajjigāti paśyan gṛdhrasya cakṣasāvidharman
analyzed: drapsaḥ samudram abhi yat jigāti paśyan gṛdhrasya cakṣasā avidharman

original: RV_10.123.08.2{08} bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā cakānastṛtīye cakrerajasi priyāṇi
analyzed: bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā cakānaḥ tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi

original: RV_10.124.01.1{09} imaṃ no agna upa yajñamehi pañcayāmaṃ trivṛtaṃsaptatantum
analyzed: imam naḥ agne upa yajñam ehi pañca yāmam trivṛtam sapta tantum

original: RV_10.124.01.2{09} aso havyavāḷ uta naḥ purogā jyogevadīrghaṃ tama āśayiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: asaḥ havyavāṭ uta naḥ purogāḥ jyok iva dīrgham tamaḥ āśayiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_10.124.02.1{09} adevād devaḥ pracatā guhā yan prapaśyamāno amṛtatvamemi
analyzed: adevāt devaḥ pracatā guhā yan prapaśyamānaḥ amṛta tvam emi

original: RV_10.124.02.2{09} śivaṃ yat santamaśivo jahāmi svāt sakhyādaraṇīṃnābhimemi
analyzed: śivam yat santam aśivaḥ jahāmi svāt sakhyāt araṇīṃnā abhimemi

original: RV_10.124.03.1{09} paśyannanyasyā atithiṃ vayāyā ṛtasya dhāma vi mimepurūṇi
analyzed: paśyan anyasyāḥ atithim vayāyāḥ ṛtasya dhāma vi mimepurūṇi

original: RV_10.124.03.2{09} śaṃsāmi pitre asurāya śevamayajñiyādyajñiyaṃ bhāgamemi
analyzed: śaṃsāmi pitre asurāya śevam ayajñiyāt yajñiyam bhāgam emi

original: RV_10.124.04.1{09} bahvīḥ samā akaramantarasminnindraṃ vṛṇānaḥ pitaraṃjahāmi
analyzed: bahvīḥ samāḥ akaram antarasmin indram vṛṇānaḥ pitaram jahāmi

original: RV_10.124.04.2{09} agniḥ somo varuṇaste cyavante paryāvardrāṣṭraṃ tadavāmyāyan
analyzed: agniḥ somaḥ varuṇaḥ te cyavante paryāvardrāṣṭram tat avāmyāyan

original: RV_10.124.05.1{09} nirmāyā u tye asurā abhūvan tvaṃ ca mā varuṇa kāmayāse
analyzed: nirmāyāḥ u tye asurāḥ abhūvan tvam ca mā varuṇa kāmayāse

original: RV_10.124.05.2{09} ṛtena rājannanṛtaṃ viviñcan mama rāṣṭrasyādhipatyamehi
analyzed: ṛtena rājan anṛtam viviñcan mama rāṣṭrasya ādhipatyam ehi

original: RV_10.124.06.1{10} idaṃ svaridamidāsa vāmamayaṃ prakāśa urvantarikṣam
analyzed: idam vāmam ayam prakāśaḥ uru antarikṣam

original: RV_10.124.06.2{10} hanāva vṛtraṃ nirehi soma haviṣ ṭvā santaṃ haviṣāyajāma
analyzed: hanāva vṛtram nirehi soma haviḥ tvā santam haviṣā āyajāma

original: RV_10.124.07.1{10} kaviḥ kavitvā divi rūpamāsajadaprabhūtī varuṇo nirapaḥ sṛjat
analyzed: kaviḥ kavi tvā divi rūpam āsajat a prabhūtīḥ varuṇaḥ niḥ apaḥ sṛjat

original: RV_10.124.07.2{10} kṣemaṃ kṛṇvānā janayo na sindhavaś tā asyavarṇaṃ śucayo bharibhrati
analyzed: kṣemam kṛṇvānāḥ janayaḥ na sindhavaḥ tāḥ asya varṇam śucayaḥ bharibhrati

original: RV_10.124.08.1{10} tā asya jyeṣṭhamindriyaṃ sacante tā īmā kṣetisvadhayā madantīḥ
analyzed: tāḥ asya jyeṣṭham indriyam sacante tāḥ īmā kṣeti svadhayā madantīḥ

original: RV_10.124.08.2{10} tā iṃ viśo na rājānaṃ vṛṇānābībhatsuvo apa vṛtrādatiṣṭhan
analyzed: tāḥ im viśaḥ na rājānam vṛṇānāḥ a bībhatsuvaḥ apa vṛtrāt atiṣṭhan

original: RV_10.124.09.1{10} bībhatsūnāṃ sayujaṃ haṃsamāhurapāṃ divyānāṃsakhye carantam
analyzed: bībhatsūnām sayujam haṃsam āhuḥ apām divyānām sakhye carantam

original: RV_10.124.09.2{10} anuṣṭubhamanu carcūryamāṇamindraṃ nicikyuḥ kavayo manīṣā
analyzed: anuṣṭubham anu carcūryamāṇam indram nicikyuḥ kavayaḥ manīṣā

original: RV_10.125.01.1{11} ahaṃ rudrebhirvasubhiścarāmyahamādityairutaviśvadevaiḥ
analyzed: aham rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ carāmi aham ādityaiḥ uta viśvadevaiḥ

original: RV_10.125.01.2{11} ahaṃ mitrāvaruṇobhā bibharmyahamindrāgnīahamaśvinobhā
analyzed: aham mitrāvaruṇā ubhā bibharmi aham indra agnī aham aśvinā ubhā

original: RV_10.125.02.1{11} ahaṃ somamāhanasaṃ bibharmyahaṃ tvaṣṭāramutapūṣaṇaṃ bhagam
analyzed: aham somam āhanasam bibharmi aham tvaṣṭāram uta pūṣaṇam bhagam

original: RV_10.125.02.2{11} ahaṃ dadhāmi draviṇaṃ haviṣmatesuprāvye yajamānāya sunvate
analyzed: aham dadhāmi draviṇam haviṣmate suprāvye yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_10.125.03.1{11} ahaṃ rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnāṃ cikituṣī prathamāyajñiyānām
analyzed: aham rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnām cikituṣī prathamā a yajñiyānām

original: RV_10.125.03.2{11} tāṃ mā devā vyadadhuḥ purutrābhūristhātrāṃ bhūryāveśayantīm
analyzed: tām mā devāḥ vyadadhuḥ purutrā a bhūri sthātrām bhūri āveśayantīm

original: RV_10.125.04.1{11} mayā so annamatti yo vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇiti ya īṃśṛṇotyuktam
analyzed: mayā saḥ annam atti yaḥ vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇiti yaḥ īm śṛṇoti uktam

original: RV_10.125.04.2{11} amantavo māṃ ta upa kṣiyanti śrudhiśruta śraddhivaṃ te vadāmi
analyzed: amantavaḥ mām te upa kṣiyanti śrudhiśruta śraddhivam te vadāmi

original: RV_10.125.05.1{11} ahameva svayamidaṃ vadāmi juṣṭaṃ devebhirutamānuṣebhiḥ
analyzed: aham eva svayam idam vadāmi juṣṭam devebhiḥ uta mānuṣebhiḥ

original: RV_10.125.05.2{11} yaṃ kāmaye taṃ-tamugraṃ kṛṇomi tambrahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām
analyzed: yam kāmaye tam tam ugram kṛṇomi tam brahmāṇam tam ṛṣim tam su medhām

original: RV_10.125.06.1{12} ahaṃ rudrāya dhanurā tanomi brahmadviṣe śarave hantavāu
analyzed: aham rudrāya dhanuḥ ā tanomi brahma dviṣe śarave hantavau

original: RV_10.125.06.2{12} ahaṃ janāya samadaṃ kṛṇomyahaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī āviveśa
analyzed: aham janāya samadam kṛṇomi aham dyāvāpṛthivī āviveśa

original: RV_10.125.07.1{12} ahaṃ suve pitaramasya mūrdhan mama yonirapsvantaḥ samudre
analyzed: aham suve pitaram asya mūrdhan mama yoniḥ apsu antar samudre

original: RV_10.125.07.2{12} tato vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanānu viśvotāmūṃ dyāṃvarṣmaṇopa spṛśāmi
analyzed: tatas vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanā anu viśvā uta amūm dyām varṣmaṇā upa spṛśāmi

original: RV_10.125.08.1{12} ahameva vāta iva pra vāmyārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: aham eva vātaḥ iva pra vāmi ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10.125.08.2{12} paro divā para enā pṛthivyaitāvatī mahinā saṃ babhūva
analyzed: paras divā paras enā pṛthivyā etāvatī mahinā sam babhūva

original: RV_10.126.01.1{13} na tamaṃho na duritaṃ devāso aṣṭa martyam
analyzed: na tam aṃhaḥ na duritam devāsaḥ aṣṭa martyam

original: RV_10.126.01.2{13} sajoṣasoyamaryamā mitro nayanti varuṇo ati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: sajoṣasā iyam aryamā mitraḥ nayanti varuṇaḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.126.02.1{13} tad dhi vayaṃ vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitrāryaman
analyzed: tat hi vayam vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitra aryaman

original: RV_10.126.02.2{13} yenā niraṃhaso yūyaṃ pātha nethā ca martyamati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: yena niraṃhasaḥ yūyam pātha netha ca martyam ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.126.03.1{13} te nūnaṃ no 'yamūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: te nūnam naḥ yamūtaye varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10.126.03.2{13} nayiṣthā uno neṣaṇi parṣiṣṭhā u naḥ parṣaṇyati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: nayiṣthāḥ unaḥ neṣaṇi parṣiṣṭhāḥ u naḥ parṣaṇyati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.126.04.1{13} yūyaṃ viśvaṃ pari pātha varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: yūyam viśvam pari pātha varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10.126.04.2{13} yuṣmākaṃśarmaṇi priye syāma supraṇītayo 'ti dviṣaḥ
analyzed: yuṣmākam śarmaṇi priye syāma su praṇītayaḥ ti dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.126.05.1{13} ādityāso ati sridho varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ ati sridhaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10.126.05.2{13} ugraṃ marudbhīrudraṃ huvemendramagniṃ svastaye 'ti dviṣaḥ
analyzed: ugram marut bhīḥ rudram huvema indram agnim svastaye ti dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.126.06.1{13} netāra ū ṣu ṇastiro varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: netāraḥ u su naḥ tiras varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10.126.06.2{13} ati viśvāniduritā rājānaścarṣaṇīnāmati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: ati viśvāni duritā rājānaḥ carṣaṇīnām ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.126.07.1{13} śunamasmabhyamūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā
analyzed: śunam asmabhyam ūtaye varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10.126.07.2{13} śarma yachantusapratha ādityāso yadīmahe ati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: śarma yacchantusaprathaḥ ādityāsaḥ yadīmahe ati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.126.08.1{13} yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitāmamuñcatāyajatrāḥ
analyzed: yathā ha tyad vasavaḥ gauryam cit padi sitām amuñcata ayajatrāḥ

original: RV_10.126.08.2{13} evo ṣvasman muñcatā vyaṃhaḥ pra tāryagneprataraṃ na āyuḥ
analyzed: eva u su asmat muñcata vyaṃhaḥ pra tāri agne prataram naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_10.127.01.1{14} rātrī vyakhyadāyatī purutrā devyakṣabhiḥ
analyzed: rātrī vyakhyat āyatī purutrā devī akṣabhiḥ

original: RV_10.127.01.2{14} viśvāadhi śriyo 'dhita
analyzed: viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ dhita

original: RV_10.127.02.1{14} orvaprā amartyā nivato devyudvataḥ
analyzed: ā uru aprāḥ amartyāḥ nivataḥ devī udvataḥ

original: RV_10.127.02.2{14} jyotiṣā bādhatetamaḥ
analyzed: jyotiṣā bādhatetamaḥ

original: RV_10.127.03.1{14} niru svasāramaskṛtoṣasaṃ devyāyatī
analyzed: niru svasāḥ amaskṛtā uṣasam devī āyatī

original: RV_10.127.03.2{14} apedu hāsatetamaḥ
analyzed: apedu hāsatetamaḥ

original: RV_10.127.04.1{14} sā no adya yasyā vayaṃ ni te yāmannnavikṣmahi
analyzed: sā naḥ adya yasyāḥ vayam ni te yāman navikṣmahi

original: RV_10.127.04.2{14} vṛkṣena vasatiṃ vayaḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣena vasatim vayaḥ

original: RV_10.127.05.1{14} ni grāmāso avikṣata ni padvanto ni pakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: ni grāmāsaḥ avikṣata ni padvantaḥ ni pakṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_10.127.05.2{14} niśyenāsaścidarthinaḥ
analyzed: niśyenāsaḥ cit arthinaḥ

original: RV_10.127.06.1{14} yāvayā vṛkyaṃ vṛkaṃ yavaya stenamūrmye
analyzed: yāvaya vṛkyam vṛkam yavaya stenam ūrmye

original: RV_10.127.06.2{14} athā naḥsutarā bhava
analyzed: athā naḥsutarā bhava

original: RV_10.127.07.1{14} upa mā pepiśat tamaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vyaktamasthita
analyzed: upa mā pepiśat tamaḥ kṛṣṇam vyaktam asthita

original: RV_10.127.07.2{14} uṣa ṛṇevayātaya
analyzed: uṣaḥ ṛṇeva yātaya

original: RV_10.127.08.1{14} upa te gā ivākaraṃ vṛṇīṣva duhitardivaḥ
analyzed: upa te gāḥ iva akaram vṛṇīṣva duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_10.127.08.2{14} rātri stomaṃna jigyuṣe
analyzed: rātri stomaṃna jigyuṣe

original: RV_10.128.01.1{15} mamāgne varco vihaveṣvastu vayaṃ tvendhānāstanvampuṣema
analyzed: mama agne varcaḥ vihaveṣu astu vayam tvā indhānāḥ tanvam puṣema

original: RV_10.128.01.2{15} mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaścatasrastvayādhyakṣeṇapṛtanā jayema
analyzed: mahyam namantām pradiśaḥ catasraḥ tvayā adhyakṣeṇa pṛtanāḥ jayema

original: RV_10.128.02.1{15} mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇuragniḥ
analyzed: mama devāḥ vihave santu sarve indravantaḥ marutaḥ viṣṇuḥ agniḥ

original: RV_10.128.02.2{15} mamāntarikṣamurulokamastu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃkāme asmin
analyzed: mama antarikṣam uru lokam astu mahyam vātaḥ pavatām kāme asmin

original: RV_10.128.03.1{15} mayi devā draviṇamā yajantāṃ mayyāśīrastu mayidevahūtiḥ
analyzed: mayi devāḥ draviṇamāḥ yajantām mayi āśīḥ astu mayi deva hūtiḥ

original: RV_10.128.03.2{15} daivyā hotāro vanuṣanta pūrve 'riṣṭāḥsyāma tanvā suvīrāḥ
analyzed: daivyāḥ hotāraḥ vanuṣanta pūrve riṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā su vīrāḥ

original: RV_10.128.04.1{15} mahyaṃ yajantu mama yāni havyākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu
analyzed: mahyam yajantu mama yāni havyā ākūtiḥ satyā manasaḥ me astu

original: RV_10.128.04.2{15} eno mā ni gāṃ katamaccanāhaṃ viśve devāso adhivocatā naḥ
analyzed: enaḥ mā ni gām katamat cana aham viśve devāsaḥ adhivocata naḥ

original: RV_10.128.05.1{15} devīḥ ṣaḷ urvīruru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsa ihavīrayadhvam
analyzed: devīḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsaḥ ihavīrayadhvam

original: RV_10.128.05.2{15} mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhirmā radhāmadviṣate soma rājan
analyzed: mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhiḥ mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan

original: RV_10.128.06.1{16} agne manyuṃ pratinudan pareṣāmadabdho gopāḥ pari pāhi nastvam
analyzed: agne manyum pratinudan pareṣām adabdhaḥ gopāḥ pari pāhi naḥ tvam

original: RV_10.128.06.2{16} pratyañco yantu nigutaḥ punaste 'maiṣāṃ cittamprabudhāṃ vi neśat
analyzed: pratyañcaḥ yantu nigutaḥ punar te mā eṣām cittam prabudhām vi neśat

original: RV_10.128.07.1{16} dhātā dhātṝṇāṃ bhuvanasya yas patirdevaṃ trātāramabhimātiṣāham
analyzed: dhātā dhātṝṇām bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ devam trātāram abhimātiṣāham

original: RV_10.128.07.2{16} imaṃ yajñamaśvinobhā bṛhaspatirdevāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nyarthāt
analyzed: imam yajñam aśvinā ubhā bṛhaspatiḥ devāḥ pāntu yajamānam nyarthāt

original: RV_10.128.08.1{16} uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yaṃsadasmin have puruhūtaḥpurukṣuḥ
analyzed: uru vyacāḥ naḥ mahiṣaḥ śarma yaṃsat asmin have puruhūtaḥ purukṣuḥ

original: RV_10.128.08.2{16} sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛḷayendra mā norīriṣo mā parā dāḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ prajāyai hari aśva mṛḍaya indra mā na urīriṣaḥ mā parā dāḥ

original: RV_10.128.09.1{16} ye naḥ sapatnā apa te bhavantvindrāgnibhyāmava bādhāmahetān
analyzed: ye naḥ sapatnāḥ apa te bhavantu indra agnibhyām ava bādhāmahe etān

original: RV_10.128.09.2{16} vasavo rudrā ādityā uparispṛśaṃ mograṃ cettāramadhirājamakran
analyzed: vasavaḥ rudrāḥ ādityāḥ uparispṛśam mā ugram cettāram adhirājam akran

original: RV_10.129.01.1{17} nāsadāsīn no sadāsīt tadānīṃ nāsīd rajo no vyomāparo yat
analyzed: na asat āsīt na u sadā āsīt tadānīm na āsīt rajaḥ na u vyoma aparaḥ yat

original: RV_10.129.01.2{17} kimāvarīvaḥ kuha kasya śarmannambhaḥ kimāsīd gahanaṃ gabhīram
analyzed: kim avarīvaḥ kuha kasya śarman ambhaḥ kim āsīt gahanam gabhīram

original: RV_10.129.02.1{17} na mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahna āsītpraketaḥ
analyzed: na mṛtyuḥ āsīt amṛtam na tarhi na rātryāḥ ahnaḥ āsīt praketaḥ

original: RV_10.129.02.2{17} ānīdavātaṃ svadhayā tadekaṃ tasmāddhānyan na paraḥ kiṃ canāsa
analyzed: ānīt avātam svadhayā tat ekam tasmāt ha anyat na paraḥ kim cana āsa

original: RV_10.129.03.1{17} tama āsīt tamasā gūḷamagre 'praketaṃ salilaṃ sarvamāidam
analyzed: tamaḥ āsīt tamasā gūḷam agre praketam salilam sarvam āidam

original: RV_10.129.03.2{17} tuchyenābhvapihitaṃ yadāsīt tapasastanmahinājāyataikam
analyzed: tuchyena abhu apihitam yat āsīt tapasaḥ tat mahinā ajāyata ekam

original: RV_10.129.04.1{17} kāmastadagre samavartatādhi manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yadāsīt
analyzed: kāmaḥ tat agre samavartata adhi manasaḥ retaḥ prathamam yat āsīt

original: RV_10.129.04.2{17} sato bandhumasati niravindan hṛdi pratīṣyākavayo manīṣā
analyzed: sataḥ bandhum asati niravindan hṛdi pratīṣya akavayaḥ manīṣā

original: RV_10.129.05.1{17} tiraścīno vitato raśmireṣāmadhaḥ svidāsī ' ' 't
analyzed: tiraścīnaḥ vitataḥ raśmiḥ eṣām adhas svidāsī t

original: RV_10.129.05.2{17} retodhāāsan mahimāna āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt
analyzed: retaḥ dhāḥ āsan mahimānaḥ āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt

original: RV_10.129.06.1{17} ko addhā veda ka iha pra vocat kuta ājātā kuta iyaṃvisṛṣṭiḥ
analyzed: kaḥ addhā veda kaḥ iha pra vocat kutas ājātā kutas iyam visṛṣṭiḥ

original: RV_10.129.06.2{17} arvāg devā asya visarjanenāthā ko veda yataābabhūva
analyzed: arvāk devāḥ asya visarjanena atha kaḥ veda yatas ābabhūva

original: RV_10.129.07.1{17} iyaṃ visṛṣṭiryata ābabhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na
analyzed: iyam visṛṣṭiḥ yatas ābabhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na

original: RV_10.129.07.2{17} yo asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman so aṅga veda yadi vā naveda
analyzed: yaḥ asya adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman saḥ aṅga veda yadi vā na veda

original: RV_10.130.01.1{18} yo yajño viśvatastantubhistata ekaśataṃ devakarmebhirāyataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ yajñaḥ viśvatas tantubhiḥ tatas eka śatam deva karmebhiḥ āyataḥ

original: RV_10.130.01.2{18} ime vayanti pitaro ya āyayuḥ pra vayāpa vayetyāsate tate
analyzed: ime vayanti pitaraḥ ye āyayuḥ pra vaya apa vaya iti āsate tate

original: RV_10.130.02.1{18} pumānenaṃ tanuta ut kṛṇatti pumān vi tatne adhi nākeasmin
analyzed: pumān enam tanute ud kṛṇatti pumān vi tatne adhi nākeasmin

original: RV_10.130.02.2{18} ime mayūkhā upa sedurū sadaḥ sāmāni cakrustasarāṇyotave
analyzed: ime mayūkhāḥ upa seduḥ ū sadaḥ sāmāni cakruḥ tasarāṇi otave

original: RV_10.130.03.1{18} kāsīt pramā pratimā kiṃ nidānamājyaṃ kimāsītparidhiḥ ka āsīt
analyzed: kā āsīt pramā pratimā kim nidānam ājyam kim āsīt paridhiḥ kaḥ āsīt

original: RV_10.130.03.2{18} chandaḥ kimāsīt praugaṃ kimukthaṃyad devā devamayajanta viśve
analyzed: chandaḥ kim āsīt praugam kim uktham yat devāḥ devam ayajanta viśve

original: RV_10.130.04.1{18} agnergāyatryabhavat sayugvoṣṇihayā savitā saṃ babhūva
analyzed: agneḥ gāyatrī abhavat sayugvā uṣṇihayā savitā sam babhūva

original: RV_10.130.04.2{18} anuṣṭubhā soma ukthairmahasvān bṛhaspaterbṛhatī vācamāvat
analyzed: anuṣṭubhā somaḥ ukthaiḥ mahasvān bṛhaspateḥ bṛhatī vācam āvat

original: RV_10.130.05.1{18} virāṇ mitrāvaruṇayorabhiśrīrindrasya triṣṭub ihabhāgo ahnaḥ
analyzed: virāj mitrāvaruṇayoḥ abhiśrīḥ indrasya triṣṭubh ihabhāgaḥ ahnaḥ

original: RV_10.130.05.2{18} viśvān devāñ jagatyā viveśa tenacākḷipra ṛṣayo manuṣyāḥ
analyzed: viśvān devān jagatyā viveśa tena cākḷipre ṛṣayaḥ manuṣyāḥ

original: RV_10.130.06.1{18} cākḷipre tena ṛṣayo manuṣyā yajñe jāte pitaro naḥpurāṇe
analyzed: cākḷipre tena ṛṣayaḥ manuṣyāḥ yajñe jāte pitaraḥ naḥ purāṇe

original: RV_10.130.06.2{18} paśyan manye manasā cakṣasā tān ya imaṃyajñamayajanta pūrve
analyzed: paśyan manye manasā cakṣasā tān ye imaṃyajñam ayajanta pūrve

original: RV_10.130.07.1{18} sahastomāḥ sahachandasa āvṛtaḥ sahapramā ṛṣayaḥ saptadaivyāḥ
analyzed: saha stomāḥ saha chandasaḥ āvṛtaḥ saha pramāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sapta daivyāḥ

original: RV_10.130.07.2{18} pūrveṣāṃ panthāmanudṛśya dhīrā anvālebhirerathyo na raśmīn
analyzed: pūrveṣām panthām anudṛśya dhīrāḥ anvālebhiḥ erathyaḥ na raśmīn

original: RV_10.131.01.1{19} apa prāca indra viśvānamitrānapāpāco abhibhūte nudasva
analyzed: apa prācaḥ indra viśvān amitrān apa apācaḥ abhibhūte nudasva

original: RV_10.131.01.2{19} apodīco apa śūrādharāca urau yathā tava śarmanmadema
analyzed: apa udīcaḥ apa śūra adharācaḥ urau yathā tava śarman madema

original: RV_10.131.02.1{19} kuvidaṅga yavamanto yavaṃ cid yathā dāntyanupūrvaṃviyūya
analyzed: kuvid aṅga yavamantaḥ yavam cit yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya

original: RV_10.131.02.2{19} ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣonamovṛktiṃ na jagmuḥ
analyzed: iha iha eṣām kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣaḥ namovṛktim na jagmuḥ

original: RV_10.131.03.1{19} nahi sthūry ṛtuthā yātamasti nota śravo vividesaṃgameṣu
analyzed: nahi sthūri ṛtuthā yātam asti na uta śravaḥ

original: RV_10.131.03.2{19} gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyantovṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ
analyzed: gavyantaḥ indram sakhyāya viprāḥ aśvāyantaḥ vṛṣaṇam vājayantaḥ

original: RV_10.131.04.1{19} yuvaṃ surāmamaśvinā namucāvāsure sacā
analyzed: yuvam su rāmam aśvinā namucau āsure sacā

original: RV_10.131.04.2{19} vipipānāśubhas patī indraṃ karmasvāvatam
analyzed: vipipāna aśubhaḥ patī indram karmasva avatam

original: RV_10.131.05.1{19} putramiva pitarāvaśvinobhendrāvathuḥ kāvyairdaṃsanābhiḥ
analyzed: putram iva pitarau aśvinā ubhā indra āvathuḥ kāvyaiḥ daṃsanābhiḥ

original: RV_10.131.05.2{19} yat surāmaṃ vyapibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatītvā maghavannabhiṣṇak
analyzed: yat su rāmam vyapibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvati itvā maghavan abhiṣṇak

original: RV_10.131.06.1{19} indraḥ sutrāmā svavānavobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatuviśvavedāḥ
analyzed: indraḥ sutrāmā su avān avobhiḥ su mṛḷīkaḥ bhavatu viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_10.131.06.2{19} bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasyapatayaḥ syāma
analyzed: bādhatām dveṣaḥ abhayam kṛṇotu su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_10.131.07.1{19} tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma
analyzed: tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: RV_10.131.07.2{19} sa sutrāmā svavānindro asme ārāccid dveṣaḥ sanutaryuyotu
analyzed: sa sutrāmā svavān indraḥ asme ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu

original: RV_10.132.01.1{20} ījānamid dyaurgūrtāvasurījānaṃ bhūmirabhiprabhūṣaṇi
analyzed: ījānam id dyauḥ gūrtāvasuḥ ījānam bhūmiḥ abhiprabhūṣaṇi

original: RV_10.132.01.2{20} ījānaṃ devāvaśvināvabhi sumnairavardhatām
analyzed: ījānam devau aśvinau abhi sumnaiḥ avardhatām

original: RV_10.132.02.1{20} tā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā dhārayatkṣitī suṣumneṣitatvatāyajāmasi
analyzed: tā vām mitrāvaruṇā dhārayat kṣitī suṣumnā iṣitatvatā ayajāmasi

original: RV_10.132.02.2{20} yuvoḥ krāṇāya sakhyairabhi ṣyāma rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: yuvoḥ krāṇāya sakhyaiḥ abhi syāma rakṣasaḥ

original: RV_10.132.03.1{20} adhā cin nu yad didhiṣāmahe vāmabhi priyaṃ rekṇaḥpatyamānāḥ
analyzed: adhā cit nu yat didhiṣāmahe vāmabhi priyam rekṇaḥ patyamānāḥ

original: RV_10.132.03.2{20} dadvān vā yat puṣyati rekṇaḥ saṃ vārannakirasya maghāni
analyzed: dadvān vā yat puṣyati rekṇaḥ sam vārannakirasya maghāni

original: RV_10.132.04.1{20} asāvanyo asura sūyata dyaustvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsirājā
analyzed: asau anyaḥ asura sūyata dyauḥ tvam viśveṣām varuṇa asi rājā

original: RV_10.132.04.2{20} mūrdhā rathasya cākan naitāvatainasāntakadhruk
analyzed: mūrdhā rathasya cākan na etāvatā enasā antaka druh

original: RV_10.132.05.1{20} asmin svetacchakapūta eno hite mitre nigatān hanti vīrān
analyzed: asmin su etat śaka pūte enaḥ hite mitre nigatān hanti vīrān

original: RV_10.132.05.2{20} avorvā yad dhāt tanūṣvavaḥ priyāsu yajñiyāsvarvā
analyzed: ava urvā yat dhāt tanūṣu avaḥ priyāsu yajñiyāsu arvā

original: RV_10.132.06.1{20} yuvorhi mātāditirvicetasā dyaurna bhūmiḥ payasāpupūtani
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi mātā aditiḥ vicetasā dyauḥ na bhūmiḥ payasā apupūtani

original: RV_10.132.06.2{20} ava priyā didiṣṭana sūro ninikta raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: ava priyā didiṣṭana sūraḥ ninikta raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_10.132.07.1{20} yuvaṃ hyapnarājāvasīdataṃ tiṣṭhad rathaṃ nadhūrṣadaṃ vanarṣadam
analyzed: yuvam hi apna rājā avasīdatam tiṣṭhat ratham nadhūrṣadam vanarṣadam

original: RV_10.132.07.2{20} tā naḥ kaṇūkayantīrnṛmedhastatre aṃhasaḥ sumedhastatre aṃhasaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ kaṇūkayantīḥ nṛmedhaḥ tatre aṃhasaḥ sumedhaḥ tatre aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10.133.01.1{21} pro ṣvasmai purorathamindrāya śūṣamarcata
analyzed: pra u su asmai puroratham indrāya śūṣam arcata

original: RV_10.133.01.2{21} abhīke cidulokakṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahāsmākaṃ bodhi coditānabhantāmanyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu
analyzed: abhīke cit uloka kṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahā asmākam bodhi coditā an abhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10.133.02.1{21} tvaṃ sindhūnravāsṛjo 'dharāco ahannahim
analyzed: tvam sindhūn rava asṛjaḥ dharācaḥ ahan ahim

original: RV_10.133.02.2{21} aśatrurindrajajñiṣe viśvaṃ puṣyasi vāryaṃ taṃ tvā pari ṣvajāmahenabhantāmanyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu
analyzed: a śatruḥ indra jajñiṣe viśvam puṣyasi vāryam tam tvā pari svajāma henabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10.133.03.1{21} vi ṣu viśvā arātayo 'ryo naśanta no dhiyaḥ
analyzed: vi su viśvāḥ arātayaḥ ryaḥ naśanta naḥ dhiyaḥ

original: RV_10.133.03.2{21} astāsiśatrave vadhaṃ yo na indra jighāṃsati yā te rātirdadirvasu nabhantāmanyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu
analyzed: asta asi śatrave vadham yaḥ naḥ indra jighāṃsati yā te rātiḥ dadiḥ vasu nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10.133.04.1{21} yo na indrābhito jano vṛkāyurādideśati
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ indra abhitas janaḥ vṛkāyuḥ ādideśati

original: RV_10.133.04.2{21} adhaspadaṃ tamīṃ kṛdhi vibādho asi sāsahirnabhantāmanyakeṣāṃ jyākāadhi dhanvasu
analyzed: adhaspadam tamīm kṛdhi vibādhaḥ asi sāsahiḥ nabhantām anyakeṣām jyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10.133.05.1{21} yo na indrābhidāsati sanābhiryaśca niṣṭyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ indra abhidāsati sanābhiḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ

original: RV_10.133.05.2{21} ava tasyabalaṃ tira mahīva dyauradha tmanā nabhantāmanyakeṣāṃjyākā adhi dhanvasu
analyzed: ava tasya balam tira mahī iva dyauḥ adha tmanā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃjyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10.133.06.1{21} vayamindra tvāyavaḥ sakhitvamā rabhāmahe
analyzed: vayam indra tvāyavaḥ sakhitvam ā rabhāmahe

original: RV_10.133.06.2{21} ṛtasya naḥpathā nayāti viśvāni duritā nabhantāmanyakeṣāṃjyākā adhi dhanvasu
analyzed: ṛtasya naḥ pathā naya ati viśvāni duritā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃjyākāḥ adhi dhanvasu

original: RV_10.133.07.1{21} asmabhyaṃ su tvamindra tāṃ śikṣa yā dohate prati varaṃjaritre
analyzed: asmabhyam su tvam indra tām śikṣa yā dohate prati varaṃjaritre

original: RV_10.133.07.2{21} achidrodhnī pīpayad yathā naḥ sahasradhārāpayasā mahī gauḥ
analyzed: achidra udhnī pīpayat yathā naḥ sahasra dhārā payasā mahī gauḥ

original: RV_10.134.01.1{22} ubhe yadindra rodasī āpaprāthoṣā iva
analyzed: ubhe yat indra rodasī āpaprātha uṣāḥ iva

original: RV_10.134.01.2{22} mahāntaṃ tvāmahīnāṃ samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ devī janitryajījanadbhadrā janitryajījanat
analyzed: mahāntam tvām ahīnām samrājam carṣaṇīnām devī janitrī ajījanat bhadrā janitrī ajījanat

original: RV_10.134.02.1{22} ava sma durhaṇāyato martasya tanuhi sthiram
analyzed: ava sma durhaṇāyataḥ martasya tanuhi sthiram

original: RV_10.134.02.2{22} adhaspadaṃ tamīṃ kṛdhi yo asmānādideśati devī janitryajījanad bhadrājanitryajījanat
analyzed: adhaspadam tamīm kṛdhi yaḥ asmān ādideśati devī janitrī ajījanat bhadrā janitrī ajījanat

original: RV_10.134.03.1{22} ava tyā bṛhatīriṣo viśvaścandrā amitrahan
analyzed: ava tyāḥ bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ viśva ścandrāḥ amitra han

original: RV_10.134.03.2{22} śacībhiḥśakra dhūnuhīndra viśvābhirūtibhirdevī janitry ...
analyzed: śacībhiḥ śakra dhūnuhi indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ devī janitrī

original: RV_10.134.04.1{22} ava yat tvaṃ śatakratavindra viśvāni dhūnuṣe
analyzed: ava yat tvam śatakrato indra viśvāni dhūnuṣe

original: RV_10.134.04.2{22} rayiṃna sunvate sacā sahasriṇībhirūtibhirdevī janitry ...
analyzed: rayiṃna sunvate sacā sahasriṇībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ devī janitrī

original: RV_10.134.05.1{22} ava svedā ivābhito viṣvak patantu didyavaḥ
analyzed: ava svedāḥ iva abhitas viṣvak patantu didyavaḥ

original: RV_10.134.05.2{22} dūrvāyā ivatantavo vyasmadetu durmatirdevī janītry ...
analyzed: dūrvāyāḥ iva tantavaḥ vi asmat etu durmatiḥ devī janītrī

original: RV_10.134.06.1{22} dīrghaṃ hyaṅkuśaṃ yathā śaktiṃ bibharṣi mantumaḥ
analyzed: dīrgham hi aṅkuśam yathā śaktim bibharṣi mantumas

original: RV_10.134.06.2{22} pūrveṇa maghavan padājo vayāṃ yathā yamo devī janitry...
analyzed: pūrveṇa maghavan padā ajaḥ vayām yathā yamaḥ devī janitrī

original: RV_10.134.07.1{22} nakirdevā minīmasi nakirā yopayāmasi mantraśrutyaṃcarāmasi
analyzed: nakir devāḥ minīmasi nakirā yopayāmasi mantraśrutyam carāmasi

original: RV_10.134.07.2{22} pakṣebhirapikakṣebhiratrābhi saṃ rabhāmahe
analyzed: pakṣebhiḥ apikakṣebhiḥ atra abhi sam rabhāmahe

original: RV_10.135.01.1{23} yasmin vṛkṣe supalāśe devaiḥ sampibate yamaḥ
analyzed: yasmin vṛkṣe su palāśe devaiḥ sampibate yamaḥ

original: RV_10.135.01.2{23} atrā noviśpatiḥ pitā purāṇānanu venati
analyzed: atrā naḥ viśpatiḥ pitā purāṇān anu venati

original: RV_10.135.02.1{23} purāṇānanuvenantaṃ carantaṃ pāpayāmuyā
analyzed: purāṇān anuvenantam carantam pāpayā amuyā

original: RV_10.135.02.2{23} asūyannabhyacākṣaṃ tasmā aspṛhayaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: asūyan abhyacākṣam tasmai aspṛhayam punar

original: RV_10.135.03.1{23} yaṃ kumāra navaṃ rathamacakraṃ manasākṛṇoḥ
analyzed: yam kumāra navam ratham a cakram manasā akṛṇoḥ

original: RV_10.135.03.2{23} ekeṣaṃviśvataḥ prāñcamapaśyannadhi tiṣṭhasi
analyzed: ekeṣam viśvatas prāñcam a paśyan adhi tiṣṭhasi

original: RV_10.135.04.1{23} yaṃ kumāra prāvartayo rathaṃ viprebhyas pari
analyzed: yam kumāra prāvartayaḥ ratham viprebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_10.135.04.2{23} taṃsāmānu prāvartata samito nāvyāhitam
analyzed: taṃsāma anu prāvartata samitaḥ na a vyāhitam

original: RV_10.135.05.1{23} kaḥ kumāramajanayad rathaṃ ko niravartayat
analyzed: kaḥ kumāram ajanayat ratham kaḥ niravartayat

original: RV_10.135.05.2{23} kaḥ svit tadadya no brūyādanudeyī yathābhavat
analyzed: kaḥ svid tat adya naḥ brūyāt anudeyī yathā abhavat

original: RV_10.135.06.1{23} yathābhavadanudeyī tato agramajāyata
analyzed: yathā abhavat anudeyī tatas agram ajāyata

original: RV_10.135.06.2{23} purastād budhnaātataḥ paścān nirayaṇaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: purastāt budhnaātataḥ paścāt nirayaṇam kṛtam

original: RV_10.135.07.1{23} idaṃ yamasya sādanaṃ devamānaṃ yaducyate
analyzed: idam yamasya sādanam deva mānam yat ucyate

original: RV_10.135.07.2{23} iyamasyadhamyate nāḷīrayaṃ gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ
analyzed: iyam asi a dhamyate nāḷīḥ ayam gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10.136.01.1{24} keśyagniṃ keśī viṣaṃ keśī bibharti rodasī
analyzed: keśī agnim keśī viṣam keśī bibharti rodasī

original: RV_10.136.01.2{24} keśīviśvaṃ svardṛśe keśīdaṃ jyotirucyate
analyzed: keśīviśvam svar dṛśe keśīdam jyotiḥ ucyate

original: RV_10.136.02.1{24} munayo vātaraśanāḥ piśaṅgā vasate malā
analyzed: munayaḥ vāta raśanāḥ piśaṅgāḥ vasate

original: RV_10.136.02.2{24} vātasyānudhrājiṃ yanti yad devāso avikṣata
analyzed: vātasya anudhrājim yanti yat devāsaḥ avikṣata

original: RV_10.136.03.1{24} unmaditā mauneyana vātānā tasthimā vayam
analyzed: unmaditāḥ mauneyana vātānā tasthima vayam

original: RV_10.136.03.2{24} śarīredasmākaṃ yūyaṃ martāso abhi paśyatha
analyzed: yūyam martāsaḥ abhi paśyatha

original: RV_10.136.04.1{24} antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā rūpāvacākaśat
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā rūpā avacākaśat

original: RV_10.136.04.2{24} munirdevasya-devasya saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ
analyzed: muniḥ devasya devasya saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ

original: RV_10.136.05.1{24} vātasyāśvo vāyoḥ sakhātho deveṣito muniḥ
analyzed: vātasya aśvaḥ vāyoḥ sakhā atho deva iṣitaḥ muniḥ

original: RV_10.136.05.2{24} ubhausamudrāvā kṣeti yaśca pūrva utāparaḥ
analyzed: ubhau samudrau ā kṣeti yaḥ ca pūrvaḥ uta aparaḥ

original: RV_10.136.06.1{24} apsarasāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ caraṇe caran
analyzed: apsarasām gandharvāṇām mṛgāṇām caraṇe caran

original: RV_10.136.06.2{24} keśīketasya vidvān sakhā svādurmadintamaḥ
analyzed: keśīketasya vidvān sakhā svāduḥ madintamaḥ

original: RV_10.136.07.1{24} vāyurasmā upāmanthat pinaṣṭi smā kunannamā
analyzed: vāyuḥ asmai upāmanthat pinaṣṭi sma kunannamā

original: RV_10.136.07.2{24} keśīviṣasya pātreṇa yad rudreṇāpibat saha
analyzed: keśīviṣasya pātreṇa yat rudreṇa apibat saha

original: RV_10.137.01.1{25} uta devā avahitaṃ devā un nayathā punaḥ
analyzed: uta devāḥ avahitam devāḥ ud nayathā punar

original: RV_10.137.01.2{25} utāgaścakruṣaṃ devā devā jīvayathā punaḥ
analyzed: uta āgaḥ cakruṣam devāḥ devāḥ jīvayathā punar

original: RV_10.137.02.1{25} dvāvimau vātau vāta ā sindhorā parāvataḥ
analyzed: dvau imau vātau vātaḥ ā sindhoḥ ā parāvataḥ

original: RV_10.137.02.2{25} dakṣante anya ā vātu parānyo vātu yad rapaḥ
analyzed: dakṣante anye ā vātu parā anyaḥ vātu yat rapaḥ

original: RV_10.137.03.1{25} ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ
analyzed: ā vāta vāhi bheṣajam vi vāta vāhi yat rapaḥ

original: RV_10.137.03.2{25} tvaṃ hiviśvabheṣajo devānāṃ dūta īyase
analyzed: tvam hi viśva bheṣajaḥ devānām dūtaḥ īyase

original: RV_10.137.04.1{25} ā tvāgamaṃ śantātibhiratho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ
analyzed: ā tvā agamam śantātibhiḥ atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ

original: RV_10.137.04.2{25} dakṣante bhadramābhārṣaṃ parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te
analyzed: dakṣante bhadram ābhārṣam parā yakṣmam suvāmi te

original: RV_10.137.05.1{25} trāyantāmiha devāstrāyatāṃ marutāṃ gaṇaḥ
analyzed: trāyantām iha devāḥ trāyatām marutām gaṇaḥ

original: RV_10.137.05.2{25} trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyamarapā asat
analyzed: trāyantām viśvā bhūtāni yathā ayam arapāḥ asat

original: RV_10.137.06.1{25} āpa id vā u bheṣajīrāpo amīvacātanīḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ id vai u bheṣajīḥ āpaḥ amīva cātanīḥ

original: RV_10.137.06.2{25} āpaḥsarvasya bheṣajīstāste kṛṇvantu bheṣajam
analyzed: āpaḥ sarvasya bheṣajīḥ tāḥ te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam

original: RV_10.137.07.1{25} hastābhyāṃ daśaśākhā bhyāṃ jihvā vācaḥ purogavī
analyzed: hastābhyām daśa śākhā bhyām jihvā vācaḥ purogavī

original: RV_10.137.07.2{25} anāmayitnubhyāṃ tvā tabhyāṃ tvopa spṛśāmasi
analyzed: anāmayitnubhyām tvā tabhyām tvā upa spṛśāmasi

original: RV_10.138.01.1{26} tava tya indra sakhyeṣu vahnaya ṛtaṃ manvānā vyadardirurvalam
analyzed: tava tye indra sakhyeṣu vahnayaḥ ṛtam manvānāḥ vyadardiruḥ valam

original: RV_10.138.01.2{26} yatrā daśasyannuṣaso riṇannapaḥ kutsāyamanmannahyaśca daṃsayaḥ
analyzed: yatrā daśasyan uṣasaḥ riṇan apaḥ daṃsayaḥ

original: RV_10.138.02.1{26} avāsṛjaḥ prasvaḥ śvañcayo girinudāja usrā apibomadhu priyam
analyzed: avāsṛjaḥ prasvaḥ śvañcayaḥ girinudā ajaḥ usrāḥ apibaḥ madhu priyam

original: RV_10.138.02.2{26} avardhayo vanino asya daṃsasā śuśocasūrya ṛtajātayā girā
analyzed: avardhayaḥ vaninaḥ asya daṃsasā śuśoca sūryaḥ ṛta jātayā girā

original: RV_10.138.03.1{26} vi sūryo madhye amucad rathaṃ divo vidad dāsaya pratimānamāryaḥ
analyzed: vi sūryaḥ madhye amucat ratham divaḥ vidat dāsaya pratimānam āryaḥ

original: RV_10.138.03.2{26} dṛḷāni piprorasurasya māyina indro vyāsyaccakṛvān ṛjiśvanā
analyzed: dṛḷāni piproḥ asurasya māyinaḥ indraḥ vyāsyat cakṛvān ṛjiśvanā

original: RV_10.138.04.1{26} anādhṛṣṭāni dhṛṣito vyāsyan nidhīnradevānamṛṇadayāsyaḥ
analyzed: anādhṛṣṭāni dhṛṣitaḥ vyāsyan nidhīn radevān amṛṇat ayāsyaḥ

original: RV_10.138.04.2{26} māseva sūryo vasu puryamā dade gṛṇānaḥśatrūnraśṛṇād virukmatā
analyzed: māsā iva sūryaḥ vasu puryamā dade gṛṇānaḥ śatrūn raśṛṇāt virukmatā

original: RV_10.138.05.1{26} ayuddhaseno vibhvā vibhindatā dāśad vṛtrahā tujyāni tejate
analyzed: a yuddha senaḥ vibhvā vibhindatā dāśat vṛtrahā tujyāni tejate

original: RV_10.138.05.2{26} indrasya vajrādabibhedabhiśnathaḥ prākrāmacchundhyurajahaduṣa anaḥ
analyzed: indrasya vajrāt abibhet abhiśnathaḥ prākrāmat śundhyuḥ ajahat uṣaḥ anaḥ

original: RV_10.138.06.1{26} etā tyā te śrutyāni kevalā yadeka ekamakṛṇorayajñam
analyzed: etā tyā te śrutyāni kevalā yat ekaḥ ekam akṛṇoḥ a yajñam

original: RV_10.138.06.2{26} māsāṃ vidhānamadadhā adhi dyavi tvayā vibhinnambharati pradhiṃ pitā
analyzed: māsām vidhānam adadhāḥ adhi dyavi tvayā vibhinnam bharati pradhim pitā

original: RV_10.139.01.1{27} sūryaraśmirharikeśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotirudayānajasram
analyzed: sūrya raśmiḥ hari keśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotiḥ udayān ajasram

original: RV_10.139.01.2{27} tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān sampaśyanviśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ
analyzed: tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān sampaśyan viśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ

original: RV_10.139.02.1{27} nṛcakṣā eṣa divo madhya āsta āpaprivān rodasīantarikṣam
analyzed: nṛ cakṣāḥ eṣa divaḥ madhye āste āpaprivān

original: RV_10.139.02.2{27} sa viśvācīrabhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīrantarāpūrvamaparaṃ ca ketum
analyzed: sa viśvācīḥ abhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīḥ antarāpūrvam aparam ca ketum

original: RV_10.139.03.1{27} rāyo budhnaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ viśvā rūpābhi caṣṭeśacībhiḥ
analyzed: rāyaḥ budhnaḥ saṃgamanaḥ vasūnām viśvā rūpā abhi caṣṭe aśacībhiḥ

original: RV_10.139.03.2{27} deva iva savitā satyadharmendro na tasthausamare dhanānām
analyzed: devaḥ iva savitā satya dharmā indraḥ na tasthau samare dhanānām

original: RV_10.139.04.1{27} viśvāvasuṃ soma gandharvamāpo dadṛśuṣīstad ṛtenā vyāyan
analyzed: viśvāvasum soma gandharvam āpaḥ dadṛśuṣīḥ tat ṛtena vyāyan

original: RV_10.139.04.2{27} tadanvavaidindro rārahāṇa āsāṃ pari suryasyaparidhinrapaśyat
analyzed: tat anvavait indraḥ rārahāṇaḥ āsām pari suryasya paridhin apaśyat

original: RV_10.139.05.1{27} viśvāvasurabhi tan no gṛṇātu divyo gandharvo rajasovimānaḥ
analyzed: viśvāvasuḥ abhi tat naḥ gṛṇātu divyaḥ gandharvaḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ

original: RV_10.139.05.2{27} yad vā ghā satyamuta yan na vidma dhiyohinvāno dhiya in no avyāḥ
analyzed: yat vā gha satyam uta yat na vidma dhiyaḥ hinvānaḥ dhiyaḥ id naḥ avyāḥ

original: RV_10.139.06.1{27} sasnimavindaccaraṇe nadīnāmapāvṛṇod duro aśmavrajānām
analyzed: sasnim avindat caraṇe nadīnām apāvṛṇot duraḥ aśma vrajānām

original: RV_10.139.06.2{27} prāsāṃ gandharvo amṛtāni vocadindro dakṣaṃ pari jānādahīnām
analyzed: pra āsām gandharvaḥ amṛtāni vocat indraḥ dakṣam pari jānāt ahīnām

original: RV_10.140.01.1{28} agne tava śravo vayo mahi bhrājante arcayo vibhāvaso
analyzed: agne tava śravaḥ vayaḥ mahi bhrājante arcayaḥ vibhāvaso

original: RV_10.140.01.2{28} bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājamukthyaṃ dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave
analyzed: bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājam ukthyam dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave

original: RV_10.140.02.1{28} pāvakavarcāḥ śukravarcā anūnavarcā udiyarṣi bhānunā
analyzed: pāvaka varcāḥ śukra varcāḥ anūna varcāḥ udiyarṣi bhānunā

original: RV_10.140.02.2{28} putro mātarā vicarannupāvasi pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe
analyzed: putraḥ mātarā vicaran upa avasi pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe

original: RV_10.140.03.1{28} ūrjo napājjātavedaḥ suśastibhirmandasva dhītibhirhitaḥ
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napāt jātavedaḥ su śastibhiḥ mandasva dhītibhiḥ hitaḥ

original: RV_10.140.03.2{28} tve iṣaḥ saṃ dadhurbhūrivarpasaścitrotayo vāmajātāḥ
analyzed: tve iṣaḥ sam bhūri varpasaḥ citra ūtayaḥ vāma jātāḥ

original: RV_10.140.04.1{28} irajyannagne prathayasva jantubhirasme rāyo amartya
analyzed: irajyan agne prathayasva jantubhiḥ asme rāyaḥ amartya

original: RV_10.140.04.2{28} sadarśatasya vapuṣo vi rājasi pṛṇakṣi sānasiṃ kratum
analyzed: sa darśatasya vapuṣaḥ vi rājasi pṛṇakṣi sānasim kratum

original: RV_10.140.05.1{28} iṣkartāramadhvarasya pracetasaṃ kṣayantaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ
analyzed: iṣkartāram adhvarasya pracetasam kṣayantam rādhasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_10.140.05.2{28} rātiṃ vāmasya subhagāṃ mahīmiṣaṃ dadhāsi sānasiṃrayim
analyzed: rātim vāmasya subhagām mahīm iṣam dadhāsi sānasiṃrayim

original: RV_10.140.06.1{28} ṛtāvānaṃ mahiṣaṃ viśvadarśatamagniṃ sumnāya dadhirepuro janāḥ
analyzed: ṛtāvānam mahiṣam viśva darśatam agnim sumnāya janāḥ

original: RV_10.140.06.2{28} śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā daivyammānuṣā yugā
analyzed: śrutkarṇam saprathastamam tvā girā daivyam mānuṣā yugā

original: RV_10.141.01.1{29} agne achā vadeha naḥ pratyaṃ naḥ sumanā bhava
analyzed: agne achā vada iha naḥ pratyam naḥ su manāḥ bhava

original: RV_10.141.01.2{29} pra noyacha viśas pate dhanadā asi nastvam
analyzed: pra naḥ yaccha viśaḥ pate dhana dāḥ asi nastvam

original: RV_10.141.02.1{29} pra no yachatvaryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: pra naḥ yacchatu aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ

original: RV_10.141.02.2{29} pradevāḥ prota sūnṛtā rāyo devī dadātu naḥ
analyzed: pra devāḥ pra uta sūnṛtāḥ rāyaḥ devī dadātu naḥ

original: RV_10.141.03.1{29} somaṃ rājānamavase 'gniṃ gīrbhirhavāmahe
analyzed: somam rājānam avase gnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe

original: RV_10.141.03.2{29} ādityānviṣṇuṃ sūryaṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim
analyzed: ādityān viṣṇum sūryam brahmāṇam ca bṛhaspatim

original: RV_10.141.04.1{29} indravāyū bṛhaspatiṃ suhaveha havāmahe
analyzed: indra vāyū bṛhaspatim su havā iha havāmahe

original: RV_10.141.04.2{29} yathā naḥ sarvaijjanaḥ saṃgatyāṃ sumanā asat
analyzed: yathā naḥ sarvait janaḥ saṃgatyām su manāḥ asat

original: RV_10.141.05.1{29} aryamaṇaṃ bṛhaspatimindraṃ dānāya codaya
analyzed: aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indram dānāya codaya

original: RV_10.141.05.2{29} vātaṃviṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam
analyzed: vātam viṣṇum sarasvatīm savitāram ca vājinam

original: RV_10.141.06.1{29} tvaṃ no agne agnibhirbrahma yajñaṃ ca vardhaya
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne agnibhiḥ brahma yajñam ca vardhaya

original: RV_10.141.06.2{29} tvaṃ nodevatātaye rāyo dānāya codaya
analyzed: tvam naḥ devatātaye rāyaḥ dānāya codaya

original: RV_10.142.01.1{30} ayamagne jaritā tve abhūdapi sahasaḥ sūno nahyanyadastyāpyam
analyzed: ayam agne jaritā tve abhūt api sahasaḥ sūno na hi anyat asti āpyam

original: RV_10.142.01.2{30} bhadraṃ hi śarma trivarūthamasti ta ārehiṃsānāmapa didyumā kṛdhi
analyzed: bhadram hi śarma tri varūtham asti te ārehiṃsānām apa didyumā kṛdhi

original: RV_10.142.02.1{30} pravat te agne janimā pitūyataḥ sācīva viśvā bhuvanā nyṛñjase
analyzed: pravat te agne janimā pitūyataḥ sāci iva viśvā bhuvanā nyṛñjase

original: RV_10.142.02.2{30} pra saptayaḥ pra saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ puraścarantipaśupā iva tmanā
analyzed: pra saptayaḥ pra saniṣanta naḥ dhiyaḥ puras caranti paśu pāḥ iva tmanā

original: RV_10.142.03.1{30} uta vā u pari vṛṇakṣi bapsad bahoragna ulapasya svadhāvaḥ
analyzed: uta vai u pari vṛṇakṣi bapsat bahoḥ agne ulapasya svadhāvas

original: RV_10.142.03.2{30} uta khilyā urvarāṇāṃ bhavanti mā te hetiṃ taviṣīṃcukrudhāma
analyzed: uta khilyāḥ urvarāṇām bhavanti mā te hetim taviṣīṃcukrudhāma

original: RV_10.142.04.1{30} yadudvato nivato yāsi bapsat pṛthageṣi pragardhinīvasenā
analyzed: yat udvataḥ nivataḥ yāsi bapsat pṛthak eṣi pragardhinī vasena

original: RV_10.142.04.2{30} yadā te vāto anuvāti śocirvapteva śmaśru vapasipra bhūma
analyzed: yadā te vātaḥ anuvāti śociḥ vaptā iva śmaśru vapasi pra bhūma

original: RV_10.142.05.1{30} pratyasya śreṇayo dadṛśra ekaṃ niyānaṃ bahavo rathāsaḥ
analyzed: pratyasya śreṇayaḥ dadṛśre ekam niyānam bahavaḥ rathāsaḥ

original: RV_10.142.05.2{30} bāhū yadagne anumarmṛjāno nyaṃṃ uttānāmanveṣibhūmim
analyzed: bāhū yat agne anumarmṛjānaḥ nyaṃ uttānām anveṣi bhūmim

original: RV_10.142.06.1{30} ut te śuṣmā jihatāmut te arcirut te agne śaśamānasyavājāḥ
analyzed: ud te śuṣmāḥ jihatām ud te arciḥ ud te agne śaśamānasya vājāḥ

original: RV_10.142.06.2{30} ucchvañcasva ni nama vardhamāna ā tvādya viśvevasavaḥ sadantu
analyzed: ucchvañcasva ni nama vardhamānaḥ ā tvā adya viśvevasavaḥ sadantu

original: RV_10.142.07.1{30} apāmidaṃ nyayanaṃ samudrasya niveśanam
analyzed: apām idam nyayanam samudrasya niveśanam

original: RV_10.142.07.2{30} anyaṃkṛṇuṣvetaḥ panthāṃ tena yāhi vaśānanu
analyzed: anyaṃkṛṇuṣva itas panthām tena yāhi vaśān anu

original: RV_10.142.08.1{30} āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvā rohantu puṣpiṇiḥ
analyzed: āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvāḥ rohantu puṣpiṇiḥ

original: RV_10.142.08.2{30} hradāścapuṇḍarīkāṇi samudrasya gṛhā ime
analyzed: hradāḥ ca puṇḍarīkāṇi samudrasya gṛhāḥ ime

original: RV_10.143.01.1{01} tyaṃ cidatrim ṛtajuramarthamaśvaṃ na yātave
analyzed: tyam cit atrim ṛtajuram artham aśvam na yātave

original: RV_10.143.01.2{01} kakṣivantaṃ yadī punā rathaṃ na kṛṇutho navam
analyzed: kakṣivantam yadī punā ratham na kṛṇuthaḥ navam

original: RV_10.143.02.1{01} tyaṃ cidaśvaṃ na vājinamareṇavo yamatnata
analyzed: tyam cit aśvam na vājinam areṇavaḥ yam atnata

original: RV_10.143.02.2{01} dṛḷaṃgranthiṃ na vi ṣyatamatriṃ yaviṣṭhamā rajaḥ
analyzed: dṛḷaṃgranthim na vi syatam atrim yaviṣṭhamā rajaḥ

original: RV_10.143.03.1{01} narā daṃsiṣṭhavatraye śubhrā siṣāsataṃ dhiyaḥ
analyzed: narā śubhrā siṣāsatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_10.143.03.2{01} athā hi vāṃ divo narā puna stomo na viśase
analyzed: athā hi vām divaḥ narā punar stomaḥ na

original: RV_10.143.04.1{01} cite tad vāṃ surādhasā rātiḥ sumatiraśvinā
analyzed: cite tat vām su rādhasā rātiḥ sumatiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10.143.04.2{01} ā yannaḥ sadane pṛthau samane parṣatho narā
analyzed: ā yat naḥ sadane pṛthau samane parṣathaḥ narā

original: RV_10.143.05.1{01} yuvaṃ bhujyuṃ samudra ā rajasaḥ pāra īṅkhitam
analyzed: yuvam bhujyum samudre ā rajasaḥ pāre īṅkhitam

original: RV_10.143.05.2{01} yātamachā patatribhirnāsatyā sātaye kṛtam
analyzed: yātam achā patatribhiḥ nāsatyā sātaye kṛtam

original: RV_10.143.06.1{01} ā vāṃ sumnaiḥ śamyū iva maṃhiṣṭhā viśvavedasā
analyzed: ā vām sumnaiḥ śamyū iva maṃhiṣṭhā viśva vedasā

original: RV_10.143.06.2{01} samasme bhūṣataṃ narotsaṃ na pipyuṣīriṣaḥ
analyzed: sam asme bhūṣatam narā utsam na pipyuṣīḥ iriṣaḥ

original: RV_10.144.01.1{02} ayaṃ hi te amartya induratyo na patyate
analyzed: ayam hi te amartyaḥ induḥ atyaḥ na patyate

original: RV_10.144.01.2{02} dakṣo viśvāyurvedhase
analyzed: dakṣaḥ viśvāyuḥ vedhase

original: RV_10.144.02.1{02} ayamasmāsu kāvya ṛbhurvajro dāsvate
analyzed: ayam asmāsu kāvyaḥ ṛbhuḥ vajraḥ dāsvate

original: RV_10.144.02.2{02} ayaṃ bibhartyūrdhvakṛśanaṃ madam ṛbhurna kṛtvyaṃ madam
analyzed: ayam bibharti ūrdhva kṛśanam madam ṛbhuḥ na kṛtvyam madam

original: RV_10.144.03.1{02} ghṛṣuḥ śyenāya kṛtvana āsu svāsu vaṃsagaḥ
analyzed: ghṛṣuḥ śyenāya kṛtvane āsu svāsu vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_10.144.03.2{02} ava dīdhedahīśuvaḥ
analyzed: ava dīdhedahīśuvaḥ

original: RV_10.144.04.1{02} yaṃ suparṇaḥ parāvataḥ śyenasya putra ābharat
analyzed: yam suparṇaḥ parāvataḥ śyenasya putraḥ ābharat

original: RV_10.144.04.2{02} śatacakraṃ yo 'hyo vartaniḥ
analyzed: śata cakram yaḥ hyas vartaniḥ

original: RV_10.144.05.1{02} yaṃ te śyenaścārumavṛkaṃ padābharadaruṇaṃ mānamandhasaḥ
analyzed: yam te śyenaḥ cārum avṛkam padā abharat aruṇam mānam andhasaḥ

original: RV_10.144.05.2{02} enā vayo vi tāryāyurjīvasa enā jāgārabandhutā
analyzed: enā vayaḥ vi tāri āyuḥ jīvase enā jāgāra bandhu tā

original: RV_10.144.06.1{02} evā tadindra indunā deveṣu cid dhārayāte mahi tyajaḥ
analyzed: eva tat indraḥ indunā deveṣu cit dhārayāte mahi tyajaḥ

original: RV_10.144.06.2{02} kratvā vayo vi tāryāyuḥ sukrato kratvāyamasmadāsutaḥ
analyzed: kratvā vayaḥ vi tāri āyuḥ su krato kratvā ayam asmat āsutaḥ

original: RV_10.145.01.1{03} imāṃ khanāmyoṣadhiṃ vīrudhaṃ balavattamām
analyzed: imām khanāmi oṣadhim vīrudham balavattamām

original: RV_10.145.01.2{03} yayāsapatnīṃ bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim
analyzed: yayā a sapatnīm bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim

original: RV_10.145.02.1{03} uttānaparṇe subhage devajūte sahasvati
analyzed: uttāna parṇe subhage deva jūte sahasvati

original: RV_10.145.02.2{03} sapatnīṃ me parādhama patiṃ me kevalaṃ kuru
analyzed: sapatnīm me parādhama patim me kevalam kuru

original: RV_10.145.03.1{03} uttarāhamuttara uttareduttarābhyaḥ
analyzed: uttarā aham uttaraḥ uttaret uttarābhyaḥ

original: RV_10.145.03.2{03} athā sapatnī yāmamādharā sādharābhyaḥ
analyzed: athā sapatnī sā adharābhyaḥ

original: RV_10.145.04.1{03} nahyasyā nāma gṛbhṇāmi no asmin ramate jane
analyzed: na hi asyāḥ nāma gṛbhṇāmi na u asmin ramate jane

original: RV_10.145.04.2{03} parāmevaparāvataṃ sapatnīṃ gamayāmasi
analyzed: parām eva parāvatam sapatnīm gamayāmasi

original: RV_10.145.05.1{03} ahamasmi sahamānātha tvamasi sāsahiḥ
analyzed: aham asmi sahamānā atha tvam asi sāsahiḥ

original: RV_10.145.05.2{03} ubhe sahasvatībhūtvī sapatnīṃ me sahāvahai
analyzed: ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvī sapatnīm me sahāvahai

original: RV_10.145.06.1{03} upa te 'dhāṃ sahamānāmabhi tvādhāṃ sahīyasā
analyzed: upa te dhām sahamānām abhi tvā adhām sahīyasā

original: RV_10.145.06.2{03} māmanupra te mano vatsaṃ gauriva dhāvatu pathā vāriva dhāvatu
analyzed: mām anu pra te manaḥ vatsam gauḥ iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu

original: RV_10.146.01.1{04} araṇyānyaraṇyānyasau yā preva naśyasi
analyzed: araṇyāni araṇyāni asau yā pra iva naśyasi

original: RV_10.146.01.2{04} kathāgrāmaṃ na pṛchasi na tvā bhīriva vindatī ' ' 'n
analyzed: kathā grāmam na pṛcchasi na tvā bhīḥ iva vindatī

original: RV_10.146.02.1{04} vṛṣāravāya vadate yadupāvati ciccikaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣāravāya vadate yat upāvati ciccikaḥ

original: RV_10.146.02.2{04} āghāṭibhirivadhāvayannaraṇyānirmahīyate
analyzed: āghāṭibhiḥ iva dhāvayan araṇyā nirmahīyate

original: RV_10.146.03.1{04} uta gāva ivādantyuta veśmeva dṛśyate
analyzed: uta gāvaḥ iva adanti uta veśma iva dṛśyate

original: RV_10.146.03.2{04} uto araṇyāniḥsāyaṃ śakaṭīriva sarjati
analyzed: uta u araṇyā niḥsāyam śakaṭīḥ iva sarjati

original: RV_10.146.04.1{04} gāmaṅgaiṣa ā hvayati dārvaṅgaiṣo apāvadhīt
analyzed: gām aṅga eṣaḥ ā hvayati dāru aṅga eṣaḥ apāvadhīt

original: RV_10.146.04.2{04} vasannaraṇyānyāṃ sāyamakrukṣaditi manyate
analyzed: vasan araṇyānyām sāyam akrukṣat iti manyate

original: RV_10.146.05.1{04} na vā araṇyānirhantyanyaścen nābhigachati
analyzed: na vai araṇyā nirhanti anyaḥ ced na abhigacchati

original: RV_10.146.05.2{04} svādoḥphalasya jagdhvāya yathākāmaṃ ni padyate
analyzed: svādoḥ phalasya jagdhvāya yathākāmam ni padyate

original: RV_10.146.06.1{04} āñjanagandhiṃ surabhiṃ bahvannāmakṛṣīvalām
analyzed: āñjana gandhim surabhim bahu annām akṛṣīvalām

original: RV_10.146.06.2{04} prāhammṛgāṇāṃ mātaramaraṇyānimaśaṃsiṣam
analyzed: prāham mṛgāṇām mātaram araṇyānim aśaṃsiṣam

original: RV_10.147.01.1{05} śrat te dadhāmi prathamāya manyave 'han yad vṛtraṃ naryaṃviverapaḥ
analyzed: śrat te dadhāmi prathamāya manyave han yat vṛtram naryaṃviverapaḥ

original: RV_10.147.01.2{05} ubhe yat tvā bhavato rodasī anu rejateśuṣmāt pṛthivī cidadrivaḥ
analyzed: ubhe yat tvā bhavataḥ rodasī anu rejate īśuṣmāt pṛthivī cit adrivas

original: RV_10.147.02.1{05} tvaṃ māyābhiranavadya māyinaṃ śravasyatā manasā vṛtramardayaḥ
analyzed: tvam māyābhiḥ anavadya māyinam śravasyatā manasā vṛtram ardayaḥ

original: RV_10.147.02.2{05} tvamin naro vṛṇate gaviṣṭiṣu tvāṃ viśvāsuhavyāsviṣṭiṣu
analyzed: tvamin naraḥ vṛṇate gaviṣṭiṣu tvām viśvāsu havyāsu iṣṭiṣu

original: RV_10.147.03.1{05} aiṣu cākandhi puruhūta sūriṣu vṛdhāso ye maghavannānaśurmagham
analyzed: ā eṣu cākandhi puruhūta sūriṣu vṛdhāsaḥ ye maghavan ānaśuḥ magham

original: RV_10.147.03.2{05} arcanti toke tanaye pariṣṭiṣu medhasātā vājinamahraye dhane
analyzed: arcanti toke tanaye pariṣṭiṣu medha sātā vājinam ahraye dhane

original: RV_10.147.04.1{05} sa in nu rāyaḥ subhṛtasya cākanan madaṃ yo asya raṃhyaṃciketati
analyzed: saḥ id nu rāyaḥ su bhṛtasya cākanat madam yaḥ asya raṃhī aṃciketati

original: RV_10.147.04.2{05} tvāvṛdho maghavan dāśvadhvaro makṣū sa vājambharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: tvāvṛdhaḥ maghavan dāśu adhvaraḥ makṣū sa vājambharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_10.147.05.1{05} tvaṃ śardhāya mahinā gṛṇāna uru kṛdhi maghavañchagdhirāyaḥ
analyzed: tvam śardhāya mahinā gṛṇānaḥ uru kṛdhi maghavan śagdhirāyaḥ

original: RV_10.147.05.2{05} tvaṃ no mitro varuṇo na māyī pitvo na dasmadayase vibhaktā
analyzed: tvam naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ na māyī pitvaḥ na dasma dayase vibhaktā

original: RV_10.148.01.1{06} suṣvāṇāsa indra stumasi tvā sasavāṃsaśca tuvinṛmṇavājam
analyzed: suṣvāṇāsaḥ indra stumasi tvā sasavāṃsaḥ ca tuvi nṛmṇa vājam

original: RV_10.148.01.2{06} ā no bhara suvitaṃ yasya cākan tmanā tanāsanuyāma tvotāḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ bhara suvitam yasya cākan tmanā tanā asanuyāma tvotāḥ

original: RV_10.148.02.1{06} ṛṣvastvamindra śūra jāto dāsīrviśaḥ sūryeṇasahyāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣvaḥ tvam indra śūra jātaḥ dāsīḥ viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ

original: RV_10.148.02.2{06} guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷamapsu bibhṛmasiprasravaṇe na somam
analyzed: guhā hitam guhyam gūḷam apsu bibhṛmasi prasravaṇe na somam

original: RV_10.148.03.1{06} aryo vā giro abhyarca vidvān ṛṣīṇāṃ vipraḥ sumatiṃcakānaḥ
analyzed: aryaḥ vā giraḥ abhyarca vidvān ṛṣīṇām vipraḥ sumatiṃcakānaḥ

original: RV_10.148.03.2{06} te syāma ye raṇayanta somairenota tubhyaṃrathoḷa bhakṣaiḥ
analyzed: te syāma ye raṇayanta somaiḥ enā uta tubhyaṃrathoḷa bhakṣaiḥ

original: RV_10.148.04.1{06} imā brahmendra tubhyaṃ śaṃsi dā nṛbhyo nṛṇāṃ śūraśavaḥ
analyzed: imā brahma indra tubhyam śaṃsi dāḥ nṛbhyaḥ nṛṇām śūra śavaḥ

original: RV_10.148.04.2{06} tebhirbhava sakraturyeṣu cākannuta trāyasvagṛṇata uta stīn
analyzed: tebhiḥ bhava sakratuḥ yeṣu cākan uta trāyasva a gṛṇataḥ uta stīn

original: RV_10.148.05.1{06} śrudhī havamindra śūra pṛthyā uta stavase venyasyārkaiḥ
analyzed: śrudhi havam indra śūra pṛthyāḥ uta stavase venyasya arkaiḥ

original: RV_10.148.05.2{06} ā yaste yoniṃ ghṛtavantamasvārūrmirna nimnairdravayanta vakvāḥ
analyzed: ā yaḥ te yonim ghṛtavantam asvāru ūrmiḥ na nimnaiḥ dravayanta vakvāḥ

original: RV_10.149.01.1{07} savitā yantraiḥ pṛthivīmaramṇādaskambhane savitā dyāmadṛṃhat
analyzed: savitā yantraiḥ pṛthivīm aramṇāt askambhane savitā dyām adṛṃhat

original: RV_10.149.01.2{07} aśvamivādhukṣad dhunimantarikṣamatūrtebaddhaṃ savitā samudram
analyzed: aśvam iva adhukṣat dhunim antarikṣam a tūrtebaddham savitā samudram

original: RV_10.149.02.1{07} yatrā samudra skabhito vyaunadapāṃ napāt savitā tasyaveda
analyzed: yatra samudraḥ skabhitaḥ vyaunat apām napāt savitā

original: RV_10.149.02.2{07} ato bhūrata ā utthitaṃ rajo 'to dyāvāpṛthivīaprathetām
analyzed: atas bhūratas ā utthitam rajaḥ tasmāt dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām

original: RV_10.149.03.1{07} paścedamanyadabhavad yajatramamartyasya bhuvanasya bhūnā
analyzed: paścā idam anyat abhavat yajatram amartyasya bhuvanasya bhūnā

original: RV_10.149.03.2{07} suparṇo aṅga saviturgarutmān pūrvo jātaḥ sa u asyānudharma
analyzed: suparṇaḥ aṅga savituḥ garutmān pūrvaḥ jātaḥ saḥ u asya anudharma

original: RV_10.149.04.1{07} gāva iva grāmaṃ yūyudhirivāśvān vāśreva vatsaṃsumanā duhānā
analyzed: gāvaḥ iva grāmam yūyudhiḥ iva aśvān vāśrā iva vatsam sumanāḥ duhānā

original: RV_10.149.04.2{07} patiriva jāyāmabhi no nyetu dhartādivaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ
analyzed: patiḥ iva jāyām abhi naḥ nyetu dhartā ādivaḥ savitā viśva vāraḥ

original: RV_10.149.05.1{07} hiraṇyastūpaḥ savitaryathā tvāṅgiraso juhve vāje asmin
analyzed: hiraṇya stūpaḥ savitar yathā tvā aṅgirasaḥ juhve vāje asmin

original: RV_10.149.05.2{07} evā tvārcannavase vandamānaḥ somasyevāṇśuṃ pratijāgarāham
analyzed: eva tvā arcan avase vandamānaḥ somasya iva aṇśum pratijāgara aham

original: RV_10.150.01.1{08} samiddhaścit samidhyase devebhyo havyavāhana
analyzed: samiddhaḥ cit samidhyase devebhyaḥ havya vāhana

original: RV_10.150.01.2{08} ādityairudrairvasubhirna ā gahi mṛḷīkāya na ā gahi
analyzed: ādityaiḥ udraiḥ vasubhiḥ naḥ ā gahi mṛḍīkāya naḥ ā gahi

original: RV_10.150.02.1{08} imaṃ yajñamidaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi
analyzed: imam yajñam idam vacaḥ jujuṣāṇaḥ upāgahi

original: RV_10.150.02.2{08} martāsastvāsamidhāna havāmahe mṛḷīkāya havāmahe
analyzed: martāsaḥ tvā a samidhāna havāmahe mṛḷīkāya havāmahe

original: RV_10.150.03.1{08} tvāmu jātavedasaṃ viśvavāraṃ gṛṇe dhiyā
analyzed: tvāmu jātavedasam viśva vāram gṛṇe dhiyā

original: RV_10.150.03.2{08} agne devānā vaha naḥ priyavratān mṛḷīkāya priyavratān
analyzed: agne devān ā vaha naḥ priya vratān mṛḷīkāya priya vratān

original: RV_10.150.04.1{08} agnirdevo devānāmabhavat purohito 'gniṃ manuṣyā ṛṣayaḥsamīdhire
analyzed: agniḥ devaḥ devānām abhavat purohitaḥ gnim manuṣyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ samīdhire

original: RV_10.150.04.2{08} agniṃ maho dhanasātāvahaṃ huve mṛḷīkandhanasātaye
analyzed: agnim mahaḥ dhana sātau aham huve mṛḍīkan dhana sātaye

original: RV_10.150.05.1{08} agniratriṃ bharadvājaṃ gaviṣṭhiraṃ prāvan naḥ kaṇvantrasadasyumāhave
analyzed: agniḥ atrim bharadvājam gaviṣṭhiram prāvat naḥ kaṇva antra sadasyum āhave

original: RV_10.150.05.2{08} agniṃ vasiṣṭho havate purohitomṛḷīkāya purohitaḥ
analyzed: agnim vasiṣṭhaḥ havate purohitaḥ umṛḷīkāya purohitaḥ

original: RV_10.151.01.1{09} śraddhayāgniḥ samidhyate śraddhaya huyate haviḥ
analyzed: śraddhayā agniḥ samidhyate śraddhayā huyate haviḥ

original: RV_10.151.01.2{09} śraddhāṃ bhagasya mūrdhani vacasā vedayamasi
analyzed: śraddhām bhagasya mūrdhani vacasā vedayamasi

original: RV_10.151.02.1{09} priyaṃ śraddhe dadataḥ priyaṃ śraddte didāsataḥ
analyzed: priyam śraddhe dadataḥ priyam śraddte didāsataḥ

original: RV_10.151.02.2{09} priyambhojeṣu yajvasvidaṃ ma uditaṃ kṛdhi
analyzed: priyambhojeṣu yajvasu idam me uditam kṛdhi

original: RV_10.151.03.1{09} yathā deva asureṣu śraddhāmugreṣu cakrire
analyzed: yathā deva asureṣu śraddhāmugreṣu cakrire

original: RV_10.151.03.2{09} evambhojeṣu yajvasvasmākamuditaṃ kṛdhi
