analyzed: evam bhojeṣu yajvasu asmākam uditam kṛdhi

original: RV_10.151.04.1{09} śraddhāṃ devā yajamānā vāyugopā upāsate
analyzed: śraddhām devāḥ yajamānāḥ vāyu gopāḥ upāsate

original: RV_10.151.04.2{09} śraddhāṃhṛdayyayākūtyā śraddhayā vindate vasu
analyzed: śraddhāṃhṛdayyayā ākūtyā śraddhayā vindate vasu

original: RV_10.151.05.1{09} śraddhāṃ prātai havāmahe śraddhāṃ madhyandinaṃ pari
analyzed: śraddhām prātai havāmahe śraddhām madhyandinam pari

original: RV_10.151.05.2{09} śraddhāṃ sūryasya nimruci śraddhe śrad dhāpayeha naḥ
analyzed: śraddhām sūryasya nimruci śraddhe śrat dhāpaya iha naḥ

original: RV_10.152.01.1{10} śāsa itthā mahānasyamitrakhādo adbhutaḥ
analyzed: śāsaḥ itthā mahānasi amitra khādaḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_10.152.01.2{10} na yasyahanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana
analyzed: na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana

original: RV_10.152.02.1{10} svastida viśas patirvṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī
analyzed: svasti da viśaḥ patiḥ vṛtra hā vimṛdhaḥ vaśī

original: RV_10.152.02.2{10} vṛṣendraḥpura etu naḥ somapa abhayaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā indraḥ puras etu naḥ soma pa abhayaṃkaraḥ

original: RV_10.152.03.1{10} vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja
analyzed: vi rakṣaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja

original: RV_10.152.03.2{10} vi manyumindra vṛtrahannamitrasyābhidasataḥ
analyzed: vi manyum indra vṛtrahan amitrasya abhidasataḥ

original: RV_10.152.04.1{10} vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yacha pṛtanyataḥ
analyzed: vi naḥ indra mṛdhaḥ jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ

original: RV_10.152.04.2{10} yo asmānabhidāsatyadharaṃ gamayā tamaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ asmān abhidāsati adharam gamaya tamaḥ

original: RV_10.152.05.1{10} apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato vadham
analyzed: apa indra dviṣataḥ mano pa jijyāsataḥ vadham

original: RV_10.152.05.2{10} vi manyoḥśarma yacha varīyo yavayā vadham
analyzed: vi manyoḥśarma yaccha varīyaḥ yavaya vadham

original: RV_10.153.01.1{11} īṅkhayantīrapasyuva indraṃ jātamupāsate
analyzed: īṅkhayantīḥ apasyuvaḥ indram jātam upāsate

original: RV_10.153.01.2{11} bhejānasaḥsuvīryam
analyzed: bhejānasaḥ su vīryam

original: RV_10.153.02.1{11} tvamindra balādadhi sahaso jāta ojasaḥ
analyzed: tvam indra balāt adhi sahasaḥ jātaḥ ojasaḥ

original: RV_10.153.02.2{11} tvaṃ vṛṣanvṛṣedasi
analyzed: tvam vṛṣan vṛṣā idam asi

original: RV_10.153.03.1{11} tvamindrāsi vṛtrahā vyantarikṣamatiraḥ
analyzed: tvam indra asi vṛtra hā vi antarikṣam atiraḥ

original: RV_10.153.03.2{11} ud dyāmastabhnā ojasā
analyzed: ud dyām astabhnāḥ ojasā

original: RV_10.153.04.1{11} tvamindra sajoṣasamarkaṃ bibharṣi bāhvoḥ
analyzed: tvam indra sajoṣasam arkam bibharṣi bāhvoḥ

original: RV_10.153.04.2{11} vajraṃśiśāna ojasā
analyzed: vajram śiśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_10.153.05.1{11} tvamindrābhibhūrasi viśvā jātānyojasā
analyzed: tvam indra abhibhūḥ asi viśvā jātāni ojasā

original: RV_10.153.05.2{11} sa viśvābhuva ābhavaḥ
analyzed: sa viśvābhuvaḥ ābhavaḥ

original: RV_10.154.01.1{12} soma ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtameka upāsate
analyzed: somaḥ ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtam eke upāsate

original: RV_10.154.01.2{12} yebhyo madhupradhāvati tāṃścidevāpi gachatāt
analyzed: yebhyaḥ madhu pradhāvati tān cit eva api gachatāt

original: RV_10.154.02.1{12} tapasā ye anādhṛṣyāstapasā ye svaryayuḥ
analyzed: tapasā ye anādhṛṣyāḥ tapasā ye svar yayuḥ

original: RV_10.154.02.2{12} tapo yecakrire mahastāṃścidevāpi gachatāt
analyzed: tapaḥ ye cakrire mahaḥ tān cit eva api gacchatāt

original: RV_10.154.03.1{12} ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāso ye tanūtyajaḥ
analyzed: ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāsaḥ ye tanūtyajaḥ

original: RV_10.154.03.2{12} ye vāsahasradakṣiṇāstāṃścidevāpi gachatāt
analyzed: ye vā a sahasra dakṣiṇāḥ tān cit eva api gacchatāt

original: RV_10.154.04.1{12} ye cit pūrva ṛtasāpa ṛtāvāna ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
analyzed: ye cit pūrve ṛtasāpaḥ ṛtāvānaḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_10.154.04.2{12} pitṝn tapasvatoyama tāṃścidevāpi gachatāt
analyzed: pitṝn tapasvataḥ yama tān cit eva api gacchatāt

original: RV_10.154.05.1{12} sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayo ye gopāyanti sūryam
analyzed: sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayaḥ ye gopāyanti sūryam

original: RV_10.154.05.2{12} ṛṣīntapasvato yama tapojānapi gachatāt
analyzed: ṛṣīn tapasvataḥ yama tapaḥ jān api gacchatāt

original: RV_10.155.01.1{13} arāyi kāṇe vikaṭe giriṃ gacha sadānve
analyzed: arāyi kāṇe vikaṭe girim gacha sadānve

original: RV_10.155.01.2{13} śirimbiṭhasyasatvabhistebhiṣ ṭvā cātayāmasi
analyzed: śirimbiṭhasya satvabhiḥ tebhiḥ tvā cātayāmasi

original: RV_10.155.02.1{13} catto itaścattāmutaḥ sarvā bhrūṇānyāruṣī
analyzed: cattā u itas cattā amutas sarvā bhrūṇāni āruṣī

original: RV_10.155.02.2{13} arāyyaṃ brahmaṇas pate tīkṣṇaśṛṇgodṛṣannihi
analyzed: arāyyam brahmaṇaḥ pate

original: RV_10.155.03.1{13} ado yad dāru plavate sindhoḥ pāre apūruṣam
analyzed: adaḥ yat dāru plavate sindhoḥ pāre apūruṣam

original: RV_10.155.03.2{13} tadārabhasva durhaṇo tena gacha parastaram
analyzed: tat ārabhasva durhaṇo tena gacha parastaram

original: RV_10.155.04.1{13} yad dha prācīrajagantoro maṇḍūradhāṇikīḥ
analyzed: yat ha prācīrajagantā uraḥ maṇḍūradhāṇikīḥ

original: RV_10.155.04.2{13} hatāindrasya śatravaḥ sarve budbudayāśavaḥ
analyzed: hatāḥ aindrasya śatravaḥ sarve budbudayāśavaḥ

original: RV_10.155.05.1{13} parīme gāmaneṣata paryagnimahṛṣata
analyzed: pari ime gām aneṣata pari agnim ahṛṣata

original: RV_10.155.05.2{13} deveṣvakrataśravaḥ ka imānā dadharṣati
analyzed: deveṣu akrata śravaḥ kaḥ imānā dadharṣati

original: RV_10.156.01.1{14} agniṃ hinvantu no dhiyaḥ saptimāśumivājiṣu
analyzed: agnim hinvantu naḥ dhiyaḥ saptim āśum iva ājiṣu

original: RV_10.156.01.2{14} tena jeṣmadhanaṃ-dhanam
analyzed: tena jeṣmadhanaṃdhanam

original: RV_10.156.02.1{14} yayā gā ākarāmahe senayāgne tavotyā
analyzed: yayā gāḥ ākarāmahe senayā agne tava ūtyā

original: RV_10.156.02.2{14} tāṃ no hinvamaghattaye
analyzed: tām naḥ hinvam aghattaye

original: RV_10.156.03.1{14} āgne sthūraṃ rayiṃ bhara pṛthuṃ gomantamaśvinam
analyzed: ā agne sthūram rayim bhara pṛthum gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_10.156.03.2{14} aṃdhikhaṃ vartayā paṇim
analyzed: aṃdhi kham vartaya paṇim

original: RV_10.156.04.1{14} agne nakṣatramajaramā sūryaṃ rohayo divi
analyzed: agne nakṣatram ajaram ā sūryam rohayaḥ divi

original: RV_10.156.04.2{14} dadhajjyotirjanebhyaḥ
analyzed: dadhat jyotiḥ janebhyaḥ

original: RV_10.156.05.1{14} agne keturviśāmasi preṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha upasthasat
analyzed: agne ketuḥ viśāmasi preṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ upastha sad

original: RV_10.156.05.2{14} bodhā stotre vayo dadhat
analyzed: bodha stotre vayaḥ dadhat

original: RV_10.157.01.1{15} imā nu kaṃ bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraśca viśve ca devāḥ
analyzed: imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāma indraḥ ca viśve ca devāḥ

original: RV_10.157.02.1{15} yajñaṃ ca nastanvaṃ ca prajāṃ cādityairindraḥ sahacīkḷipāti
analyzed: yajñam ca naḥ tanvam ca prajām ca ādityaiḥ indraḥ sahacīkḷipāti

original: RV_10.157.03.1{15} ādityairindraḥ sagaṇo marudbhirasmākaṃ bhūtvavitātanūnām
analyzed: ādityaiḥ indraḥ sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ asmākam

original: RV_10.157.04.1{15} hatvāya devā asurān yadāyan devā devatvamabhirakṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: hatvāya devāḥ asurān yadā āyan devāḥ deva tvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_10.157.05.1{15} pratyañcamarkamanayañchacībhirādit svadhāmiṣirāmparyapaśyan
analyzed: pratyañcam arkam anayan śacībhiḥ ādit svadhām iṣirām paryapaśyan

original: RV_10.158.01.1{16} sūryo no divas pātu vāto antarikṣāt
analyzed: sūryaḥ naḥ divaḥ pātu vātaḥ antarikṣāt

original: RV_10.158.01.2{16} agnirnaḥpārthivebhyaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ pārthivebhyaḥ

original: RV_10.158.02.1{16} joṣā savitaryasya te haraḥ śataṃ savānarhati
analyzed: joṣā savitar yasya te haraḥ śatam savān arhati

original: RV_10.158.02.2{16} pāhino didyutaḥ patantyāḥ
analyzed: pāhinaḥ didyutaḥ patantyāḥ

original: RV_10.158.03.1{16} cakṣurno devaḥ savitā cakṣurna uta parvataḥ
analyzed: cakṣuḥ naḥ devaḥ savitā cakṣuḥ naḥ uta parvataḥ

original: RV_10.158.03.2{16} cakṣurdhātā dadhātu naḥ
analyzed: cakṣuḥ dhātā dadhātu naḥ

original: RV_10.158.04.1{16} cakṣurno dhehi cakṣuṣe cakṣurvikhyai tanūbhyaḥ
analyzed: cakṣuḥ naḥ dhehi cakṣuṣe cakṣuḥ vikhyai tanūbhyaḥ

original: RV_10.158.04.2{16} saṃcedaṃ vi ca paśyema
analyzed: saṃca idam vi ca paśyema

original: RV_10.158.05.1{16} susandṛśaṃ tvā vayaṃ prati paśyema sūrya
analyzed: su sandṛśam tvā vayam prati paśyema sūrya

original: RV_10.158.05.2{16} vi paśyemanṛcakṣasaḥ
analyzed: vi paśyema anṛcakṣasaḥ

original: RV_10.159.01.1{17} udasau sūryo agādudayaṃ māmako bhagaḥ
analyzed: ud asau sūryaḥ agāt udayam māmakaḥ bhagaḥ

original: RV_10.159.01.2{17} ahaṃ tadvidvalā patimabhyasākṣi viṣāsahiḥ
analyzed: aham tad vidvalā patim abhyasākṣi viṣāsahiḥ

original: RV_10.159.02.1{17} ahaṃ keturahaṃ mūrdhāhamugrā vivācanī
analyzed: aham ketuḥ aham mūrdhā aham ugrā vivācanī

original: RV_10.159.02.2{17} mamedanukratuṃ patiḥ sehānāyā upācaret
analyzed: mama id anukratum patiḥ sehānāyāḥ upācaret

original: RV_10.159.03.1{17} mama putrāḥ śatruhaṇo 'tho me duhitā virāṭ
analyzed: mama putrāḥ śatru haṇaḥ me duhitā virāj

original: RV_10.159.03.2{17} utāhamasmi saṃjayā patyau me śloka uttamaḥ
analyzed: uta aham asmi saṃjayā patyau me ślokaḥ uttamaḥ

original: RV_10.159.04.1{17} yenendro haviṣā kṛtvyabhavad dyumnyuttamaḥ
analyzed: yena indraḥ haviṣā kṛtvī abhavat dyumnī uttamaḥ

original: RV_10.159.04.2{17} idaṃ tadakri devā asapatnā kilābhuvam
analyzed: idam tat akri devāḥ asapatnā kila abhuvam

original: RV_10.159.05.1{17} asapatnā sapatnaghnī jayantyabhibhūvarī
analyzed: asapatnā sapatna ghnī jayantī abhibhūvarī

original: RV_10.159.05.2{17} āvṛkṣamanyāsāṃ varco rādho astheyasāmiva
analyzed: āvṛkṣam anyāsām varcaḥ rādhaḥ astheyasām iva

original: RV_10.159.06.1{17} samajaiṣamimā ahaṃ sapatnīrabhibhūvarī
analyzed: samajaiṣam imāḥ aham sapatnīḥ abhibhūvarī

original: RV_10.159.06.2{17} yathāhamasya vīrasya virājāni janasya ca
analyzed: yathā aham asya vīrasya virājāni janasya ca

original: RV_10.160.01.1{18} tīvrasyābhivayaso asya pāhi sarvarathā vi harī iha muñca
analyzed: tīvrasya abhivayasaḥ asya pāhi sarva rathā vi harī iha muñca

original: RV_10.160.01.2{18} indra mā tvā yajamānāso anye ni rīraman tubhyamimesutāsaḥ
analyzed: indra mā tvā yajamānāsaḥ anye ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ

original: RV_10.160.02.1{18} tubhyaṃ sutāstubhyamu sotvāsastvāṃ giraḥ śvātryāā hvayanti
analyzed: tubhyam sutāḥ tubhyam u sotvāsaḥ tvām giraḥ śvātryāā hvayanti

original: RV_10.160.02.2{18} indredamadya savanaṃ juṣāṇo viśvasyavidvāniha pāhi somam
analyzed: indra idam adya savanam juṣāṇaḥ viśvasya vidvān iha pāhi somam

original: RV_10.160.03.1{18} ya uśatā manasā somamasmai sarvahṛdā devakāmaḥ sunoti
analyzed: yaḥ uśatā manasā somam asmai sarva hṛdā deva kāmaḥ sunoti

original: RV_10.160.03.2{18} na gā indrastasya parā dadāti praśastamiccārumasmaikṛṇoti
analyzed: na gāḥ indraḥ tasya parā dadāti praśastam id cārum asmai kṛṇoti

original: RV_10.160.04.1{18} anuspaṣṭo bhavatyeṣo asya yo asmai revān na sunoti somam
analyzed: anuspaṣṭaḥ bhavati eṣaḥ asya yaḥ asmai revān na sunoti somam

original: RV_10.160.04.2{18} niraratnau maghavā taṃ dadhāti brahmadviṣo hantyanānudiṣṭaḥ
analyzed: niraratnau maghavā tam dadhāti brahma dviṣaḥ hanti anānudiṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10.160.05.1{18} aśvāyanto gavyanto vājayanto havāmahe tvopagantavā u
analyzed: aśvāyantaḥ gavyantaḥ vājayantaḥ havāmahe tvā upagantavai u

original: RV_10.160.05.2{18} ābhūṣantaste sumatau navāyāṃ vayamindra tvā śunaṃhuvema
analyzed: ābhūṣantaḥ te sumatau navāyām vayam indra tvā śunaṃhuvema

original: RV_10.161.01.1{19} muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kamajñātayakṣmādutarājayakṣmāt
analyzed: muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñāta yakṣmāt uta rājayakṣmāt

original: RV_10.161.01.2{19} grāhirjagrāha yadi vaitadenaṃ tasyāindrāgnī pra mumuktamenam
analyzed: grāhiḥ jagrāha yadi vā etat enam tasya aindra agnī pra mumuktam enam

original: RV_10.161.02.1{19} yadi kṣitāyuryadi vā pareto yadi mṛtyorantikaṃ nītaeva
analyzed: yadi kṣita āyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ yadi mṛtyoḥ antikam nītaḥ eva

original: RV_10.161.02.2{19} tamā harāmi nir{ṛ}terupasthādaspārṣamenaṃśataśāradāya
analyzed: tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt aspārṣam enam śata śāradāya

original: RV_10.161.03.1{19} sahasrākṣeṇa śataśāradena śatāyuṣā haviṣāhārṣamenam
analyzed: sahasra akṣeṇa śata śāradena śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam

original: RV_10.161.03.2{19} śataṃ yathemaṃ śarado nayātīndro viśvasyaduritasya pāram
analyzed: śatam yathā imam śaradaḥ nayāti indraḥ viśvasya duritasya pāram

original: RV_10.161.04.1{19} śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamānaḥ śataṃ hemantāñchatamuvasantān
analyzed: śatam jīva śaradaḥ vardhamānaḥ śatam hemantān śatam uvasantān

original: RV_10.161.04.2{19} śatamindrāgnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śatāyuṣāhaviṣemaṃ punarduḥ
analyzed: śatam indra agnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śata āyuṣā haviṣā imam punar duḥ

original: RV_10.161.05.1{19} āhārṣaṃ tvāvidaṃ tvā punarāgāḥ punarnava
analyzed: āhārṣam tvā avidam tvā punar āgāḥ punarnava

original: RV_10.161.05.2{19} sarvāṅgasarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvamāyuśca te 'vidam
analyzed: sarva aṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuḥ ca te vidam

original: RV_10.162.01.1{20} brahmaṇāgniḥ saṃvidāno rakṣohā bādhatāmitaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇā agniḥ saṃvidānaḥ rakṣaḥ hā bādhatām itas

original: RV_10.162.01.2{20} amīvāyaste garbhaṃ durṇāmā yonimāśaye
analyzed: amīvā yaste garbham durṇāmā yonim āśaye

original: RV_10.162.02.1{20} yaste garbhamamīvā durṇāmā yonimāśaye
analyzed: yaḥ te garbham amīvāḥ durṇāmā yonim āśaye

original: RV_10.162.02.2{20} agniṣ ṭambrahmaṇā saha niṣ kravyādamanīnaśat
analyzed: agniḥ tam brahmaṇā saha niḥ kravyādam anīnaśat

original: RV_10.162.03.1{20} yaste hanti patayantaṃ niṣatsnuṃ yaḥ sarīsṛpam
analyzed: yaḥ te hanti patayantam niṣatsnum yaḥ sarīsṛpam

original: RV_10.162.03.2{20} jātaṃyaste jighāṃsati tamito nāśayāmasi
analyzed: jātaṃyaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi

original: RV_10.162.04.1{20} yasta ūrū viharatyantarā dampatī śaye
analyzed: yaḥ te ūrū viharati antarā dampatī śaye

original: RV_10.162.04.2{20} yoniṃ yoantarāreḷi tamito nāśayāmasi
analyzed: yonim tam itas nāśayāmasi

original: RV_10.162.05.1{20} yastvā bhrātā patirbhūtvā jāro bhūtvā nipadyate
analyzed: yaḥ tvā bhrātā patiḥ bhūtvā jāraḥ bhūtvā nipadyate

original: RV_10.162.05.2{20} prajāṃ yaste jighāṃsati tamito nāśayāmasi
analyzed: prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi

original: RV_10.162.06.1{20} yastvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate
analyzed: yaḥ tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate

original: RV_10.162.06.2{20} prajāṃ yaste jighāṃsati tamito nāśayāmasi
analyzed: prajām yaḥ te jighāṃsati tam itas nāśayāmasi

original: RV_10.163.01.1{21} akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ chubukādadhi
analyzed: akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām karṇābhyām chubukāt adhi

original: RV_10.163.01.2{21} yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ mastiṣkājjihvāyā vi vṛhāmi te
analyzed: yakṣmam śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāt jihvāyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10.163.02.1{21} grīvābhyasta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt
analyzed: grīvābhyaḥ taḥ uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyaḥ anūkyāt

original: RV_10.163.02.2{21} yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyamaṃsābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ vi vṛhāmi te
analyzed: yakṣmam doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyām vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10.163.03.1{21} āntrebhyaste gudābhyo vaniṣṭhorhṛdayādadhi
analyzed: āntrebhyaḥ te gudābhyaḥ vaniṣṭhoḥ hṛdayāt adhi

original: RV_10.163.03.2{21} yakṣmammatasnābhyāṃ yaknaḥ plāśibhyo vi vṛhāmi te
analyzed: yakṣmammatasnābhyām yaknaḥ plāśibhyaḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10.163.04.1{21} ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām
analyzed: ūrubhyām te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām

original: RV_10.163.04.2{21} yakṣmaṃ śroṇibhyāṃ bhāsadād bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmi te
analyzed: yakṣmam śroṇibhyām bhāsadāt bhaṃsasaḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10.163.05.1{21} mehanād vanaṃkaraṇāl lomabhyaste nakhebhyaḥ
analyzed: mehanāt vanaṃkaraṇāt lomabhyaḥ te nakhebhyaḥ

original: RV_10.163.05.2{21} yakṣmaṃsarvasmādātmanastamidaṃ vi vṛhāmi te
analyzed: yakṣman sarvasmāt ātmanaḥ tam idam vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10.163.06.1{21} aṅgād-aṅgāl lomno-lomno jātaṃ parvaṇi-parvaṇi
analyzed: aṅgāt aṅgāt lomnaḥ lomnaḥ jātam parvaṇi parvaṇi

original: RV_10.163.06.2{21} yakṣmaṃsarvasmādātmanastamidaṃ vi vṛhāmi te
analyzed: yakṣman sarvasmāt ātmanaḥ tam idam vi vṛhāmi te

original: RV_10.164.01.1{22} apehi manasas pate 'pa krāma paraścara
analyzed: apehi manasaḥ pate pa krāma paraścara

original: RV_10.164.01.2{22} paro nir{ṛ}tyā ācakṣva bahudhā jīvato manaḥ
analyzed: paras nirṛtyāḥ ācakṣva bahudhā jīvataḥ manaḥ

original: RV_10.164.02.1{22} bhadraṃ vai varaṃ vṛṇate bhadraṃ yuñjanti dakṣiṇam
analyzed: bhadram vai varam vṛṇate bhadram yuñjanti dakṣiṇam

original: RV_10.164.02.2{22} bhadraṃ vaivasvate cakṣurbahutrā jīvato manaḥ
analyzed: bhadram vaivasvate cakṣuḥ bahutrā jīvataḥ manaḥ

original: RV_10.164.03.1{22} yadāśasā niḥśasābhiśasopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ
analyzed: yat āśasā niḥśasā abhiśasā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ

original: RV_10.164.03.2{22} agnirviśvānyapa duṣkṛtānyajuṣṭānyāre asmaddadhātu
analyzed: agniḥ viśvāni apa duṣkṛtāni a juṣṭāni āre asmat dadhātu

original: RV_10.164.04.1{22} yadindra brahmaṇas pate 'bhidrohaṃ carāmasi
analyzed: yat indra brahmaṇas pate bhidroham carāmasi

original: RV_10.164.04.2{22} pracetā naāṅgiraso dviṣatāṃ pātyaṃhasaḥ
analyzed: pracetāḥ na āṅgirasaḥ dviṣatām pāti aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10.164.05.1{22} ajaiṣmādyāsanāma cābhūmānāgaso vayam
analyzed: ajaiṣma adya asanāma ca abhūma anāgasaḥ vayam

original: RV_10.164.05.2{22} jāgratsvapnaḥsaṃkalpaḥ pāpo yaṃ dviṣmastaṃ sa ṛchatu yo no dveṣṭitam ṛchatu
analyzed: jāgrat svapnaḥ saṃkalpaḥ pāpaḥ yam dviṣmaḥ tam saḥ ṛchatu yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭitam ṛchatu

original: RV_10.165.01.1{23} devāḥ kapota iṣito yadichan dūto nir{ṛ}tyā idamājagāma
analyzed: devāḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ yat icchan dūtaḥ nirṛtyāḥ idam ājagāma

original: RV_10.165.01.2{23} tasmā arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtiṃ śaṃ no astu dvipadeśaṃ catuṣpade
analyzed: tasmai arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtim śam naḥ astu dvipadā īśam catuṣpade

original: RV_10.165.02.1{23} śivaḥ kapota iṣito no astvanāgā devāḥ śakuno gṛheṣu
analyzed: śivaḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ naḥ astu anāgāḥ devāḥ śakunaḥ gṛheṣu

original: RV_10.165.02.2{23} agnirhi vipro juṣatāṃ havirnaḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī novṛṇaktu
analyzed: agniḥ hi vipraḥ juṣatām haviḥ naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī naḥ vṛṇaktu

original: RV_10.165.03.1{23} hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhātyasmānāṣṭryāṃ padaṃ kṛṇuteagnidhāne
analyzed: hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāti asmān āṣṭryām padam kṛṇute agnidhāne

original: RV_10.165.03.2{23} śaṃ no gobhyaśca puruṣebhyaścāstu mā nohiṃsīdiha devāḥ kapotaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ gobhyaḥ ca puruṣebhyaḥ ca astu mā na uhiṃsīt iha devāḥ kapotaḥ

original: RV_10.165.04.1{23} yadulūko vadati moghametad yat kapotaḥ padamagnaukṛṇoti
analyzed: yat ulūkaḥ vadati mogham etat yat kapotaḥ padam agnaukṛṇoti

original: RV_10.165.04.2{23} yasya dūtaḥ prahita eṣa etat tasmai yamāya namoastu mrityave
analyzed: yasya dūtaḥ prahitaḥ eṣaḥ etat tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mrityave

original: RV_10.165.05.1{23} ṛcā kapotaṃ nudata praṇodamiṣaṃ madantaḥ pari gāṃnayadhvam
analyzed: ṛcā kapotam nudata praṇodam iṣam madantaḥ pari gāṃnayadhvam

original: RV_10.165.05.2{23} saṃyopayanto duritāni viśvā hitvā na ūrjaṃ prapatāt patiṣthaḥ
analyzed: saṃyopayantaḥ duritāni viśvā hitvā naḥ ūrjam prapatāt patiṣthaḥ

original: RV_10.166.01.1{24} ṛṣabhaṃ mā samānānāṃ sapatnānāṃ viṣāsahim
analyzed: ṛṣabham mā samānānām sapatnānām viṣāsahim

original: RV_10.166.01.2{24} hantāraṃśatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām
analyzed: hantāram śatrūṇām kṛdhi virājam go patim gavām

original: RV_10.166.02.1{24} ahamasmi sapatnahendra ivāriṣṭo akṣataḥ
analyzed: aham asmi sapatna hā indraḥ iva ariṣṭaḥ akṣataḥ

original: RV_10.166.02.2{24} adhaḥ sapatnāme padorime sarve abhiṣṭhitāḥ
analyzed: adhas padoḥ ime sarve abhiṣṭhitāḥ

original: RV_10.166.03.1{24} atraiva vo 'pi nahyāmyubhe ārtnī iva jyayā
analyzed: atra eva vaḥ pi nahyāmi ubhe ārtnī iva jyayā

original: RV_10.166.03.2{24} vācas pateni ṣedhemān yathā madadharaṃ vadān
analyzed: vācaḥ pateni sedha imān yathā mad adharam vadān

original: RV_10.166.04.1{24} abhibhūrahamāgamaṃ viśvakarmeṇa dhāmnā
analyzed: abhibhūḥ aham āgamam viśvakarmeṇa dhāmnā

original: RV_10.166.04.2{24} ā vaścittamā vo vratamā vo 'haṃ samitiṃ dade
analyzed: ā vaḥ cittamāḥ vaḥ vratamāḥ vaḥ ham samitim dade

original: RV_10.166.05.1{24} yogakṣemaṃ va ādāyāhaṃ bhūyāsamuttama ā vo mūrdhānamakramīm
analyzed: yogakṣemam vaḥ ādāya aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ ā vaḥ mūrdhānam akramīm

original: RV_10.166.05.2{24} adhaspadān ma ud vadata maṇḍūkā ivodakānmaṇḍūkā udakādiva
analyzed: adhaspadān me ud vadata maṇḍūkāḥ iva udakāt maṇḍūkāḥ udakāt iva

original: RV_10.167.01.1{25} tubhyedamindra pari ṣicyate madhu tvaṃ sutasya kalaśasyarājasi
analyzed: tubhya idam indra pari sicyate madhu tvam sutasya kalaśasya rājasi

original: RV_10.167.01.2{25} tvaṃ rayiṃ puruvīrāmu nas kṛdhi tvaṃ tapaḥparitapyājayaḥ svaḥ
analyzed: tvam rayim puru vīrā āmu naḥ kṛdhi tvam tapaḥ paritapya ajayaḥ svar

original: RV_10.167.02.1{25} svarjitaṃ mahi mandānamandhaso havāmahe pari śakraṃsutānupa
analyzed: svar jitam mahi mandānam andhasaḥ havāmahe pari śakraṃsutān upa

original: RV_10.167.02.2{25} imaṃ no yajñamiha bodhyā gahi spṛdhojayantaṃ maghavānamīmahe
analyzed: imam naḥ yajñam iha bodhyā gahi spṛdhaḥ jayantam maghavān amīmahe

original: RV_10.167.03.1{25} somasya rājño varuṇasya dharmaṇi bṛhaspateranumatyā uśarmaṇi
analyzed: somasya rājñaḥ varuṇasya dharmaṇi bṛhaspateḥ anumatyai uśarmaṇi

original: RV_10.167.03.2{25} tavāhamadya maghavannupastutau dhātarvidhātaḥ kalaśānabhakṣayam
analyzed: tava aham adya maghavan upastutau dhātar vidhātar kalaśān abhakṣayam

original: RV_10.167.04.1{25} prasūto bhakṣamakaraṃ carāvapi stomaṃ cemaṃ prathamaḥsūrirun mṛje
analyzed: prasūtaḥ bhakṣa makaram carau api stomam ca imam prathamaḥ sūriḥ ud mṛje

original: RV_10.167.04.2{25} sute sātena yadyāgamaṃ vāṃ prativiśvāmitrajamadagnī dame
analyzed: sute sātena yadi agamam vām prativiśvāmitra jamadagnī dame

original: RV_10.168.01.1{26} vātasya nu mahimānaṃ rathasya rujanneti stanayannasyaghoṣaḥ
analyzed: vātasya nu mahimānam rathasya rujan eti stanayan āsya ghoṣaḥ

original: RV_10.168.01.2{26} divispṛg yātyaruṇāni kṛṇvannuto eti pṛthivyāreṇumasyan
analyzed: divispṛś yāti aruṇāni kṛṇvan uta u eti pṛthivi āreṇum asyan

original: RV_10.168.02.1{26} saṃ prerate anu vātasy viṣṭhā ainaṃ gachanti samanaṃ nayoṣāḥ
analyzed: sam pra īrate anu vātasya viṣṭhāḥ ā enam gacchanti samanam naya uṣāḥ

original: RV_10.168.02.2{26} tābhiḥ sayuk sarathaṃ deva īyate 'sya viśvasyabhuvanasya rājā
analyzed: tābhiḥ sayuj sa ratham devaḥ īyate sya viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā

original: RV_10.168.03.1{26} antarikṣe pathibhirīyamāno na ni viśate katamaccanāhaḥ
analyzed: antarikṣe pathibhiḥ īyamānaḥ na ni viśate katamat cana ahar

original: RV_10.168.03.2{26} apāṃ sakhā prathamajā ṛtāvā kva svijjātaḥ kuta ābabhūva
analyzed: apām sakhā prathama jāḥ ṛtāvā kva svid jātaḥ kutas ābabhūva

original: RV_10.168.04.1{26} ātmā devānāṃ bhuvanasya garbho yathāvaśaṃ carati devaeṣaḥ
analyzed: ātmā devānām bhuvanasya garbhaḥ yathā vaśam carati deva eṣaḥ

original: RV_10.168.04.2{26} ghoṣā idasya śṛṇvire na rūpaṃ tasmai vātāyahaviṣā vidhema
analyzed: ghoṣāḥ id asya śṛṇvire na rūpam tasmai vātāya haviṣā vidhema

original: RV_10.169.01.1{27} mayobhūrvāto abhi vātūsrā ūrjasvatīroṣadhīrāriśantām
analyzed: mayobhūḥ vātaḥ abhi vātu usrāḥ ūrjasvatīḥ oṣadhīḥ āriśantām

original: RV_10.169.01.2{27} pīvasvatīrjīvadhanyāḥ pibantvavasāya padvaterudra mṛḷa
analyzed: pīvasvatīḥ jīva dhanyāḥ pibantu avasāya mṛḷa

original: RV_10.169.02.1{27} yāḥ sarūpā virūpā ekarūpā yāsāmagniriṣṭyānāmāni veda
analyzed: yāḥ sarūpāḥ virūpāḥ eka rūpāḥ yāsām agniḥ iṣṭyā nāmāni veda

original: RV_10.169.02.2{27} yā aṅgirasastapaseha cakrustābhyaḥparjanya mahi śarma yacha
analyzed: yāḥ aṅgirasaḥ tapasā iha cakruḥ tābhyaḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha

original: RV_10.169.03.1{27} yā deveṣu tanvamairayanta yāsāṃ somo viśvā rūpāṇiveda
analyzed: yāḥ deveṣu tanvam airayanta yāsām somaḥ viśvā rūpāṇi veda

original: RV_10.169.03.2{27} tā asmabhyaṃ payasā pinvamānāḥ prajāvatīrindragoṣṭhe rirīhi
analyzed: tāḥ asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ prajāvatīḥ indra goṣṭhe rirīhi

original: RV_10.169.04.1{27} prajāpatirmahyametā rarāṇo viśvairdevaiḥ pitṛbhiḥsaṃvidānaḥ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ mahyam etāḥ rarāṇaḥ viśvaiḥ devaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ

original: RV_10.169.04.2{27} śivāḥ satīrupa no goṣṭhamākastāsāṃvayaṃ prajayā saṃ sadema
analyzed: śivāḥ satīḥ upa naḥ goṣṭham ākaḥ tāsām vayam prajayā sam sadema

original: RV_10.170.01.1{28} vibhrāḍ bṛhat pibatu somyaṃ madhvāyurdadhad yajñapatāvavihrutam
analyzed: vibhrāj bṛhat pibatu somyam madhu āyuḥ dadhat yajñapatau a vihrutam

original: RV_10.170.01.2{28} vātajūto yo abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣapurudhā vi rājati
analyzed: vāta jūtaḥ yaḥ abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣa purudhā vi rājati

original: RV_10.170.02.1{28} vibhrāḍ bṛhat subhṛtaṃ vājasātamaṃ dharman divo dharuṇesatyamarpitam
analyzed: vibhrāj bṛhat su bhṛtam vāja sātamam dharman divaḥ dharuṇesatyam arpitam

original: RV_10.170.02.2{28} amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhantamaṃ jyotirjajñeasurahā sapatnahā
analyzed: amitra hā vṛtra hā dasyu hantamam jyotiḥ jajñe asura hā sapatna hā

original: RV_10.170.03.1{28} idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotiruttamaṃ viśvajiddhanajiducyate bṛhat
analyzed: idam śreṣṭham jyotiṣām jyotiḥ uttamam viśvajit dhanajit ucyate bṛhat

original: RV_10.170.03.2{28} viśvabhrāḍ bhrājo mahi sūryo dṛśauru paprathe saha ojo acyutam
analyzed: viśva bhrāj bhrājaḥ mahi sūryaḥ dṛśā uru paprathe sahaḥ ojaḥ acyutam

original: RV_10.170.04.1{28} vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svaragacho rocanaṃ divaḥ
analyzed: vibhrājam jyotiṣā svara gachaḥ rocanam divaḥ

original: RV_10.170.04.2{28} yenemāviśvā bhuvanānyābhṛtā viśvakarmaṇā viśvadevyāvatā
analyzed: yena imā viśvā bhuvanāni ābhṛtā viśva karmaṇā viśvadevyāvatā

original: RV_10.171.01.1{29} tvaṃ tyamiṭato rathamindra prāvaḥ sutāvataḥ
analyzed: tvam tyam iṭataḥ ratham indra prāvaḥ sutāvataḥ

original: RV_10.171.01.2{29} aśṛṇoḥ somino havam
analyzed: aśṛṇoḥ sominaḥ havam

original: RV_10.171.02.1{29} tvaṃ makhasya dodhataḥ śiro 'va tvaco bharaḥ
analyzed: tvam makhasya dodhataḥ śiraḥ vaḥ tvacaḥ bharaḥ

original: RV_10.171.02.2{29} agachaḥsomino gṛham
analyzed: agacchaḥsominaḥ gṛham

original: RV_10.171.03.1{29} tvaṃ tyamindra martyamāstrabudhnāya venyam
analyzed: tvam tyam indra martyam āstrabudhnāya venyam

original: RV_10.171.03.2{29} muhuḥśrathnā manasyave
analyzed: muhuḥśrathnā manasyave

original: RV_10.171.04.1{29} tvaṃ tyamindra sūryaṃ paścā santaṃ puras kṛdhi
analyzed: tvam tyam indra sūryam paścā santam puras kṛdhi

original: RV_10.171.04.2{29} devānāṃ cit tiro vaśam
analyzed: devānām cit tiras vaśam

original: RV_10.172.01.1{30} ā yāhi vanasā saha gāvaḥ sacanta vartaniṃ yadūdhabhiḥ
analyzed: ā yāhi vanasā saha gāvaḥ sacanta vartanim yat ūdhabhiḥ

original: RV_10.172.02.1{30} ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭho jārayanmakhaḥsudānubhiḥ
analyzed: ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭhaḥ jārayan makhaḥ sudānubhiḥ

original: RV_10.172.03.1{30} pitubhṛto na tantumit sudānavaḥ prati dadhmo yajāmasi
analyzed: pitu bhṛtaḥ na tantumit sudānavaḥ prati dadhmaḥ yajāmasi

original: RV_10.172.04.1{30} uṣā apa svasustamaḥ saṃ vartayati vartaniṃ sujātatā
analyzed: uṣāḥ apa svasuḥ tamaḥ sam vartayati vartanim sujāta tā

original: RV_10.173.01.1{31} ā tvāhārṣamantaredhi dhruvastiṣṭhāvicācaliḥ
analyzed: ā tvā ahārṣam antaredhi dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha avicācaliḥ

original: RV_10.173.01.2{31} viśastvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭramadhi bhraśat
analyzed: viśaḥ tvā sarvāḥ vāñchantu mā tvat rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat

original: RV_10.173.02.1{31} ihaivaidhi māpa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvata ivāvicācaliḥ
analyzed: iha eva edhi mā apa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvataḥ iva a vicācaliḥ

original: RV_10.173.02.2{31} indraiveha dhruvastiṣṭheha rāṣṭramu dhāraya
analyzed: indra eva iha dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha iha rāṣṭramu dhāraya

original: RV_10.173.03.1{31} imamindro adīdharad dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣā
analyzed: imam indraḥ adīdharat dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā

original: RV_10.173.03.2{31} tasmai somoadhi bravat tasmā u brahmaṇas patiḥ
analyzed: tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat tasmai u brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10.173.04.1{31} dhruvā dyaurdhruvā pṛthivī dhruvāsaḥ parvatā ime
analyzed: dhruvā dyauḥ dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvāsaḥ parvatāḥ ime

original: RV_10.173.04.2{31} dhruvaṃ viśvamidaṃ jagad dhruvo rājā viśāmayam
analyzed: dhruvam viśvam idam jagat dhruvaḥ rājā viśām ayam

original: RV_10.173.05.1{31} dhruvaṃ te rājā varuṇo dhruvaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: dhruvam te rājā varuṇaḥ dhruvam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: RV_10.173.05.2{31} dhruvaṃ ta indraścāgniśca rāṣṭraṃ dhārayatāṃ dhruvam
analyzed: dhruvam te indraḥ ca agniḥ ca rāṣṭram dhārayatām dhruvam

original: RV_10.173.06.1{31} dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣābhi somaṃ mṛśāmasi
analyzed: dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā abhi somam mṛśāmasi

original: RV_10.173.06.2{31} atho taindraḥ kevalīrviśo balihṛtas karat
analyzed: atha u taindraḥ kevalīḥ viśaḥ bali hṛtaḥ karat

original: RV_10.174.01.1{32} abhīvartena haviṣā yenendro abhivāvṛte
analyzed: abhīvartena haviṣā yena indraḥ abhivāvṛte

original: RV_10.174.01.2{32} tenāsmānbrahmaṇas pate 'bhi rāṣṭrāya vartaya
analyzed: tena asmān brahmaṇas pate bhi rāṣṭrāya vartaya

original: RV_10.174.02.1{32} abhivṛtya sapatnānabhi yā no arātayaḥ
analyzed: abhivṛtya sapatnān abhi yāḥ naḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_10.174.02.2{32} abhi pṛtanyantantiṣṭhābhi yo na irasyati
analyzed: abhi pṛtanyantantiṣṭha abhi yaḥ naḥ irasyati

original: RV_10.174.03.1{32} abhi tvā devaḥ savitābhi somo avīvṛtat
analyzed: abhi tvā devaḥ savitā abhi somaḥ avīvṛtat

original: RV_10.174.03.2{32} abhi tvā viśvābhūtānyabhīvarto yathāsasi
analyzed: abhi tvā viśvābhūtāni abhīvartaḥ yathā asasi

original: RV_10.174.04.1{32} yenendro haviṣā kṛtvyabhavad dyumnyuttamaḥ
analyzed: yena indraḥ haviṣā kṛtvī abhavat dyumnī uttamaḥ

original: RV_10.174.04.2{32} idaṃ tadakri devā asapatnaḥ kilābhuvam
analyzed: idam tat akri devāḥ asapatnaḥ kila abhuvam

original: RV_10.174.05.1{32} asapatnaḥ sapatnahābhirāṣṭro viṣāsahiḥ
analyzed: asapatnaḥ sapatna hā abhirāṣṭraḥ viṣāsahiḥ

original: RV_10.174.05.2{32} yathāhameṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ virājāni janasya ca
analyzed: yathā aham eṣām bhūtānām virājāni janasya ca

original: RV_10.175.01.1{33} pra vo grāvāṇaḥ savitā devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā
analyzed: pra vaḥ grāvāṇaḥ savitā devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā

original: RV_10.175.01.2{33} dhūrṣuyujyadhvaṃ sunuta
analyzed: dhūrṣuyujyadhvam sunuta

original: RV_10.175.02.1{33} grāvāṇo apa duchunāmapa sedhata durmatim
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ apa duchunām apa sedhata durmatim

original: RV_10.175.02.2{33} usrāḥ kartanabheṣajam
analyzed: usrāḥ kartana bheṣajam

original: RV_10.175.03.1{33} grāvāṇa upareṣvā mahīyante sajoṣasaḥ
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ upara iṣvā mahīyante sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_10.175.03.2{33} vṛṣṇedadhato vṛṣṇyam
analyzed: vṛṣṇā idadhataḥ vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_10.175.04.1{33} grāvāṇaḥ savitā nu vo devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ savitā nu vaḥ devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā

original: RV_10.175.04.2{33} yajamānāya sunvate
analyzed: yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_10.176.01.1{34} pra sūnava ṛbhūṇāṃ bṛhan navanta vṛjanā
analyzed: pra sūnavaḥ ṛbhūṇām bṛhat navanta vṛjanā

original: RV_10.176.01.2{34} kṣāmā yeviśvadhāyaso 'śnan dhenuṃ na mātaram
analyzed: kṣāmāḥ yeviśva dhāyasaḥ śnan dhenum na mātaram

original: RV_10.176.02.1{34} pra devaṃ devyā dhiyā bharatā jātavedasam
analyzed: pra devam devyā dhiyā bharata jātavedasam

original: RV_10.176.02.2{34} havyā novakṣadānuṣak
analyzed: havyā naḥ vakṣada anuṣak

original: RV_10.176.03.1{34} ayamu ṣya pra devayurhotā yajñāya nīyate
analyzed: ayam u sya pra devayuḥ hotā yajñāya nīyate

original: RV_10.176.03.2{34} ratho nayorabhīvṛto ghṛṇīvāñcetati tmanā
analyzed: rathaḥ nayoḥ abhīvṛtaḥ ghṛṇīvān cetati tmanā

original: RV_10.176.04.1{34} ayamagniruruṣyatyamṛtādiva janmanaḥ
analyzed: ayam agniḥ uruṣyati amṛtāt iva janmanaḥ

original: RV_10.176.04.2{34} sahasaścidsahīyān devo jīvātave kṛtaḥ
analyzed: sahasaḥ cit sahīyān devaḥ jīvātave kṛtaḥ

original: RV_10.177.01.1{35} pataṃgamaktamasurasya māyayā hṛdā paśyanti manasāvipaścitaḥ
analyzed: pataṃgam aktam asurasya māyayā hṛdā paśyanti manasā vipaścitaḥ

original: RV_10.177.01.2{35} samudre antaḥ kavayo vi cakṣate marīcīnāmpadamichanti vedhasaḥ
analyzed: samudre antar kavayaḥ vi cakṣate marīcīnām padam ichanti vedhasaḥ

original: RV_10.177.02.1{35} pataṃgo vācaṃ manasā bibharti tāṃ gandharvo 'vadad garbheantaḥ
analyzed: pataṃgaḥ vācam manasā bibharti tām gandharvaḥ vadat garbheantaḥ

original: RV_10.177.02.2{35} tāṃ dyotamānāṃ svaryaṃ manīṣām ṛtasya padekavayo ni pānti
analyzed: tām dyotamānām svaryam manīṣām ṛtasya padā ikavayaḥ ni pānti

original: RV_10.177.03.1{35} apaśyaṃ gopāmanipadyamānamā ca parā ca pathibhiścarantam
analyzed: apaśyam gopām a nipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam

original: RV_10.177.03.2{35} sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīrvasāna ā varīvartibhuvaneṣvantaḥ
analyzed: sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar

original: RV_10.178.01.1{36} tyamū ṣu vājinaṃ devajūtaṃ sahāvānaṃ tarutāraṃrathānām
analyzed: tyamū su vājinam deva jūtam sahāvānam tarutāraṃrathānām

original: RV_10.178.01.2{36} ariṣṭanemiṃ pṛtanājamāśuṃ svastayetārkṣyamihā huvema
analyzed: ariṣṭa nemim pṛtanājam āśum svastayā ita ārkṣyam iha ā huvema

original: RV_10.178.02.1{36} indrasyeva rātimājohuvānāḥ svastaye nāvamivā ruhema
analyzed: indrasya iva rātim ājohuvānāḥ svastaye nāvam iva ā ruhema

original: RV_10.178.02.2{36} urvī na pṛthvī bahule gabhīre mā vāmetau mā paretauriṣāma
analyzed: urvī na pṛthvī bahule gabhīre mā vām etau mā paretauriṣāma

original: RV_10.178.03.1{36} sadyaścid yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya ivajyotiṣāpastatāna
analyzed: sadyas cit yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūryaḥ iva jyotiṣā apaḥ tatāna

original: RV_10.178.03.2{36} sahasrasāḥ śatasā asya raṃhirnasmā varante yuvatiṃ na śaryām
analyzed: sahasra sāḥ śata sāḥ asya raṃhiḥ nasmā varante yuvatim na śaryām

original: RV_10.179.01.1{37} ut tiṣṭhatāva paśyatendrasya bhāgam ṛtviyam
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhata ava paśyata indrasya bhāgam ṛtviyam

original: RV_10.179.01.2{37} yadi śrātojuhotana yadyaśrāto mamattana
analyzed: yadi śrātaḥ juhotana yadi a śrātaḥ mamattana

original: RV_10.179.02.1{37} śrātaṃ haviro ṣvindra pra yāhi jagāma sūro adhvanovimadhyam
analyzed: śrātam havirā u su indra pra yāhi jagāma sūraḥ adhvanovimadhyam

original: RV_10.179.02.2{37} pari tvāsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ kulapā navrājapatiṃ carantam
analyzed: pari tvā āsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ kula pāḥ na vrāja patim carantam

original: RV_10.179.03.1{37} śrātaṃ manya ūdhani śrātamagnau suśrātaṃ manye tadṛtaṃ navīyaḥ
analyzed: śrātam manye ūdhani śrātam agnau su śrātam manye tat ṛtam navīyaḥ

original: RV_10.179.03.2{37} mādhyandinasya savanasya dadhnaḥ pibendravajrin purukṛjjuṣāṇaḥ
analyzed: mādhyandinasya savanasya dadhnaḥ piba indra vajrin puru kṛt juṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_10.180.01.1{38} pra sasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūñ jyeṣṭhaste śuṣma iharātirastu
analyzed: pra sasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūm jyeṣṭhaḥ te śuṣmaḥ iha rātiḥ astu

original: RV_10.180.01.2{38} indrā bhara dakṣiṇenā vasūni patiḥsindhūnāmasi revatīnām
analyzed: indra ā bhara dakṣiṇena vasūni patiḥ sindhūnām asi revatīnām

original: RV_10.180.02.1{38} mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ parāvata ā jaganthāparasyāḥ
analyzed: mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣṭhāḥ parāvataḥ ā jagantha aparasyāḥ

original: RV_10.180.02.2{38} sṛkaṃ saṃśāya pavimindra tigmaṃ vi śatrūntāḷi vi mṛdho nudasva
analyzed: sṛkam saṃśāya pavim indra tigmam vi śatrūn tāḷi vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva

original: RV_10.180.03.1{38} indra kṣatramabhi vāmamojo 'jāyathā vṛṣabhacarṣaṇīnām
analyzed: indra kṣatram abhi vāmam ojaḥ jāyathāḥ vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_10.180.03.2{38} apānudo janamamitrayantamuruṃ devebhyoakṛṇoru lokam
analyzed: apānudaḥ janam amitrayantam urum devebhyaḥ akṛṇaḥ uru lokam

original: RV_10.181.01.1{39} prathaśca yasya saprathaśca namānuṣṭubhasya haviṣohaviryat
analyzed: prathaḥ ca yasya sa prathaḥ ca nama ānuṣṭubhasya haviṣaḥ haviḥ yat

original: RV_10.181.01.2{39} dhāturdyutānāt savituśca viṣṇo rathantaramā jabhārā vasiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ rathantaram āḥ jabhārā vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_10.181.02.1{39} avindan te atihitaṃ yadāsīd yajñasya dhāma paramaṃguhā yat
analyzed: avindan te atihitam yadā āsīt yajñasya dhāma paramaṃguhā yat

original: RV_10.181.02.2{39} dhāturdyutānāt savituśca viṣṇorbharadvājo bṛhadā cakre agneḥ
analyzed: dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ bharadvājaḥ bṛhat ā cakre agneḥ

original: RV_10.181.03.1{39} te 'vindan manasā dīdhyānā yaju ṣkannaṃ prathamandevayānam
analyzed: te vindan manasā dīdhyānāḥ yaju skannam prathaman deva yānam

original: RV_10.181.03.2{39} dhāturdyutānāt savituśca viṣṇorāsūryādabharan gharmamete
analyzed: dhātuḥ dyutānāt savituḥ ca viṣṇoḥ ā sūryāt abharan gharmam ete

original: RV_10.182.01.1{40} bṛhaspatirnayatu durgahā tiraḥ punarneṣadaghaśaṃsāyamanma
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ nayatu durgahā tiras punar neṣat agha śaṃsāya manma

original: RV_10.182.01.2{40} kṣipadaśastimapa durmatiṃ hannathā karadyajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ
analyzed: kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han athā karat yajamānāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_10.182.02.1{40} narāśaṃso no 'vatu prayāje śaṃ no astvanuyājo haveṣu
analyzed: narāśaṃsaḥ naḥ vatu prayāje śam naḥ astu anuyājaḥ haveṣu

original: RV_10.182.02.2{40} kṣipadaśastimapa durmatiṃ hannathā karad yajamānāyaśaṃ yoḥ
analyzed: kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han nathā karat yajamāna ayaśam yoḥ

original: RV_10.182.03.1{40} tapurmūrdhā tapatu rakṣaso ye brahmadviṣaḥ śaravehantavā u
analyzed: tapurmūrdhā tapatu rakṣasaḥ ye brahma dviṣaḥ śara vehantavai u

original: RV_10.182.03.2{40} kṣipadaśastimapa durmatiṃ hannathā karadyajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ
analyzed: kṣipat aśastim apa durmatim han athā karat yajamānāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_10.183.01.1{41} apaśyaṃ tvā manasā cekitānaṃ tapaso jātaṃ tapasovibhūtam
analyzed: apaśyam tvā manasā cekitānam tapasaḥ jātam tapasaḥ vibhūtam

original: RV_10.183.01.2{41} iha prajāmiha rayiṃ rarāṇaḥ pra jāyasvaprajayā putrakāma
analyzed: iha prajām iha rayim rarāṇaḥ pra jāyasva aprajayā putra kāma

original: RV_10.183.02.1{41} apaśyaṃ tvā manasā dīdhyānāṃ svāyāṃ tanū ṛtvyenādhamānām
analyzed: apaśyam tvā manasā dīdhyānām svāyām tanū ṛtvyena adhamānām

original: RV_10.183.02.2{41} upa māmuccā yuvatirbabhūyāḥ pra jāyasvaprajayā putrakāme
analyzed: upa mām uccā yuvatiḥ babhūyāḥ pra jāyasva aprajayā putra kāme

original: RV_10.183.03.1{41} ahaṃ garbhamadadhāmoṣadhīṣvahaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣvantaḥ ahaṃ prajā ajanayaṃ pṛthivyāmahaṃ janibhyo aparīṣuputrān
analyzed: aham garbham adadhām oṣadhīṣu aham viśveṣu bhuvaneṣu antar aham prajāḥ ajanayam pṛthivyām aham janibhyaḥ aparīṣu putrān

original: RV_10.184.01.1{42} viṣṇuryoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ yonim kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu

original: RV_10.184.01.2{42} āsiñcatu prajāpatirdhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te
analyzed: āsiñcatu prajāpatiḥ dhātā garbham dadhātu te

original: RV_10.184.02.1{42} garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi sarasvati
analyzed: garbham dhehi sinīvāli garbham dhehi sarasvati

original: RV_10.184.02.2{42} garbhaṃ teaśvinau devāvā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā
analyzed: garbham te aśvinau devau ā dhattām puṣkara srajā

original: RV_10.184.03.1{42} hiraṇyayī araṇī yaṃ nirmanthato aśvinā
analyzed: hiraṇyayī araṇī yam nirmanthataḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10.184.03.2{42} taṃ tegarbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtave
analyzed: tam te garbham havāmahe daśame māsi sūtave

original: RV_10.185.01.1{43} mahi trīṇāmavo 'stu dyukṣaṃ mitrasyāryamṇaḥ
analyzed: mahi trīṇām avaḥ stu dyukṣam mitrasya aryamṇaḥ

original: RV_10.185.01.2{43} durādharṣaṃ varuṇasya
analyzed: durādharṣam varuṇasya

original: RV_10.185.02.1{43} nahi teṣāmamā cana nādhvasu vāraṇeṣu
analyzed: nahi teṣām amā cana na adhvasu vā araṇeṣu

original: RV_10.185.02.2{43} īśe ripuraghaśaṃsaḥ
analyzed: īśe ripuḥ agha śaṃsaḥ

original: RV_10.185.03.1{43} yasmai putrāso aditeḥ pra jīvase martyāya
analyzed: yasmai putrāsaḥ aditeḥ pra jīvase martyāya

original: RV_10.185.03.2{43} jyotiryachantyajasram
analyzed: jyotiḥ yacchanti ajasram

original: RV_10.186.01.1{44} vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ śambhu mayobhu no hṛde
analyzed: vātaḥ ā vātu bheṣajam śambhu mayobhu naḥ hṛde

original: RV_10.186.01.2{44} pra ṇaāyūṃṣi tāriṣat
analyzed: pra na āyūṃṣi tāriṣat

original: RV_10.186.02.1{44} uta vāta pitāsi na uta bhrātota naḥ sakhā
analyzed: uta vāta pitā asi naḥ uta bhrātā uta naḥ sakhā

original: RV_10.186.02.2{44} sa nojīvātave kṛdhi
analyzed: sa naḥ jīvātave kṛdhi

original: RV_10.186.03.1{44} yadado vāta te gṛhe 'mṛtasya nidhirhitaḥ
analyzed: yat adaḥ vāta te gṛhe mṛtasya nidhiḥ hitaḥ

original: RV_10.186.03.2{44} tato no dehijīvase
analyzed: tatas naḥ dehi jīvase

original: RV_10.187.01.1{45} prāgnaye vācamīraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām
analyzed: pra agnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām

original: RV_10.187.01.2{45} sa naḥparṣadati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥparṣadati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.187.02.1{45} yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvatastiro dhanvātirocate
analyzed: yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvataḥ tiras dhanva atirocate

original: RV_10.187.02.2{45} sa naḥparṣadati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥparṣadati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.187.03.1{45} yo rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati vṛṣā śukreṇa śociṣā
analyzed: yaḥ rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati vṛṣā śukreṇa śociṣā

original: RV_10.187.03.2{45} sa naḥparṣadati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥparṣadati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.187.04.1{45} yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati
analyzed: yaḥ viśvā abhi vipaśyati bhuvanā sam ca paśyati

original: RV_10.187.04.2{45} sa naḥparṣadati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥparṣadati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.187.05.1{45} yo asya pāre rajasaḥ śukro agnirajāyata
analyzed: yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ śukraḥ agniḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10.187.05.2{45} sa naḥ parṣadati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣadati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_10.188.01.1{46} pra nūnaṃ jātavedasamaśvaṃ hinota vājinam
analyzed: pra nūnam jātavedasam aśvam hinota vājinam

original: RV_10.188.01.2{46} idaṃ nobarhirāsade
analyzed: idam naḥ barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_10.188.02.1{46} asya pra jātavedaso vipravīrasya mīḷuṣaḥ
analyzed: asya pra jātavedasaḥ vipra vīrasya mīḍuṣaḥ

original: RV_10.188.02.2{46} mahīmiyarmisuṣṭutim
RV_10.188.03.1{46} yā ruco jātavedaso devatrā havyavāhanīḥ
analyzed: yāḥ rucaḥ jātavedasaḥ devatrā havya vāhanīḥ

original: RV_10.188.03.2{46} tābhirnoyajñaminvatu
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ yajñam invatu

original: RV_10.189.01.1{47} āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnirakramīdasadan mātaraṃ puraḥ
analyzed: ā ayam gauḥ pṛśniḥ akramīt asadat mātaram puras

original: RV_10.189.01.2{47} pitaraṃ ca prayan svaḥ
analyzed: pitaram ca prayan svar

original: RV_10.189.02.1{47} antaścarati rocanāsya prāṇādapānatī
analyzed: antar carati rocanā asya prāṇāt apānatī

original: RV_10.189.02.2{47} vyakhyanmahiṣo divam
analyzed: vyakhyat mahiṣaḥ divam

original: RV_10.189.03.1{47} triṃśad dhāma vi rājati vāk pataṃgāya dhīyate
analyzed: triṃśat dhāma vi rājati vāc pataṃgāya dhīyate

original: RV_10.189.03.2{47} prativastoraha dyubhiḥ
analyzed: prativastoḥ aha dyubhiḥ

original: RV_10.190.01.1{48} ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ cābhīddhāt tapaso 'dhyajāyata
analyzed: ṛtam ca satyam ca abhīddhāt tapasaḥ dhī ajāyata

original: RV_10.190.01.2{48} tatorātryajāyata tataḥ samudro arṇavaḥ
analyzed: tatas rātrī ajāyata tatas samudraḥ arṇavaḥ

original: RV_10.190.02.1{48} samudrādarṇavādadhi saṃvatsaro ajāyata
analyzed: samudrāt arṇavāt adhi saṃvatsaraḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10.190.02.2{48} ahorātrāṇividadhad viśvasya miṣato vaśī
analyzed: viśvasya miṣataḥ vaśī

original: RV_10.190.03.1{48} sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat
analyzed: sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvam akalpayat

original: RV_10.190.03.2{48} divaṃ capṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ
analyzed: divam ca pṛthivīm ca antarikṣam atho svar

original: RV_10.191.01.1{49} saṃ-samid yuvase vṛṣannagne viśvānyarya ā
analyzed: saṃsamidh yuvase vṛṣan agne viśvāni aryaḥ ā

original: RV_10.191.01.2{49} iḷas padesamidhyase sa no vasūnyā bhara
analyzed: iḷaḥ padesamidhyase sa naḥ vasūni ā bhara

original: RV_10.191.02.1{49} saṃ gachadhvaṃ saṃ vadadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām
analyzed: sam gachadhvam sam vadadhvam sam vaḥ manāṃsi jānatām

original: RV_10.191.02.2{49} devā bhāgaṃ yathā pūrve saṃjānānā upāsate
analyzed: devāḥ bhāgam yathā pūrve saṃjānānāḥ upāsate

original: RV_10.191.03.1{49} samāno mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānaṃ manaḥ saha cittameṣām
analyzed: samānaḥ mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānam manaḥ saha cittam eṣām

original: RV_10.191.03.2{49} samānaṃ mantramabhi maṇtraye vaḥ samānena vohaviṣā juhomi
analyzed: samānam mantram abhi maṇtraye vaḥ samānena vaḥ haviṣā juhomi

original: RV_10.191.04.1{49} samānī va ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ
analyzed: samānī vaḥ ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ

original: RV_10.191.04.2{49} samānamastu vomano yathā vaḥ susahāsati
analyzed: samānam astu vomanaḥ yathā vaḥ su sahā asati
